40001001	This is the list of ancestors of Jesus Christ , descendant of David and Abraham .
40001002	Abraham was the father of Isaac , Isaac the father of Jacob , Jacob the father of Judah and his brothers .
40001003	Judah and Tamar were the father and mother of Perez and Zerah . Perez was the father of Hezron , Hezron the father of Ram ,
40001004	Ram the father of Amminadab , Amminadab the father of Nahshon , Nahshon the father of Salmon .
40001005	Salmon and Rahab were the father and mother of Boaz . Boaz and Ruth were the father and mother of Obed . Obed was the father of Jesse ,
40001006	Jesse the father of King David . David and Uriah’s wife Bathsheba were the father and mother of Solomon .
40001007	Solomon was the father of Rehoboam , Rehoboam the father of Abijah , Abijah the father of Asa ,
40001008	Asa the father of Jehoshaphat , Jehoshaphat the father of Joram , Joram the father of Uzziah ,
40001009	Uzziah the father of Jotham , Jotham the father of Ahaz , Ahaz the father of Hezekiah ,
40001010	Hezekiah the father of Manasseh , Manasseh the father of Amon , Amon the father of Josiah .
40001011	Josiah was the father of Jechoniah and his brothers . They lived at the time when the people were exiled to Babylon .
40001012	After the exile to Babylon , Jechoniah became the father of Shealtiel . Shealtiel was the father of Zerubbabel ,
40001013	Zerubbabel the father of Abiud , Abiud the father of Eliakim , Eliakim the father of Azor ,
40001014	Azor the father of Zadok , Zadok the father of Achim , Achim the father of Eliud ,
40001015	Eliud the father of Eleazar , Eleazar the father of Matthan , Matthan the father of Jacob .
40001016	Jacob was the father of Joseph , who was the husband of Mary . Mary was the mother of Jesus , who is called Christ .
40001017	So there were14 generations from Abraham to David , 14 generations from David until the exile to Babylon , 14 generations from the exile until the Messiah .
40001018	The birth of Jesus Christ took place in this way . His mother Mary had been promised to Joseph in marriage . But before they were married , Mary realized that she was pregnant by the Holy Spirit .
40001019	Her husband Joseph was an honorable man and did not want to disgrace her publicly . So he decided to break the marriage agreement with her secretly .
40001020	Joseph had this in mind when an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream . The angel said to him , “ Joseph , descendant of David , don’t be afraid to take Mary as your wife . She is pregnant by the Holy Spirit .
40001021	She will give birth to a son , and you will name him Jesus [ He Saves ] , because he will save his people from their sins . ”
40001022	All this happened so that what the Lord had spoken through the prophet came true :
40001023	“ The virgin will become pregnant and give birth to a son , and they will name him Immanuel , ” which means “ God is with us . ”
40001024	When Joseph woke up , he did what the angel of the Lord had commanded him to do . He took Mary to be his wife .
40001025	He did not have marital relations with her before she gave birth to a son . Joseph named the child Jesus .
40002001	Jesus was born in Bethlehem in Judea when Herod was king . After Jesus’ birth wise men from the east arrived in Jerusalem .
40002002	They asked , “ Where is the one who was born to be the king of the Jews ? We saw his star rising and have come to worship him . ”
40002003	When King Herod and all Jerusalem heard about this , they became disturbed .
40002004	He called together all the chief priests and scribes and tried to find out from them where the Messiah was supposed to be born .
40002005	They told him , “ In Bethlehem in Judea . The prophet wrote about this :
40002006	Bethlehem in the land of Judah , you are by no means least among the leaders of Judah . A leader will come from you . He will shepherd my people Israel . ”
40002007	Then Herod secretly called the wise men and found out from them exactly when the star had appeared .
40002008	As he sent them to Bethlehem , he said , “ Go and search carefully for the child . When you have found him , report to me so that I may go and worship him too . ”
40002009	After they had heard the king , they started out . The star they had seen rising led them until it stopped over the place where the child was .
40002010	They were overwhelmed with joy to see the star .
40002011	When they entered the house , they saw the child with his mother Mary . So they bowed down and worshiped him . Then they opened their treasure chests and offered him gifts of gold , frankincense , and myrrh .
40002012	God warned them in a dream not to go back to Herod . So they left for their country by another road .
40002013	After they had left , an angel of the Lord appeared to Joseph in a dream . The angel said to him , “ Get up , take the child and his mother , and flee to Egypt . Stay there until I tell you , because Herod intends to search for the child and kill him . ”
40002014	Joseph got up , took the child and his mother , and left for Egypt that night .
40002015	He stayed there until Herod died . What the Lord had spoken through the prophet came true : “ I have called my son out of Egypt . ”
40002016	When Herod saw that the wise men had tricked him , he became furious . He sent soldiers to kill all the boys two years old and younger in or near Bethlehem . This matched the exact time he had learned from the wise men .
40002017	Then the words spoken through the prophet Jeremiah came true :
40002018	“ A sound was heard in Ramah , the sound of crying in bitter grief . Rachel was crying for her children . She refused to be comfortedbecause they were dead . ”
40002019	After Herod was dead , an angel of the Lord appeared in a dream to Joseph in Egypt .
40002020	The angel said to him , “ Get up , take the child and his mother , and go to Israel . Those who tried to kill the child are dead . ”
40002021	Joseph got up , took the child and his mother , and went to Israel .
40002022	But when he heard that Archelaus had succeeded his father Herod as king of Judea , Joseph was afraid to go there . Warned in a dream , he left for Galilee
40002023	and made his home in a city called Nazareth . So what the prophets had said came true : “ He will be called a Nazarene . ”
40003001	Later , John the Baptizer appeared in the desert of Judea . His message was ,
40003002	“ Turn to God and change the way you think and act , because the kingdom of heaven is near . ”
40003003	Isaiah the prophet spoke about this man when he said , “ A voice cries out in the desert : ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord ! Make his paths straight ! ’ ”
40003004	John wore clothes made from camel’s hair and had a leather belt around his waist . His diet consisted of locusts and wild honey .
40003005	Jerusalem , all Judea , and the whole Jordan Valley went to him .
40003006	As they confessed their sins , he baptized them in the Jordan River .
40003007	But when he saw many Pharisees and Sadducees coming to be baptized , he said to them , “ You poisonous snakes ! Who showed you how to flee from God’s coming anger ?
40003008	Do those things that prove you have turned to God and have changed the way you think and act .
40003009	Don’t think you can say , ‘ Abraham is our ancestor . ’ I can guarantee that God can raise up descendants for Abraham from these stones .
40003010	The ax is now ready to cut the roots of the trees . Any tree that doesn’t produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into a fire .
40003011	I baptize you with water so that you will change the way you think and act . But the one who comes after me is more powerful than I . I am not worthy to remove his sandals . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and fire .
40003012	His winnowing shovel is in his hand , and he will clean up his threshing floor . He will gather his wheat into a barn , but he will burn the husks in a fire that can never be put out . ”
40003013	Then Jesus appeared . He came from Galilee to the Jordan River to be baptized by John .
40003014	But John tried to stop him and said , “ I need to be baptized by you . Why are you coming to me ? ”
40003015	Jesus answered him , “ This is the way it has to be now . This is the proper way to do everything that God requires of us . ” Then John gave in to him .
40003016	After Jesus was baptized , he immediately came up from the water . Suddenly , the heavens were opened , and he saw the Spirit of God coming down as a dove to him .
40003017	Then a voice from heaven said , “ This is my Son , whom I love—my Son with whom I am pleased . ”
40004001	Then the Spirit led Jesus into the desert to be tempted by the devil .
40004002	Jesus did not eat anything for 40 days and 40 nights . At the end of that time , he was hungry .
40004003	The tempter came to him and said , “ If you are the Son of God , tell these stones to become loaves of bread . ”
40004004	Jesus answered , “ Scripture says , ‘ A person cannot live on bread alone but on every word that God speaks . ’ ”
40004005	Then the devil took him into the holy city and had him stand on the highest part of the temple .
40004006	He said to Jesus , “ If you are the Son of God , jump ! Scripture says , ‘ He will put his angels in charge of you . They will carry you in their hands so that you never hit your foot against a rock . ’ ”
40004007	Jesus said to him , “ Again , Scripture says , ‘ Never tempt the Lord your God . ’ ”
40004008	Once more the devil took him to a very high mountain and showed him all the kingdoms in the world and their glory .
40004009	The devil said to him , “ I will give you all this if you will bow down and worship me . ”
40004010	Jesus said to him , “ Go away , Satan ! Scripture says , ‘ Worship the Lord your God and serve only him . ’ ”
40004011	Then the devil left him , and angels came to take care of him .
40004012	When Jesus heard that John had been put in prison , he went back to Galilee .
40004013	He left Nazareth and made his home in Capernaum on the shores of the Sea of Galilee . This was in the region of Zebulun and Naphtali .
40004014	So what the prophet Isaiah had said came true :
40004015	“ Land of Zebulun and land of Naphtali , on the way to the sea , across the Jordan River , Galilee , where foreigners live !
40004016	The people who lived in darknesshave seen a bright light . A light has risenfor those who live in a land overshadowed by death . ”
40004017	From then on , Jesus began to tell people , “ Turn to God and change the way you think and act , because the kingdom of heaven is near ! ”
40004018	As he was walking along the Sea of Galilee , he saw two brothers , Simon ( called Peter ) and Andrew . They were throwing a net into the sea because they were fishermen .
40004019	Jesus said to them , “ Come , follow me ! I will teach you how to catch people instead of fish . ”
40004020	They immediately left their nets and followed him .
40004021	As Jesus went on , he saw two other brothers , James and John , the sons of Zebedee . They were in a boat with their father Zebedee preparing their nets to go fishing . He called them ,
40004022	and they immediately left the boat and their father and followed Jesus .
40004023	Jesus went all over Galilee . He taught in the synagogues and spread the Good News of the kingdom . He also cured every disease and sickness among the people .
40004024	The news about Jesus spread throughout Syria . People brought him everyone who was sick , those who suffered from any kind of disease or pain . They also brought epileptics , those who were paralyzed , and people possessed by demons , and he cured them all .
40004025	Large crowds followed him . They came from Galilee , the Ten Cities , Jerusalem , Judea , and from across the Jordan River .
40005001	When Jesus saw the crowds , he went up a mountain and sat down . His disciples came to him ,
40005002	and he began to teach them :
40005003	“ Blessed are those who recognize they are spiritually helpless . The kingdom of heaven belongs to them .
40005004	Blessed are those who mourn . They will be comforted .
40005005	Blessed are those who are gentle . They will inherit the earth .
40005006	Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for God’s approval . They will be satisfied .
40005007	Blessed are those who show mercy . They will be treated mercifully .
40005008	Blessed are those whose thoughts are pure . They will see God .
40005009	Blessed are those who make peace . They will be called God’s children .
40005010	Blessed are those who are persecuted for doing what God approves of . The kingdom of heaven belongs to them .
40005011	“ Blessed are you when people insult you , persecute you , lie , and say all kinds of evil things about you because of me .
40005012	Rejoice and be glad because you have a great reward in heaven ! The prophets who lived before you were persecuted in these ways .
40005013	“ You are salt for the earth . But if salt loses its taste , how will it be made salty again ? It is no longer good for anything except to be thrown out and trampled on by people .
40005014	“ You are light for the world . A city cannot be hidden when it is located on a hill .
40005015	No one lights a lamp and puts it under a basket . Instead , everyone who lights a lamp puts it on a lamp stand . Then its light shines on everyone in the house .
40005016	In the same way let your light shine in front of people . Then they will see the good that you do and praise your Father in heaven .
40005017	“ Don’t ever think that I came to set aside Moses’ Teachings or the Prophets . I didn’t come to set them aside but to make them come true .
40005018	I can guarantee this truth : Until the earth and the heavens disappear , neither a period nor a comma will disappear from Moses’ Teachings before everything has come true .
40005019	So whoever sets aside any command that seems unimportant and teaches others to do the same will be unimportant in the kingdom of heaven . But whoever does and teaches what the commands say will be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
40005020	I can guarantee that unless you live a life that has God’s approval and do it more faithfully than the scribes and Pharisees , you will never enter the kingdom of heaven .
40005021	“ You have heard that it was said to your ancestors , ‘ Never murder . Whoever murders will answer for it in court . ’
40005022	But I can guarantee that whoever is angry with another believer will answer for it in court . Whoever calls another believer an insulting name will answer for it in the highest court . Whoever calls another believer a fool will answer for it in hellfire .
40005023	“ So if you are offering your gift at the altar and remember there that another believer has something against you ,
40005024	leave your gift at the altar . First go away and make peace with that person . Then come back and offer your gift .
40005025	“ Make peace quickly with your opponent while you are on the way to court with him . Otherwise , he will hand you over to the judge . Then the judge will hand you over to an officer , who will throw you into prison .
40005026	I can guarantee this truth : You will never get out until you pay every penny of your fine .
40005027	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ Never commit adultery . ’
40005028	But I can guarantee that whoever looks at a woman and desires her has already committed adultery in his heart .
40005029	“ So if your right eye causes you to sin , tear it out and throw it away . It is better for you to lose a part of your body than to have all of it thrown into hell .
40005030	And if your right hand leads you to sin , cut it off and throw it away . It is better for you to lose a part of your body than to have all of it go into hell .
40005031	“ It has also been said , ‘ Whoever divorces his wife must give her a written notice . ’
40005032	But I can guarantee that any man who divorces his wife for any reason other than unfaithfulness makes her look as though she has committed adultery . Whoever marries a woman divorced in this way makes himself look as though he has committed adultery .
40005033	“ You have heard that it was said to your ancestors , ‘ Never break your oath , but give to the Lord what you swore in an oath to give him . ’
40005034	But I tell you don’t swear an oath at all . Don’t swear an oath by heaven , which is God’s throne ,
40005035	or by the earth , which is his footstool , or by Jerusalem , which is the city of the great King .
40005036	And don’t swear an oath by your head . After all , you cannot make one hair black or white .
40005037	Simply say yes or no . Anything more than that comes from the evil one .
40005038	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth . ’
40005039	But I tell you not to oppose an evil person . If someone slaps you on your right cheek , turn your other cheek to him as well .
40005040	If someone wants to sue you in order to take your shirt , let him have your coat too .
40005041	If someone forces you to go one mile , go two miles with him .
40005042	Give to everyone who asks you for something . Don’t turn anyone away who wants to borrow something from you .
40005043	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ Love your neighbor , and hate your enemy . ’
40005044	But I tell you this : Love your enemies , and pray for those who persecute you .
40005045	In this way you show that you are children of your Father in heaven . He makes his sun rise on people whether they are good or evil . He lets rain fall on them whether they are just or unjust .
40005046	If you love those who love you , do you deserve a reward ? Even the tax collectors do that !
40005047	Are you doing anything remarkable if you welcome only your friends ? Everyone does that !
40005048	That is why you must be perfect as your Father in heaven is perfect .
40006001	“ Be careful not to do your good works in public in order to attract attention . If you do , your Father in heaven will not reward you .
40006002	So when you give to the poor , don’t announce it with trumpet fanfare . This is what hypocrites do in the synagogues and on the streets in order to be praised by people . I can guarantee this truth : That will be their only reward .
40006003	When you give to the poor , don’t let your left hand know what your right hand is doing .
40006004	Give your contributions privately . Your Father sees what you do in private . He will reward you .
40006005	“ When you pray , don’t be like hypocrites . They like to stand in synagogues and on street corners to pray so that everyone can see them . I can guarantee this truth : That will be their only reward .
40006006	When you pray , go to your room and close the door . Pray privately to your Father who is with you . Your Father sees what you do in private . He will reward you .
40006007	“ When you pray , don’t ramble like heathens who think they’ll be heard if they talk a lot .
40006008	Don’t be like them . Your Father knows what you need before you ask him .
40006009	“ This is how you should pray : Our Father in heaven , let your name be kept holy .
40006010	Let your kingdom come . Let your will be done on earthas it is done in heaven .
40006011	Give us our daily bread today .
40006012	Forgive us as we forgive others .
40006013	Don’t allow us to be tempted . Instead , rescue us from the evil one .
40006014	“ If you forgive the failures of others , your heavenly Father will also forgive you .
40006015	But if you don’t forgive others , your Father will not forgive your failures .
40006016	“ When you fast , stop looking sad like hypocrites . They put on sad faces to make it obvious that they’re fasting . I can guarantee this truth : That will be their only reward .
40006017	When you fast , wash your face and comb your hair .
40006018	Then your fasting won’t be obvious . Instead , it will be obvious to your Father who is with you in private . Your Father sees what you do in private . He will reward you .
40006019	“ Stop storing up treasures for yourselves on earth , where moths and rust destroy and thieves break in and steal .
40006020	Instead , store up treasures for yourselves in heaven , where moths and rust don’t destroy and thieves don’t break in and steal .
40006021	Your heart will be where your treasure is .
40006022	“ The eye is the lamp of the body . So if your eye is unclouded , your whole body will be full of light .
40006023	But if your eye is evil , your whole body will be full of darkness . If the light in you is darkness , how dark it will be !
40006024	“ No one can serve two masters . He will hate the first master and love the second , or he will be devoted to the first and despise the second . You cannot serve God and wealth .
40006025	“ So I tell you to stop worrying about what you will eat , drink , or wear . Isn’t life more than food and the body more than clothes ?
40006026	“ Look at the birds . They don’t plant , harvest , or gather the harvest into barns . Yet , your heavenly Father feeds them . Aren’t you worth more than they ?
40006027	“ Can any of you add a single hour to your life by worrying ?
40006028	“ And why worry about clothes ? Notice how the flowers grow in the field . They never work or spin yarn for clothes .
40006029	But I say that not even Solomon in all his majesty was dressed like one of these flowers .
40006030	That’s the way God clothes the grass in the field . Today it’s alive , and tomorrow it’s thrown into an incinerator . So how much more will he clothe you people who have so little faith ?
40006031	“ Don’t ever worry and say , ‘ What are we going to eat ? ’ or ‘ What are we going to drink ? ’ or ‘ What are we going to wear ? ’
40006032	Everyone is concerned about these things , and your heavenly Father certainly knows you need all of them .
40006033	But first , be concerned about his kingdom and what has his approval . Then all these things will be provided for you .
40006034	“ So don’t ever worry about tomorrow . After all , tomorrow will worry about itself . Each day has enough trouble of its own .
40007001	“ Stop judging so that you will not be judged .
40007002	Otherwise , you will be judged by the same standard you use to judge others . The standards you use for others will be applied to you .
40007003	So why do you see the piece of sawdust in another believer’s eye and not notice the wooden beam in your own eye ?
40007004	How can you say to another believer , ‘ Let me take the piece of sawdust out of your eye , ’ when you have a beam in your own eye ?
40007005	You hypocrite ! First remove the beam from your own eye . Then you will see clearly to remove the piece of sawdust from another believer’s eye .
40007006	“ Don’t give what is holy to dogs or throw your pearls to pigs . Otherwise , they will trample them and then tear you to pieces .
40007007	“ Ask , and you will receive . Search , and you will find . Knock , and the door will be opened for you .
40007008	Everyone who asks will receive . The one who searches will find , and for the one who knocks , the door will be opened .
40007009	“ If your child asks you for bread , would any of you give him a stone ?
40007010	Or if your child asks for a fish , would you give him a snake ?
40007011	Even though you’re evil , you know how to give good gifts to your children . So how much more will your Father in heaven give good things to those who ask him ?
40007012	“ Always do for other people everything you want them to do for you . That is the meaning of Moses’ Teachings and the Prophets .
40007013	“ Enter through the narrow gate because the gate and road that lead to destruction are wide . Many enter through the wide gate .
40007014	But the narrow gate and the road that lead to life are full of trouble . Only a few people find the narrow gate .
40007015	“ Beware of false prophets . They come to you disguised as sheep , but in their hearts they are vicious wolves .
40007016	You will know them by what they produce . “ People don’t pick grapes from thornbushes or figs from thistles , do they ?
40007017	In the same way every good tree produces good fruit , but a rotten tree produces bad fruit .
40007018	A good tree cannot produce bad fruit , and a rotten tree cannot produce good fruit .
40007019	Any tree that fails to produce good fruit is cut down and thrown into a fire .
40007020	So you will know them by what they produce .
40007021	“ Not everyone who says to me , ‘ Lord , Lord ! ’ will enter the kingdom of heaven , but only the person who does what my Father in heaven wants .
40007022	Many will say to me on that day , ‘ Lord , Lord , didn’t we prophesy in your name ? Didn’t we force out demons and do many miracles by the power and authority of your name ? ’
40007023	Then I will tell them publicly , ‘ I’ve never known you . Get away from me , you evil people . ’
40007024	“ Therefore , everyone who hears what I say and obeys it will be like a wise person who built a house on rock .
40007025	Rain poured , and floods came . Winds blew and beat against that house . But it did not collapse , because its foundation was on rock .
40007026	“ Everyone who hears what I say but doesn’t obey it will be like a foolish person who built a house on sand .
40007027	Rain poured , and floods came . Winds blew and struck that house . It collapsed , and the result was a total disaster . ”
40007028	When Jesus finished this speech , the crowds were amazed at his teachings .
40007029	Unlike their scribes , he taught them with authority .
40008001	When Jesus came down from the mountain , large crowds followed him .
40008002	A man with a serious skin disease came and bowed down in front of him . The man said to Jesus , “ Sir , if you’re willing , you can make me clean . ”
40008003	Jesus reached out , touched him , and said , “ I’m willing . So be clean ! ” Immediately , his skin disease went away , and he was clean .
40008004	Jesus said to him , “ Don’t tell anyone about this ! Instead , show yourself to the priest . Then offer the sacrifice Moses commanded as proof to people that you are clean . ”
40008005	When Jesus went to Capernaum , a Roman army officer came to beg him for help .
40008006	The officer said , “ Sir , my servant is lying at home paralyzed and in terrible pain . ”
40008007	Jesus said to him , “ I’ll come to heal him . ”
40008008	The officer responded , “ Sir , I don’t deserve to have you come into my house . But just give a command , and my servant will be healed .
40008009	As you know , I’m in a chain of command and have soldiers at my command . I tell one of them , ‘ Go ! ’ and he goes , and another , ‘ Come ! ’ and he comes . I tell my servant , ‘ Do this ! ’ and he does it . ”
40008010	Jesus was amazed when he heard this . He said to those who were following him , “ I can guarantee this truth : I haven’t found faith as great as this in anyone in Israel .
40008011	I can guarantee that many will come from all over the world . They will eat with Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob in the kingdom of heaven .
40008012	The citizens of that kingdom will be thrown outside into the darkness . People will cry and be in extreme pain there .
40008013	Jesus told the officer , “ Go ! What you believed will be done for you . ” And at that moment the servant was healed .
40008014	When Jesus went to Peter’s house , he saw Peter’s mother-in-law in bed with a fever .
40008015	Jesus touched her hand , and the fever went away . So she got up and prepared a meal for him .
40008016	In the evening the people brought him many who were possessed by demons . He forced the evil spirits out of people with a command and cured everyone who was sick .
40008017	So what the prophet Isaiah had said came true : “ He took away our weaknesses and removed our diseases . ”
40008018	Now , when Jesus saw a crowd around him , he ordered his disciples to cross to the other side of the Sea of Galilee .
40008019	A scribe came to him and said , “ Teacher , I’ll follow you wherever you go . ”
40008020	Jesus told him , “ Foxes have holes , and birds have nests , but the Son of Man has nowhere to sleep . ”
40008021	Another disciple said to him , “ Sir , first let me go to bury my father . ”
40008022	But Jesus told him , “ Follow me , and let the dead bury their own dead . ”
40008023	Jesus’ disciples went with him as he left in a boat .
40008024	Suddenly , a severe storm came across the sea . The waves were covering the boat . Yet , Jesus was sleeping .
40008025	So they woke him up , saying , “ Lord ! Save us ! We’re going to die ! ”
40008026	Jesus said to them , “ Why do you cowards have so little faith ? ” Then he got up , gave an order to the wind and the sea , and the sea became very calm .
40008027	The men were amazed and asked , “ What kind of man is this ? Even the wind and the sea obey him ! ”
40008028	When he arrived in the territory of the Gadarenes on the other side of the Sea of Galilee , two men met him . They were possessed by demons and had come out of the tombs . No one could travel along that road because the men were so dangerous .
40008029	They shouted , “ Why are you bothering us now , Son of God ? Did you come here to torture us before it is time ? ”
40008030	A large herd of pigs was feeding in the distance .
40008031	The demons begged Jesus , “ If you’re going to force us out , send us into that herd of pigs . ”
40008032	Jesus said to them , “ Go ! ” The demons came out and went into the pigs . Suddenly , the whole herd rushed down the cliff into the sea and died in the water .
40008033	Those who took care of the pigs ran into the city . There they reported everything , especially about the men possessed by demons .
40008034	Everyone from the city went to meet Jesus . When they saw him , they begged him to leave their territory .

40009017	Nor do people pour new wine into old wineskins . If they do , the skins burst , the wine runs out , and the skins are ruined . Rather , people pour new wine into fresh skins , and both are saved . ”
40009018	A synagogue leader came to Jesus while he was talking to John’s disciples . He bowed down in front of Jesus and said , “ My daughter just died . Come , lay your hand on her , and she will live . ”
40009019	Jesus and his disciples got up and followed the man .

40009021	She thought , “ If I only touch his clothes , I’ll get well . ”
40009022	When Jesus turned and saw her he said , “ Cheer up , daughter ! Your faith has made you well . ” At that very moment the woman became well .

40009027	When Jesus left that place , two blind men followed him . They shouted , “ Have mercy on us , Son of David . ”

40009030	Then they could see . He warned them , “ Don’t let anyone know about this ! ”

40010001	Jesus called his twelve disciples and gave them authority to force evil spirits out of people and to cure every disease and sickness .

40010003	Philip and Bartholomew ; Thomas and Matthew the tax collector ; James ( son of Alphaeus ) , and Thaddaeus ;

40010009	“ Don’t take any gold , silver , or even copper coins in your pockets .
40010010	Don’t take a traveling bag for the trip , a change of clothes , sandals , or a walking stick . After all , the worker deserves to have his needs met .

40010012	When you go into a house , greet the family .
40010013	If it is a family that listens to you , allow your greeting to stand . But if it is not receptive , take back your greeting .

40010016	“ I’m sending you out like sheep among wolves . So be as cunning as snakes but as innocent as doves .

40010020	Indeed , you’re not the ones who will be speaking . The Spirit of your Father will be speaking through you .
40010021	“ Brother will hand over brother to death ; a father will hand over his child . Children will rebel against their parents and kill them .
40010022	Everyone will hate you because you are committed to me . But the person who patiently endures to the end will be saved .
40010023	So when they persecute you in one city , flee to another . I can guarantee this truth : Before you have gone through every city in Israel , the Son of Man will come .
40010024	“ A student is not better than his teacher . Nor is a slave better than his owner .

40010026	So don’t be afraid of them . Nothing has been covered that will not be exposed . Whatever is secret will be made known .
40010027	Tell in the daylight what I say to you in the dark . Shout from the housetops what you hear whispered .
40010028	Don’t be afraid of those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul . Instead , fear the one who can destroy both body and soul in hell .
40010029	“ Aren’t two sparrows sold for a penny ? Not one of them will fall to the ground without your Father’s permission .
40010030	Every hair on your head has been counted .
40010031	Don’t be afraid ! You are worth more than many sparrows .
40010032	“ So I will acknowledge in front of my Father in heaven that person who acknowledges me in front of others .
40010033	But I will tell my Father in heaven that I don’t know the person who tells others that he doesn’t know me .
40010034	“ Don’t think that I came to bring peace to earth . I didn’t come to bring peace but conflict .
40010035	I came to turn a man against his father , a daughter against her mother , a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law .
40010036	A person’s enemies will be the members of his own family .
40010037	“ The person who loves his father or mother more than me does not deserve to be my disciple . The person who loves a son or daughter more than me does not deserve to be my disciple .
40010038	Whoever doesn’t take up his cross and follow me doesn’t deserve to be my disciple .
40010039	The person who tries to preserve his life will lose it , but the person who loses his life for me will preserve it .
40010040	“ The person who welcomes you welcomes me , and the person who welcomes me welcomes the one who sent me .
40010041	The person who welcomes a prophet as a prophet will receive a prophet’s reward . The person who welcomes a righteous person as a righteous person will receive a righteous person’s reward .
40010042	I can guarantee this truth : Whoever gives any of my humble followers a cup of cold water because that person is my disciple will certainly never lose his reward . ”

40013001	That same day Jesus left the house and sat down by the Sea of Galilee .
40013002	The crowd that gathered around him was so large that he got into a boat . He sat in the boat while the entire crowd stood on the shore .
40013003	Then he used stories as illustrations to tell them many things . He said , “ Listen ! A farmer went to plant seed .
40013004	Some seeds were planted along the road , and birds came and devoured them .
40013005	Other seeds were planted on rocky ground , where there was little soil . The plants sprouted quickly because the soil wasn’t deep .
40013006	But when the sun came up , they were scorched . They withered because their roots weren’t deep enough .
40013007	Other seeds were planted among thornbushes , and the thornbushes grew up and choked them .
40013008	But other seeds were planted on good ground and produced grain . They produced one hundred , sixty , or thirty times as much as was planted .
40013009	Let the person who has ears listen ! ”
40013010	The disciples asked him , “ Why do you use stories as illustrations when you speak to people ? ”
40013011	Jesus answered , “ Knowledge about the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven has been given to you . But it has not been given to the crowd .
40013012	Those who understand these mysteries will be given more knowledge , and they will excel in understanding them . However , some people don’t understand these mysteries . Even what they understand will be taken away from them .
40013013	This is why I speak to them this way . They see , but they’re blind . They hear , but they don’t listen . They don’t even try to understand .
40013014	So they make Isaiah’s prophecy come true : ‘ You will hear clearly but never understand . You will see clearly but never comprehend .
40013015	These people have become close-mindedand hard of hearing . They have shut their eyesso that their eyes never see . Their ears never hear . Their minds never understand . And they never return to me for healing ! ’
40013016	“ Blessed are your eyes because they see and your ears because they hear .
40013017	I can guarantee this truth : Many prophets and many of God’s people longed to see what you see but didn’t see it , to hear what you hear but didn’t hear it .
40013018	“ Listen to what the story about the farmer means .
40013019	Someone hears the word about the kingdom but doesn’t understand it . The evil one comes at once and snatches away what was planted in him . This is what the seed planted along the road illustrates .
40013020	The seed planted on rocky ground is the person who hears the word and accepts it at once with joy .
40013021	Since he doesn’t have any root , he lasts only a little while . When suffering or persecution comes along because of the word , he immediately falls from faith .
40013022	The seed planted among thornbushes is another person who hears the word . But the worries of life and the deceitful pleasures of riches choke the word so that it can’t produce anything .
40013023	But the seed planted on good ground is the person who hears and understands the word . This type produces crops . They produce one hundred , sixty , or thirty times as much as was planted . ”
40013024	Jesus used another illustration . He said , “ The kingdom of heaven is like a man who planted good seed in his field .
40013025	But while people were asleep , his enemy planted weeds in the wheat field and went away .
40013026	When the wheat came up and formed kernels , weeds appeared .
40013027	“ The owner’s workers came to him and asked , ‘ Sir , didn’t you plant good seed in your field ? Where did the weeds come from ? ’
40013028	“ He told them , ‘ An enemy did this . ’ “ His workers asked him , ‘ Do you want us to pull out the weeds ? ’
40013029	“ He replied , ‘ No . If you pull out the weeds , you may pull out the wheat with them .
40013030	Let both grow together until the harvest . When the grain is cut , I will tell the workers to gather the weeds first and tie them in bundles to be burned . But I’ll have them bring the wheat into my barn . ’ ”
40013031	Jesus used another illustration . He said , “ The kingdom of heaven is like a mustard seed that someone planted in a field .
40013032	It’s one of the smallest seeds . However , when it has grown , it is taller than the garden plants . It becomes a tree that is large enough for birds to nest in its branches . ”
40013033	He used another illustration . “ The kingdom of heaven is like yeast that a woman mixed into a large amount of flour until the yeast worked its way through all the dough . ”
40013034	Jesus used illustrations to tell the crowds all these things . He did not tell them anything without illustrating it with a story .
40013035	So what the prophet had said came true : “ I will open my mouth to illustrate points . I will tell what has been hidden since the world was made . ”
40013036	When Jesus had sent the people away , he went into the house . His disciples came to him and said , “ Explain what the illustration of the weeds in the field means . ”
40013037	He answered , “ The one who plants the good seeds is the Son of Man .

40013040	Just as weeds are gathered and burned , so it will be at the end of time .
40013041	The Son of Man will send his angels . They will gather everything in his kingdom that causes people to sin and everyone who does evil .
40013042	The angels will throw them into a blazing furnace . People will cry and be in extreme pain there .
40013043	Then the people who have God’s approval will shine like the sun in their Father’s kingdom . Let the person who has ears listen !
40013044	“ The kingdom of heaven is like a treasure buried in a field . When a man discovered it , he buried it again . He was so delighted with it that he went away , sold everything he had , and bought that field .
40013045	“ Also , the kingdom of heaven is like a merchant who was searching for fine pearls .
40013046	When he found a valuable pearl , he went away , sold everything he had , and bought it .
40013047	“ Also , the kingdom of heaven is like a net that was thrown into the sea . It gathered all kinds of fish .
40013048	When it was full , they pulled it to the shore . Then they sat down , gathered the good fish into containers , and threw the bad ones away .
40013049	The same thing will happen at the end of time . The angels will go out and separate the evil people from people who have God’s approval .

40014027	Immediately , Jesus said , “ Calm down ! It’s me . Don’t be afraid ! ”
40014028	Peter answered , “ Lord , if it is you , order me to come to you on the water . ”
40014029	Jesus said , “ Come ! ” So Peter got out of the boat and walked on the water toward Jesus .
40014030	But when he noticed how strong the wind was , he became afraid and started to sink . He shouted , “ Lord , save me ! ”
40014031	Immediately , Jesus reached out , caught hold of him , and said , “ You have so little faith ! Why did you doubt ? ”
40014032	When they got into the boat , the wind stopped blowing .
40014033	The men in the boat bowed down in front of Jesus and said , “ You are truly the Son of God . ”

40014035	The men there recognized Jesus and sent messengers all around the countryside . The people brought him everyone who was sick .
40014036	They begged him to let them touch just the edge of his clothes . Everyone who touched his clothes was made well .
40015001	Then some Pharisees and scribes came from Jerusalem to Jesus . They asked ,
40015002	“ Why do your disciples break the traditions of our ancestors ? They do not wash their hands before they eat . ”
40015003	He answered them , “ Why do you break the commandment of God because of your traditions ?
40015004	For example , God said , ‘ Honor your father and your mother ’ and ‘ Whoever curses father or mother must be put to death . ’
40015005	But you say that whoever tells his father or mother , ‘ I have given to God whatever support you might have received from me , ’
40015006	does not have to honor his father . Because of your traditions you have destroyed the authority of God’s word .
40015007	You hypocrites ! Isaiah was right when he prophesied about you :
40015008	‘ These people honor me with their lips , but their hearts are far from me .
40015009	Their worship of me is pointless , because their teachings are rules made by humans . ’ ”
40015010	Then he called the crowd and said to them , “ Listen and try to understand !
40015011	What goes into a person’s mouth doesn’t make him unclean . It’s what comes out of the mouth that makes a person unclean . ”

40015013	He answered , “ Any plant that my heavenly Father did not plant will be uprooted .

40015021	Jesus left that place and went to the region of Tyre and Sidon .

40015032	Jesus called his disciples and said , “ I feel sorry for the people . They have been with me three days now and have nothing to eat . I don’t want to send them away hungry , or they may become exhausted on their way home . ”

40015037	All of them ate as much as they wanted . The disciples picked up the leftover pieces and filled seven large baskets .
40015038	Four thousand men had eaten . ( This number does not include the women and children who had eaten . )
40015039	After he sent the people on their way , Jesus stepped into the boat and came to the territory of Magadan .

40016002	He responded to them , “ In the evening you say that the weather will be fine because the sky is red .

40016004	“ Evil and unfaithful people look for a miraculous sign . But the only sign they will be given is that of Jonah . ” Then he left them standing there and went away .

40017001	After six days Jesus took Peter , James , and John ( the brother of James ) and led them up a high mountain where they could be alone .

40017025	“ Certainly , ” he answered . Peter went into the house . Before he could speak , Jesus asked him , “ What do you think , Simon ? From whom do the kings of the world collect fees or taxes ? Is it from their family members or from other people ? ”

40018001	At that time the disciples came to Jesus and asked , “ Who is greatest in the kingdom of heaven ? ”
40018002	He called a little child and had him stand among them .
40018003	Then he said to them , “ I can guarantee this truth : Unless you change and become like little children , you will never enter the kingdom of heaven .

40018005	And whoever welcomes a child like this in my name welcomes me .
40018006	“ These little ones believe in me . It would be best for the person who causes one of them to lose faith to be drowned in the sea with a large stone hung around his neck .

40018008	“ If your hand or your foot causes you to lose your faith , cut it off and throw it away . It is better for you to enter life disabled or injured than to have two hands or two feet and be thrown into everlasting fire .
40018009	If your eye causes you to lose your faith , tear it out and throw it away . It is better for you to enter life with one eye than to have two eyes and be thrown into hellfire .
40018010	“ Be careful not to despise these little ones . I can guarantee that their angels in heaven always see the face of my Father , who is in heaven .
40018012	“ What do you think ? Suppose a man has 100 sheep and one of them strays . Won’t he leave the 99 sheep in the hills to look for the one that has strayed ?
40018013	I can guarantee this truth : If he finds it , he is happier about it than about the 99 that have not strayed .
40018014	In the same way , your Father in heaven does not want one of these little ones to be lost .
40018015	“ If a believer does something wrong , go , confront him when the two of you are alone . If he listens to you , you have won back that believer .
40018016	But if he does not listen , take one or two others with you so that every accusation may be verified by two or three witnesses .
40018017	If he ignores these witnesses , tell it to the community of believers . If he also ignores the community , deal with him as you would a heathen or a tax collector .
40018018	I can guarantee this truth : Whatever you imprison , God will imprison . And whatever you set free , God will set free .

40018025	Because he could not pay off the debt , the master ordered him , his wife , his children , and all that he had to be sold to pay off the account .

40018027	“ The master felt sorry for his servant , freed him , and canceled his debt .
40018028	But when that servant went away , he found a servant who owed him hundreds of dollars . He grabbed the servant he found and began to choke him . ‘ Pay what you owe ! ’ he said .
40018029	“ Then that other servant fell at his feet and begged him , ‘ Be patient with me , and I will repay you . ’
40018030	But he refused . Instead , he turned away and had that servant put into prison until he would repay what he owed .
40018031	“ The other servants who worked with him saw what had happened and felt very sad . They told their master the whole story .
40018032	“ Then his master sent for him and said to him , ‘ You evil servant ! I canceled your entire debt , because you begged me .

40018034	“ His master was so angry that he handed him over to the torturers until he would repay everything that he owed .

40019030	However , many who are first will be last , and many who are last will be first .
40020001	“ The kingdom of heaven is like a landowner who went out at daybreak to hire workers for his vineyard .
40020002	After agreeing to pay the workers the usual day’s wages , he sent them to work in his vineyard .
40020003	About 9 a . m . he saw others standing in the marketplace without work .
40020004	He said to them , ‘ Work in my vineyard , and I’ll give you whatever is right . ’ So they went .
40020005	“ He went out again about noon and 3 p . m . and did the same thing .
40020006	About 5 p . m . he went out and found some others standing around . He said to them , ‘ Why are you standing here all day long without work ? ’
40020007	“ ‘ No one has hired us , ’ they answered him . “ He said to them , ‘ Work in my vineyard . ’
40020008	“ When evening came , the owner of the vineyard told the supervisor , ‘ Call the workers , and give them their wages . Start with the last , and end with the first . ’
40020009	“ Those who started working about 5 p . m . came , and each received a day’s wages .
40020010	When those who had been hired first came , they expected to receive more . But each of them received a day’s wages .
40020011	Although they took it , they began to protest to the owner .
40020012	They said , ‘ These last workers have worked only one hour . Yet , you’ve treated us all the same , even though we worked hard all day under a blazing sun . ’
40020013	“ The owner said to one of them , ‘ Friend , I’m not treating you unfairly . Didn’t you agree with me on a day’s wages ?
40020014	Take your money and go ! I want to give this last worker as much as I gave you .
40020015	Can’t I do what I want with my own money ? Or do you resent my generosity towards others ? ’

40021001	When they came near Jerusalem and had reached Bethphage on the Mount of Olives , Jesus sent two disciples ahead of him .

40021026	But if we say , ‘ from humans , ’ we’re afraid of what the crowd might do . All those people think of John as a prophet . ”

40021028	“ What do you think about this ? A man had two sons . He went to the first and said , ‘ Son , go to work in the vineyard today . ’
40021029	“ His son replied , ‘ I don’t want to ! ’ But later he changed his mind and went .
40021030	“ The father went to the other son and told him the same thing . He replied , ‘ I will , sir , ’ but he didn’t go .

40021033	“ Listen to another illustration . A landowner planted a vineyard . He put a wall around it , made a winepress , and built a watchtower . Then he leased it to vineyard workers and went on a trip .
40021034	“ When the grapes were getting ripe , he sent his servants to the workers to collect his share of the produce .

40026063	But Jesus was silent . Then the chief priest said to him , “ Swear an oath in front of the living God and tell us , are you the Messiah , the Son of God ? ”
40026064	Jesus answered him , “ Yes , I am . But I can guarantee that from now on you will see the Son of Man in the highest position in heaven . He will be coming on the clouds of heaven . ”
40026065	Then the chief priest tore his robes in horror and said , “ He has dishonored God ! Why do we need any more witnesses ? You’ve just heard him dishonor God !
40026066	What’s your verdict ? ” They answered , “ He deserves the death penalty ! ”
40026067	Then they spit in his face , hit him with their fists , and some of them slapped him .
40026068	They said , “ You Christ , if you’re a prophet , tell us who hit you . ”
40026069	Peter was sitting in the courtyard . A female servant came to him and said , “ You , too , were with Jesus the Galilean . ”
40026070	But Peter denied it in front of them all by saying , “ I don’t know what you’re talking about . ”
40026071	As he went to the entrance , another female servant saw him . She told those who were there , “ This man was with Jesus from Nazareth . ”
40026072	Again Peter denied it and swore with an oath , “ I don’t know the man ! ”
40026073	After a little while the men standing there approached Peter and said , “ It’s obvious you’re also one of them . Your accent gives you away ! ”
40026074	Then Peter began to curse and swear with an oath , “ I don’t know the man ! ” Just then a rooster crowed .
40026075	Peter remembered what Jesus had said : “ Before a rooster crows , you will say three times that you don’t know me . ” Then Peter went outside and cried bitterly .
40027001	Early in the morning all the chief priests and the leaders of the people decided to execute Jesus .
40027002	They tied him up , led him away , and handed him over to Pilate , the governor .
40027003	Then Judas , who had betrayed Jesus , regretted what had happened when he saw that Jesus was condemned . He brought the 30 silver coins back to the chief priests and leaders .
40027004	He said , “ I’ve sinned by betraying an innocent man . ” They replied , “ What do we care ? That’s your problem . ”
40027005	So he threw the money into the temple , went away , and hanged himself .
40027006	The chief priests took the money and said , “ It’s not right to put it into the temple treasury , because it’s blood money . ”
40027007	So they decided to use it to buy a potter’s field for the burial of strangers .
40027008	That’s why that field has been called the Field of Blood ever since .
40027009	Then what the prophet Jeremiah had said came true , “ They took the 30 silver coins , the price the people of Israel had placed on him ,
40027010	and used the coins to buy a potter’s field , as the Lord had directed me . ”
40027011	Jesus stood in front of the governor , Pilate . The governor asked him , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” “ Yes , I am , ” Jesus answered .
40027012	While the chief priests and leaders were accusing him , he said nothing .
40027013	Then Pilate asked him , “ Don’t you hear how many charges they’re bringing against you ? ”
40027014	But Jesus said absolutely nothing to him in reply , so the governor was very surprised .
40027015	At every Passover festival the governor would free one prisoner whom the crowd wanted .
40027016	At that time there was a well-known prisoner by the name of Barabbas .
40027017	So when the people gathered , Pilate asked them , “ Which man do you want me to free for you ? Do you want me to free Barabbas or Jesus , who is called Christ ? ”
40027018	Pilate knew that they had handed Jesus over to him because they were jealous .
40027019	While Pilate was judging the case , his wife sent him a message . It said , “ Leave that innocent man alone . I’ve been very upset today because of a dream I had about him . ”
40027020	But the chief priests and leaders persuaded the crowd to ask for the release of Barabbas and the execution of Jesus .
40027021	The governor asked them , “ Which of the two do you want me to free for you ? ” They said , “ Barabbas . ”
40027022	Pilate asked them , “ Then what should I do with Jesus , who is called Christ ? ” “ He should be crucified ! ” they all said .
40027023	Pilate asked , “ Why ? What has he done wrong ? ” But they began to shout loudly , “ He should be crucified ! ”
40027024	Pilate saw that he was not getting anywhere . Instead , a riot was breaking out . So Pilate took some water and washed his hands in front of the crowd . He said , “ I won’t be guilty of killing this man . Do what you want ! ”
40027025	All the people answered , “ The responsibility for killing him will rest on us and our children . ”
40027026	Then Pilate freed Barabbas for the people . But he had Jesus whipped and handed over to be crucified .
40027027	Then the governor’s soldiers took Jesus into the palace and gathered the whole troop around him .
40027028	They took off his clothes and put a bright red cape on him .
40027029	They twisted some thorns into a crown , placed it on his head , and put a stick in his right hand . They knelt in front of him and made fun of him by saying , “ Long live the king of the Jews ! ”
40027030	After they had spit on him , they took the stick and kept hitting him on the head with it .
40027031	After the soldiers finished making fun of Jesus , they took off the cape and put his own clothes back on him . Then they led him away to crucify him .
40027032	On the way they found a man named Simon . He was from the city of Cyrene . The soldiers forced him to carry Jesus’ cross .
40027033	They came to a place called Golgotha ( which means “ the place of the skull ” ) .
40027034	They gave him a drink of wine mixed with a drug called gall . When he tasted it , he refused to drink it .
40027035	After they had crucified him , they divided his clothes among themselves by throwing dice .
40027036	Then they sat there and kept watch over him .
40027037	They placed a written accusation above his head . It read , “ This is Jesus , the king of the Jews . ”
40027038	At that time they crucified two criminals with him , one on his right and the other on his left .
40027039	Those who passed by insulted him . They shook their heads
40027040	and said , “ You were going to tear down God’s temple and build it again in three days . Save yourself ! If you’re the Son of God , come down from the cross . ”
40027041	The chief priests together with the scribes and the leaders made fun of him in the same way . They said ,
40027042	“ He saved others , but he can’t save himself . So he’s Israel’s king ! Let him come down from the cross now , and we’ll believe him .
40027043	He trusted God . Let God rescue him now if he wants . After all , this man said , ‘ I am the Son of God . ’ ”
40027044	Even the criminals crucified with him were insulting him the same way .
40027045	At noon darkness came over the whole land until three in the afternoon .
40027046	About three o’clock Jesus cried out in a loud voice , “ Eli , Eli , lema sabachthani ? ” which means , “ My God , my God , why have you abandoned me ? ”
40027047	When some of the people standing there heard him say that , they said , “ He’s calling Elijah . ”
40027048	One of the men ran at once , took a sponge , and soaked it in some vinegar . Then he put it on a stick and offered Jesus a drink .
40027049	The others said , “ Leave him alone ! Let’s see if Elijah comes to save him . ”
40027050	Then Jesus loudly cried out once again and gave up his life .
40027051	Suddenly , the curtain in the temple was split in two from top to bottom . The earth shook , and the rocks were split open .
40027052	The tombs were opened , and the bodies of many holy people who had died came back to life .
40027053	They came out of the tombs after he had come back to life , and they went into the holy city where they appeared to many people .
40027054	An army officer and those watching Jesus with him saw the earthquake and the other things happening . They were terrified and said , “ Certainly , this was the Son of God ! ”
40027055	Many women were there watching from a distance . They had followed Jesus from Galilee and had always supported him .
40027056	Among them were Mary from Magdala , Mary ( the mother of James and Joseph ) , and the mother of Zebedee’s sons .
40027057	In the evening a rich man named Joseph arrived . He was from the city of Arimathea and had become a disciple of Jesus .
40027058	He went to Pilate and asked for the body of Jesus . Pilate ordered that it be given to him .
40027059	Joseph took the body and wrapped it in a clean linen cloth .
40027060	Then he laid it in his own new tomb , which had been cut in a rock . After rolling a large stone against the door of the tomb , he went away .
40027061	Mary from Magdala and the other Mary were sitting there , facing the tomb .
40027062	The next day , which was the day of worship , the chief priests and Pharisees gathered together and went to Pilate .
40027063	They said , “ Sir , we remember how that deceiver said while he was still alive , ‘ After three days I will be brought back to life . ’
40027064	Therefore , give the order to make the tomb secure until the third day . Otherwise , his disciples may steal him and say to the people , ‘ He has been brought back to life . ’ Then the last deception will be worse than the first . ”
40027065	Pilate told them , “ You have the soldiers you want for guard duty . Go and make the tomb as secure as you know how . ”
40027066	So they went to secure the tomb . They placed a seal on the stone and posted the soldiers on guard duty .
40028001	After the day of worship , as the sun rose Sunday morning , Mary from Magdala and the other Mary went to look at the tomb .
40028002	Suddenly , there was a powerful earthquake . An angel of the Lord had come down from heaven , rolled the stone away , and was sitting on it .
40028003	He was as bright as lightning , and his clothes were as white as snow .
40028004	The guards were so deathly afraid of him that they shook .
40028005	The angel said to the women , “ Don’t be afraid ! I know you’re looking for Jesus , who was crucified .
40028006	He’s not here . He has been brought back to life as he said . Come , see the place where he was lying .
40028007	Then go quickly , and tell his disciples that he has been brought back to life . He’s going ahead of them into Galilee . There they will see him . Take note that I have told you . ”
40028008	They hurried away from the tomb with fear and great joy and ran to tell his disciples .
40028009	Suddenly , Jesus met them and greeted them . They went up to him , bowed down to worship him , and took hold of his feet .
40028010	Then Jesus said to them , “ Don’t be afraid ! Go , tell my followers to go to Galilee . There they will see me . ”
40028011	While the women were on their way , some of the guards went into the city . They told the chief priests everything that had happened .
40028012	The chief priests gathered together with the leaders and agreed on a plan . They gave the soldiers a large amount of money
40028013	and told them to say that Jesus’ disciples had come at night and had stolen his body while they were sleeping .
40028014	They added , “ If the governor hears about it , we’ll take care of it , and you’ll have nothing to worry about . ”
40028015	The soldiers took the money and did as they were told . Their story has been spread among the Jewish people to this day .
40028016	The eleven disciples went to the mountain in Galilee where Jesus had told them to go .
40028017	When they saw him , they bowed down in worship , though some had doubts .
40028018	When Jesus came near , he spoke to them . He said , “ All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me .
40028019	So wherever you go , make disciples of all nations : Baptize them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Spirit .
40028020	Teach them to do everything I have commanded you . “ And remember that I am always with you until the end of time . ”
41001001	This is the beginning of the Good News about Jesus Christ , the Son of God .
41001002	The prophet Isaiah wrote , “ I am sending my messenger ahead of youto prepare the way for you . ”
41001003	“ A voice cries out in the desert : ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord ! Make his paths straight ! ’ ”
41001004	John the Baptizer was in the desert telling people about a baptism of repentance for the forgiveness of sins .
41001005	All Judea and all the people of Jerusalem went to him . As they confessed their sins , he baptized them in the Jordan River .
41001006	John was dressed in clothes made from camel’s hair . He wore a leather belt around his waist and ate locusts and wild honey .
41001007	He announced , “ The one who comes after me is more powerful than I . I am not worthy to bend down and untie his sandal straps .
41001008	I have baptized you with water , but he will baptize you with the Holy Spirit . ”
41001009	At that time Jesus came from Nazareth in Galilee and was baptized by John in the Jordan River .
41001010	As Jesus came out of the water , he saw heaven split open and the Spirit coming down to him as a dove .
41001011	A voice from heaven said , “ You are my Son , whom I love . I am pleased with you . ”
41001012	At once the Spirit brought him into the desert ,
41001013	where he was tempted by Satan for 40 days . He was there with the wild animals , and the angels took care of him .
41001014	After John had been put in prison , Jesus went to Galilee and told people the Good News of God .
41001015	He said , “ The time has come , and the kingdom of God is near . Change the way you think and act , and believe the Good News . ”
41001016	As he was going along the Sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and his brother Andrew . They were throwing a net into the sea because they were fishermen .
41001017	Jesus said to them , “ Come , follow me ! I will teach you how to catch people instead of fish . ”
41001018	They immediately left their nets and followed him .
41001019	As Jesus went on a little farther , he saw James and John , the sons of Zebedee . They were in a boat preparing their nets to go fishing .
41001020	He immediately called them , and they left their father Zebedee and the hired men in the boat and followed Jesus .
41001021	Then they went to Capernaum . On the next day of worship , Jesus went into the synagogue and began to teach .
41001022	The people were amazed at his teachings . Unlike their scribes , he taught them with authority .
41001023	At that time there was a man in the synagogue who was controlled by an evil spirit . He shouted ,
41001024	“ What do you want with us , Jesus from Nazareth ? Have you come to destroy us ? I know who you are—the Holy One of God ! ”
41001025	Jesus ordered the spirit , “ Keep quiet , and come out of him ! ”
41001026	The evil spirit threw the man into convulsions and came out of him with a loud shriek .
41001027	Everyone was stunned . They said to each other , “ What is this ? This is a new teaching that has authority behind it ! He gives orders to evil spirits , and they obey him . ”
41001028	The news about him spread quickly throughout the surrounding region of Galilee .
41001029	After they left the synagogue , they went directly to the house of Simon and Andrew . James and John went with them .
41001030	Simon’s mother-in-law was in bed with a fever . The first thing they did was to tell Jesus about her .
41001031	Jesus went to her , took her hand , and helped her get up . The fever went away , and she prepared a meal for them .
41001032	In the evening , when the sun had set , people brought to him everyone who was sick and those possessed by demons .
41001033	The whole city had gathered at his door .
41001034	He cured many who were sick with various diseases and forced many demons out of people . However , he would not allow the demons to speak . After all , they knew who he was .
41001035	In the morning , long before sunrise , Jesus went to a place where he could be alone to pray .
41001036	Simon and his friends searched for him .
41001037	When they found him , they told him , “ Everyone is looking for you . ”
41001038	Jesus said to them , “ Let’s go somewhere else , to the small towns that are nearby . I have to spread the Good News in them also . This is why I have come . ”
41001039	So he went to spread the Good News in the synagogues all over Galilee , and he forced demons out of people .
41001040	Then a man with a serious skin disease came to him . The man fell to his knees and begged Jesus , “ If you’re willing , you can make me clean . ”
41001041	Jesus felt sorry for him , reached out , touched him , and said , “ I’m willing . So be clean ! ”
41001042	Immediately , his skin disease went away , and he was clean .
41001043	Jesus sent him away at once and warned him ,
41001044	“ Don’t tell anyone about this ! Instead , show yourself to the priest . Then offer the sacrifices which Moses commanded as proof to people that you are clean . ”
41001045	When the man left , he began to talk freely . He spread his story so widely that Jesus could no longer enter any city openly . Instead , he stayed in places where he could be alone . But people still kept coming to him from everywhere .
41002001	Several days later Jesus came back to Capernaum . The report went out that he was home .
41002002	Many people had gathered . There was no room left , even in front of the door . Jesus was speaking God’s word to them .
41002003	Four men came to him carrying a paralyzed man .
41002004	Since they could not bring him to Jesus because of the crowd , they made an opening in the roof over the place where Jesus was . Then they lowered the cot on which the paralyzed man was lying .
41002005	When Jesus saw their faith , he said to the man , “ Friend , your sins are forgiven . ”
41002006	Some scribes were sitting there . They thought ,
41002007	“ Why does he talk this way ? He’s dishonoring God . Who besides God can forgive sins ? ”
41002008	At once , Jesus knew inwardly what they were thinking . He asked them , “ Why do you have these thoughts ?
41002009	Is it easier to say to this paralyzed man , ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or to say , ‘ Get up , pick up your cot , and walk ’ ?
41002010	I want you to know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins . ” Then he said to the paralyzed man ,
41002011	“ I’m telling you to get up , pick up your cot , and go home ! ”
41002012	The man got up , immediately picked up his cot , and walked away while everyone watched . Everyone was amazed and praised God , saying , “ We have never seen anything like this . ”
41002013	Jesus went to the seashore again . Large crowds came to him , and he taught them .
41002014	When Jesus was leaving , he saw Levi , son of Alphaeus , sitting in a tax office . Jesus said to him , “ Follow me ! ” So Levi got up and followed him .
41002015	Later Jesus was having dinner at Levi’s house . Many tax collectors and sinners who were followers of Jesus were eating with him and his disciples .
41002016	When the scribes who were Pharisees saw him eating with sinners and tax collectors , they asked his disciples , “ Why does he eat with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
41002017	When Jesus heard that , he said to them , “ Healthy people don’t need a doctor ; those who are sick do . I’ve come to call sinners , not people who think they don’t have any flaws . ”
41002018	John’s disciples and the Pharisees were fasting . Some people came to Jesus and said to him , “ Why do John’s disciples and the Pharisees’ disciples fast , but your disciples don’t ? ”
41002019	Jesus replied , “ Can wedding guests fast while the groom is still with them ? As long as they have the groom with them , they cannot fast .
41002020	But the time will come when the groom will be taken away from them . Then they will fast .
41002021	“ No one patches an old coat with a new piece of cloth that will shrink . Otherwise , the new patch will shrink and rip away some of the old cloth , and the tear will become worse .
41002022	People don’t pour new wine into old wineskins . If they do , the wine will make the skins burst , and both the wine and the skins will be ruined . Rather , new wine is to be poured into fresh skins . ”
41002023	Once on a day of worship Jesus was going through the grainfields . As the disciples walked along , they began to pick the heads of grain .
41002024	The Pharisees asked him , “ Look ! Why are your disciples doing something that is not permitted on the day of worship ? ”
41002025	Jesus asked them , “ Haven’t you ever read what David did when he and his men were in need and were hungry ?
41002026	Haven’t you ever read how he went into the house of God when Abiathar was chief priest and ate the bread of the presence ? He had no right to eat those loaves . Only the priests have that right . Haven’t you ever read how he also gave some of it to his men ? ”
41002027	Then he added , “ The day of worship was made for people , not people for the day of worship .
41002028	For this reason the Son of Man has authority over the day of worship . ”
41003001	Jesus went into a synagogue again . A man who had a paralyzed hand was there .
41003002	The people were watching Jesus closely . They wanted to see whether he would heal the man on the day of worship so that they could accuse him of doing something wrong .
41003003	So he told the man with the paralyzed hand , “ Stand in the center of the synagogue . ”
41003004	Then he asked them , “ Is it right to do good or to do evil on the day of worship , to give a person back his health or to let him die ? ” But they were silent .
41003005	Jesus was angry as he looked around at them . He was deeply hurt because their minds were closed . Then he told the man , “ Hold out your hand . ” The man held it out , and his hand became normal again .
41003006	The Pharisees left , and with Herod’s followers they immediately plotted to kill Jesus .
41003007	Jesus left with his disciples for the Sea of Galilee . A large crowd from Galilee , Judea ,
41003008	Jerusalem , Idumea , and from across the Jordan River , and from around Tyre and Sidon followed him . They came to him because they had heard about everything he was doing .
41003009	Jesus told his disciples to have a boat ready so that the crowd would not crush him .
41003010	He had cured so many that everyone with a disease rushed up to him in order to touch him .
41003011	Whenever people with evil spirits saw him , they would fall down in front of him and shout , “ You are the Son of God ! ”
