41003013	Jesus went up a mountain , called those whom he wanted , and they came to him .
41003014	He appointed twelve whom he called apostles . They were to accompany him and to be sent out by him to spread the Good News .
41003015	They also had the authority to force demons out of people .
41003016	He appointed these twelve : Simon ( whom Jesus named Peter ) ,
41003017	James and his brother John ( Zebedee’s sons whom Jesus named Boanerges , which means “ Thunderbolts ” ) ,
41003018	Andrew , Philip , Bartholomew , Matthew , Thomas , James ( son of Alphaeus ) , Thaddaeus , Simon the Zealot ,
41003019	and Judas Iscariot ( who later betrayed Jesus ) .
41003020	Then Jesus went home . Another crowd gathered so that Jesus and his disciples could not even eat .
41003021	When his family heard about it , they went to get him . They said , “ He’s out of his mind ! ”
41003022	The scribes who had come from Jerusalem said , “ Beelzebul is in him , ” and “ He forces demons out of people with the help of the ruler of demons . ”
41003023	Jesus called them together and used this illustration : “ How can Satan force out Satan ?
41003024	If a kingdom is divided against itself , that kingdom cannot last .
41003025	And if a household is divided against itself , that household will not last .
41003026	So if Satan rebels against himself and is divided , he cannot last . That will be the end of him .
41003027	“ No one can go into a strong man’s house and steal his property . First he must tie up the strong man . Then he can go through the strong man’s house and steal his property .
41003028	“ I can guarantee this truth : People will be forgiven for any sin or curse .
41003029	But whoever curses the Holy Spirit will never be forgiven . He is guilty of an everlasting sin . ”
41003030	Jesus said this because the scribes had said that he had an evil spirit .
41003031	Then his mother and his brothers arrived . They stood outside and sent someone to ask him to come out .
41003032	The crowd sitting around Jesus told him , “ Your mother and your brothers are outside looking for you . ”
41003033	He replied to them , “ Who is my mother , and who are my brothers ? ”
41003034	Then looking at those who sat in a circle around him , he said , “ Look , here are my mother and my brothers .
41003035	Whoever does what God wants is my brother and sister and mother . ”
41004001	Jesus began to teach again by the Sea of Galilee . A very large crowd gathered around him , so he got into a boat and sat in it . The boat was in the water while the entire crowd lined the shore .
41004002	He used stories as illustrations to teach them many things . While he was teaching them , he said ,
41004003	“ Listen ! A farmer went to plant seed .
41004004	Some seeds were planted along the road , and birds came and devoured them .
41004005	Other seeds were planted on rocky ground , where there wasn’t much soil . The plants sprouted quickly because the soil wasn’t deep .
41004006	When the sun came up , they were scorched . They didn’t have any roots , so they withered .
41004007	Other seeds were planted among thornbushes . The thornbushes grew up and choked them , and they didn’t produce anything .
41004008	But other seeds were planted on good ground , sprouted , and produced thirty , sixty , or one hundred times as much as was planted . ”
41004009	He added , “ Let the person who has ears listen ! ”
41004010	When he was alone with his followers and the twelve apostles , they asked him about the stories .
41004011	Jesus replied to them , “ The mystery about the kingdom of God has been given directly to you . To those on the outside , it is given in stories :
41004012	‘ They see clearly but don’t perceive . They hear clearly but don’t understand . They never return to meand are never forgiven . ’ ”
41004013	Jesus asked them , “ Don’t you understand this story ? How , then , will you understand any of the stories I use as illustrations ?
41004014	“ The farmer plants the word .
41004015	Some people are like seeds that were planted along the road . Whenever they hear the word , Satan comes at once and takes away the word that was planted in them .
41004016	Other people are like seeds that were planted on rocky ground . Whenever they hear the word , they accept it at once with joy .
41004017	But they don’t develop any roots . They last for a short time . When suffering or persecution comes along because of the word , they immediately fall from faith .
41004018	Other people are like seeds planted among thornbushes . They hear the word ,
41004019	but the worries of life , the deceitful pleasures of riches , and the desires for other things take over . They choke the word so that it can’t produce anything .
41004020	Others are like seeds planted on good ground . They hear the word , accept it , and produce crops—thirty , sixty , or one hundred times as much as was planted . ”
41004021	Jesus said to them , “ Does anyone bring a lamp into a room to put it under a basket or under a bed ? Isn’t it put on a lamp stand ?
41004022	There is nothing hidden that will not be revealed . There is nothing kept secret that will not come to light .
41004023	Let the person who has ears listen ! ”
41004024	He went on to say , “ Pay attention to what you’re listening to ! Knowledge will be measured out to you by the measure of attention you give . This is the way knowledge increases .
41004025	Those who understand these mysteries will be given more knowledge . However , some people don’t understand these mysteries . Even what they understand will be taken away from them . ”
41004026	Jesus said , “ The kingdom of God is like a man who scatters seeds on the ground .
41004027	He sleeps at night and is awake during the day . The seeds sprout and grow , although the man doesn’t know how .
41004028	The ground produces grain by itself . First the green blade appears , then the head , then the head full of grain .
41004029	As soon as the grain is ready , he cuts it with a sickle , because harvest time has come . ”
41004030	Jesus asked , “ How can we show what the kingdom of God is like ? To what can we compare it ?
41004031	It’s like a mustard seed planted in the ground . The mustard seed is one of the smallest seeds on earth .
41004032	However , when planted , it comes up and becomes taller than all the garden plants . It grows such large branches that birds can nest in its shade . ”
41004033	Jesus spoke God’s word to them using many illustrations like these . In this way people could understand what he taught .
41004034	He did not speak to them without using an illustration . But when he was alone with his disciples , he explained everything to them .
41004035	That evening , Jesus said to his disciples , “ Let’s cross to the other side . ”
41004036	Leaving the crowd , they took Jesus along in a boat just as he was . Other boats were with him .
41004037	A violent windstorm came up . The waves were breaking into the boat so that it was quickly filling up .
41004038	But he was sleeping on a cushion in the back of the boat . So they woke him up and said to him , “ Teacher , don’t you care that we’re going to die ? ”
41004039	Then he got up , ordered the wind to stop , and said to the sea , “ Be still , absolutely still ! ” The wind stopped blowing , and the sea became very calm .
41004040	He asked them , “ Why are you such cowards ? Don’t you have any faith yet ? ”
41004041	They were overcome with fear and asked each other , “ Who is this man ? Even the wind and the sea obey him ! ”
41005001	They arrived in the territory of the Gerasenes on the other side of the Sea of Galilee .
41005002	As Jesus stepped out of the boat , a man came out of the tombs and met him . The man was controlled by an evil spirit
41005003	and lived among the tombs . No one could restrain him any longer , not even with a chain .
41005004	He had often been chained hand and foot . However , he snapped the chains off his hands and broke the chains from his feet . No one could control him .
41005005	Night and day he was among the tombs and on the mountainsides screaming and cutting himself with stones .
41005006	The man saw Jesus at a distance . So he ran to Jesus , bowed down in front of him ,
41005007	and shouted , “ Why are you bothering me now , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ? Swear to God that you won’t torture me . ”
41005008	He shouted this because Jesus said , “ You evil spirit , come out of the man . ”
41005009	Jesus asked him , “ What is your name ? ” He told Jesus , “ My name is Legion [ Six Thousand ] , because there are many of us . ”
41005010	He begged Jesus not to send them out of the territory .
41005011	A large herd of pigs was feeding on a mountainside nearby .
41005012	The demons begged him , “ Send us into the pigs ! Let us enter them ! ”
41005013	Jesus let them do this . The evil spirits came out of the man and went into the pigs . The herd of about two thousand pigs rushed down the cliff into the sea and drowned .
41005014	Those who took care of the pigs ran away . In the city and countryside they reported everything that had happened . So the people came to see what had happened .
41005015	They came to Jesus and saw the man who had been possessed by the legion of demons . The man was sitting there dressed and in his right mind . The people were frightened .
41005016	Those who saw this told what had happened to the demon-possessed man and the pigs .
41005017	Then the people began to beg Jesus to leave their territory .
41005018	As Jesus stepped into the boat , the man who had been demon-possessed begged him , “ Let me stay with you . ”
41005019	But Jesus would not allow it . Instead , he told the man , “ Go home to your family , and tell them how much the Lord has done for you and how merciful he has been to you . ”
41005020	So the man left . He began to tell how much Jesus had done for him in the Ten Cities . Everyone was amazed .
41005021	Jesus again crossed to the other side of the Sea of Galilee in a boat . A large crowd gathered around him by the seashore .
41005022	A synagogue leader named Jairus also arrived . When he saw Jesus , he quickly bowed down in front of him .
41005023	He begged Jesus , “ My little daughter is dying . Come , lay your hands on her so that she may get well and live . ”
41005024	Jesus went with the man . A huge crowd followed Jesus and pressed him on every side .
41005025	In the crowd was a woman who had been suffering from chronic bleeding for twelve years .
41005026	Although she had been under the care of many doctors and had spent all her money , she had not been helped at all . Actually , she had become worse .
41005027	Since she had heard about Jesus , she came from behind in the crowd and touched his clothes .
41005028	She said , “ If I can just touch his clothes , I’ll get well . ”
41005029	Her bleeding stopped immediately . She felt cured from her illness .
41005030	At that moment Jesus felt power had gone out of him . He turned around in the crowd and asked , “ Who touched my clothes ? ”
41005031	His disciples said to him , “ How can you ask , ‘ Who touched me , ’ when you see the crowd pressing you on all sides ? ”
41005032	But he kept looking around to see the woman who had done this .
41005033	The woman trembled with fear . She knew what had happened to her . So she quickly bowed in front of him and told him the whole truth .
41005034	Jesus told her , “ Daughter , your faith has made you well . Go in peace ! Be cured from your illness . ”
41005035	While Jesus was still speaking to her , some people came from the synagogue leader’s home . They told the synagogue leader , “ Your daughter has died . Why bother the teacher anymore ? ”
41005036	When Jesus overheard what they said , he told the synagogue leader , “ Don’t be afraid ! Just believe . ”
41005037	Jesus allowed no one to go with him except Peter and the two brothers James and John .
41005038	When they came to the home of the synagogue leader , Jesus saw a noisy crowd there . People were crying and sobbing loudly .
41005039	When he came into the house , he asked them , “ Why are you making so much noise and crying ? The child isn’t dead . She’s just sleeping . ”
41005040	They laughed at him . So he made all of them go outside . Then he took the child’s father , mother , and his three disciples and went to the child .
41005041	Jesus took the child’s hand and said to her , “ Talitha , koum ! ” which means , “ Little girl , I’m telling you to get up ! ”
41005042	The girl got up at once and started to walk . ( She was twelve years old . ) They were astonished .
41005043	Jesus ordered them not to let anyone know about this . He also told them to give the little girl something to eat .
41006001	Jesus left that place and went to his hometown . His disciples followed him .
41006002	When the day of worship came , he began to teach in the synagogue . He amazed many who heard him . They asked , “ Where did this man get these ideas ? Who gave him this kind of wisdom and the ability to do such great miracles ?
41006003	Isn’t this the carpenter , the son of Mary , and the brother of James , Joseph , Judas , and Simon ? Aren’t his sisters here with us ? ” So they took offense at him .
41006004	But Jesus told them , “ The only place a prophet isn’t honored is in his hometown , among his relatives , and in his own house . ”
41006005	He couldn’t work any miracles there except to lay his hands on a few sick people and cure them .
41006006	Their unbelief amazed him . Then Jesus went around to the villages and taught .
41006007	He called the twelve apostles , sent them out two by two , and gave them authority over evil spirits .
41006008	He instructed them to take nothing along on the trip except a walking stick . They were not to take any food , a traveling bag , or money in their pockets .
41006009	They could wear sandals but could not take along a change of clothes .
41006010	He told them , “ Whenever you go into a home , stay there until you’re ready to leave that place .
41006011	Wherever people don’t welcome you or listen to you , leave and shake the dust from your feet as a warning to them . ”
41006012	So the apostles went and told people that they should turn to God and change the way they think and act .
41006013	They also forced many demons out of people and poured oil on many who were sick to cure them .
41006014	King Herod heard about Jesus , because Jesus’ name had become well-known . Some people were saying , “ John the Baptizer has come back to life . That’s why he has the power to perform these miracles . ”
41006015	Others said , “ He is Elijah . ” Still others said , “ He is a prophet like one of the other prophets . ”
41006016	But when Herod heard about it , he said , “ I had John’s head cut off , and he has come back to life ! ”
41006017	Herod had sent men who had arrested John , tied him up , and put him in prison . Herod did that for Herodias , whom he had married . ( She used to be his brother Philip’s wife . )
41006018	John had been telling Herod , “ It’s not right for you to be married to your brother’s wife . ”
41006019	So Herodias held a grudge against John and wanted to kill him . But she wasn’t allowed to do it
41006020	because Herod was afraid of John . Herod knew that John was a fair and holy man , so he protected him . When he listened to John , he would become very disturbed , and yet he liked to listen to him .
41006021	An opportunity finally came on Herod’s birthday . Herod gave a dinner for his top officials , army officers , and the most important people of Galilee .
41006022	His daughter , that is , Herodias’ daughter , came in and danced . Herod and his guests were delighted with her . The king told the girl , “ Ask me for anything you want , and I’ll give it to you . ”
41006023	He swore an oath to her : “ I’ll give you anything you ask for , up to half of my kingdom . ”
41006024	So she went out and asked her mother , “ What should I ask for ? ” Her mother said , “ Ask for the head of John the Baptizer . ”
41006025	So the girl hurried back to the king with her request . She said , “ I want you to give me the head of John the Baptizer on a platter at once . ”
41006026	The king deeply regretted his promise . But because of his oath and his guests , he didn’t want to refuse her .
41006027	Immediately , the king sent a guard and ordered him to bring John’s head . The guard cut off John’s head in prison .
41006028	Then he brought the head on a platter and gave it to the girl , and the girl gave it to her mother .
41006029	When John’s disciples heard about this , they came for his body and laid it in a tomb .
41006030	The apostles gathered around Jesus . They reported to him everything they had done and taught .
41006031	So he said to them , “ Let’s go to a place where we can be alone to rest for a while . ” Many people were coming and going , and Jesus and the apostles didn’t even have a chance to eat .
41006032	So they went away in a boat to a place where they could be alone .
41006033	But many people saw them leave and recognized them . The people ran from all the cities and arrived ahead of them .
41006034	When Jesus got out of the boat , he saw a large crowd and felt sorry for them . They were like sheep without a shepherd . So he spent a lot of time teaching them .
41006035	When it was late , his disciples came to him . They said , “ No one lives around here , and it’s already late .
41006036	Send the people to the closest farms and villages to buy themselves something to eat . ”
41006037	Jesus replied , “ You give them something to eat . ” They said to him , “ Should we go and spend about a year’s wages on bread to feed them ? ”
41006038	He said to them , “ How many loaves do you have ? Go and see . ” When they found out , they told him , “ Five loaves of bread and two fish . ”
41006039	Then he ordered all of them to sit down in groups on the green grass .
41006040	They sat down in groups of hundreds and fifties .
41006041	After he took the five loaves and the two fish , he looked up to heaven and blessed the food . He broke the loaves apart and kept giving them to the disciples to give to the people . He also gave pieces of the two fish to everyone .
41006042	All of them ate as much as they wanted .
41006043	When they picked up the leftover pieces , they filled twelve baskets with bread and fish .
41006044	There were 5,000 men who had eaten the bread .
41006045	Jesus quickly made his disciples get into a boat and cross to Bethsaida ahead of him while he sent the people away .
41006046	After saying goodbye to them , he went up a mountain to pray .
41006047	When evening came , the boat was in the middle of the sea , and he was alone on the land .
41006048	Jesus saw that they were in a lot of trouble as they rowed , because they were going against the wind . Between three and six o’clock in the morning , he came to them . He was walking on the sea . He wanted to pass by them .
41006049	When they saw him walking on the sea , they thought , “ It’s a ghost ! ” and they began to scream .
41006050	All of them saw him and were terrified . Immediately , he said , “ Calm down ! It’s me . Don’t be afraid ! ”
41006051	He got into the boat with them , and the wind stopped blowing . The disciples were astounded .
41006052	( They didn’t understand what had happened with the loaves of bread . Instead , their minds were closed . )
41006053	They crossed the sea , came to shore at Gennesaret , and anchored there .
41006054	As soon as they stepped out of the boat , the people recognized Jesus .
41006055	They ran all over the countryside and began to carry the sick on cots to any place where they heard he was .
41006056	Whenever he would go into villages , cities , or farms , people would put their sick in the marketplaces . They begged him to let them touch the edge of his clothes . Everyone who touched his clothes was made well .
41007001	The Pharisees and some scribes who had come from Jerusalem gathered around Jesus .
41007002	They saw that some of his disciples were unclean because they ate without washing their hands .
41007003	( The Pharisees , like all other Jewish people , don’t eat unless they have properly washed their hands . They follow the traditions of their ancestors .
41007004	When they come from the marketplace , they don’t eat unless they have washed first . They have been taught to follow many other rules . For example , they must also wash their cups , jars , brass pots , and dinner tables . )
41007005	The Pharisees and the scribes asked Jesus , “ Why don’t your disciples follow the traditions taught by our ancestors ? They are unclean because they don’t wash their hands before they eat ! ”
41007006	Jesus told them , “ Isaiah was right when he prophesied about you hypocrites in Scripture : ‘ These people honor me with their lips , but their hearts are far from me .
41007007	Their worship of me is pointless , because their teachings are rules made by humans . ’
41007008	“ You abandon the commandments of God to follow human traditions . ”
41007009	He added , “ You have no trouble rejecting the commandments of God in order to keep your own traditions !
41007010	For example , Moses said , ‘ Honor your father and your mother ’ and ‘ Whoever curses father or mother must be put to death . ’
41007011	But you say , ‘ If a person tells his father or mother that whatever he might have used to help them is ( that is , an offering to God ) ,
41007012	he no longer has to do anything for his father or mother . ’
41007013	Because of your traditions you have destroyed the authority of God’s word . And you do many other things like that . ”
41007014	Then he called the crowd again and said to them , “ Listen to me , all of you , and try to understand !
41007015	Nothing that goes into a person from the outside can make him unclean . It’s what comes out of a person that makes him unclean .
41007016	Let the person who has ears listen ! ”
41007017	When he had left the people and gone home , his disciples asked him about this illustration .
41007018	Jesus said to them , “ Don’t you understand ? Don’t you know that whatever goes into a person from the outside can’t make him unclean ?
41007019	It doesn’t go into his thoughts but into his stomach and then into a toilet . ” ( By saying this , Jesus declared all foods acceptable . )
41007020	He continued , “ It’s what comes out of a person that makes him unclean .
41007021	Evil thoughts , sexual sins , stealing , murder , adultery ,
41007022	greed , wickedness , cheating , shameless lust , envy , cursing , arrogance , and foolishness come from within a person .
41007023	All these evils come from within and make a person unclean . ”
41007024	Jesus left that place and went to the territory of Tyre . He didn’t want anyone to know that he was staying in a house there . However , it couldn’t be kept a secret .
41007025	A woman whose little daughter had an evil spirit heard about Jesus . She went to him and bowed down .
41007026	The woman happened to be Greek , born in Phoenicia in Syria . She asked him to force the demon out of her daughter .
41007027	Jesus said to her , “ First , let the children eat all they want . It’s not right to take the children’s food and throw it to the dogs . ”
41007028	She answered him , “ Lord , even the dogs under the table eat some of the children’s scraps . ”
41007029	Jesus said to her , “ Because you have said this , go ! The demon has left your daughter . ”
41007030	The woman went home and found the little child lying on her bed , and the demon was gone .
41007031	Jesus then left the neighborhood of Tyre . He went through Sidon and the territory of the Ten Cities to the Sea of Galilee .
41007032	Some people brought to him a man who was deaf and who also had a speech defect . They begged Jesus to lay his hand on him .
41007033	Jesus took him away from the crowd to be alone with him . He put his fingers into the man’s ears , and after spitting , he touched the man’s tongue .
41007034	Then he looked up to heaven , sighed , and said to the man , “ Ephphatha ! ” which means , “ Be opened ! ”
41007035	At once the man could hear and talk normally .
41007036	Jesus ordered the people not to tell anyone . But the more he ordered them , the more they spread the news .
41007037	Jesus completely amazed the people . They said , “ He has done everything well . He makes the deaf hear and the mute talk . ”
41008001	About that time there was once again a large crowd with nothing to eat . Jesus called his disciples and said to them ,
41008002	“ I feel sorry for the people . They have been with me three days now and have nothing to eat .
41008003	If I send them home before they’ve eaten , they will become exhausted on the road . Some of them have come a long distance . ”
41008004	His disciples asked him , “ Where could anyone get enough bread to feed these people in this place where no one lives ? ”
41008005	Jesus asked them , “ How many loaves of bread do you have ? ” They answered , “ Seven . ”
41008006	He ordered the crowd to sit down on the ground . He took the seven loaves and gave thanks to God . Then he broke the bread and gave it to his disciples to serve to the people .
41008007	They also had a few small fish . He blessed them and said that the fish should also be served to the people .
41008008	The people ate as much as they wanted . The disciples picked up the leftover pieces and filled seven large baskets .
41008009	About four thousand people were there . Then he sent the people on their way .
41008010	After that , Jesus and his disciples got into a boat and went into the region of Dalmanutha .
41008011	The Pharisees went to Jesus and began to argue with him . They tested him by demanding that he perform a miraculous sign from heaven .
41008012	With a deep sigh he asked , “ Why do these people demand a sign ? I can guarantee this truth : If these people are given a sign , it will be far different than what they want ! ”
41008013	Then he left them there . He got into a boat again and crossed to the other side of the Sea of Galilee .
41008014	The disciples had forgotten to take any bread along and had only one loaf with them in the boat .
41008015	Jesus warned them , “ Be careful ! Watch out for the yeast of the Pharisees and the yeast of Herod ! ”
41008016	They had been discussing with one another that they didn’t have any bread .
41008017	Jesus knew what they were saying and asked them , “ Why are you discussing the fact that you don’t have any bread ? Don’t you understand yet ? Don’t you catch on ? Are your minds closed ?
41008018	Are you blind and deaf ? Don’t you remember ?
41008019	When I broke the five loaves for the five thousand , how many baskets did you fill with leftover pieces ? ” They told him , “ Twelve . ”
41008020	“ When I broke the seven loaves for the four thousand , how many large baskets did you fill with leftover pieces ? ” They answered him , “ Seven . ”
41008021	He asked them , “ Don’t you catch on yet ? ”
41008022	As they came to Bethsaida , some people brought a blind man to Jesus . They begged Jesus to touch him .
41008023	Jesus took the blind man’s hand and led him out of the village . He spit into the man’s eyes and placed his hands on him . Jesus asked him , “ Can you see anything ? ”
41008024	The man looked up and said , “ I see people . They look like trees walking around . ”
41008025	Then Jesus placed his hands on the man’s eyes a second time , and the man saw clearly . His sight was normal again . He could see everything clearly even at a distance .
41008026	Jesus told him when he sent him home , “ Don’t go into the village . ”
41008027	Then Jesus and his disciples went to the villages around Caesarea Philippi . On the way he asked his disciples , “ Who do people say I am ? ”
41008028	They answered him , “ Some say you are John the Baptizer , others Elijah , still others one of the prophets . ”
41008029	He asked them , “ But who do you say I am ? ” Peter answered him , “ You are the Messiah ! ”
41008030	He ordered them not to tell anyone about him .
41008031	Then he began to teach them that the Son of Man would have to suffer a lot . He taught them that he would be rejected by the leaders , the chief priests , and the scribes . He would be killed , but after three days he would come back to life .
41008032	He told them very clearly what he meant . Peter took him aside and objected to this .
41008033	Jesus turned , looked at his disciples , and objected to what Peter said . Jesus said , “ Get out of my way , Satan ! You aren’t thinking the way God thinks but the way humans think . ”
41008034	Then Jesus called the crowd to himself along with his disciples . He said to them , “ Those who want to follow me must say no to the things they want , pick up their crosses , and follow me .
41008035	Those who want to save their lives will lose them . But those who lose their lives for me and for the Good News will save them .
41008036	What good does it do for people to win the whole world yet lose their lives ?
41008037	Or what should a person give in exchange for life ?
41008038	If people are ashamed of me and what I say in this unfaithful and sinful generation , the Son of Man will be ashamed of those people when he comes with the holy angels in his Father’s glory . ”
41009001	He said to them , “ I can guarantee this truth : Some people who are standing here will not die until they see the kingdom of God arrive with power . ”
41009002	After six days Jesus took only Peter , James , and John and led them up a high mountain where they could be alone . Jesus’ appearance changed in front of them .
41009003	His clothes became dazzling white , whiter than anyone on earth could bleach them .
41009004	Then Elijah and Moses appeared to them and were talking with Jesus .
41009005	Peter said to Jesus , “ Rabbi , it’s good that we’re here . Let’s put up three tents—one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
41009006	( Peter didn’t know how to respond . He and the others were terrified . )
41009007	Then a cloud overshadowed them . A voice came out of the cloud and said , “ This is my Son , whom I love . Listen to him ! ”
41009008	Suddenly , as they looked around , they saw no one with them but Jesus .
41009009	On their way down the mountain , Jesus ordered them not to tell anyone what they had seen . They were to wait until the Son of Man had come back to life .
41009010	They kept in mind what he said but argued among themselves what he meant by “ come back to life . ”
41009011	So they asked him , “ Don’t the scribes say that Elijah must come first ? ”
41009012	Jesus said to them , “ Elijah is coming first and will put everything in order again . But in what sense was it written that the Son of Man must suffer a lot and be treated shamefully ?
41009013	Indeed , I can guarantee that Elijah has come . Yet , people treated him as they pleased , as Scripture says about him . ”
41009014	When they came to the other disciples , they saw a large crowd around them . Some scribes were arguing with them .
41009015	All the people were very surprised to see Jesus and ran to welcome him .
41009016	Jesus asked the scribes , “ What are you arguing about with them ? ”
41009017	A man in the crowd answered , “ Teacher , I brought you my son . He is possessed by a spirit that won’t let him talk .
41009018	Whenever the spirit brings on a seizure , it throws him to the ground . Then he foams at the mouth , grinds his teeth , and becomes exhausted . I asked your disciples to force the spirit out , but they didn’t have the power to do it . ”
41009019	Jesus said to them , “ You unbelieving generation ! How long must I be with you ? How long must I put up with you ? Bring him to me ! ”
41009020	They brought the boy to him . As soon as the spirit saw Jesus , it threw the boy into convulsions . He fell on the ground , rolled around , and foamed at the mouth .
41009021	Jesus asked his father , “ How long has he been like this ? ” The father replied , “ He has been this way since he was a child .
41009022	The demon has often thrown him into fire or into water to destroy him . If it’s possible for you , put yourself in our place , and help us ! ”
41009023	Jesus said to him , “ As far as possibilities go , everything is possible for the person who believes . ”
41009024	The child’s father cried out at once , “ I believe ! Help my lack of faith . ”
41009025	When Jesus saw that a crowd was running to the scene , he gave an order to the evil spirit . He said , “ You spirit that won’t let him talk , I command you to come out of him and never enter him again . ”
41009026	The evil spirit screamed , shook the child violently , and came out . The boy looked as if he were dead , and everyone said , “ He’s dead ! ”
41009027	Jesus took his hand and helped him to stand up .
41009028	When Jesus went into a house , his disciples asked him privately , “ Why couldn’t we force the spirit out of the boy ? ”
41009029	He told them , “ This kind of spirit can be forced out only by prayer . ”
41009030	They left that place and were passing through Galilee . Jesus did not want anyone to know where he was
41009031	because he was teaching his disciples . He taught them , “ The Son of Man will be betrayed and handed over to people . They will kill him , but on the third day he will come back to life . ”
41009032	The disciples didn’t understand what he meant and were afraid to ask him .
41009033	Then they came to Capernaum . While Jesus was at home , he asked the disciples , “ What were you arguing about on the road ? ”
41009034	They were silent . On the road they had argued about who was the greatest .
41009035	He sat down and called the twelve apostles . He told them , “ Whoever wants to be the most important person must take the last place and be a servant to everyone else . ”
41009036	Then he took a little child and had him stand among them . He put his arms around the child and said to them ,
41009037	“ Whoever welcomes a child like this in my name welcomes me . Whoever welcomes me welcomes not me but the one who sent me . ”
41009038	John said to Jesus , “ Teacher , we saw someone forcing demons out of a person by using the power and authority of your name . We tried to stop him because he was not one of us . ”
41009039	Jesus said , “ Don’t stop him ! No one who works a miracle in my name can turn around and speak evil of me .
41009040	Whoever isn’t against us is for us .
41009041	I can guarantee this truth : Whoever gives you a cup of water to drink because you belong to Christ will certainly not lose his reward . ”
41009042	“ These little ones believe in me . It would be best for the person who causes one of them to lose faith to be thrown into the sea with a large stone hung around his neck .
41009043	“ So if your hand causes you to lose your faith , cut it off ! It is better for you to enter life disabled than to have two hands and go to hell , to the fire that cannot be put out .
41009045	If your foot causes you to lose your faith , cut it off ! It is better for you to enter life lame than to have two feet and be thrown into hell .
41009047	If your eye causes you to lose your faith , tear it out ! It is better for you to enter the kingdom of God with one eye than to have two eyes and be thrown into hell .
41009048	In hell worms that eat the body never die , and the fire is never put out .
41009049	Everyone will be salted with fire .
41009050	Salt is good . But if salt loses its taste , how will you restore its flavor ? Have salt within you , and live in peace with one another . ”
41010001	Jesus left there and went into the territory of Judea along the other side of the Jordan River . Crowds gathered around him again , and he taught them as he usually did .
41010002	Some Pharisees came to test him . They asked , “ Can a husband divorce his wife ? ”
41010003	Jesus answered them , “ What command did Moses give you ? ”
41010004	They said , “ Moses allowed a man to give his wife a written notice to divorce her . ”
41010005	Jesus said to them , “ He wrote this command for you because you’re heartless .
41010006	But God made them male and female in the beginning , at creation .
41010007	That’s why a man will leave his father and mother and will remain united with his wife ,
41010008	and the two will be one . So they are no longer two but one .
41010009	Therefore , don’t let anyone separate what God has joined together . ”
41010010	When they were in a house , the disciples asked him about this .
41010011	He answered them , “ Whoever divorces his wife and marries another woman is committing adultery .
41010012	If a wife divorces her husband and marries another man , she is committing adultery . ”
41010013	Some people brought little children to Jesus to have him hold them . But the disciples told the people not to do that .
41010014	When Jesus saw this , he became irritated . He told them , “ Don’t stop the children from coming to me . Children like these are part of the kingdom of God .
41010015	I can guarantee this truth : Whoever doesn’t receive the kingdom of God as a little child receives it will never enter it . ”
41010016	Jesus put his arms around the children and blessed them by placing his hands on them .
41010017	As Jesus was coming out to the road , a man came running to him and knelt in front of him . He asked Jesus , “ Good Teacher , what should I do to inherit eternal life ? ”
41010018	Jesus said to him , “ Why do you call me good ? No one is good except God alone .
41010019	You know the commandments : Never murder . Never commit adultery . Never steal . Never give false testimony . Never cheat . Honor your father and mother . ”
41010020	The man replied , “ Teacher , I’ve obeyed all these commandments since I was a boy . ”
41010021	Jesus looked at him and loved him . He told him , “ You’re still missing one thing . Sell everything you have . Give the money to the poor , and you will have treasure in heaven . Then follow me ! ”
41010022	When the man heard that , he looked unhappy and went away sad , because he owned a lot of property .
41010023	Jesus looked around and said to his disciples , “ How hard it will be for rich people to enter the kingdom of God ! ”
41010024	The disciples were stunned by his words . But Jesus said to them again , “ Children , how hard it is to enter the kingdom of God !
41010025	It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich person to enter the kingdom of God . ”
41010026	This amazed his disciples more than ever . They asked each other , “ Who , then , can be saved ? ”
41010027	Jesus looked at them and said , “ It’s impossible for people to save themselves , but it’s not impossible for God to save them . Everything is possible for God . ”
41010028	Then Peter spoke up , “ We’ve given up everything to follow you . ”
41010029	Jesus said , “ I can guarantee this truth : Anyone who gave up his home , brothers , sisters , mother , father , children , or fields because of me and the Good News
41010030	will certainly receive a hundred times as much here in this life . They will certainly receive homes , brothers , sisters , mothers , children and fields , along with persecutions . But in the world to come they will receive eternal life .
41010031	But many who are first will be last , and the last will be first . ”
41010032	Jesus and his disciples were on their way to Jerusalem . Jesus was walking ahead of them . His disciples were shocked that he was going to Jerusalem . The others who followed were afraid . Once again he took the twelve apostles aside . He began to tell them what was going to happen to him .
41010033	“ We’re going to Jerusalem . There the Son of Man will be betrayed to the chief priests and the scribes . They will condemn him to death and hand him over to foreigners .
41010034	They will make fun of him , spit on him , whip him , and kill him . But after three days he will come back to life . ”
41010035	James and John , sons of Zebedee , went to Jesus . They said to him , “ Teacher , we want you to do us a favor . ”
41010036	“ What do you want me to do for you ? ” he asked them .
41010037	They said to him , “ Let one of us sit at your right and the other at your left in your glory . ”
41010038	Jesus said , “ You don’t realize what you’re asking . Can you drink the cup that I’m going to drink ? Can you be baptized with the baptism that I’m going to receive ? ”
41010039	“ We can , ” they told him . Jesus told them , “ You will drink the cup that I’m going to drink . You will be baptized with the baptism that I’m going to receive .
41010040	But I don’t have the authority to grant you a seat at my right or left . Those positions have already been prepared for certain people . ”
41010041	When the other ten apostles heard about it , they were irritated with James and John .
41010042	Jesus called the apostles and said , “ You know that the acknowledged rulers of nations have absolute power over people and their officials have absolute authority over people .
41010043	But that’s not the way it’s going to be among you . Whoever wants to become great among you will be your servant .
41010044	Whoever wants to be most important among you will be a slave for everyone .
41010045	It’s the same way with the Son of Man . He didn’t come so that others could serve him . He came to serve and to give his life as a ransom for many people . ”
41010046	Then they came to Jericho . As Jesus , his disciples , and many people were leaving Jericho , a blind beggar named Bartimaeus , son of Timaeus , was sitting by the road .
41010047	When he heard that Jesus from Nazareth was passing by , he began to shout , “ Jesus , Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
41010048	The people told him to be quiet . But he shouted even louder , “ Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
41010049	Jesus stopped and said , “ Call him ! ” They called the blind man and told him , “ Cheer up ! Get up ! He’s calling you . ”
41010050	The blind man threw off his coat , jumped up , and went to Jesus .
41010051	Jesus asked him , “ What do you want me to do for you ? ” The blind man said , “ Teacher , I want to see again . ”
41010052	Jesus told him , “ Go , your faith has made you well . ” At once he could see again , and he followed Jesus on the road .
41011001	When they came near Jerusalem , to Bethphage and Bethany , at the Mount of Olives , Jesus sent two of his disciples ahead of him .
41011002	He said to them , “ Go into the village ahead of you . As you enter it , you will find a young donkey tied there . No one has ever sat on it . Untie it , and bring it .
41011003	If anyone asks you what you are doing , say that the Lord needs it . That person will send it here at once . ”
41011004	The disciples found the young donkey in the street . It was tied to the door of a house . As they were untying it ,
41011005	some men standing there asked them , “ Why are you untying that donkey ? ”
41011006	The disciples answered them as Jesus had told them . So the men let them go .
41011007	They brought the donkey to Jesus , put their coats on it , and he sat on it .
41011008	Many spread their coats on the road . Others cut leafy branches in the fields and spread them on the road .
41011009	Those who went ahead and those who followed him were shouting , “ Hosanna ! Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the Lord !
41011010	Blessed is our ancestor David’s kingdom that is coming ! Hosanna in the highest heaven ! ”
41011011	Jesus came into Jerusalem and went into the temple courtyard , where he looked around at everything . Since it was already late , he went out with the twelve apostles to Bethany .
41011012	The next day , when they left Bethany , Jesus became hungry .
41011013	In the distance he saw a fig tree with leaves . He went to see if he could find any figs on it . When he came to it , he found nothing but leaves because it wasn’t the season for figs .
41011014	Then he said to the tree , “ No one will ever eat fruit from you again ! ” His disciples heard this .
41011015	When they came to Jerusalem , Jesus went into the temple courtyard and began to throw out those who were buying and selling there . He overturned the moneychangers’ tables and the chairs of those who sold pigeons .
41011016	He would not let anyone carry anything across the temple courtyard .
41011017	Then he taught them by saying , “ Scripture says , ‘ My house will be called a house of prayer for all nations , ’ but you have turned it into a gathering place for thieves . ”
41011018	When the chief priests and scribes heard him , they looked for a way to kill him . They were afraid of him because he amazed all the crowds with his teaching .
41011019	( Every evening Jesus and his disciples would leave the city . )
41011020	While Jesus and his disciples were walking early in the morning , they saw that the fig tree had dried up .
41011021	Peter remembered what Jesus had said , so he said to Jesus , “ Rabbi , look ! The fig tree you cursed has dried up . ”
41011022	Jesus said to them , “ Have faith in God !
41011023	I can guarantee this truth : This is what will be done for someone who doesn’t doubt but believes what he says will happen : He can say to this mountain , ‘ Be uprooted and thrown into the sea , ’ and it will be done for him .
41011024	That’s why I tell you to have faith that you have already received whatever you pray for , and it will be yours .
41011025	Whenever you pray , forgive anything you have against anyone . Then your Father in heaven will forgive your failures . ”
41011027	Jesus and his disciples returned to Jerusalem . As he was walking in the temple courtyard , the chief priests , the scribes , and the leaders came to him .
41011028	They asked him , “ What gives you the right to do these things ? Who told you that you could do this ? ”
41011029	Jesus said to them , “ I’ll ask you a question . Answer me , and then I’ll tell you why I have the right to do these things .
41011030	Did John’s right to baptize come from heaven or from humans ? Answer me ! ”
41011031	They discussed this among themselves . They said , “ If we say , ‘ from heaven , ’ he will ask , ‘ Then why didn’t you believe him ? ’
41011032	But if we say , ‘ from humans , ’ then what will happen ? ” They were afraid of the people . All the people thought of John as a true prophet .
41011033	So they answered Jesus , “ We don’t know . ” Jesus told them , “ Then I won’t tell you why I have the right to do these things . ”
41012001	Then , using this illustration , Jesus spoke to them . He said , “ A man planted a vineyard . He put a wall around it , made a vat for the winepress , and built a watchtower . Then he leased it to vineyard workers and went on a trip .
41012002	“ At the right time he sent a servant to the workers to collect from them a share of the grapes from the vineyard .
41012003	The workers took the servant , beat him , and sent him back with nothing .
41012004	So the man sent another servant to them . They hit the servant on the head and treated him shamefully .
41012005	The man sent another , and they killed that servant . Then he sent many other servants . Some of these they beat , and others they killed .
41012006	“ He had one more person to send . That person was his son , whom he loved . Finally , he sent his son to them . He thought , ‘ They will respect my son . ’
41012007	“ But those workers said to one another , ‘ This is the heir . Let’s kill him , and the inheritance will be ours . ’
41012008	So they took him , killed him , and threw him out of the vineyard .
41012009	“ What will the owner of the vineyard do ? He will come and destroy the workers and give the vineyard to others .
41012010	Have you never read the Scripture passage : ‘ The stone that the builders rejectedhas become the cornerstone .
41012011	The Lord has done this , and it is amazing for us to see ’ ? ”
41012012	They wanted to arrest him but were afraid of the crowd . They knew that he had directed this illustration at them . So they left him alone and went away .
41012013	The leaders sent some of the Pharisees and some of Herod’s followers to Jesus . They wanted to trap him into saying the wrong thing .
41012014	When they came to him , they said , “ Teacher , we know that you tell the truth . You don’t favor individuals because of who they are . Rather , you teach the way of God truthfully . Is it right to pay taxes to the emperor or not ? Should we pay taxes or not ? ”
41012015	Jesus recognized their hypocrisy , so he asked them , “ Why do you test me ? Bring me a coin so that I can look at it . ”
41012016	They brought a coin . He said to them , “ Whose face and name is this ? ” They told him , “ The emperor’s . ”
41012017	Jesus said to them , “ Give the emperor what belongs to the emperor , and give God what belongs to God . ” They were surprised at his reply .
41012018	Some Sadducees , who say that people will never come back to life , came to Jesus . They asked him ,
41012019	“ Teacher , Moses wrote for us , ‘ If a man dies and leaves a wife but no child , his brother should marry his widow and have children for his brother . ’
41012020	There were seven brothers . The first got married and died without having children .
41012021	The second married her and died without having children . So did the third .
41012022	None of the seven brothers had any children . Last of all , the woman died .
41012023	When the dead come back to life , whose wife will she be ? The seven brothers had married her . ”
41012024	Jesus said to them , “ Aren’t you mistaken because you don’t know the Scriptures or God’s power ?
41012025	When the dead come back to life , they don’t marry . Rather , they are like the angels in heaven .
41012026	Haven’t you read in the book of Moses that the dead come back to life ? It’s in the passage about the bush , where God said , ‘ I am the God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob . ’
41012027	He’s not the God of the dead but of the living . You’re badly mistaken ! ”
41012028	One of the scribes went to Jesus during the argument with the Sadducees . He saw how well Jesus answered them , so he asked him , “ Which commandment is the most important of them all ? ”
41012029	Jesus answered , “ The most important is , ‘ Listen , Israel , the Lord our God is the only Lord .
41012030	So love the Lord your God with all your heart , with all your soul , with all your mind , and with all your strength . ’
41012031	The second most important commandment is this : ‘ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ’ No other commandment is greater than these . ”
41012032	The scribe said to Jesus , “ Teacher , that was well said ! You’ve told the truth that there is only one God and no other besides him !
41012033	To love him with all your heart , with all your understanding , with all your strength , and to love your neighbor as you love yourself is more important than all the burnt offerings and sacrifices . ”
41012034	When Jesus heard how wisely the man answered , he told the man , “ You’re not too far from the kingdom of God . ” After that , no one dared to ask him another question .
41012035	While Jesus was teaching in the temple courtyard , he asked , “ How can the scribes say that the Messiah is David’s son ?

41012037	David calls him Lord . So how can he be his son ? ” The large crowd enjoyed listening to him .
41012038	As he taught , he said , “ Watch out for the scribes ! They like to walk around in long robes , to be greeted in the marketplaces ,
41012039	and to have the front seats in synagogues and the places of honor at dinners .
41012040	They rob widows by taking their houses and then say long prayers to make themselves look good . The scribes will receive the most severe punishment . ”
41012041	As Jesus sat facing the temple offering box , he watched how much money people put into it . Many rich people put in large amounts .
41012042	A poor widow dropped in two small coins , worth less than a cent .
41012043	He called his disciples and said to them , “ I can guarantee this truth : This poor widow has given more than all the others .
41012044	All of them have given what they could spare . But she , in her poverty , has given everything she had to live on . ”
41013001	As Jesus was going out of the temple courtyard , one of his disciples said to him , “ Teacher , look at these huge stones and these beautiful buildings ! ”
41013002	Jesus said to him , “ Do you see these large buildings ? Not one of these stones will be left on top of another . Each one will be torn down . ”
41013003	As Jesus was sitting on the Mount of Olives facing the temple buildings , Peter , James , John , and Andrew asked him privately ,
41013004	“ Tell us , when will this happen ? What will be the sign when all this will come to an end ? ”
41013005	Jesus answered them , “ Be careful not to let anyone deceive you .

41013007	“ When you hear of wars and rumors of wars , don’t be alarmed ! These things must happen , but they don’t mean that the end has come .
41013008	Nation will fight against nation and kingdom against kingdom . There will be earthquakes and famines in various places . These are only the beginning pains of the end .
41013009	“ Be on your guard ! People will hand you over to the Jewish courts and whip you in their synagogues . You will stand in front of governors and kings to testify to them because of me .

41013012	“ Brother will hand over brother to death ; a father will hand over his child . Children will rebel against their parents and kill them .

41013015	Those who are on the roof should not come down to get anything out of their houses .

41013017	“ How horrible it will be for the women who are pregnant or who are nursing babies in those days .

41013020	If the Lord does not reduce that time , no one will be saved . But those days will be reduced because of those whom God has chosen .
41013021	“ At that time don’t believe anyone who tells you , ‘ Here is the Messiah ! ’ or ‘ There he is ! ’

41013023	Be on your guard ! I have told you everything before it happens .

41013029	In the same way , when you see these things happen , you know that he is near , at the door .
41013030	“ I can guarantee this truth : This generation will not disappear until all these things take place .
41013031	The earth and the heavens will disappear , but my words will never disappear .
41013032	“ No one knows when that day or hour will come . Even the angels in heaven and the Son don’t know . Only the Father knows .
41013033	Be careful ! Watch ! You don’t know the exact time .
41013034	It is like a man who went on a trip . As he left home , he put his servants in charge . He assigned work to each one and ordered the guard to be alert .
41013035	Therefore , be alert , because you don’t know when the owner of the house will return . It could be in the evening or at midnight or at dawn or in the morning .
41013036	Make sure he doesn’t come suddenly and find you asleep .
41013037	I’m telling everyone what I’m telling you : ‘ Be alert ! ’ ”
41014001	It was two days before the Passover and the Festival of Unleavened Bread . The chief priests and the scribes were looking for some underhanded way to arrest Jesus and to kill him .
41014002	However , they said , “ We shouldn’t arrest him during the festival , or else there will be a riot among the people . ”
41014003	Jesus was in Bethany at the home of Simon , a man who had suffered from a skin disease . While Jesus was sitting there , a woman went to him . She had a bottle of very expensive perfume made from pure nard . She opened the bottle and poured the perfume on his head .
41014004	Some who were there were irritated and said to one another , “ Why was the perfume wasted like this ?
41014005	This perfume could have been sold for a high price , and the money could have been given to the poor . ” So they said some very unkind things to her .
41014006	Jesus said , “ Leave her alone ! Why are you bothering her ? She has done a beautiful thing for me .
41014007	You will always have the poor with you and can help them whenever you want . But you will not always have me with you .
41014008	She did what she could . She came to pour perfume on my body before it is placed in a tomb .
41014009	I can guarantee this truth : Wherever the Good News is spoken in the world , what she has done will also be told in memory of her . ”
41014010	Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve apostles , went to the chief priests to betray Jesus .

41014012	Killing the Passover lamb was customary on the first day of the Festival of Unleavened Bread . The disciples asked Jesus , “ Where do you want us to prepare the Passover meal for you ? ”
41014013	He sent two of his disciples and told them , “ Go into the city . You will meet a man carrying a jug of water . Follow him .

41014015	He will take you upstairs and show you a large room . The room will be completely furnished . Get everything ready for us there . ”
41014016	The disciples left . They went into the city and found everything as Jesus had told them . So they prepared the Passover .
41014017	When evening came , Jesus arrived with the twelve apostles .
41014018	While they were at the table eating , Jesus said , “ I can guarantee this truth : One of you is going to betray me , one who is eating with me ! ”

41014020	He said to them , “ It’s one of you twelve , someone dipping his hand into the bowl with me .
41014021	The Son of Man is going to die as the Scriptures say he will . But how horrible it will be for that person who betrays the Son of Man ! It would have been better for that person if he had never been born . ”

41014032	Then they came to a place called Gethsemane . He said to his disciples , “ Stay here while I pray . ”
41014033	He took Peter , James , and John with him and began to feel distressed and anguished .

41014071	Then Peter began to curse and swear with an oath , “ I don’t know this man you’re talking about ! ”
41014072	Just then a rooster crowed a second time . Peter remembered that Jesus said to him , “ Before a rooster crows twice , you will say three times that you don’t know me . ” Then Peter began to cry very hard .
41015001	Early in the morning the chief priests immediately came to a decision with the leaders and the scribes . The whole Jewish council decided to tie Jesus up , lead him away , and hand him over to Pilate .
41015002	Pilate asked him , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” “ Yes , I am , ” Jesus answered him .
41015003	The chief priests were accusing him of many things .
41015004	So Pilate asked him again , “ Don’t you have any answer ? Look how many accusations they’re bringing against you ! ”
41015005	But Jesus no longer answered anything , so Pilate was surprised .
41015006	At every Passover festival , Pilate would free one prisoner whom the people asked for .
41015007	There was a man named Barabbas in prison . He was with some rebels who had committed murder during a riot .
41015008	The crowd asked Pilate to do for them what he always did .
41015009	Pilate answered them , “ Do you want me to free the king of the Jews for you ? ”
41015010	Pilate knew that the chief priests had handed Jesus over to him because they were jealous .
41015011	The chief priests stirred up the crowd so that Pilate would free Barabbas for them instead .
41015012	So Pilate again asked them , “ Then what should I do with the king of the Jews ? ”
41015013	“ Crucify him ! ” they shouted back .
41015014	Pilate said to them , “ Why ? What has he done wrong ? ” But they shouted even louder , “ Crucify him ! ”
41015015	Pilate wanted to satisfy the people , so he freed Barabbas for them . But he had Jesus whipped and handed over to be crucified .
41015016	The soldiers led Jesus into the courtyard of the palace and called together the whole troop .
41015017	They dressed him in purple , twisted some thorns into a crown , and placed it on his head .
41015018	Then they began to greet him , “ Long live the king of the Jews ! ”
41015019	They kept hitting him on the head with a stick , spitting on him , and kneeling in front of him with false humility .
41015020	After the soldiers finished making fun of Jesus , they took off the purple cape and put his own clothes back on him . Then they led him out to crucify him .
41015021	A man named Simon from the city of Cyrene was coming into Jerusalem from his home in the country . He was the father of Alexander and Rufus . As he was about to pass by , the soldiers forced him to carry Jesus’ cross .
41015022	They took Jesus to Golgotha ( which means “ the place of the skull ” ) .
41015023	They tried to give him wine mixed with a drug called myrrh , but he wouldn’t take it .
41015024	Next they crucified him . Then they divided his clothes among themselves by throwing dice to see what each one would get .
41015025	It was nine in the morning when they crucified him .
41015026	There was a written notice of the accusation against him . It read , “ The king of the Jews . ”
41015027	They crucified two criminals with him , one on his right and the other on his left .
41015029	Those who passed by insulted him . They shook their heads and said , “ What a joke ! You were going to tear down God’s temple and build it again in three days .
41015030	Come down from the cross , and save yourself ! ”
41015031	The chief priests and the scribes made fun of him among themselves in the same way . They said , “ He saved others , but he can’t save himself .
41015032	Let the Messiah , the king of Israel , come down from the cross now so that we may see and believe . ” Even those who were crucified with him were insulting him .
41015033	At noon darkness came over the whole land until three in the afternoon .
41015034	At three o’clock Jesus cried out in a loud voice , “ Eloi , Eloi , lema sabachthani ? ” which means , “ My God , my God , why have you abandoned me ? ”
41015035	When some of the people standing there heard him say that , they said , “ Listen ! He’s calling Elijah . ”
41015036	Someone ran and soaked a sponge in vinegar . Then he put it on a stick and offered Jesus a drink . The man said , “ Let’s see if Elijah comes to take him down . ”
41015037	Then Jesus cried out in a loud voice and died .
41015038	The curtain in the temple was split in two from top to bottom .
41015039	When the officer who stood facing Jesus saw how he gave up his spirit , he said , “ Certainly , this man was the Son of God ! ”
41015040	Some women were watching from a distance . Among them were Mary from Magdala , Mary ( the mother of young James and Joseph ) , and Salome .
41015041	They had followed him and supported him while he was in Galilee . Many other women who had come to Jerusalem with him were there too .
41015042	It was Friday evening , before the day of worship ,
41015043	when Joseph arrived . He was from the city of Arimathea and was an important member of the Jewish council . He , too , was waiting for the kingdom of God . Joseph boldly went to Pilate’s quarters to ask for the body of Jesus .
41015044	Pilate wondered if Jesus had already died . So he summoned the officer to ask him if Jesus was , in fact , dead .
41015045	When the officer had assured him that Jesus was dead , Pilate let Joseph have the corpse .
41015046	Joseph had purchased some linen cloth . He took the body down from the cross and wrapped it in the cloth . Then he laid the body in a tomb , which had been cut out of rock , and he rolled a stone against the door of the tomb .
41015047	Mary from Magdala and Mary ( the mother of Joses ) watched where Jesus was laid .
41016001	When the day of worship was over , Mary from Magdala , Mary ( the mother of James ) , and Salome bought spices to go and anoint Jesus .
41016002	On Sunday they were going to the tomb very early when the sun had just come up .
41016003	They said to one another , “ Who will roll away the stone for us from the entrance to the tomb ? ”
41016004	When they looked up , they saw that the stone had been rolled away . It was a very large stone .
41016005	As they went into the tomb , they saw a young man . He was dressed in a white robe and sat on the right side . They were panic-stricken .
41016006	The young man said to them , “ Don’t panic ! You’re looking for Jesus from Nazareth , who was crucified . He has been brought back to life . He’s not here . Look at the place where they laid him .
41016007	Go and tell his disciples and Peter that he’s going ahead of them to Galilee . There they will see him , just as he told them . ”
41016008	They went out of the tomb and ran away . Shock and trembling had overwhelmed them . They didn’t say a thing to anyone , because they were afraid .
41016009	After Jesus came back to life early on Sunday , he appeared first to Mary from Magdala , from whom he had forced out seven demons .
41016010	She went and told his friends , who were grieving and crying .
41016011	They didn’t believe her when they heard that he was alive and that she had seen him .
41016012	Later Jesus appeared to two disciples as they were walking to their home in the country . He did not look as he usually did .
41016013	They went back and told the others , who did not believe them either .
41016014	Still later Jesus appeared to the eleven apostles while they were eating . He put them to shame for their unbelief and because they were too stubborn to believe those who had seen him alive .
41016015	Then Jesus said to them , “ Go everywhere in the world , and tell everyone the Good News .
41016016	Whoever believes and is baptized will be saved , but whoever does not believe will be condemned .
41016017	“ These are the miraculous signs that will accompany believers : They will use the power and authority of my name to force demons out of people . They will speak new languages .
41016018	They will pick up snakes , and if they drink any deadly poison , it will not hurt them . They will place their hands on the sick and cure them . ”
41016019	After talking with the apostles , the Lord was taken to heaven , where God gave him the highest position .
41016020	The disciples spread the Good News everywhere . The Lord worked with them . He confirmed his word by the miraculous signs that accompanied it .
42001001	Many have attempted to write about what had taken place among us .
42001002	They received their information from those who had been eyewitnesses and servants of God’s word from the beginning , and they passed it on to us .
42001003	I , too , have followed everything closely from the beginning . So I thought it would be a good idea to write an orderly account for Your Excellency , Theophilus .
42001004	In this way you will know that what you’ve been told is true .
42001005	When Herod was king of Judea , there was a priest named Zechariah , who belonged to the division of priests named after Abijah . Zechariah’s wife Elizabeth was a descendant of Aaron .
42001006	Zechariah and Elizabeth had God’s approval . They followed all the Lord’s commands and regulations perfectly .
42001007	Yet , they never had any children because Elizabeth couldn’t become pregnant . Both of them were too old to have children .
42001008	Zechariah was on duty with his division of priests . As he served in God’s presence ,
42001009	he was chosen by priestly custom to go into the Lord’s temple to burn incense .
42001010	All the people were praying outside while he was burning incense .
42001011	Then , to the right of the incense altar , an angel of the Lord appeared to him .
42001012	Zechariah was troubled and overcome with fear .
42001013	The angel said to him , “ Don’t be afraid , Zechariah ! God has heard your prayer . Your wife Elizabeth will have a son , and you will name him John .
42001014	He will be your pride and joy , and many people will be glad that he was born .
42001015	As far as the Lord is concerned , he will be a great man . He will never drink wine or any other liquor . He will be filled with the Holy Spirit even before he is born .
42001016	He will bring many people in Israel back to the Lord their God .
42001017	He will go ahead of the Lord with the spirit and power that Elijah had . He will change parents’ attitudes toward their children . He will change disobedient people so that they will accept the wisdom of those who have God’s approval . In this way he will prepare the people for their Lord . ”
42001018	Zechariah said to the angel , “ What proof is there for this ? I’m an old man , and my wife is beyond her childbearing years . ”
42001019	The angel answered him , “ I’m Gabriel ! I stand in God’s presence . God sent me to tell you this good news .
42001020	But because you didn’t believe what I said , you will be unable to talk until the day this happens . Everything will come true at the right time . ”
42001021	Meanwhile , the people were waiting for Zechariah . They were amazed that he was staying in the temple so long .
42001022	When he did come out , he was unable to speak to them . So they realized that he had seen a vision in the temple . He motioned to them but remained unable to talk .
42001023	When the days of his service were over , he went home .
42001024	Later , his wife Elizabeth became pregnant and didn’t go out in public for five months . She said ,
42001025	“ The Lord has done this for me now . He has removed my public disgrace . ”
42001026	Six months after Elizabeth had become pregnant , God sent the angel Gabriel to Nazareth , a city in Galilee .
42001027	The angel went to a virgin promised in marriage to a descendant of David named Joseph . The virgin’s name was Mary .
42001028	When the angel entered her home , he greeted her and said , “ You are favored by the Lord ! The Lord is with you . ”
42001029	She was startled by what the angel said and tried to figure out what this greeting meant .
42001030	The angel told her , “ Don’t be afraid , Mary . You have found favor with God .
42001031	You will become pregnant , give birth to a son , and name him Jesus .
42001032	He will be a great manand will be called the Son of the Most High . The Lord God will give himthe throne of his ancestor David .
42001033	Your son will be king of Jacob’s people forever , and his kingdom will never end . ”
42001034	Mary asked the angel , “ How can this be ? I’ve never had sexual intercourse . ”
42001035	The angel answered her , “ The Holy Spirit will come to you , and the power of the Most High will overshadow you . Therefore , the holy child developing inside you will be called the Son of God .
42001036	“ Elizabeth , your relative , is six months pregnant with a son in her old age . People said she couldn’t have a child .
42001037	But nothing is impossible for God . ”
42001038	Mary answered , “ I am the Lord’s servant . Let everything you’ve said happen to me . ” Then the angel left her .
42001039	Soon afterward , Mary hurried to a city in the mountain region of Judah .
42001040	She entered Zechariah’s home and greeted Elizabeth .
42001041	When Elizabeth heard the greeting , she felt the baby kick . Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit .
42001042	She said in a loud voice , “ You are the most blessed of all women , and blessed is the child that you will have .
42001043	I feel blessed that the mother of my Lord is visiting me .
42001044	As soon as I heard your greeting , I felt the baby jump for joy .
42001045	You are blessed for believing that the Lord would keep his promise to you . ”
42001046	Mary said , “ My soul praises the Lord’s greatness !
42001047	My spirit finds its joy in God , my Savior ,
42001048	because he has looked favorably on me , his humble servant . “ From now on , all people will call me blessed
42001049	because the Almighty has done great things to me . His name is holy .
42001050	For those who fear him , his mercy lasts throughout every generation .
42001051	“ He displayed his mighty power . He scattered those who think too highly of themselves .
42001052	He pulled strong rulers from their thrones . He honored humble people .
42001053	He fed hungry people with good food . He sent rich people away with nothing .
42001054	“ He remembered to help his servant Israel forever .
42001055	This is the promise he made to our ancestors , to Abraham and his descendants . ”
42001056	Mary stayed with Elizabeth about three months and then went back home .
42001057	When the time came for Elizabeth to have her child , she gave birth to a son .
42001058	Her neighbors and relatives heard that the Lord had been very kind to her , and they shared her joy .
42001059	When the child was eight days old , they went to the temple to circumcise him . They were going to name him Zechariah after his father .
42001060	But his mother spoke up , “ Absolutely not ! His name will be John . ”
42001061	Their friends said to her , “ But you don’t have any relatives with that name . ”
42001062	So they motioned to the baby’s father to see what he wanted to name the child .

42001064	Suddenly , Zechariah was able to speak , and he began to praise God .
42001065	All their neighbors were filled with awe . Throughout the mountain region of Judea , people talked about everything that had happened .
42001066	Everyone who heard about it seriously thought it over and asked , “ What does the future hold for this child ? ” It was clear that the Lord was with him .
42001067	His father Zechariah was filled with the Holy Spirit and prophesied ,

42001069	He has raised up a mighty Savior for usin the family of his servant David .
42001070	He made this promise through his holy prophets long ago .

42001078	A new day will dawn on us from abovebecause our God is loving and merciful .

42001080	The child John grew and became spiritually strong . He lived in the desert until the day he appeared to the people of Israel .
42002001	At that time the Emperor Augustus ordered a census of the Roman Empire .
42002002	This was the first census taken while Quirinius was governor of Syria .
42002003	All the people went to register in the cities where their ancestors had lived .
42002004	So Joseph went from Nazareth , a city in Galilee , to a Judean city called Bethlehem . Joseph , a descendant of King David , went to Bethlehem because David had been born there .
42002005	Joseph went there to register with Mary . She had been promised to him in marriage and was pregnant .
42002006	While they were in Bethlehem , the time came for Mary to have her child .
42002007	She gave birth to her firstborn son . She wrapped him in strips of cloth and laid him in a manger because there wasn’t any room for them in the inn .

42002026	and had told him that he wouldn’t die until he had seen the Messiah , whom the Lord would send .

42002037	and she had been a widow for 84 years . Anna never left the temple courtyard but worshiped day and night by fasting and praying .

42002040	The child grew and became strong . He was filled with wisdom , and God’s favor was with him .
42002041	Every year Jesus’ parents would go to Jerusalem for the Passover festival .
42002042	When he was 12 years old , they went as usual .
42002043	When the festival was over , they left for home . The boy Jesus stayed behind in Jerusalem , but his parents didn’t know it .
42002044	They thought that he was with the others who were traveling with them . After traveling for a day , they started to look for him among their relatives and friends .
42002045	When they didn’t find him , they went back to Jerusalem to look for him .
42002046	Three days later , they found him in the temple courtyard . He was sitting among the teachers , listening to them , and asking them questions .
42002047	His understanding and his answers stunned everyone who heard him .
42002048	When his parents saw him , they were shocked . His mother asked him , “ Son , why have you done this to us ? Your father and I have been worried sick looking for you ! ”
42002049	Jesus said to them , “ Why were you looking for me ? Didn’t you realize that I had to be in my Father’s house ? ”
42002050	But they didn’t understand what he meant .
42002051	Then he returned with them to Nazareth and was obedient to them . His mother treasured all these things in her heart .
42002052	Jesus grew in wisdom and maturity . He gained favor from God and people .
42003001	It was the fifteenth year in the reign of the Emperor Tiberius . Pontius Pilate was governor of Judea . Herod ruled Galilee , and his brother Philip ruled Iturea and Trachonitis . Lysanias was the ruler of Abilene .
42003002	It was at the time when Annas and Caiaphas were chief priests that God spoke to John , son of Zechariah , in the desert .
42003003	John traveled throughout the region around the Jordan River . He told people about a baptism of repentance for the forgiveness of sins .
42003004	As the prophet Isaiah wrote in his book , “ A voice cries out in the desert : ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord ! Make his paths straight !
42003005	Every valley will be filled . Every mountain and hill will be leveled . The crooked ways will be made straight . The rough roads will be made smooth .
42003006	All people will see the salvation that God gives . ’ ”
42003007	Crowds of people were coming to be baptized by John . He would say to them , “ You poisonous snakes ! Who showed you how to flee from God’s coming anger ?
42003008	Do those things that prove that you have turned to God and have changed the way you think and act . Don’t say , ‘ Abraham is our ancestor . ’ I guarantee that God can raise up descendants for Abraham from these stones .
42003009	The ax is now ready to cut the roots of the trees . Any tree that doesn’t produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into a fire . ”
42003010	The crowds asked him , “ What should we do ? ”
42003011	He answered them , “ Whoever has two shirts should share with the person who doesn’t have any . Whoever has food should share it too . ”
42003012	Some tax collectors came to be baptized . They asked him , “ Teacher , what should we do ? ”
42003013	He told them , “ Don’t collect more money than you are ordered to collect . ”

42004002	where he was tempted by the devil for 40 days . During those days Jesus ate nothing , so when they were over , he was hungry .
42004003	The devil said to him , “ If you are the Son of God , tell this stone to become a loaf of bread . ”
42004004	Jesus answered him , “ Scripture says , ‘ A person cannot live on bread alone . ’ ”
42004005	The devil took him to a high place and showed him all the kingdoms of the world in an instant .
