42004021	Then he said to them , “ This passage came true today when you heard me read it . ”
42004022	All the people spoke well of him . They were amazed to hear the gracious words flowing from his lips . They said , “ Isn’t this Joseph’s son ? ”
42004023	So he said to them , “ You’ll probably quote this proverb to me , ‘ Doctor , cure yourself ! ’ and then say to me , ‘ Do all the things in your hometown that we’ve heard you’ve done in Capernaum . ’ ”
42004024	Then Jesus added , “ I can guarantee this truth : A prophet isn’t accepted in his hometown .
42004025	“ I can guarantee this truth : There were many widows in Israel in Elijah’s time . It had not rained for three-and-a-half years , and the famine was severe everywhere in the country .
42004026	But God didn’t send Elijah to anyone except a widow at Zarephath in the territory of Sidon .
42004027	There were also many people with skin diseases in Israel in the prophet Elisha’s time . But God cured no one except Naaman from Syria . ”
42004028	Everyone in the synagogue became furious when they heard this .
42004029	Their city was built on a hill with a cliff . So they got up , forced Jesus out of the city , and led him to the cliff . They intended to throw him off of it .
42004030	But Jesus walked right by them and went away .
42004031	Jesus went to Capernaum , a city in Galilee , and taught them on a day of worship .
42004032	The people were amazed at his teachings because he spoke with authority .
42004033	In the synagogue was a man possessed by a spirit , an evil demon . He shouted very loudly ,
42004034	“ Oh , no ! What do you want with us , Jesus from Nazareth ? Have you come to destroy us ? I know who you are—the Holy One of God ! ”
42004035	Jesus ordered the spirit , “ Keep quiet , and come out of him ! ” The demon threw the man down in the middle of the synagogue and came out without hurting him .
42004036	Everyone was stunned . They said to one another , “ What kind of command is this ? With authority and power he gives orders to evil spirits , and they come out . ”
42004037	So news about him spread to every place throughout the surrounding region .
42004038	Jesus left the synagogue and went to Simon’s house . Simon’s mother-in-law was sick with a high fever . They asked Jesus to help her .
42004039	He bent over her , ordered the fever to leave , and it went away . She got up immediately and prepared a meal for them .
42004040	When the sun was setting , everyone who had friends suffering from various diseases brought them to him . He placed his hands on each of them and cured them .
42004041	Demons came out of many people , shouting , “ You are the Son of God ! ” But Jesus ordered them not to speak . After all , they knew he was the Messiah .
42004042	In the morning he went to a place where he could be alone . The crowds searched for him . When they came to him , they tried to keep him from leaving .
42004043	But he said to them , “ I have to tell the Good News about the kingdom of God in other cities also . That’s what I was sent to do . ”
42004044	So he spread his message in the synagogues of Judea .
42005001	One day Jesus was standing by the Sea of Galilee . The people crowded around him as they listened to God’s word .
42005002	Jesus saw two boats on the shore . The fishermen had stepped out of them and were washing their nets .
42005003	So Jesus got into the boat that belonged to Simon and asked him to push off a little from the shore . Then Jesus sat down and taught the crowd from the boat .
42005004	When he finished speaking , he told Simon , “ Take the boat into deep water , and lower your nets to catch some fish . ”
42005005	Simon answered , “ Teacher , we worked hard all night and caught nothing . But if you say so , I’ll lower the nets . ”
42005006	After the men had done this , they caught such a large number of fish that their nets began to tear .
42005007	So they signaled to their partners in the other boat to come and help them . Their partners came and filled both boats until the boats nearly sank .
42005008	When Simon Peter saw this , he knelt in front of Jesus and said , “ Leave me , Lord ! I’m a sinful person ! ”
42005009	Simon and everyone who was with him was amazed to see the large number of fish they had caught .
42005010	James and John , who were Zebedee’s sons and Simon’s partners , were also amazed . Jesus told Simon , “ Don’t be afraid . From now on you will catch people instead of fish . ”
42005011	Simon and his partners brought the boats to shore , left everything , and followed Jesus .
42005012	One day Jesus was in a city where there was a man covered with a serious skin disease . When the man saw Jesus , he bowed with his face to the ground . He begged Jesus , “ Sir , if you want to , you can make me clean . ”
42005013	Jesus reached out , touched him , and said , “ I want to . So be clean ! ” Immediately , his skin disease went away .
42005014	Jesus ordered him , “ Don’t tell anyone . Instead , show yourself to the priest . Then offer the sacrifice as Moses commanded as proof to people that you are clean . ”
42005015	The news about Jesus spread even more . Large crowds gathered to hear him and have their diseases cured .
42005016	But he would go away to places where he could be alone for prayer .
42005017	One day when Jesus was teaching , some Pharisees and experts in Moses’ Teachings were present . They had come from every village in Galilee and Judea and from Jerusalem . Jesus had the power of the Lord to heal .
42005018	Some men brought a paralyzed man on a stretcher . They tried to take him into the house and put him in front of Jesus .
42005019	But they could not find a way to get him into the house because of the crowd . So they went up on the roof . They made an opening in the tiles and let the man down on his stretcher among the people . ( They lowered him in front of Jesus . )
42005020	When Jesus saw their faith , he said , “ Sir , your sins are forgiven . ”
42005021	The scribes and the Pharisees thought , “ Who is this man ? He’s dishonoring God ! Who besides God can forgive sins ? ”
42005022	Jesus knew what they were thinking . So he said to them , “ What are you thinking ?
42005023	Is it easier to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or to say , ‘ Get up and walk ’ ?
42005024	I want you to know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins . ” Then he said to the paralyzed man , “ Get up , pick up your stretcher , and go home . ”
42005025	The man immediately stood up in front of them and picked up the stretcher he had been lying on . Praising God , he went home .
42005026	Everyone was amazed and praised God . They were filled with awe and said , “ We’ve seen things today we can hardly believe ! ”
42005027	After that , Jesus left . He saw a tax collector named Levi sitting in a tax office . Jesus said to him , “ Follow me ! ”
42005028	So Levi got up , left everything , and followed him .
42005029	Levi held a large reception at his home for Jesus . A huge crowd of tax collectors and others were eating with them .
42005030	The Pharisees and their scribes complained to Jesus’ disciples . They asked , “ Why do you eat and drink with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
42005031	Jesus answered them , “ Healthy people don’t need a doctor ; those who are sick do .
42005032	I’ve come to call sinners to change the way they think and act , not to call people who think they don’t have any flaws . ”
42005033	They said to him , “ John’s disciples frequently fast and say prayers , and so do the disciples of the Pharisees . But your disciples eat and drink . ”
42005034	Jesus asked them , “ Can you force wedding guests to fast while the groom is still with them ?
42005035	The time will come when the groom will be taken away from them . At that time they will fast . ”
42005036	He also used these illustrations : “ No one tears a piece of cloth from a new coat to patch an old coat . Otherwise , the new cloth will tear the old . Besides , the patch from the new will not match the old .
42005037	People don’t pour new wine into old wineskins . If they do , the new wine will make the skins burst . The wine will run out , and the skins will be ruined .
42005038	Rather , new wine is to be poured into fresh skins .
42005039	“ No one who has been drinking old wine wants new wine . He says , ‘ The old wine is better ! ’ ”
42006001	Once , on a day of worship , Jesus was walking through some grainfields . His disciples were picking the heads of grain , removing the husks , and eating the grain .
42006002	Some of the Pharisees asked , “ Why are your disciples doing something that is not right to do on the day of worship ? ”
42006003	Jesus answered them , “ Haven’t you read what David did when he and his men were hungry ?
42006004	Haven’t you read how he went into the house of God , ate the bread of the presence , and gave some of it to the men who were with him ? He had no right to eat those loaves . Only the priests have that right . ”
42006005	Then he added , “ The Son of Man has authority over the day of worship . ”
42006006	On another day of worship , Jesus went into a synagogue to teach . A man whose right hand was paralyzed was there .
42006007	The scribes and the Pharisees were watching Jesus closely . They wanted to see whether he would heal the man on the day of worship so that they could find a way to accuse him of doing something wrong .
42006008	But Jesus knew what they were thinking . So he told the man with the paralyzed hand , “ Get up , and stand in the center of the synagogue ! ” The man got up and stood there .
42006009	Then Jesus said to them , “ I ask you—what is the right thing to do on a day of worship : to do good or evil , to give a person his health or to destroy it ? ”
42006010	He looked around at all of them and then said to the man , “ Hold out your hand . ” The man did so , and his hand became normal again .
42006011	The scribes and Pharisees were furious and began to discuss with each other what they could do to Jesus .
42006012	At that time Jesus went to a mountain to pray . He spent the whole night in prayer to God .
42006013	When it was day , he called his disciples . He chose twelve of them and called them apostles .
42006014	They were Simon ( whom Jesus named Peter ) and Simon’s brother Andrew , James , John , Philip , Bartholomew ,
42006015	Matthew , Thomas , James ( son of Alphaeus ) , Simon ( who was called the Zealot ) ,
42006016	Judas ( son of James ) , and Judas Iscariot ( who became a traitor ) .
42006017	Jesus came down from the mountain with them and stood on a level place . A large crowd of his disciples and many other people were there . They had come from all over Judea , Jerusalem , and the seacoast of Tyre and Sidon .
42006018	They wanted to hear him and be cured of their diseases . Those who were tormented by evil spirits were cured .
42006019	The entire crowd was trying to touch him because power was coming from him and curing all of them .
42006020	Jesus looked at his disciples and said , “ Blessed are those who are poor . The kingdom of God is theirs .
42006021	Blessed are those who are hungry . They will be satisfied . Blessed are those who are crying . They will laugh .
42006022	Blessed are you when people hate you , avoid you , insult you , and slander youbecause you are committed to the Son of Man .
42006023	Rejoice then , and be very happy ! You have a great reward in heaven . That’s the way their ancestors treated the prophets .
42006024	“ But how horrible it will be for those who are rich . They have had their comfort .
42006025	How horrible it will be for those who are well-fed . They will be hungry . How horrible it will be for those who are laughing . They will mourn and cry .
42006026	How horrible it will be for youwhen everyone says nice things about you . That’s the way their ancestors treated the false prophets .
42006027	“ But I tell everyone who is listening : Love your enemies . Be kind to those who hate you .
42006028	Bless those who curse you . Pray for those who insult you .
42006029	If someone strikes you on the cheek , offer the other cheek as well . If someone takes your coat , don’t stop him from taking your shirt .
42006030	Give to everyone who asks you for something . If someone takes what is yours , don’t insist on getting it back .
42006031	“ Do for other people everything you want them to do for you .
42006032	“ If you love those who love you , do you deserve any thanks for that ? Even sinners love those who love them .
42006033	If you help those who help you , do you deserve any thanks for that ? Sinners do that too .
42006034	If you lend anything to those from whom you expect to get something back , do you deserve any thanks for that ? Sinners also lend to sinners to get back what they lend .
42006035	Rather , love your enemies , help them , and lend to them without expecting to get anything back . Then you will have a great reward . You will be the children of the Most High God . After all , he is kind to unthankful and evil people .
42006036	Be merciful as your Father is merciful .
42006037	“ Stop judging , and you will never be judged . Stop condemning , and you will never be condemned . Forgive , and you will be forgiven .
42006038	Give , and you will receive . A large quantity , pressed together , shaken down , and running over will be put into your pocket . The standards you use for others will be applied to you . ”
42006039	Jesus also gave them this illustration : “ Can one blind person lead another ? Won’t both fall into the same pit ?
42006040	A student is no better than his teacher . But everyone who is well-trained will be like his teacher .
42006041	“ Why do you see the piece of sawdust in another believer’s eye and not notice the wooden beam in your own eye ?
42006042	How can you say to another believer , ‘ Friend , let me take the piece of sawdust out of your eye , ’ when you don’t see the beam in your own eye ? You hypocrite ! First remove the beam from your own eye . Then you will see clearly to remove the piece of sawdust from another believer’s eye .
42006043	“ A good tree doesn’t produce rotten fruit , and a rotten tree doesn’t produce good fruit .
42006044	Each tree is known by its fruit . You don’t pick figs from thorny plants or grapes from a thornbush .
42006045	Good people do the good that is in them . But evil people do the evil that is in them . The things people say come from inside them .
42006046	“ Why do you call me Lord but don’t do what I tell you ?
42006047	“ I will show you what everyone who comes to me , hears what I say , and obeys it is like .
42006048	He is like a person who dug down to bedrock to lay the foundation of his home . When a flood came , the floodwaters pushed against that house . But the house couldn’t be washed away because it had a good foundation .
42006049	The person who hears what I say but doesn’t obey it is like someone who built a house on the ground without any foundation . The floodwaters pushed against it , and that house quickly collapsed and was destroyed . ”
42007001	When Jesus had finished everything he wanted to say to the people , he went to Capernaum .
42007002	There a Roman army officer’s valuable slave was sick and near death .
42007003	The officer had heard about Jesus and sent some Jewish leaders to him . They were to ask Jesus to come and save the servant’s life .
42007004	They came to Jesus and begged , “ He deserves your help .
42007005	He loves our people and built our synagogue at his own expense . ”
42007006	Jesus went with them . He was not far from the house when the officer sent friends to tell Jesus , “ Sir , don’t bother . I don’t deserve to have you come into my house .
42007007	That’s why I didn’t come to you . But just give a command , and let my servant be cured .
42007008	As you know , I’m in a chain of command and have soldiers at my command . I tell one of them , ‘ Go ! ’ and he goes , and another , ‘ Come ! ’ and he comes . I tell my servant , ‘ Do this ! ’ and he does it . ”
42007009	Jesus was amazed at the officer when he heard these words . He turned to the crowd following him and said , “ I can guarantee that I haven’t found faith as great as this in Israel . ”
42007010	When the men who had been sent returned to the house , they found the servant healthy again .
42007011	Soon afterward , Jesus went to a city called Nain . His disciples and a large crowd went with him .
42007012	As he came near the entrance to the city , he met a funeral procession . The dead man was a widow’s only child . A large crowd from the city was with her .
42007013	When the Lord saw her , he felt sorry for her . He said to her , “ Don’t cry . ”
42007014	He went up to the open coffin , took hold of it , and the men who were carrying it stopped . He said , “ Young man , I’m telling you to come back to life ! ”
42007015	The dead man sat up and began to talk , and Jesus gave him back to his mother .
42007016	Everyone was struck with fear and praised God . They said , “ A great prophet has appeared among us , ” and “ God has taken care of his people . ”
42007017	This news about Jesus spread throughout Judea and the surrounding region .
42007018	John’s disciples told him about all these things . Then John called two of his disciples
42007019	and sent them to ask the Lord , “ Are you the one who is coming , or should we look for someone else ? ”
42007020	The men came to Jesus and said , “ John the Baptizer sent us to ask you , ‘ Are you the one who is coming , or should we look for someone else ? ’ ”
42007021	At that time Jesus was curing many people who had diseases , sicknesses , and evil spirits . Also , he was giving back sight to many who were blind .
42007022	Jesus answered John’s disciples , “ Go back , and tell John what you have seen and heard : Blind people see again , lame people are walking , those with skin diseases are made clean , deaf people hear again , dead people are brought back to life , and poor people hear the Good News .
42007023	Whoever doesn’t lose his faith in me is indeed blessed . ”
42007024	When John’s messengers had left , Jesus spoke to the crowds about John . “ What did you go into the desert to see ? Tall grass swaying in the wind ?
42007025	Really , what did you go to see ? A man dressed in fine clothes ? Those who wear splendid clothes and live in luxury are in royal palaces .
42007026	Really , what did you go to see ? A prophet ? Let me tell you that he is far more than a prophet .
42007027	John is the one about whom Scripture says , ‘ I am sending my messenger ahead of youto prepare the way in front of you . ’
42007028	I can guarantee that of all the people ever born , no one is greater than John . Yet , the least important person in the kingdom of God is greater than John .
42007029	“ All the people , including tax collectors , heard John . They admitted that God was right by letting John baptize them .
42007030	But the Pharisees and the experts in Moses’ Teachings rejected God’s plan for them . They refused to be baptized .
42007031	“ How can I describe the people who are living now ? What are they like ?
42007032	They are like children who sit in the marketplace and shout to each other , ‘ We played music for you , but you didn’t dance . We sang a funeral song , but you didn’t cry . ’
42007033	John the Baptizer has come neither eating bread nor drinking wine , and you say , ‘ There’s a demon in him ! ’
42007034	The Son of Man has come eating and drinking , and you say , ‘ Look at him ! He’s a glutton and a drunk , a friend of tax collectors and sinners ! ’
42007035	“ Yet , wisdom is proved right by all its results . ”
42007036	One of the Pharisees invited Jesus to eat with him . Jesus went to the Pharisee’s house and was eating at the table .
42007037	A woman who lived a sinful life in that city found out that Jesus was eating at the Pharisee’s house . So she took a bottle of perfume
42007038	and knelt at his feet . She was crying and washed his feet with her tears . Then she dried his feet with her hair , kissed them over and over again , and poured the perfume on them .
42007039	The Pharisee who had invited Jesus saw this and thought , “ If this man really were a prophet , he would know what sort of woman is touching him . She’s a sinner . ”
42007040	Jesus spoke up , “ Simon , I have something to say to you . ” Simon replied , “ Teacher , you’re free to speak . ”
42007041	So Jesus said , “ Two men owed a moneylender some money . One owed him five hundred silver coins , and the other owed him fifty .
42007042	When they couldn’t pay it back , he was kind enough to cancel their debts . Now , who do you think will love him the most ? ”
42007043	Simon answered , “ I suppose the one who had the largest debt canceled . ” Jesus said to him , “ You’re right ! ”
42007044	Then , turning to the woman , he said to Simon , “ You see this woman , don’t you ? I came into your house . You didn’t wash my feet . But she has washed my feet with her tears and dried them with her hair .
42007045	You didn’t give me a kiss . But ever since I came in , she has not stopped kissing my feet .
42007046	You didn’t put any olive oil on my head . But she has poured perfume on my feet .
42007047	That’s why I’m telling you that her many sins have been forgiven . Her great love proves that . But whoever receives little forgiveness loves very little . ”
42007048	Then Jesus said to her , “ Your sins have been forgiven . ”
42007049	The other guests thought , “ Who is this man who even forgives sins ? ”
42007050	Jesus said to the woman , “ Your faith has saved you . Go in peace ! ”
42008001	After this , Jesus traveled from one city and village to another . He spread the Good News about God’s kingdom . The twelve apostles were with him .
42008002	Also , some women were with him . They had been cured from evil spirits and various illnesses . These women were Mary , also called Magdalene , from whom seven demons had gone out ;
42008003	Joanna , whose husband Chusa was Herod’s administrator ; Susanna ; and many other women . They provided financial support for Jesus and his disciples .
42008004	When a large crowd had gathered and people had come to Jesus from every city , he used this story as an illustration :
42008005	“ A farmer went to plant his seeds . Some seeds were planted along the road , were trampled , and were devoured by birds .
42008006	Others were planted on rocky soil . When the plants came up , they withered because they had no moisture .
42008007	Others were planted among thornbushes . The thornbushes grew up with them and choked them .
42008008	Others were planted on good ground . When they came up , they produced a hundred times as much as was planted . ” After he had said this , he called out , “ Let the person who has ears listen ! ”
42008009	His disciples asked him what this story meant .
42008010	Jesus answered , “ Knowledge about the mysteries of the kingdom of God has been given directly to you . But it is given to others in stories . When they look , they don’t see , and when they hear , they don’t understand .
42008011	“ This is what the story illustrates : The seed is God’s word .
42008012	Some people are like seeds that were planted along the road . They hear the word , but then the devil comes . He takes the word away from them so that they don’t believe and become saved .
42008013	Some people are like seeds on rocky soil . They welcome the word with joy whenever they hear it , but they don’t develop any roots . They believe for a while , but when their faith is tested , they abandon it .
42008014	The seeds that were planted among thornbushes are people who hear the word , but as life goes on the worries , riches , and pleasures of life choke them . So they don’t produce anything good .
42008015	The seeds that were planted on good ground are people who also hear the word . But they keep it in their good and honest hearts and produce what is good despite what life may bring .
42008016	“ No one lights a lamp and hides it under a bowl or puts it under a bed . Instead , everyone who lights a lamp puts it on a lamp stand so that those who come in will see the light .
42008017	There is nothing hidden that will not be revealed . There is nothing kept secret that will not come to light .
42008018	“ So pay attention to how you listen ! Those who understand these mysteries will be given more knowledge . However , some people don’t understand these mysteries . Even what they think they understand will be taken away from them . ”
42008019	His mother and his brothers came to see him . But they couldn’t meet with him because of the crowd .
42008020	Someone told Jesus , “ Your mother and your brothers are standing outside . They want to see you . ”
42008021	He answered them , “ My mother and my brothers are those who hear and do what God’s word says . ”
42008022	One day Jesus and his disciples got into a boat . He said to them , “ Let’s cross to the other side of the lake . ” So they started out .
42008023	As they were sailing along , Jesus fell asleep . A violent storm came across the lake . The boat was taking on water , and they were in danger .
42008024	They went to him , woke him up , and said , “ Master ! Master ! We’re going to die ! ” Then he got up and ordered the wind and the waves to stop . The wind stopped , and the sea became calm .
42008025	He asked them , “ Where is your faith ? ” Frightened and amazed , they asked each other , “ Who is this man ? He gives orders to the wind and the water , and they obey him ! ”
42008026	They landed in the region of the Gerasenes across from Galilee .
42008027	When Jesus stepped out on the shore , a certain man from the city met him . The man was possessed by demons and had not worn clothes for a long time . He would not stay in a house but lived in the tombs .
42008028	When he saw Jesus , he shouted , fell in front of him , and said in a loud voice , “ Why are you bothering me , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ? I beg you not to torture me ! ”
42008029	Jesus ordered the evil spirit to come out of the man . ( The evil spirit had controlled the man for a long time . People had kept him under guard . He was chained hand and foot . But he would break the chains . Then the demon would force him to go into the desert . )
42008030	Jesus asked him , “ What is your name ? ” He answered , “ Legion [ Six Thousand ] . ” ( Many demons had entered him . )
42008031	The demons begged Jesus not to order them to go into the bottomless pit .
42008032	A large herd of pigs was feeding on a mountainside . The demons begged Jesus to let them enter those pigs . So he let them do this .
42008033	The demons came out of the man and went into the pigs . Then the herd rushed down the cliff into the lake and drowned .
42008034	When those who had taken care of the pigs saw what had happened , they ran away . They reported everything in the city and countryside .
42008035	The people went to see what had happened . They came to Jesus and found the man from whom the demons had gone out . Dressed and in his right mind , he was sitting at Jesus’ feet . The people were frightened .
42008036	Those who had seen this told the people how Jesus had restored the demon-possessed man to health .
42008037	Then all the people from the surrounding region of the Gerasenes asked Jesus to leave because they were terrified . Jesus got into a boat and started back .
42008038	The man from whom the demons had gone out begged him , “ Let me go with you . ” But Jesus sent the man away and told him ,
42008039	“ Go home to your family , and tell them how much God has done for you . ” So the man left . He went through the whole city and told people how much Jesus had done for him .
42008040	When Jesus came back , a crowd welcomed him . Everyone was expecting him .
42008041	A man named Jairus , a synagogue leader , arrived and quickly bowed down in front of Jesus . He begged Jesus to come to his home .
42008042	His only daughter , who was about twelve years old , was dying . As Jesus went , the people were crowding around him .
42008043	A woman who had been suffering from chronic bleeding for twelve years was in the crowd . No one could cure her .
42008044	She came up behind Jesus , touched the edge of his clothes , and her bleeding stopped at once .
42008045	Jesus asked , “ Who touched me ? ” After everyone denied touching him , Peter said , “ Teacher , the people are crowding you and pressing against you . ”
42008046	Jesus said , “ Someone touched me . I know power has gone out of me . ”
42008047	The woman saw that she couldn’t hide . Trembling , she quickly bowed in front of him . There , in front of all the people , she told why she touched him and how she was cured at once .
42008048	Jesus told her , “ Daughter , your faith has made you well . Go in peace ! ”
42008049	While Jesus was still speaking to her , someone came from the synagogue leader’s home . He said , “ Your daughter is dead . Don’t bother the teacher anymore . ”
42008050	When Jesus heard this , he told the synagogue leader , “ Don’t be afraid ! Just believe , and she will get well . ”
42008051	Jesus went into the house . He allowed no one to go with him except Peter , John , James , and the child’s parents .
42008052	Everyone was crying and showing how sad they were . Jesus said , “ Don’t cry ! She’s not dead . She’s just sleeping . ”
42008053	They laughed at him because they knew she was dead .
42008054	But Jesus took her hand and called out , “ Child , get up ! ”
42008055	She came back to life and got up at once . He ordered her parents to give her something to eat .
42008056	They were amazed . Jesus ordered them not to tell anyone what had happened .
42009001	Jesus called the twelve apostles together and gave them power and authority over every demon and power and authority to cure diseases .
42009002	He sent them to spread the message about the kingdom of God and to cure the sick .
42009003	He told them , “ Don’t take anything along on the trip . Don’t take a walking stick , traveling bag , any food , money , or a change of clothes .
42009004	When you go into a home , stay there until you’re ready to leave .
42009005	If people don’t welcome you , leave that city , and shake its dust off your feet as a warning to them . ”
42009006	The apostles went from village to village , told the Good News , and cured the sick everywhere .
42009007	Herod the ruler heard about everything that was happening . He didn’t know what to make of it . Some people were saying that John had come back to life .
42009008	Others said that Elijah had appeared , and still others said that one of the prophets from long ago had come back to life .
42009009	Herod said , “ I had John’s head cut off . Who is this person I’m hearing so much about ? ” So Herod wanted to see Jesus .
42009010	The apostles came back and told Jesus everything they had done . He took them with him to a city called Bethsaida so that they could be alone .
42009011	But the crowds found out about this and followed him . He welcomed them , talked to them about the kingdom of God , and cured those who were sick .
42009012	Toward the end of the day , the twelve apostles came to him . They said to him , “ Send the crowd to the closest villages and farms so that they can find some food and a place to stay . No one lives around here . ”
42009013	Jesus replied , “ You give them something to eat . ” They said to him , “ We have five loaves of bread and two fish . Unless we go to buy food for all these people , that’s all we have . ”
42009014	( There were about five thousand men . ) Then he told his disciples , “ Have them sit in groups of about fifty . ”
42009015	So they did this .
42009016	Then he took the five loaves and the two fish , looked up to heaven , and blessed the food . He broke the loaves apart and kept giving them to the disciples to give to the crowd .
42009017	All of them ate as much as they wanted . When they picked up the leftover pieces , they filled twelve baskets .
42009018	Once when Jesus was praying privately and his disciples were with him , he asked them , “ Who do people say I am ? ”
42009019	They answered , “ Some say you are John the Baptizer , others Elijah , and still others say that one of the prophets from long ago has come back to life . ”
42009020	He asked them , “ But who do you say I am ? ” Peter answered , “ You are the Messiah , whom God has sent . ”
42009021	He ordered them not to tell this to anyone .
42009022	Jesus said that the Son of Man would have to suffer a lot . He would be rejected by the leaders , the chief priests , and the scribes . He would be killed , but on the third day he would come back to life .
42009023	He said to all of them , “ Those who want to come with me must say no to the things they want , pick up their crosses every day , and follow me .
42009024	Those who want to save their lives will lose them . But those who lose their lives for me will save them .
42009025	What good does it do for people to win the whole world but lose their lives by destroying them ?
42009026	If people are ashamed of me and what I say , the Son of Man will be ashamed of those people when he comes in the glory that he shares with the Father and the holy angels .
42009027	“ I can guarantee this truth : Some people who are standing here will not die until they see the kingdom of God . ”
42009028	About eight days after he had said this , Jesus took Peter , John , and James with him and went up a mountain to pray .
42009029	While Jesus was praying , the appearance of his face changed , and his clothes became dazzling white .
42009030	Suddenly , both Moses and Elijah were talking with him .
42009031	They appeared in heavenly glory and were discussing Jesus’ approaching death and what he was about to fulfill in Jerusalem .
42009032	Peter and the men with him were sleeping soundly . When they woke up , they saw Jesus’ glory and the two men standing with him .
42009033	As Moses and Elijah were leaving him , Peter said to Jesus , “ Teacher , it’s good that we’re here . Let’s put up three tents—one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ” Peter didn’t know what he was saying .
42009034	While he was saying this , a cloud overshadowed them . They were frightened as they went into the cloud .
42009035	A voice came out of the cloud and said , “ This is my Son , whom I have chosen . Listen to him ! ”
42009036	After the voice had spoken , they saw that Jesus was alone . The disciples said nothing , and for some time they told no one about what they had seen .
42009037	The next day , when they had come down from the mountain , a large crowd met Jesus .
42009038	A man in the crowd shouted , “ Teacher , I beg you to look at my son . He’s my only child .
42009039	Whenever a spirit takes control of him , he shrieks , goes into convulsions , and foams at the mouth . After a struggle , the spirit goes away , leaving the child worn out .
42009040	I begged your disciples to force the spirit out of him , but they couldn’t do it . ”
42009041	Jesus answered , “ You unbelieving and corrupt generation ! How long must I be with you and put up with you ? Bring your son here ! ”
42009042	While he was coming to Jesus , the demon knocked the boy to the ground and threw him into convulsions . Jesus ordered the evil spirit to leave . He cured the boy and gave him back to his father .
42009043	Everyone was amazed to see God’s wonderful power . Everyone was amazed at all the things that Jesus was doing . So he said to his disciples ,
42009044	“ Listen carefully to what I say . The Son of Man will be betrayed and handed over to people . ”
42009045	They didn’t know what he meant . The meaning was hidden from them so that they didn’t understand it . Besides , they were afraid to ask him about what he had said .
42009046	A discussion started among them about who would be the greatest .
42009047	Jesus knew what they were thinking . So he took a little child and had him stand beside him .
42009048	Then he said to them , “ Whoever welcomes this little child in my name welcomes me . Whoever welcomes me welcomes the one who sent me . The one who is least among all of you is the one who is greatest . ”
42009049	John replied , “ Master , we saw someone forcing demons out of a person by using the power and authority of your name . We tried to stop him because he was not one of us . ”
42009050	Jesus said to him , “ Don’t stop him ! Whoever isn’t against you is for you . ”
42009051	The time was coming closer for Jesus to be taken to heaven . So he was determined to go to Jerusalem .

42009053	But the people didn’t welcome him , because he was on his way to Jerusalem .
42009054	James and John , his disciples , saw this . They asked , “ Lord , do you want us to call down fire from heaven to burn them up ? ”
42009055	But he turned and corrected them .
42009056	So they went to another village .
42009057	As they were walking along the road , a man said to Jesus , “ I’ll follow you wherever you go . ”
42009058	Jesus told him , “ Foxes have holes , and birds have nests , but the Son of Man has nowhere to sleep . ”
42009059	He told another man , “ Follow me ! ” But the man said , “ Sir , first let me go to bury my father . ”
42009060	But Jesus told him , “ Let the dead bury their own dead . You must go everywhere and tell about the kingdom of God . ”
42009061	Another said , “ I’ll follow you , sir , but first let me tell my family goodbye . ”
42009062	Jesus said to him , “ Whoever starts to plow and looks back is not fit for the kingdom of God . ”

42010002	He told them , “ The harvest is large , but the workers are few . So ask the Lord who gives this harvest to send workers to harvest his crops .

42010006	If a peaceful person lives there , your greeting will be accepted . But if that’s not the case , your greeting will be rejected .
42010007	Stay with the family that accepts you . Eat and drink whatever they offer you . After all , the worker deserves his pay . Do not move around from one house to another .

42012017	He thought , ‘ What should I do ? I don’t have enough room to store my crops . ’
42012018	He said , ‘ I know what I’ll do . I’ll tear down my barns and build bigger ones so that I can store all my grain and goods in them .

42012023	Life is more than food , and the body is more than clothes .
42012024	Consider the crows . They don’t plant or harvest . They don’t even have a storeroom or a barn . Yet , God feeds them . You are worth much more than birds .
42012025	“ Can any of you add an hour to your life by worrying ?
42012026	If you can’t do a small thing like that , why worry about other things ?
42012027	Consider how the flowers grow . They never work or spin yarn for clothes . But I say that not even Solomon in all his majesty was dressed like one of these flowers .
42012028	That’s the way God clothes the grass in the field . Today it’s alive , and tomorrow it’s thrown into an incinerator . So how much more will he clothe you people who have so little faith ?
42012029	“ Don’t concern yourself about what you will eat or drink , and quit worrying about these things .
42012030	Everyone in the world is concerned about these things , but your Father knows you need them .
42012031	Rather , be concerned about his kingdom . Then these things will be provided for you .
42012032	Don’t be afraid , little flock . Your Father is pleased to give you the kingdom .
42012033	“ Sell your material possessions , and give the money to the poor . Make yourselves wallets that don’t wear out ! Make a treasure for yourselves in heaven that never loses its value ! In heaven thieves and moths can’t get close enough to destroy your treasure .

42012055	When you see a south wind blowing , you say , ‘ It’s going to be hot , ’ and that’s what happens .
42012056	You hypocrites ! You can forecast the weather by judging the appearance of earth and sky . But for some reason you don’t know how to judge the time in which you’re living .
42012057	So why don’t you judge for yourselves what is right ?
42012058	For instance , when an opponent brings you to court in front of a ruler , do your best to settle with him before you get there . Otherwise , he will drag you in front of a judge . The judge will hand you over to an officer who will throw you into prison .
42012059	I can guarantee that you won’t get out until you pay every penny of your fine . ”
42013001	At that time some people reported to Jesus about some Galileans whom Pilate had executed while they were sacrificing animals .

42013003	No ! I can guarantee that they weren’t . But if you don’t turn to God and change the way you think and act , then you , too , will all die .

42013005	No ! I can guarantee that they weren’t . But if you don’t turn to God and change the way you think and act , then you , too , will all die . ”

42013007	He said to the gardener , ‘ For the last three years I’ve come to look for figs on this fig tree but haven’t found any . Cut it down ! Why should it use up good soil ? ’
42013008	“ The gardener replied , ‘ Sir , let it stand for one more year . I’ll dig around it and fertilize it .
42013009	Maybe next year it’ll have figs . But if not , then cut it down . ’ ”
42013010	Jesus was teaching in a synagogue on the day of worship .
42013011	A woman who was possessed by a spirit was there . The spirit had disabled her for 18 years . She was hunched over and couldn’t stand up straight .
42013012	When Jesus saw her , he called her to come to him and said , “ Woman , you are free from your disability . ”
42013013	He placed his hands on her , and she immediately stood up straight and praised God .

42013016	Now , here is a descendant of Abraham . Satan has kept her in this condition for 18 years . Isn’t it right to free her on the day of worship ? ”
42013017	As he said this , everyone who opposed him felt ashamed . But the entire crowd was happy about the miraculous things he was doing .
42013018	Jesus asked , “ What is the kingdom of God like ? What can I compare it to ?
42013019	It’s like a mustard seed that someone planted in a garden . It grew and became a tree , and the birds nested in its branches . ”
42013020	He asked again , “ What can I compare the kingdom of God to ?
42013021	It’s like yeast that a woman mixed into a large amount of flour until the yeast worked its way through all the dough . ”
42013022	Then Jesus traveled and taught in one city and village after another on his way to Jerusalem .
42013023	Someone asked him , “ Sir , are only a few people going to be saved ? ” He answered ,
42013024	“ Try hard to enter through the narrow door . I can guarantee that many will try to enter , but they won’t succeed .

42013028	Then you will cry and be in extreme pain . That’s what you’ll do when you see Abraham , Isaac , Jacob , and all the prophets . They’ll be in the kingdom of God , but you’ll be thrown out .
42013029	People will come from all over the world and will eat in the kingdom of God .
42013030	Some who are last will be first , and some who are first will be last . ”
42013031	At that time some Pharisees told Jesus , “ Get out of here , and go somewhere else ! Herod wants to kill you . ”
42013032	Jesus said to them , “ Tell that fox that I will force demons out of people and heal people today and tomorrow . I will finish my work on the third day .
42013033	But I must be on my way today , tomorrow , and the next day . It’s not possible for a prophet to die outside Jerusalem .
42013034	“ Jerusalem , Jerusalem , you kill the prophets and stone to death those sent to you ! How often I wanted to gather your children together the way a hen gathers her chicks under her wings ! But you were not willing !
42013035	Your house will be abandoned . I can guarantee that you will not see me again until you say , ‘ Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the Lord ! ’ ”
42014001	On a day of worship Jesus went to eat at the home of a prominent Pharisee . The guests were watching Jesus very closely .
42014002	A man whose body was swollen with fluid was there .
42014003	Jesus reacted by asking the Pharisees and the experts in Moses’ Teachings , “ Is it right to heal on the day of worship or not ? ”

42016001	Then Jesus said to his disciples , “ A rich man had a business manager . The manager was accused of wasting the rich man’s property .

42021001	Looking up , Jesus saw people , especially the rich , dropping their gifts into the temple offering box .

43001001	In the beginning the Word already existed . The Word was with God , and the Word was God .
43001002	He was already with God in the beginning .
43001003	Everything came into existence through him . Not one thing that exists was made without him .
43001004	He was the source of life , and that life was the light for humanity .
43001005	The light shines in the dark , and the dark has never extinguished it .

43001007	John came to declare the truth about the light so that everyone would become believers through his message .
43001008	John was not the light , but he came to declare the truth about the light .
43001009	The real light , which shines on everyone , was coming into the world .
43001010	He was in the world , and the world came into existence through him . Yet , the world didn’t recognize him .
43001011	He went to his own people , and his own people didn’t accept him .
43001012	However , he gave the right to become God’s children to everyone who believed in him .
43001013	These are people who haven’t been born in a physical way—from a human impulse or from a husband’s desire to have a child . Their birth was from God .
