43001016	Each of us has received one gift after another because of all that the Word is .
43001017	The Teachings were given through Moses , but kindness and truth came into existence through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No one has ever seen God . God’s only Son , the one who is closest to the Father’s heart , has made him known .
43001019	This was John’s answer when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , “ Who are you ? ”
43001020	John didn’t refuse to answer . He told them clearly , “ I’m not the Messiah . ”
43001021	They asked him , “ Well , are you Elijah ? ” John answered , “ No , I’m not . ” Then they asked , “ Are you the prophet ? ” John replied , “ No . ”
43001022	So they asked him , “ Who are you ? Tell us so that we can take an answer back to those who sent us . What do you say about yourself ? ”
43001023	John said , “ I’m a voice crying out in the desert , ‘ Make the way for the Lord straight , ’ as the prophet Isaiah said . ”
43001024	Some of those who had been sent were Pharisees .
43001025	They asked John , “ Why do you baptize if you’re not the Messiah or Elijah or the prophet ? ”
43001026	John answered them , “ I baptize with water . Someone you don’t know is standing among you .
43001027	He’s the one who comes after me . I am not worthy to untie his sandal strap . ”
43001028	This happened in Bethany on the east side of the Jordan River , where John was baptizing .
43001029	John saw Jesus coming toward him the next day and said , “ Look ! This is the Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world .
43001030	He is the one I spoke about when I said , ‘ A man who comes after me was before me because he existed before I did . ’
43001031	I didn’t know who he was . However , I came to baptize with water to show him to the people of Israel . ”
43001032	John said , “ I saw the Spirit come down as a dove from heaven and stay on him .
43001033	I didn’t know who he was . But God , who sent me to baptize with water , had told me , ‘ When you see the Spirit come down and stay on someone , you’ll know that person is the one who baptizes with the Holy Spirit . ’
43001034	I have seen this and have declared that this is the Son of God . ”
43001035	The next day John was standing with two of his disciples .
43001036	John saw Jesus walk by . John said , “ Look ! This is the Lamb of God . ”
43001037	When the two disciples heard John say this , they followed Jesus .
43001038	Jesus turned around and saw them following him . He asked them , “ What are you looking for ? ” They said to him , “ Rabbi ” ( which means “ teacher ” ) , “ where are you staying ? ”
43001039	Jesus told them , “ Come , and you will see . ” So they went to see where he was staying and spent the rest of that day with him . It was about ten o’clock in the morning .
43001040	Andrew , Simon Peter’s brother , was one of the two disciples who heard John and followed Jesus .
43001041	Andrew at once found his brother Simon and told him , “ We have found the Messiah ” ( which means “ Christ ” ) .
43001042	Andrew brought Simon to Jesus . Jesus looked at Simon and said , “ You are Simon , son of John . Your name will be Cephas ” ( which means “ Peter ” ) .
43001043	The next day Jesus wanted to go to Galilee . He found Philip and told him , “ Follow me ! ”
43001044	( Philip was from Bethsaida , the hometown of Andrew and Peter . )
43001045	Philip found Nathanael and told him , “ We have found the man whom Moses wrote about in his teachings and whom the prophets wrote about . He is Jesus , son of Joseph , from the city of Nazareth . ”
43001046	Nathanael said to Philip , “ Can anything good come from Nazareth ? ” Philip told him , “ Come and see ! ”
43001047	Jesus saw Nathanael coming toward him and remarked , “ Here is a true Israelite who is sincere . ”
43001048	Nathanael asked Jesus , “ How do you know anything about me ? ” Jesus answered him , “ I saw you under the fig tree before Philip called you . ”
43001049	Nathanael said to Jesus , “ Rabbi , you are the Son of God ! You are the king of Israel ! ”
43001050	Jesus replied , “ You believe because I told you that I saw you under the fig tree . You will see greater things than that . ”
43001051	Jesus said to Nathanael , “ I can guarantee this truth : You will see the sky open and God’s angels going up and coming down to the Son of Man . ”
43002001	Three days later a wedding took place in the city of Cana in Galilee . Jesus’ mother was there .
43002002	Jesus and his disciples had been invited too .
43002003	When the wine was gone , Jesus’ mother said to him , “ They’re out of wine . ”
43002004	Jesus said to her , “ Why did you come to me ? My time has not yet come . ”
43002005	His mother told the servers , “ Do whatever he tells you . ”
43002006	Six stone water jars were there . They were used for Jewish purification rituals . Each jar held 18 to 27 gallons .
43002007	Jesus told the servers , “ Fill the jars with water . ” The servers filled the jars to the brim .
43002008	Jesus said to them , “ Pour some , and take it to the person in charge . ” The servers did as they were told .
43002009	The person in charge tasted the water that had become wine . He didn’t know where it had come from , although the servers who had poured the water knew . The person in charge called the groom
43002010	and said to him , “ Everyone serves the best wine first . When people are drunk , the host serves cheap wine . But you have saved the best wine for now . ”
43002011	Cana in Galilee was the place where Jesus began to perform miracles . He made his glory public there , and his disciples believed in him .
43002012	After this , Jesus , his mother , brothers , and disciples went to the city of Capernaum and stayed there for a few days .
43002013	The Jewish Passover was near , so Jesus went to Jerusalem .
43002014	He found those who were selling cattle , sheep , and pigeons in the temple courtyard . He also found moneychangers sitting there .
43002015	He made a whip from small ropes and threw everyone with their sheep and cattle out of the temple courtyard . He dumped the moneychangers’ coins and knocked over their tables .
43002016	He told those who sold pigeons , “ Pick up this stuff , and get it out of here ! Stop making my Father’s house a marketplace ! ”
43002017	His disciples remembered that Scripture said , “ Devotion for your house will consume me . ”
43002018	The Jews reacted by asking Jesus , “ What miracle can you show us to justify what you’re doing ? ”
43002019	Jesus replied , “ Tear down this temple , and I’ll rebuild it in three days . ”
43002020	The Jews said , “ It took forty-six years to build this temple . Do you really think you’re going to rebuild it in three days ? ”
43002021	But the temple Jesus spoke about was his own body .
43002022	After he came back to life , his disciples remembered that he had said this . So they believed the Scripture and this statement that Jesus had made .
43002023	While Jesus was in Jerusalem at the Passover festival , many people believed in him because they saw the miracles that he performed .
43002024	Jesus , however , was wary of these believers . He understood people
43002025	and didn’t need anyone to tell him about human nature . He knew what people were really like .
43003001	Nicodemus was a Pharisee and a member of the Jewish council .
43003002	He came to Jesus one night and said to him , “ Rabbi , we know that God has sent you as a teacher . No one can perform the miracles you perform unless God is with him . ”
43003003	Jesus replied to Nicodemus , “ I can guarantee this truth : No one can see the kingdom of God without being born from above . ”
43003004	Nicodemus asked him , “ How can anyone be born when he’s an old man ? He can’t go back inside his mother a second time to be born , can he ? ”
43003005	Jesus answered Nicodemus , “ I can guarantee this truth : No one can enter the kingdom of God without being born of water and the Spirit .
43003006	Flesh and blood give birth to flesh and blood , but the Spirit gives birth to things that are spiritual .
43003007	Don’t be surprised when I tell you that all of you must be born from above .
43003008	The wind blows wherever it pleases . You hear its sound , but you don’t know where the wind comes from or where it’s going . That’s the way it is with everyone born of the Spirit . ”
43003009	Nicodemus replied , “ How can that be ? ”
43003010	Jesus told Nicodemus , “ You’re a well-known teacher of Israel . Can’t you understand this ?
43003011	I can guarantee this truth : We know what we’re talking about , and we confirm what we’ve seen . Yet , you don’t accept our message .
43003012	If you don’t believe me when I tell you about things on earth , how will you believe me when I tell you about things in heaven ?
43003013	No one has gone to heaven except the Son of Man , who came from heaven .
43003014	“ As Moses lifted up the snake on a pole in the desert , so the Son of Man must be lifted up .
43003015	Then everyone who believes in him will have eternal life . ”
43003016	God loved the world this way : He gave his only Son so that everyone who believes in him will not die but will have eternal life .
43003017	God sent his Son into the world , not to condemn the world , but to save the world .
43003018	Those who believe in him won’t be condemned . But those who don’t believe are already condemned because they don’t believe in God’s only Son .
43003019	This is why people are condemned : The light came into the world . Yet , people loved the dark rather than the light because their actions were evil .
43003020	People who do what is wrong hate the light and don’t come to the light . They don’t want their actions to be exposed .
43003021	But people who do what is true come to the light so that the things they do for God may be clearly seen .
43003022	Later , Jesus and his disciples went to the Judean countryside , where he spent some time with them and baptized people .
43003023	John was baptizing in Aenon , near Salim . Water was plentiful there . ( People came to John to be baptized ,
43003024	since John had not yet been put in prison . )
43003025	Some of John’s disciples had an argument with a Jew about purification ceremonies .
43003026	So they went to John and asked him , “ Rabbi , do you remember the man you spoke so favorably about when he was with you on the other side of the Jordan River ? Well , he’s baptizing , and everyone is going to him ! ”
43003027	John answered , “ People can’t receive anything unless it has been given to them from heaven .
43003028	You are witnesses that I said , ‘ I’m not the Messiah , but I’ve been sent ahead of him . ’
43003029	“ The groom is the person to whom the bride belongs . The best man , who stands and listens to him , is overjoyed when the groom speaks . This is the joy that I feel .
43003030	He must increase in importance , while I must decrease in importance .
43003031	“ The person who comes from above is superior to everyone . I , a person from the earth , know nothing but what is on earth , and that’s all I can talk about . The person who comes from heaven is superior to everyone
43003032	and tells what he has seen and heard . Yet , no one accepts what he says .
43003033	I have accepted what that person said , and I have affirmed that God is truthful .
43003034	The man whom God has sent speaks God’s message . After all , God gives him the Spirit without limit .
43003035	The Father loves his Son and has put everything in his power .
43003036	Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life , but whoever rejects the Son will not see life . Instead , he will see God’s constant anger . ”
43004001	Jesus knew that the Pharisees had heard that he was making and baptizing more disciples than John .
43004002	( Actually , Jesus was not baptizing people . His disciples were . )
43004003	So he left the Judean countryside and went back to Galilee .
43004004	Jesus had to go through Samaria .
43004005	He arrived at a city in Samaria called Sychar . Sychar was near the piece of land that Jacob had given to his son Joseph .
43004006	Jacob’s Well was there . Jesus sat down by the well because he was tired from traveling . The time was about six o’clock in the evening .
43004007	A Samaritan woman went to get some water . Jesus said to her , “ Give me a drink of water . ”
43004008	( His disciples had gone into the city to buy some food . )
43004009	The Samaritan woman asked him , “ How can a Jewish man like you ask a Samaritan woman like me for a drink of water ? ” ( Jews , of course , don’t associate with Samaritans . )
43004010	Jesus replied to her , “ If you only knew what God’s gift is and who is asking you for a drink , you would have asked him for a drink . He would have given you living water . ”
43004011	The woman said to him , “ Sir , you don’t have anything to use to get water , and the well is deep . So where are you going to get this living water ?
43004012	You’re not more important than our ancestor Jacob , are you ? He gave us this well . He and his sons and his animals drank water from it . ”
43004013	Jesus answered her , “ Everyone who drinks this water will become thirsty again .
43004014	But those who drink the water that I will give them will never become thirsty again . In fact , the water I will give them will become in them a spring that gushes up to eternal life . ”
43004015	The woman told Jesus , “ Sir , give me this water ! Then I won’t get thirsty or have to come here to get water . ”
43004016	Jesus told her , “ Go to your husband , and bring him here . ”
43004017	The woman replied , “ I don’t have a husband . ” Jesus told her , “ You’re right when you say that you don’t have a husband .
43004018	You’ve had five husbands , and the man you have now isn’t your husband . You’ve told the truth . ”
43004019	The woman said to Jesus , “ I see that you’re a prophet !
43004020	Our ancestors worshiped on this mountain . But you Jews say that people must worship in Jerusalem . ”
43004021	Jesus told her , “ Believe me . A time is coming when you Samaritans won’t be worshiping the Father on this mountain or in Jerusalem .
43004022	You don’t know what you’re worshiping . We Jews know what we’re worshiping , because salvation comes from the Jews .
43004023	Indeed , the time is coming , and it is now here , when the true worshipers will worship the Father in spirit and truth . The Father is looking for people like that to worship him .
43004024	God is a spirit . Those who worship him must worship in spirit and truth . ”
43004025	The woman said to him , “ I know that the Messiah is coming . When he comes , he will tell us everything . ” ( is the one called . )
43004026	Jesus told her , “ I am he , and I am speaking to you now . ”
43004027	At that time his disciples returned . They were surprised that he was talking to a woman . But none of them asked him , “ What do you want from her ? ” or “ Why are you talking to her ? ”
43004028	Then the woman left her water jar and went back into the city . She told the people ,
43004029	“ Come with me , and meet a man who told me everything I’ve ever done . Could he be the Messiah ? ”
43004030	The people left the city and went to meet Jesus .
43004031	Meanwhile , the disciples were urging him , “ Rabbi , have something to eat . ”
43004032	Jesus told them , “ I have food to eat that you don’t know about . ”
43004033	The disciples asked each other , “ Did someone bring him something to eat ? ”
43004034	Jesus told them , “ My food is to do what the one who sent me wants me to do and to finish the work he has given me .
43004035	“ Don’t you say , ‘ In four more months the harvest will be here ’ ? I’m telling you to look and see that the fields are ready to be harvested .
43004036	The person who harvests the crop is already getting paid . He is gathering grain for eternal life . So the person who plants the grain and the person who harvests it are happy together .
43004037	In this respect the saying is true : ‘ One person plants , and another person harvests . ’
43004038	I have sent you to harvest a crop you have not worked for . Other people have done the hard work , and you have followed them in their work . ”
43004039	Many Samaritans in that city believed in Jesus because of the woman who said , “ He told me everything I’ve ever done . ”
43004040	So when the Samaritans went to Jesus , they asked him to stay with them . He stayed in Samaria for two days .
43004041	Many more Samaritans believed because of what Jesus said .
43004042	They told the woman , “ Our faith is no longer based on what you’ve said . We have heard him ourselves , and we know that he really is the savior of the world . ”
43004043	After spending two days in Samaria , Jesus left for Galilee .
43004044	Jesus had said that a prophet is not honored in his own country .
43004045	But when Jesus arrived in Galilee , the people of Galilee welcomed him . They had seen everything he had done at the festival in Jerusalem , since they , too , had attended the festival .
43004046	Jesus returned to the city of Cana in Galilee , where he had changed water into wine . A government official was in Cana . His son was sick in Capernaum .
43004047	The official heard that Jesus had returned from Judea to Galilee . So he went to Jesus and asked him to go to Capernaum with him to heal his son who was about to die .
43004048	Jesus told the official , “ If people don’t see miracles and amazing things , they won’t believe . ”
43004049	The official said to him , “ Sir , come with me before my little boy dies . ”
43004050	Jesus told him , “ Go home . Your son will live . ” The man believed what Jesus told him and left .
43004051	While the official was on his way to Capernaum , his servants met him and told him that his boy was alive .
43004052	The official asked them at what time his son got better . His servants told him , “ The fever left him yesterday evening at seven o’clock . ”
43004053	Then the boy’s father realized that it was the same time that Jesus had told him , “ Your son will live . ” So the official and his entire family became believers .
43004054	This was the second miracle that Jesus performed after he had come back from Judea to Galilee .
43005001	Later , Jesus went to Jerusalem for a Jewish festival .
43005002	Near Sheep Gate in Jerusalem was a pool called in Hebrew . It had five porches .
43005003	Under these porches a large number of sick people—people who were blind , lame , or paralyzed—used to lie .
43005005	One man , who had been sick for 38 years , was lying there .
43005006	Jesus saw the man lying there and knew that he had been sick for a long time . So Jesus asked the man , “ Would you like to get well ? ”
43005007	The sick man answered Jesus , “ Sir , I don’t have anyone to put me into the pool when the water is stirred . While I’m trying to get there , someone else steps into the pool ahead of me . ”
43005008	Jesus told the man , “ Get up , pick up your cot , and walk . ”
43005009	The man immediately became well , picked up his cot , and walked . That happened on a day of worship .
43005010	So the Jews told the man who had been healed , “ This is a day of worship . You’re not allowed to carry your cot today . ”
43005011	The man replied , “ The man who made me well told me to pick up my cot and walk . ”
43005012	The Jews asked him , “ Who is the man who told you to pick it up and walk ? ”
43005013	But the man who had been healed didn’t know who Jesus was . ( Jesus had withdrawn from the crowd . )
43005014	Later , Jesus met the man in the temple courtyard and told him , “ You’re well now . Stop sinning so that something worse doesn’t happen to you . ”
43005015	The man went back to the Jews and told them that Jesus was the man who had made him well .
43005016	The Jews began to persecute Jesus because he kept healing people on the day of worship .
43005017	Jesus replied to them , “ My Father is working right now , and so am I . ”
43005018	His reply made the Jews more intent on killing him . Not only did he break the laws about the day of worship , but also he made himself equal to God when he said repeatedly that God was his Father .
43005019	Jesus said to the Jews , “ I can guarantee this truth : The Son cannot do anything on his own . He can do only what he sees the Father doing . Indeed , the Son does exactly what the Father does .
43005020	The Father loves the Son and shows him everything he is doing . The Father will show him even greater things to do than these things so that you will be amazed .
43005021	In the same way that the Father brings back the dead and gives them life , the Son gives life to anyone he chooses .
43005022	“ The Father doesn’t judge anyone . He has entrusted judgment entirely to the Son
43005023	so that everyone will honor the Son as they honor the Father . Whoever doesn’t honor the Son doesn’t honor the Father who sent him .
43005024	I can guarantee this truth : Those who listen to what I say and believe in the one who sent me will have eternal life . They won’t be judged because they have already passed from death to life .
43005025	“ I can guarantee this truth : A time is coming ( and is now here ) when the dead will hear the voice of the Son of God and those who respond to it will live .
43005026	The Father is the source of life , and he has enabled the Son to be the source of life too .
43005027	“ He has also given the Son authority to pass judgment because he is the Son of Man .
43005028	Don’t be surprised at what I’ve just said . A time is coming when all the dead will hear his voice ,
43005029	and they will come out of their tombs . Those who have done good will come back to life and live . But those who have done evil will come back to life and will be judged .
43005030	I can’t do anything on my own . As I listen to the Father , I make my judgments . My judgments are right because I don’t try to do what I want but what the one who sent me wants .
43005031	“ If I testify on my own behalf , what I say isn’t true .
43005032	Someone else testifies on my behalf , and I know that what he says about me is true .
43005033	You sent people to John the Baptizer , and he testified to the truth .
43005034	But I don’t depend on human testimony . I’m telling you this to save you .
43005035	John was a lamp that gave off brilliant light . For a time you enjoyed the pleasure of his light .
43005036	But I have something that testifies more favorably on my behalf than John’s testimony . The tasks that the Father gave me to carry out , these tasks which I perform , testify on my behalf . They prove that the Father has sent me .
43005037	The Father who sent me testifies on my behalf . You have never heard his voice , and you have never seen his form .
43005038	So you don’t have the Father’s message within you , because you don’t believe in the person he has sent .
43005039	You study the Scriptures in detail because you think you have the source of eternal life in them . These Scriptures testify on my behalf .
43005040	Yet , you don’t want to come to me to get eternal life .
43005041	“ I don’t accept praise from humans .
43005042	But I know what kind of people you are . You don’t have any love for God .
43005043	I have come with the authority my Father has given me , but you don’t accept me . If someone else comes with his own authority , you will accept him .
43005044	How can you believe when you accept each other’s praise and don’t look for the praise that comes from the only God ?
43005045	“ Don’t think that I will accuse you in the presence of the Father . Moses , the one you trust , is already accusing you .
43005046	If you really believed Moses , you would believe me . Moses wrote about me .
43005047	If you don’t believe what Moses wrote , how will you ever believe what I say ? ”
43006001	Jesus later crossed to the other side of the Sea of Galilee ( or the Sea of Tiberias ) .
43006002	A large crowd followed him because they saw the miracles that he performed for the sick .
43006003	Jesus went up a mountain and sat with his disciples .
43006004	The time for the Jewish Passover festival was near .
43006005	As Jesus saw a large crowd coming to him , he said to Philip , “ Where can we buy bread for these people to eat ? ”
43006006	Jesus asked this question to test him but already knew what to do .
43006007	Philip answered , “ We would need about a year’s wages to buy enough bread for each of them to have a piece . ”
43006008	One of Jesus’ disciples , Andrew , who was Simon Peter’s brother , told him ,
43006009	“ A boy who has five loaves of barley bread and two small fish is here . But they won’t go very far for so many people . ”
43006010	Jesus said , “ Have the people sit down . ” The people had plenty of grass to sit on . ( There were about 5,000 men in the crowd . )
43006011	Jesus took the loaves , gave thanks , and distributed them to the people who were sitting there . He did the same thing with the fish . All the people ate as much as they wanted .
43006012	When the people were full , Jesus told his disciples , “ Gather the leftover pieces so that nothing will be wasted . ”
43006013	The disciples gathered the leftover pieces of bread and filled twelve baskets .
43006014	When the people saw the miracle Jesus performed , they said , “ This man is certainly the prophet who is to come into the world . ”
43006015	Jesus realized that the people intended to take him by force and make him king . So he returned to the mountain by himself .
43006016	When evening came , his disciples went to the sea .
43006017	They got into a boat and started to cross the sea to the city of Capernaum . By this time it was dark , and Jesus had not yet come to them .
43006018	A strong wind started to blow and stir up the sea .
43006019	After they had rowed three or four miles , they saw Jesus walking on the sea . He was coming near the boat , and they became terrified .
43006020	Jesus told them , “ It’s me . Don’t be afraid ! ”
43006021	So they were willing to help Jesus into the boat . Immediately , the boat reached the shore where they were going .
43006022	On the next day the people were still on the other side of the sea . They noticed that only one boat was there and that Jesus had not stepped into that boat with his disciples . The disciples had gone away without him .
43006023	Other boats from Tiberias arrived near the place where they had eaten the bread after the Lord gave thanks .
43006024	When the people saw that neither Jesus nor his disciples were there , they got into these boats and went to the city of Capernaum to look for Jesus .
43006025	When they found him on the other side of the sea , they asked him , “ Rabbi , when did you get here ? ”
43006026	Jesus replied to them , “ I can guarantee this truth : You’re not looking for me because you saw miracles . You are looking for me because you ate as much of those loaves as you wanted .
43006027	Don’t work for food that spoils . Instead , work for the food that lasts into eternal life . This is the food the Son of Man will give you . After all , the Father has placed his seal of approval on him . ”
43006028	The people asked Jesus , “ What does God want us to do ? ”
43006029	Jesus replied to them , “ God wants to do something for you so that you believe in the one whom he has sent . ”
43006030	The people asked him , “ What miracle are you going to perform so that we can see it and believe in you ? What are you going to do ?
43006031	Our ancestors ate the manna in the desert . Scripture says , ‘ He gave them bread from heaven to eat . ’ ”
43006032	Jesus said to them , “ I can guarantee this truth : Moses didn’t give you bread from heaven , but my Father gives you the true bread from heaven .
43006033	God’s bread is the man who comes from heaven and gives life to the world . ”
43006034	They said to him , “ Sir , give us this bread all the time . ”
43006035	Jesus told them , “ I am the bread of life . Whoever comes to me will never become hungry , and whoever believes in me will never become thirsty .
43006036	I’ve told you that you have seen me . However , you don’t believe in me .
43006037	Everyone whom the Father gives me will come to me . I will never turn away anyone who comes to me .
43006038	I haven’t come from heaven to do what I want to do . I’ve come to do what the one who sent me wants me to do .
43006039	The one who sent me doesn’t want me to lose any of those he gave me . He wants me to bring them back to life on the last day .
43006040	My Father wants all those who see the Son and believe in him to have eternal life . He wants me to bring them back to life on the last day . ”
43006041	The Jews began to criticize Jesus for saying , “ I am the bread that came from heaven . ”
43006042	They asked , “ Isn’t this man Jesus , Joseph’s son ? Don’t we know his father and mother ? How can he say now , ‘ I came from heaven ’ ? ”
43006043	Jesus responded , “ Stop criticizing me !
43006044	People cannot come to me unless the Father who sent me brings them to me . I will bring these people back to life on the last day .
43006045	The prophets wrote , ‘ God will teach everyone . ’ Those who do what they have learned from the Father come to me .
43006046	I’m saying that no one has seen the Father . Only the one who is from God has seen the Father .
43006047	I can guarantee this truth : Every believer has eternal life .
43006048	“ I am the bread of life .
43006049	Your ancestors ate the manna in the desert and died .
43006050	This is the bread that comes from heaven so that whoever eats it won’t die .
43006051	I am the living bread that came from heaven . Whoever eats this bread will live forever . The bread I will give to bring life to the world is my flesh . ”
43006052	The Jews began to quarrel with each other . They said , “ How can this man give us his flesh to eat ? ”
43006053	Jesus told them , “ I can guarantee this truth : If you don’t eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink his blood , you don’t have the source of life in you .
43006054	Those who eat my flesh and drink my blood have eternal life , and I will bring them back to life on the last day .
43006055	My flesh is true food , and my blood is true drink .
43006056	Those who eat my flesh and drink my blood live in me , and I live in them .
43006057	The Father who has life sent me , and I live because of the Father . So those who feed on me will live because of me .
43006058	This is the bread that came from heaven . It is not like the bread your ancestors ate . They eventually died . Those who eat this bread will live forever . ”
43006059	Jesus said this while he was teaching in a synagogue in Capernaum .
43006060	When many of Jesus’ disciples heard him , they said , “ What he says is hard to accept . Who wants to listen to him anymore ? ”
43006061	Jesus was aware that his disciples were criticizing his message . So Jesus asked them , “ Did what I say make you lose faith ?
43006062	What if you see the Son of Man go where he was before ?
43006063	Life is spiritual . Your physical existence doesn’t contribute to that life . The words that I have spoken to you are spiritual . They are life .
43006064	But some of you don’t believe . ” Jesus knew from the beginning those who wouldn’t believe and the one who would betray him .
43006065	So he added , “ That is why I told you that people cannot come to me unless the Father provides the way . ”
43006066	Jesus’ speech made many of his disciples go back to the lives they had led before they followed Jesus .
43006067	So Jesus asked the twelve apostles , “ Do you want to leave me too ? ”
43006068	Simon Peter answered Jesus , “ Lord , to what person could we go ? Your words give eternal life .
43006069	Besides , we believe and know that you are the Holy One of God . ”
43006070	Jesus replied , “ I chose all twelve of you . Yet , one of you is a devil . ”
43006071	Jesus meant Judas , son of Simon Iscariot . Judas , who was one of the twelve apostles , would later betray Jesus .
43007001	Jesus later traveled throughout Galilee . He didn’t want to travel in Judea because Jews there wanted to kill him .
43007002	The time for the Jewish Festival of Booths was near .
43007003	So Jesus’ brothers told him , “ Leave this place , and go to Judea so that your disciples can see the things that you’re doing .
43007004	No one does things secretly when he wants to be known publicly . If you do these things , you should let the world see you . ”
43007005	Even his brothers didn’t believe in him .
43007006	Jesus told them , “ Now is not the right time for me to go . Any time is right for you .
43007007	The world cannot hate you , but it hates me because I say that what everyone does is evil .
43007008	Go to the festival . I’m not going to this festival right now . Now is not the right time for me to go . ”
43007009	After saying this , Jesus stayed in Galilee .
43007010	But after his brothers had gone to the festival , Jesus went . He didn’t go publicly but secretly .
43007011	The Jews were looking for Jesus in the crowd at the festival . They kept asking , “ Where is that man ? ”
43007012	The crowds argued about Jesus . Some people said , “ He’s a good man , ” while others said , “ No he isn’t . He deceives the people . ”
43007013	Yet , no one would talk openly about him because they were afraid of the Jews .
43007014	When the festival was half over , Jesus went to the temple courtyard and began to teach .
43007015	The Jews were surprised and asked , “ How can this man be so educated when he hasn’t gone to school ? ”
43007016	Jesus responded to them , “ What I teach doesn’t come from me but from the one who sent me .
43007017	Those who want to follow the will of God will know if what I teach is from God or if I teach my own thoughts .
43007018	Those who speak their own thoughts are looking for their own glory . But the man who wants to bring glory to the one who sent him is a true teacher and doesn’t have dishonest motives .
43007019	Didn’t Moses give you his teachings ? Yet , none of you does what Moses taught you . So why do you want to kill me ? ”
43007020	The crowd answered , “ You’re possessed by a demon ! Who wants to kill you ? ”
43007021	Jesus answered them , “ I performed one miracle , and all of you are surprised by it .
43007022	Moses gave you the teaching about circumcision ( although it didn’t come from Moses but from our ancestors ) . So you circumcise a male on a day of worship .
43007023	If you circumcise a male on the day of worship to follow Moses’ Teachings , why are you angry with me because I made a man entirely well on the day of worship ?
43007024	Stop judging by outward appearance ! Instead , judge correctly . ”
43007025	Some of the people who lived in Jerusalem said , “ Isn’t this the man they want to kill ?
43007026	But look at this ! He’s speaking in public , and no one is saying anything to him ! Can it be that the rulers really know that this man is the Messiah ?
43007027	However , we know where this man comes from . When the Christ comes , no one will know where he is from . ”
43007028	Then , while Jesus was teaching in the temple courtyard , he said loudly , “ You know me , and you know where I come from . I didn’t decide to come on my own . The one who sent me is true . He’s the one you don’t know .
43007029	I know him because I am from him and he sent me . ”
43007030	The Jews tried to arrest him but couldn’t because his time had not yet come .
43007031	However , many people in the crowd believed in him . They asked , “ When the Messiah comes , will he perform more miracles than this man has ? ”
43007032	The Pharisees heard the crowd saying things like this about him . So the chief priests and the Pharisees sent temple guards to arrest Jesus .
43007033	Jesus said , “ I will still be with you for a little while . Then I’ll go to the one who sent me .
43007034	You will look for me , but you won’t find me . You can’t go where I’m going . ”
43007035	The Jews said among themselves , “ Where does this man intend to go so that we won’t find him ? Does he mean that he’ll live with the Jews who are scattered among the Greeks and that he’ll teach the Greeks ?
43007036	What does he mean when he says , ‘ You will look for me , but you won’t find me , ’ and ‘ You can’t go where I’m going ’ ? ”
43007037	On the last and most important day of the festival , Jesus was standing in the temple courtyard . He said loudly , “ Whoever is thirsty must come to me to drink .
43007038	As Scripture says , ‘ Streams of living water will flow from deep within the person who believes in me . ’ ”
43007039	Jesus said this about the Spirit , whom his believers would receive . The Spirit was not yet evident , as it would be after Jesus had been glorified .
43007040	After some of the crowd heard Jesus say these words , they said , “ This man is certainly the prophet . ”
43007041	Other people said , “ This man is the Messiah . ” Still other people asked , “ How can the Messiah come from Galilee ?
43007042	Doesn’t Scripture say that the Messiah will come from the descendants of David and from the village of Bethlehem , where David lived ? ”
43007043	So the people were divided because of Jesus .
43007044	Some of them wanted to arrest him , but they couldn’t .
43007045	When the temple guards returned , the chief priests and Pharisees asked them , “ Why didn’t you bring Jesus ? ”
43007046	The temple guards answered , “ No human has ever spoken like this man . ”
43007047	The Pharisees asked the temple guards , “ Have you been deceived too ?
43007048	Has any ruler or any Pharisee believed in him ?
43007049	This crowd is cursed because it doesn’t know Moses’ Teachings . ”
43007050	One of those Pharisees was Nicodemus , who had previously visited Jesus . Nicodemus asked them ,
43007051	“ Do Moses’ Teachings enable us to judge a person without first hearing that person’s side of the story ? We can’t judge a person without finding out what that person has done . ”
43007052	They asked Nicodemus , “ Are you saying this because you’re from Galilee ? Study the Scriptures , and you’ll see that no prophet comes from Galilee . ”
43007053	Then each of them went home .
43008001	Jesus went to the Mount of Olives .
43008002	Early the next morning he returned to the temple courtyard . All the people went to him , so he sat down and began to teach them .
43008003	The scribes and the Pharisees brought a woman who had been caught committing adultery . They made her stand in front of everyone
43008004	and asked Jesus , “ Teacher , we caught this woman in the act of adultery .
43008005	In his teachings , Moses ordered us to stone women like this to death . What do you say ? ”
43008006	They asked this to test him . They wanted to find a reason to bring charges against him . Jesus bent down and used his finger to write on the ground .
43008007	When they persisted in asking him questions , he straightened up and said , “ The person who is sinless should be the first to throw a stone at her . ”
43008008	Then he bent down again and continued writing on the ground .
43008009	One by one , beginning with the older men , the scribes and Pharisees left . Jesus was left alone with the woman .
43008010	Then Jesus straightened up and asked her , “ Where did they go ? Has anyone condemned you ? ”
43008011	The woman answered , “ No one , sir . ” Jesus said , “ I don’t condemn you either . Go ! From now on don’t sin . ”
43008012	Jesus spoke to the Pharisees again . He said , “ I am the light of the world . Whoever follows me will have a life filled with light and will never live in the dark . ”
43008013	The Pharisees said to him , “ You testify on your own behalf , so your testimony isn’t true . ”
43008014	Jesus replied to them , “ Even if I testify on my own behalf , my testimony is true because I know where I came from and where I’m going . However , you don’t know where I came from or where I’m going .
43008015	You judge the way humans do . I don’t judge anyone .
43008016	Even if I do judge , my judgment is valid because I don’t make it on my own . I make my judgment with the Father who sent me .
43008017	Your own teachings say that the testimony of two people is true .
43008018	I testify on my own behalf , and so does the Father who sent me . ”
43008019	The Pharisees asked him , “ Where is your father ? ” Jesus replied , “ You don’t know me or my Father . If you knew me , you would also know my Father . ”
43008020	Jesus spoke these words while he was teaching in the treasury area of the temple courtyard . No one arrested him , because his time had not yet come .
43008021	Jesus spoke to the Pharisees again . He said , “ I’m going away , and you’ll look for me . But you will die because of your sin . You can’t go where I’m going . ”
43008022	Then the Jews asked , “ Is he going to kill himself ? Is that what he means when he says , ‘ You can’t go where I’m going ’ ? ”
43008023	Jesus said to them , “ You’re from below . I’m from above . You’re from this world . I’m not from this world .
43008024	For this reason I told you that you’ll die because of your sins . If you don’t believe that I am the one , you’ll die because of your sins . ”
43008025	The Jews asked him , “ Who did you say you are ? ” Jesus told them , “ I am whom I said I was from the beginning .
43008026	I have a lot I could say about you and a lot I could condemn you for . But the one who sent me is true . So I tell the world exactly what he has told me . ”
43008027	( The Jews didn’t know that he was talking to them about the Father . )
43008028	So Jesus told them , “ When you have lifted up the Son of Man , then you’ll know that I am the one and that I can’t do anything on my own . Instead , I speak as the Father taught me .
43008029	Besides , the one who sent me is with me . He hasn’t left me by myself . I always do what pleases him . ”
43008030	As Jesus was saying this , many people believed in him .
43008031	So Jesus said to those Jews who believed in him , “ If you live by what I say , you are truly my disciples .
43008032	You will know the truth , and the truth will set you free . ”
43008033	They replied to Jesus , “ We are Abraham’s descendants , and we’ve never been anyone’s slaves . So how can you say that we will be set free ? ”
43008034	Jesus answered them , “ I can guarantee this truth : Whoever lives a sinful life is a slave to sin .
43008035	A slave doesn’t live in the home forever , but a son does .
43008036	So if the Son sets you free , you will be absolutely free .
43008037	I know that you’re Abraham’s descendants . However , you want to kill me because you don’t like what I’m saying .
43008038	What I’m saying is what I have seen in my Father’s presence . But you do what you’ve heard from your father . ”
43008039	The Jews replied to Jesus , “ Abraham is our father . ” Jesus told them , “ If you were Abraham’s children , you would do what Abraham did .
43008040	I am a man who has told you the truth that I heard from God . But now you want to kill me . Abraham wouldn’t have done that .
43008041	You’re doing what your father does . ” The Jews said to Jesus , “ We’re not illegitimate children . God is our only Father . ”
43008042	Jesus told them , “ If God were your Father , you would love me . After all , I’m here , and I came from God . I didn’t come on my own . Instead , God sent me .
43008043	Why don’t you understand the language I use ? Is it because you can’t understand the words I use ?
43008044	You come from your father , the devil , and you desire to do what your father wants you to do . The devil was a murderer from the beginning . He has never been truthful . He doesn’t know what the truth is . Whenever he tells a lie , he’s doing what comes naturally to him . He’s a liar and the father of lies .
43008045	So you don’t believe me because I tell the truth .
43008046	Can any of you convict me of committing a sin ? If I’m telling the truth , why don’t you believe me ?
43008047	The person who belongs to God understands what God says . You don’t understand because you don’t belong to God . ”
43008048	The Jews replied to Jesus , “ Aren’t we right when we say that you’re a Samaritan and that you’re possessed by a demon ? ”
43008049	Jesus answered , “ I’m not possessed . I honor my Father , but you dishonor me .
43008050	I don’t want my own glory . But there is someone who wants it , and he is the judge .
43008051	I can guarantee this truth : Whoever obeys what I say will never see death . ”
43008052	The Jews told Jesus , “ Now we know that you’re possessed by a demon . Abraham died , and so did the prophets , but you say , ‘ Whoever does what I say will never taste death . ’
43008053	Are you greater than our father Abraham , who died ? The prophets have also died . Who do you think you are ? ”
43008054	Jesus said , “ If I bring glory to myself , my glory is nothing . My Father is the one who gives me glory , and you say that he is your God .
43008055	Yet , you haven’t known him . However , I know him . If I would say that I didn’t know him , I would be a liar like all of you . But I do know him , and I do what he says .
43008056	Your father Abraham was pleased to see that my day was coming . He saw it and was happy . ”
43008057	The Jews said to Jesus , “ You’re not even fifty years old . How could you have seen Abraham ? ”
43008058	Jesus told them , “ I can guarantee this truth : Before Abraham was ever born , I am . ”
43008059	Then some of the Jews picked up stones to throw at Jesus . However , Jesus was concealed , and he left the temple courtyard .
43009001	As Jesus walked along , he saw a man who had been born blind .
43009002	His disciples asked him , “ Rabbi , why was this man born blind ? Did he or his parents sin ? ”
43009003	Jesus answered , “ Neither this man nor his parents sinned . Instead , he was born blind so that God could show what he can do for him .
43009004	We must do what the one who sent me wants us to do while it is day . The night when no one can do anything is coming .
43009005	As long as I’m in the world , I’m light for the world . ”
43009006	After Jesus said this , he spit on the ground and mixed the spit with dirt . Then he smeared it on the man’s eyes
43009007	and told him , “ Wash it off in the pool of Siloam . ” ( means “ sent . ” ) The blind man washed it off and returned . He was able to see .
43009008	His neighbors and those who had previously seen him begging asked , “ Isn’t this the man who used to sit and beg ? ”
43009009	Some of them said , “ He’s the one . ” Others said , “ No , he isn’t , but he looks like him . ” But the man himself said , “ I am the one . ”
43009010	So they asked him , “ How did you receive your sight ? ”
43009011	He replied , “ The man people call Jesus mixed some spit with dirt , smeared it on my eyes , and told me , ‘ Go to Siloam , and wash it off . ’ So I went there , washed it off , and received my sight . ”
43009012	They asked him , “ Where is that man ? ” The man answered , “ I don’t know . ”
43009013	Some people brought the man who had been blind to the Pharisees .
43009014	The day when Jesus mixed the spit and dirt and gave the man sight was a day of worship .
43009015	So the Pharisees asked the man again how he received his sight . The man told the Pharisees , “ He put a mixture of spit and dirt on my eyes . I washed it off , and now I can see . ”
43009016	Some of the Pharisees said , “ The man who did this is not from God because he doesn’t follow the traditions for the day of worship . ” Other Pharisees asked , “ How can a man who is a sinner perform miracles like these ? ” So the Pharisees were divided in their opinions .
43009017	They asked the man who had been born blind another question : “ What do you say about the man who gave you sight ? ” The man answered , “ He’s a prophet . ”
43009018	Until they talked to the man’s parents , the Jews didn’t believe that the man had been blind and had been given sight .
43009019	They asked his parents , “ Is this your son , the one you say was born blind ? Why can he see now ? ”
43009020	His parents replied , “ We know that he’s our son and that he was born blind .
43009021	But we don’t know how he got his sight or who gave it to him . You’ll have to ask him . He’s old enough to answer for himself . ”
43009022	( His parents said this because they were afraid of the Jews . The Jews had already agreed to put anyone who acknowledged that Jesus was the Christ out of the synagogue .
43009023	That’s why his parents said , “ You’ll have to ask him . He’s old enough . ” )
43009024	So once again the Jews called the man who had been blind . They told him , “ Give glory to God . We know that this man who gave you sight is a sinner . ”
43009025	The man responded , “ I don’t know if he’s a sinner or not . But I do know one thing . I used to be blind , but now I can see . ”
43009026	The Jews asked him , “ What did he do to you ? How did he give you sight ? ”
43009027	The man replied , “ I’ve already told you , but you didn’t listen . Why do you want to hear the story again ? Do you want to become his disciples too ? ”
43009028	The Jews yelled at him , “ You’re his disciple , but we’re Moses’ disciples .
43009029	We know that God spoke to Moses , but we don’t know where this man came from . ”
43009030	The man replied to them , “ That’s amazing ! You don’t know where he’s from . Yet , he gave me sight .
43009031	We know that God doesn’t listen to sinners . Instead , he listens to people who are devout and who do what he wants .
43009032	Since the beginning of time , no one has ever heard of anyone giving sight to a person born blind .
43009033	If this man were not from God , he couldn’t do anything like that . ”
43009034	The Jews answered him , “ You were born full of sin . Do you think you can teach us ? ” Then they threw him out of the synagogue .
43009035	Jesus heard that the Jews had thrown the man out of the synagogue . So when Jesus found the man , he asked him , “ Do you believe in the Son of Man ? ”
43009036	The man replied , “ Sir , tell me who he is so that I can believe in him . ”
43009037	Jesus told him , “ You’ve seen him . He is the person who is now talking with you . ”
43009038	The man bowed in front of Jesus and said , “ I believe , Lord . ”
43009039	Then Jesus said , “ I have come into this world to judge : Blind people will be given sight , and those who can see will become blind . ”
43009040	Some Pharisees who were with Jesus heard this . So they asked him , “ Do you think we’re blind ? ”
43009041	Jesus told them , “ If you were blind , you wouldn’t be sinners . But now you say , ‘ We see , ’ so you continue to be sinners .
43010001	“ I can guarantee this truth : The person who doesn’t enter the sheep pen through the gate but climbs in somewhere else is a thief or a robber .
43010002	But the one who enters through the gate is the shepherd .
43010003	The gatekeeper opens the gate for him , and the sheep respond to his voice . He calls his sheep by name and leads them out of the pen .
43010004	After he has brought out all his sheep , he walks ahead of them . The sheep follow him because they recognize his voice .
43010005	They won’t follow a stranger . Instead , they will run away from a stranger because they don’t recognize his voice . ”
43010006	Jesus used this illustration as he talked to the people , but they didn’t understand what he meant .
43010007	Jesus emphasized , “ I can guarantee this truth : I am the gate for the sheep .
43010008	All who came before I did were thieves or robbers . However , the sheep didn’t respond to them .
43010009	I am the gate . Those who enter the sheep pen through me will be saved . They will go in and out of the sheep pen and find food .
43010010	A thief comes to steal , kill , and destroy . But I came so that my sheep will have life and so that they will have everything they need .
43010011	“ I am the good shepherd . The good shepherd gives his life for the sheep .
43010012	A hired hand isn’t a shepherd and doesn’t own the sheep . When he sees a wolf coming , he abandons the sheep and quickly runs away . So the wolf drags the sheep away and scatters the flock .
43010013	The hired hand is concerned about what he’s going to get paid and not about the sheep .
43010014	“ I am the good shepherd . I know my sheep as the Father knows me . My sheep know me as I know the Father .
43010015	So I give my life for my sheep .
43010016	I also have other sheep that are not from this pen . I must lead them . They , too , will respond to my voice . So they will be one flock with one shepherd .
43010017	The Father loves me because I give my life in order to take it back again .
43010018	No one takes my life from me . I give my life of my own free will . I have the authority to give my life , and I have the authority to take my life back again . This is what my Father ordered me to do . ”
43010019	The Jews were divided because of what Jesus said .
43010020	Many of them said , “ He’s possessed by a demon ! He’s crazy ! Why do you listen to him ? ”
43010021	Others said , “ No one talks like this if he’s possessed by a demon . Can a demon give sight to the blind ? ”
43010022	The Festival of the Dedication of the Temple took place in Jerusalem during the winter .
43010023	Jesus was walking on Solomon’s porch in the temple courtyard .
43010024	The Jews surrounded him . They asked him , “ How long will you keep us in suspense ? If you are the Messiah , tell us plainly . ”
43010025	Jesus answered them , “ I’ve told you , but you don’t believe me . The things that I do in my Father’s name testify on my behalf .
43010026	However , you don’t believe because you’re not my sheep .
43010027	My sheep respond to my voice , and I know who they are . They follow me ,
43010028	and I give them eternal life . They will never be lost , and no one will tear them away from me .
43010029	My Father , who gave them to me , is greater than everyone else , and no one can tear them away from my Father .
43010030	The Father and I are one . ”
43010031	The Jews had again brought some rocks to stone Jesus to death .
43010032	Jesus replied to them , “ I’ve shown you many good things that come from the Father . For which of these good things do you want to stone me to death ? ”
43010033	The Jews answered Jesus , “ We’re going to stone you to death , not for any good things you’ve done , but for dishonoring God . You claim to be God , although you’re only a man . ”
43010034	Jesus said to them , “ Don’t your Scriptures say , ‘ I said , “ You are gods ” ’ ?
43010035	The Scriptures cannot be discredited . So if God calls people gods ( and they are the people to whom he gave the Scriptures ) ,
43010036	why do you say that I’m dishonoring God because I said , ‘ I’m the Son of God ’ ? God set me apart for this holy purpose and has sent me into the world .
43010037	If I’m not doing the things my Father does , don’t believe me .
43010038	But if I’m doing those things and you refuse to believe me , then at least believe the things that I’m doing . Then you will know and recognize that the Father is in me and that I am in the Father . ”
43010039	The Jews tried to arrest Jesus again , but he got away from them .
43010040	He went back across the Jordan River and stayed in the place where John first baptized people .
43010041	Many people went to Jesus . They said , “ John didn’t perform any miracles , but everything John said about this man is true . ”
43010042	Many people there believed in Jesus .
43011001	Lazarus , who lived in Bethany , the village where Mary and her sister Martha lived , was sick .
43011002	( Mary was the woman who poured perfume on the Lord and wiped his feet with her hair . Her brother Lazarus was the one who was sick . )
43011003	So the sisters sent a messenger to tell Jesus , “ Lord , your close friend is sick . ”
43011004	When Jesus heard the message , he said , “ His sickness won’t result in death . Instead , this sickness will bring glory to God so that the Son of God will receive glory through it . ”
43011005	Jesus loved Martha , her sister , and Lazarus .
43011006	Yet , when Jesus heard that Lazarus was sick , he stayed where he was for two more days .
43011007	Then , after the two days , Jesus said to his disciples , “ Let’s go back to Judea . ”
43011008	The disciples said to him , “ Rabbi , not long ago the Jews wanted to stone you to death . Do you really want to go back there ? ”
43011009	Jesus answered , “ Aren’t there twelve hours of daylight ? Those who walk during the day don’t stumble , because they see the light of this world .
43011010	However , those who walk at night stumble because they have no light in themselves . ”
43011011	After Jesus said this , he told his disciples , “ Our friend Lazarus is sleeping , and I’m going to Bethany to wake him . ”
43011012	His disciples said to him , “ Lord , if he’s sleeping , he’ll get well . ”
43011013	Jesus meant that Lazarus was dead , but the disciples thought Jesus meant that Lazarus was only sleeping .
43011014	Then Jesus told them plainly , “ Lazarus has died ,
43011015	but I’m glad that I wasn’t there so that you can grow in faith . Let’s go to Lazarus . ”
43011016	Thomas , who was called Didymus , said to the rest of the disciples , “ Let’s go so that we , too , can die with Jesus . ”
43011017	When Jesus arrived , he found that Lazarus had been in the tomb for four days .
43011018	( Bethany was near Jerusalem , not quite two miles away . )
43011019	Many Jews had come to Martha and Mary to comfort them about their brother .
43011020	When Martha heard that Jesus was coming , she went to meet him . Mary stayed at home .
43011021	Martha told Jesus , “ Lord , if you had been here , my brother would not have died .
43011022	But even now I know that God will give you whatever you ask him . ”
43011023	Jesus told Martha , “ Your brother will come back to life . ”
43011024	Martha answered Jesus , “ I know that he’ll come back to life on the last day , when everyone will come back to life . ”
43011025	Jesus said to her , “ I am the one who brings people back to life , and I am life itself . Those who believe in me will live even if they die .
43011026	Everyone who lives and believes in me will never die . Do you believe that ? ”
43011027	Martha said to him , “ Yes , Lord , I believe that you are the Messiah , the Son of God , the one who was expected to come into the world . ”
43011028	After Martha had said this , she went back home and whispered to her sister Mary , “ The teacher is here , and he is calling for you . ”
43011029	When Mary heard this , she got up quickly and went to Jesus .
43011030	( Jesus had not yet come into the village but was still where Martha had met him . )
43011031	The Jews who were comforting Mary in the house saw her get up quickly and leave . So they followed her . They thought that she was going to the tomb to cry .
43011032	When Mary arrived where Jesus was and saw him , she knelt at his feet and said , “ Lord , if you had been here , my brother would not have died . ”
43011033	When Jesus saw her crying , and the Jews who were crying with her , he was deeply moved and troubled .
43011034	So Jesus asked , “ Where did you put Lazarus ? ” They answered him , “ Lord , come and see . ”
43011035	Jesus cried .
43011036	The Jews said , “ See how much Jesus loved him . ”
43011037	But some of the Jews asked , “ Couldn’t this man who gave a blind man sight keep Lazarus from dying ? ”
43011038	Deeply moved again , Jesus went to the tomb . It was a cave with a stone covering the entrance .
43011039	Jesus said , “ Take the stone away . ” Martha , the dead man’s sister , told Jesus , “ Lord , there must already be a stench . He’s been dead for four days . ”
43011040	Jesus said to her , “ Didn’t I tell you that if you believe , you would see God’s glory ? ”
43011041	So the stone was moved away from the entrance of the tomb . Jesus looked up and said , “ Father , I thank you for hearing me .
43011042	I’ve known that you always hear me . However , I’ve said this so that the crowd standing around me will believe that you sent me . ”
43011043	After Jesus had said this , he shouted as loudly as he could , “ Lazarus , come out ! ”
43011044	The dead man came out . Strips of cloth were wound around his feet and hands , and his face was wrapped with a handkerchief . Jesus told them , “ Free Lazarus , and let him go . ”
43011045	Many Jews who had visited Mary and had seen what Jesus had done believed in him .
43011046	But some of them went to the Pharisees and told them what Jesus had done .
43011047	So the chief priests and the Pharisees called a meeting of the council . They asked , “ What are we doing ? This man is performing a lot of miracles .
43011048	If we let him continue what he’s doing , everyone will believe in him . Then the Romans will take away our position and our nation . ”
43011049	One of them , Caiaphas , who was chief priest that year , told them , “ You people don’t know anything .
43011050	You haven’t even considered this : It is better for one man to die for the people than for the whole nation to be destroyed . ”
43011051	Caiaphas didn’t say this on his own . As chief priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus would die for the Jewish nation .
43011052	He prophesied that Jesus wouldn’t die merely for this nation , but that Jesus would die to bring God’s scattered children together and make them one .
43011053	From that day on , the Jewish council planned to kill Jesus .
43011054	So Jesus no longer walked openly among the Jews . Instead , he left Bethany and went to the countryside near the desert , to a city called Ephraim , where he stayed with his disciples .
43011055	The Jewish Passover was near . Many people came from the countryside to Jerusalem to purify themselves before the Passover .
43011056	As they stood in the temple courtyard , they looked for Jesus and asked each other , “ Do you think that he’ll avoid coming to the festival ? ”
43011057	( The chief priests and the Pharisees had given orders that whoever knew where Jesus was should tell them so that they could arrest him . )
43012001	Six days before Passover , Jesus arrived in Bethany . Lazarus , whom Jesus had brought back to life , lived there .
43012002	Dinner was prepared for Jesus in Bethany . Martha served the dinner , and Lazarus was one of the people eating with Jesus .
43012003	Mary took a bottle of very expensive perfume made from pure nard and poured it on Jesus’ feet . Then she dried his feet with her hair . The fragrance of the perfume filled the house .
43012004	One of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , who was going to betray him , asked ,
43012005	“ Why wasn’t this perfume sold for a high price and the money given to the poor ? ”
43012006	( Judas didn’t say this because he cared about the poor but because he was a thief . He was in charge of the moneybag and carried the contributions . )
43012007	Jesus said to Judas , “ Leave her alone ! She has done this to prepare me for the day I will be placed in a tomb .
43012008	You will always have the poor with you , but you will not always have me with you . ”
43012009	A large crowd of Jews found out that Jesus was in Bethany . So they went there not only to see Jesus but also to see Lazarus , whom Jesus had brought back to life .
43012010	The chief priests planned to kill Lazarus too .
43012011	Lazarus was the reason why many people were leaving the Jews and believing in Jesus .
43012012	On the next day the large crowd that had come to the Passover festival heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem .
43012013	So they took palm branches and went to meet him . They were shouting , “ Hosanna ! Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the Lord , the king of Israel ! ”
43012014	Jesus obtained a donkey and sat on it , as Scripture says :
43012015	“ Don’t be afraid , people of Zion ! Your king is coming . He is riding on a donkey’s colt . ”
43012016	At first Jesus’ disciples didn’t know what these prophecies meant . However , when Jesus was glorified , the disciples remembered that these prophecies had been written about him . The disciples remembered that they had taken part in fulfilling the prophecies .
43012017	The people who had been with Jesus when he called Lazarus from the tomb and brought him back to life reported what they had seen .
43012018	Because the crowd heard that Jesus had performed this miracle , they came to meet him .
43012019	The Pharisees said to each other , “ This is getting us nowhere . Look ! The whole world is following him ! ”
43012020	Some Greeks were among those who came to worship during the Passover festival .
43012021	They went to Philip ( who was from Bethsaida in Galilee ) and told him , “ Sir , we would like to meet Jesus . ”
43012022	Philip told Andrew , and they told Jesus .
43012023	Jesus replied to them , “ The time has come for the Son of Man to be glorified .
43012024	I can guarantee this truth : A single grain of wheat doesn’t produce anything unless it is planted in the ground and dies . If it dies , it will produce a lot of grain .
43012025	Those who love their lives will destroy them , and those who hate their lives in this world will guard them for everlasting life .
43012026	Those who serve me must follow me . My servants will be with me wherever I will be . If people serve me , the Father will honor them .
43012027	“ I am too deeply troubled now to know how to express my feelings . Should I say , ‘ Father , save me from this time of suffering ’ ? No ! I came for this time of suffering .
43012028	Father , give glory to your name . ” A voice from heaven said , “ I have given it glory , and I will give it glory again . ”
43012029	The crowd standing there heard the voice and said that it had thundered . Others in the crowd said that an angel had talked to him .
43012030	Jesus replied , “ That voice wasn’t for my benefit but for yours .
43012031	“ This world is being judged now . The ruler of this world will be thrown out now .
43012032	When I have been lifted up from the earth , I will draw all people toward me . ”
43012033	By saying this , he indicated how he was going to die .
43012034	The crowd responded to him , “ We have heard from the Scriptures that the Messiah will remain here forever . So how can you say , ‘ The Son of Man must be lifted up from the earth ’ ? Who is this ‘ Son of Man ’ ? ”
43012035	Jesus answered the crowd , “ The light will still be with you for a little while . Walk while you have light so that darkness won’t defeat you . Those who walk in the dark don’t know where they’re going .
43012036	While you have the light , believe in the light so that you will become people whose lives show the light . ” After Jesus had said this , he was concealed as he left .
43012037	Although they had seen Jesus perform so many miracles , they wouldn’t believe in him .
43012038	In this way the words of the prophet Isaiah came true : “ Lord , who has believed our message ? To whom has the Lord’s power been revealed ? ”
43012039	So the people couldn’t believe because , as Isaiah also said ,
43012040	“ God blinded themand made them close-mindedso that their eyes don’t seeand their minds don’t understand . And they never turn to me for healing ! ”
43012041	Isaiah said this because he had seen Jesus’ glory and had spoken about him .
43012042	Many rulers believed in Jesus . However , they wouldn’t admit it publicly because the Pharisees would have thrown them out of the synagogue .
43012043	They were more concerned about what people thought of them than about what God thought of them .
43012044	Then Jesus said loudly , “ Whoever believes in me believes not only in me but also in the one who sent me .
43012045	Whoever sees me sees the one who sent me .
43012046	I am the light that has come into the world so that everyone who believes in me will not live in the dark .
43012047	If anyone hears my words and doesn’t follow them , I don’t condemn them . I didn’t come to condemn the world but to save the world .
43012048	Those who reject me by not accepting what I say have a judge appointed for them . The words that I have spoken will judge them on the last day .
43012049	I have not spoken on my own . Instead , the Father who sent me told me what I should say and how I should say it .
43012050	I know that what he commands is eternal life . Whatever I say is what the Father told me to say . ”
43013001	Before the Passover festival , Jesus knew that the time had come for him to leave this world and go back to the Father . Jesus loved his own who were in the world , and he loved them to the end .
43013002	While supper was taking place , the devil had already put the idea of betraying Jesus into the mind of Judas , son of Simon Iscariot .
43013003	The Father had put everything in Jesus’ control . Jesus knew that . He also knew that he had come from God and was going back to God .
43013004	So he got up from the table , removed his outer clothes , took a towel , and tied it around his waist .
43013005	Then he poured water into a basin and began to wash the disciples’ feet and dry them with the towel that he had tied around his waist .
43013006	When Jesus came to Simon Peter , Peter asked him , “ Lord , are you going to wash my feet ? ”
43013007	Jesus answered Peter , “ You don’t know now what I’m doing . You will understand later . ”
43013008	Peter told Jesus , “ You will never wash my feet . ” Jesus replied to Peter , “ If I don’t wash you , you don’t belong to me . ”
43013009	Simon Peter said to Jesus , “ Lord , don’t wash only my feet . Wash my hands and my head too ! ”
43013010	Jesus told Peter , “ People who have washed are completely clean . They need to have only their feet washed . All of you , except for one , are clean . ”
43013011	( Jesus knew who was going to betray him . That’s why he said , “ All of you , except for one , are clean . ” )
43013012	After Jesus had washed their feet and put on his outer clothes , he took his place at the table again . Then he asked his disciples , “ Do you understand what I’ve done for you ?
43013013	You call me teacher and Lord , and you’re right because that’s what I am .
43013014	So if I , your Lord and teacher , have washed your feet , you must wash each other’s feet .
43013015	I’ve given you an example that you should follow .
43013016	I can guarantee this truth : Slaves are not superior to their owners , and messengers are not superior to the people who send them .
43013017	If you understand all of this , you are blessed whenever you follow my example .
43013018	“ I’m not talking about all of you . I know the people I’ve chosen to be apostles . However , I’ve made my choice so that Scripture will come true . It says , ‘ The one who eats my bread has turned against me . ’
43013019	I’m telling you now before it happens . Then , when it happens , you will believe that I am the one .
43013020	“ I can guarantee this truth : Whoever accepts me accepts the one who sent me . ”
43013021	After saying this , Jesus was deeply troubled . He declared , “ I can guarantee this truth : One of you is going to betray me ! ”
43013022	The disciples began looking at each other and wondering which one of them Jesus meant .
43013023	One disciple , the one whom Jesus loved , was near him at the table .
43013024	Simon Peter motioned to that disciple and said , “ Ask Jesus whom he’s talking about ! ”
43013025	Leaning close to Jesus , that disciple asked , “ Lord , who is it ? ”
43013026	Jesus answered , “ He’s the one to whom I will give this piece of bread after I’ve dipped it in the sauce . ” So Jesus dipped the bread and gave it to Judas , son of Simon Iscariot .
43013027	Then , after Judas took the piece of bread , Satan entered him . So Jesus told him , “ Hurry ! Do what you have to do . ”
43013028	No one at the table knew why Jesus said this to him .
43013029	Judas had the moneybag . So some thought that Jesus was telling him to buy what they needed for the festival or to give something to the poor .
43013030	Judas took the piece of bread and immediately went outside . It was night .
43013031	When Judas was gone , Jesus said , “ The Son of Man is now glorified , and because of him God is glorified .
43013032	If God is glorified because of the Son of Man , God will glorify the Son of Man because of himself , and he will glorify the Son of Man at once . ”
43013033	Jesus said , “ Dear children , I will still be with you for a little while . I’m telling you what I told the Jews . You will look for me , but you can’t go where I’m going .
43013034	“ I’m giving you a new commandment : Love each other in the same way that I have loved you .
43013035	Everyone will know that you are my disciples because of your love for each other . ”
43013036	Simon Peter asked him , “ Lord , where are you going ? ” Jesus answered him , “ You can’t follow me now to the place where I’m going . However , you will follow me later . ”
43013037	Peter said to Jesus , “ Lord , why can’t I follow you now ? I’ll give my life for you . ”
43013038	Jesus replied , “ Will you give your life for me ? I can guarantee this truth : No rooster will crow until you say three times that you don’t know me .
43014001	“ Don’t be troubled . Believe in God , and believe in me .
43014002	My Father’s house has many rooms . If that were not true , would I have told you that I’m going to prepare a place for you ?

43014006	Jesus answered him , “ I am the way , the truth , and the life . No one goes to the Father except through me .
43014007	If you have known me , you will also know my Father . From now on you know him through me and have seen him in me . ”
43014008	Philip said to Jesus , “ Lord , show us the Father , and that will satisfy us . ”
43014009	Jesus replied , “ I have been with all of you for a long time . Don’t you know me yet , Philip ? The person who has seen me has seen the Father . So how can you say , ‘ Show us the Father ’ ?
43014010	Don’t you believe that I am in the Father and the Father is in me ? What I’m telling you doesn’t come from me . The Father , who lives in me , does what he wants .
43014011	Believe me when I say that I am in the Father and that the Father is in me . Otherwise , believe me because of the things I do .
43014012	“ I can guarantee this truth : Those who believe in me will do the things that I am doing . They will do even greater things because I am going to the Father .

43014015	“ If you love me , you will obey my commandments .
43014016	I will ask the Father , and he will give you another helper who will be with you forever .
