43014020	On that day you will know that I am in my Father and that you are in me and that I am in you .
43014021	Whoever knows and obeys my commandments is the person who loves me . Those who love me will have my Father’s love , and I , too , will love them and show myself to them . ”
43014022	Judas ( not Iscariot ) asked Jesus , “ Lord , what has happened that you are going to reveal yourself to us and not to the world ? ”
43014023	Jesus answered him , “ Those who love me will do what I say . My Father will love them , and we will go to them and make our home with them .
43014024	A person who doesn’t love me doesn’t do what I say . I don’t make up what you hear me say . What I say comes from the Father who sent me .
43014025	“ I have told you this while I’m still with you .
43014026	However , the helper , the Holy Spirit , whom the Father will send in my name , will teach you everything . He will remind you of everything that I have ever told you .
43014027	“ I’m leaving you peace . I’m giving you my peace . I don’t give you the kind of peace that the world gives . So don’t be troubled or cowardly .
43014028	You heard me tell you , ‘ I’m going away , but I’m coming back to you . ’ If you loved me , you would be glad that I’m going to the Father , because the Father is greater than I am .
43014029	“ I’m telling you this now before it happens . When it does happen , you will believe .
43014030	The ruler of this world has no power over me . But he’s coming , so I won’t talk with you much longer .
43014031	However , I want the world to know that I love the Father and that I am doing exactly what the Father has commanded me to do . Get up ! We have to leave . ”
43015001	Then Jesus said , “ I am the true vine , and my Father takes care of the vineyard .
43015002	He removes every one of my branches that doesn’t produce fruit . He also prunes every branch that does produce fruit to make it produce more fruit .
43015003	“ You are already clean because of what I have told you .
43015004	Live in me , and I will live in you . A branch cannot produce any fruit by itself . It has to stay attached to the vine . In the same way , you cannot produce fruit unless you live in me .
43015005	“ I am the vine . You are the branches . Those who live in me while I live in them will produce a lot of fruit . But you can’t produce anything without me .
43015006	Whoever doesn’t live in me is thrown away like a branch and dries up . Branches like this are gathered , thrown into a fire , and burned .
43015007	If you live in me and what I say lives in you , then ask for anything you want , and it will be yours .
43015008	You give glory to my Father when you produce a lot of fruit and therefore show that you are my disciples .
43015009	“ I have loved you the same way the Father has loved me . So live in my love .
43015010	If you obey my commandments , you will live in my love . I have obeyed my Father’s commandments , and in that way I live in his love .
43015011	I have told you this so that you will be as joyful as I am , and your joy will be complete .
43015012	Love each other as I have loved you . This is what I’m commanding you to do .
43015013	The greatest love you can show is to give your life for your friends .
43015014	You are my friends if you obey my commandments .
43015015	I don’t call you servants anymore , because a servant doesn’t know what his master is doing . But I’ve called you friends because I’ve made known to you everything that I’ve heard from my Father .
43015016	You didn’t choose me , but I chose you . I have appointed you to go , to produce fruit that will last , and to ask the Father in my name to give you whatever you ask for .
43015017	Love each other . This is what I’m commanding you to do .
43015018	“ If the world hates you , realize that it hated me before it hated you .
43015019	If you had anything in common with the world , the world would love you as one of its own . But you don’t have anything in common with the world . I chose you from the world , and that’s why the world hates you .
43015020	Remember what I told you : ‘ A servant isn’t greater than his master . ’ If they persecuted me , they will also persecute you . If they did what I said , they will also do what you say .
43015021	Indeed , they will do all this to you because you are committed to me , since they don’t know the one who sent me .
43015022	If I hadn’t come and spoken to them , they wouldn’t have any sin . But now they have no excuse for their sin .
43015023	The person who hates me also hates my Father .
43015024	If I hadn’t done among them what no one else has done , they wouldn’t have any sin . But now they have seen and hated both me and my Father .
43015025	In this way what is written in their Scriptures has come true : ‘ They hate me for no reason . ’
43015026	“ The helper whom I will send to you from the Father will come . This helper , the Spirit of Truth who comes from the Father , will declare the truth about me .
43015027	You will declare the truth , too , because you have been with me from the beginning . ”
43016001	Jesus continued , “ I have said these things to you so that you won’t lose your faith .
43016002	You will be thrown out of synagogues . Certainly , the time is coming when people who murder you will think that they are serving God .
43016003	They will do these things to you because they haven’t known the Father or me .
43016004	But I’ve told you this so that when it happens you’ll remember what I’ve told you . I didn’t tell you this at first , because I was with you .
43016005	“ Now I’m going to the one who sent me . Yet , none of you asks me where I’m going .
43016006	But because I’ve told you this , you’re filled with sadness .

43016008	He will come to convict the world of sin , to show the world what has God’s approval , and to convince the world that God judges it .

43016010	He will show the world what has God’s approval , because I’m going to the Father and you won’t see me anymore .
43016011	He will convince the world that God judges it , because the ruler of this world has been judged .
43016012	“ I have a lot more to tell you , but that would be too much for you now .

43016014	He will give me glory , because he will tell you what I say .
43016015	Everything the Father says is also what I say . That is why I said , ‘ He will take what I say and tell it to you . ’
43016016	“ In a little while you won’t see me anymore . Then in a little while you will see me again . ”
43016017	Some of his disciples said to each other , “ What does he mean ? He tells us that in a little while we won’t see him . Then he tells us that in a little while we will see him again and that he’s going to the Father . ”
43016018	So they were asking each other , “ What does he mean when he says , ‘ In a little while ’ ? We don’t understand what he’s talking about . ”
43016019	Jesus knew they wanted to ask him something . So he said to them , “ Are you trying to figure out among yourselves what I meant when I said , ‘ In a little while you won’t see me , and in a little while you will see me again ’ ?
43016020	I can guarantee this truth : You will cry because you are sad , but the world will be happy . You will feel pain , but your pain will turn to happiness .
43016021	A woman has pain when her time to give birth comes . But after the child is born , she doesn’t remember the pain anymore because she’s happy that a child has been brought into the world .

43016027	The Father loves you because you have loved me and have believed that I came from God .

43016029	His disciples said , “ Now you’re talking in plain words and not using examples .

43016033	I’ve told you this so that my peace will be with you . In the world you’ll have trouble . But cheer up ! I have overcome the world . ”
43017001	After saying this , Jesus looked up to heaven and said , “ Father , the time is here . Give your Son glory so that your Son can give you glory .

43017003	This is eternal life : to know you , the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom you sent .

43017021	I pray that all of these people continue to have unity in the way that you , Father , are in me and I am in you . I pray that they may be united with us so that the world will believe that you have sent me .

43017026	I have made your name known to them , and I will make it known so that the love you have for me will be in them and I will be in them . ”
43018001	After Jesus finished his prayer , he went with his disciples to the other side of the Kidron Valley . They entered the garden that was there .
43018002	Judas , who betrayed him , knew the place because Jesus and his disciples often gathered there .
43018003	So Judas took a troop of soldiers and the guards from the chief priests and Pharisees and went to the garden . They were carrying lanterns , torches , and weapons .
43018004	Jesus knew everything that was going to happen to him . So he went to meet them and asked , “ Who are you looking for ? ”
43018005	They answered him , “ Jesus from Nazareth . ” Jesus told them , “ I am he . ” Judas , who betrayed him , was standing with the crowd .
43018006	When Jesus told them , “ I am he , ” the crowd backed away and fell to the ground .
43018007	Jesus asked them again , “ Who are you looking for ? ” They said , “ Jesus from Nazareth . ”
43018008	Jesus replied , “ I told you that I am he . So if you are looking for me , let these other men go . ”
43018009	In this way what Jesus had said came true : “ I lost none of those you gave me . ”
43018010	Simon Peter had a sword . He drew it , attacked the chief priest’s servant , and cut off the servant’s right ear . ( The servant’s name was Malchus . )
43018011	Jesus told Peter , “ Put your sword away . Shouldn’t I drink the cup of suffering that my Father has given me ? ”
43018012	Then the army officer and the Jewish guards arrested Jesus . They tied Jesus up
43018013	and took him first to Annas , the father-in-law of Caiaphas . Caiaphas , the chief priest that year ,
43018014	was the person who had advised the Jews that it was better to have one man die for the people .
43018015	Simon Peter and another disciple followed Jesus . The other disciple was well-known to the chief priest . So that disciple went with Jesus into the chief priest’s courtyard .
43018016	Peter , however , was standing outside the gate . The other disciple talked to the woman who was the gatekeeper and brought Peter into the courtyard .
43018017	The gatekeeper asked Peter , “ Aren’t you one of this man’s disciples too ? ” Peter answered , “ No , I’m not ! ”
43018018	The servants and the guards were standing around a fire they had built and were warming themselves because it was cold . Peter was standing there , too , and warming himself with the others .
43018019	The chief priest questioned Jesus about his disciples and his teachings .
43018020	Jesus answered him , “ I have spoken publicly for everyone to hear . I have always taught in synagogues or in the temple courtyard , where all the Jews gather . I haven’t said anything in secret .
43018021	Why do you question me ? Question those who heard what I said to them . They know what I’ve said . ”
43018022	When Jesus said this , one of the guards standing near Jesus slapped his face and said , “ Is that how you answer the chief priest ? ”
43018023	Jesus replied to him , “ If I’ve said anything wrong , tell me what it was . But if I’ve told the truth , why do you hit me ? ”
43018024	Annas sent Jesus to Caiaphas , the chief priest . Jesus was still tied up .
43018025	Simon Peter continued to stand and warm himself by the fire . Some men asked him , “ Aren’t you , too , one of his disciples ? ” Peter denied it by saying , “ No , I’m not ! ”
43018026	One of the chief priest’s servants , a relative of the man whose ear Peter had cut off , asked him , “ Didn’t I see you with Jesus in the garden ? ”
43018027	Peter again denied it , and just then a rooster crowed .
43018028	Early in the morning , Jesus was taken from Caiaphas’ house to the governor’s palace . The Jews wouldn’t go into the palace . They didn’t want to become unclean , since they wanted to eat the Passover .
43018029	So Pilate came out to them and asked , “ What accusation are you making against this man ? ”
43018030	The Jews answered Pilate , “ If he weren’t a criminal , we wouldn’t have handed him over to you . ”
43018031	Pilate told the Jews , “ Take him , and try him by your law . ” The Jews answered him , “ We’re not allowed to execute anyone . ”
43018032	In this way what Jesus had predicted about how he would die came true .
43018033	Pilate went back into the palace , called for Jesus , and asked him , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ”
43018034	Jesus replied , “ Did you think of that yourself , or did others tell you about me ? ”
43018035	Pilate answered , “ Am I a Jew ? Your own people and the chief priests handed you over to me . What have you done ? ”
43018036	Jesus answered , “ My kingdom doesn’t belong to this world . If my kingdom belonged to this world , my followers would fight to keep me from being handed over to the Jews . My kingdom doesn’t have its origin on earth . ”
43018037	Pilate asked him , “ So you are a king ? ” Jesus replied , “ You’re correct in saying that I’m a king . I have been born and have come into the world for this reason : to testify to the truth . Everyone who belongs to the truth listens to me . ”
43018038	Pilate said to him , “ What is truth ? ” After Pilate said this , he went out to the Jews again and told them , “ I don’t find this man guilty of anything .
43018039	You have a custom that I should free one person for you at Passover . Would you like me to free the king of the Jews for you ? ”
43018040	The Jews shouted again , “ Don’t free this man ! Free Barabbas ! ” ( Barabbas was a political revolutionary . )
43019001	Then Pilate had Jesus taken away and whipped .
43019002	The soldiers twisted some thorny branches into a crown , placed it on his head , and put a purple cape on him .
43019003	They went up to him , said , “ Long live the king of the Jews ! ” and slapped his face .
43019004	Pilate went outside again and told the Jews , “ I’m bringing him out to you to let you know that I don’t find this man guilty of anything . ”
43019005	Jesus went outside . He was wearing the crown of thorns and the purple cape . Pilate said to the Jews , “ Look , here’s the man ! ”
43019006	When the chief priests and the guards saw Jesus , they shouted , “ Crucify him ! Crucify him ! ” Pilate told them , “ You take him and crucify him . I don’t find this man guilty of anything . ”
43019007	The Jews answered Pilate , “ We have a law , and by that law he must die because he claimed to be the Son of God . ”
43019008	When Pilate heard them say that , he became more afraid than ever .
43019009	He went into the palace again and asked Jesus , “ Where are you from ? ” But Jesus didn’t answer him .
43019010	So Pilate said to Jesus , “ Aren’t you going to answer me ? Don’t you know that I have the authority to free you or to crucify you ? ”
43019011	Jesus answered Pilate , “ You wouldn’t have any authority over me if it hadn’t been given to you from above . That’s why the man who handed me over to you is guilty of a greater sin . ”
43019012	When Pilate heard what Jesus said , he wanted to free him . But the Jews shouted , “ If you free this man , you’re not a friend of the emperor . Anyone who claims to be a king is defying the emperor . ”
43019013	When Pilate heard what they said , he took Jesus outside and sat on the judge’s seat in a place called Stone Pavement . ( In Hebrew it is called . )
43019014	The time was about six o’clock in the morning on the Friday of the Passover festival . Pilate said to the Jews , “ Look , here’s your king ! ”
43019015	Then the Jews shouted , “ Kill him ! Kill him ! Crucify him ! ” Pilate asked them , “ Should I crucify your king ? ” The chief priests responded , “ The emperor is the only king we have ! ”
43019016	Then Pilate handed Jesus over to them to be crucified . So the soldiers took Jesus .
43019017	He carried his own cross and went out of the city to a location called The Skull . ( In Hebrew this place is called . )
43019018	The soldiers crucified Jesus and two other men there . Jesus was in the middle .
43019019	Pilate wrote a notice and put it on the cross . The notice read , “ Jesus from Nazareth , the king of the Jews . ”
43019020	Many Jews read this notice , because the place where Jesus was crucified was near the city . The notice was written in Hebrew , Latin , and Greek .
43019021	The chief priests of the Jewish people told Pilate , “ Don’t write , ‘ The king of the Jews ! ’ Instead , write , ‘ He said that he is the king of the Jews . ’ ”
43019022	Pilate replied , “ I have written what I’ve written . ”
43019023	When the soldiers had crucified Jesus , they took his clothes and divided them four ways so that each soldier could have a share . His robe was left over . It didn’t have a seam because it had been woven in one piece from top to bottom .
43019024	The soldiers said to each other , “ Let’s not rip it apart . Let’s throw dice to see who will get it . ” In this way the Scripture came true : “ They divided my clothes among themselves . They threw dice for my clothing . ” So that’s what the soldiers did .
43019025	Jesus’ mother , her sister , Mary ( the wife of Clopas ) , and Mary from Magdala were standing beside Jesus’ cross .
43019026	Jesus saw his mother and the disciple whom he loved standing there . He said to his mother , “ Look , here’s your son ! ”
43019027	Then he said to the disciple , “ Look , here’s your mother ! ” From that time on she lived with that disciple in his home .
43019028	After this , when Jesus knew that everything had now been finished , he said , “ I’m thirsty . ” He said this so that Scripture could finally be concluded .
43019029	A jar filled with vinegar was there . So the soldiers put a sponge soaked in the vinegar on a hyssop stick and held it to his mouth .
43019030	After Jesus had taken the vinegar , he said , “ It is finished ! ” Then he bowed his head and died .
43019031	Since it was Friday and the next day was an especially important day of worship , the Jews didn’t want the bodies to stay on the crosses . So they asked Pilate to have the men’s legs broken and their bodies removed .
43019032	The soldiers broke the legs of the first man and then of the other man who had been crucified with Jesus .
43019033	When the soldiers came to Jesus and saw that he was already dead , they didn’t break his legs .
43019034	However , one of the soldiers stabbed Jesus’ side with his spear , and blood and water immediately came out .
43019035	The one who saw this is an eyewitness . What he says is true , and he knows that he is telling the truth so that you , too , will believe .
43019036	This happened so that the Scripture would come true : “ None of his bones will be broken . ”
43019037	Another Scripture passage says , “ They will look at the person whom they have stabbed . ”
43019038	Later Joseph from the city of Arimathea asked Pilate to let him remove Jesus’ body . ( Joseph was a disciple of Jesus but secretly because he was afraid of the Jews ) . Pilate gave him permission to remove Jesus’ body . So Joseph removed it .
43019039	Nicodemus , the one who had first come to Jesus at night , went with Joseph and brought 75 pounds of a myrrh and aloe mixture .
43019040	These two men took the body of Jesus and bound it with strips of linen . They laced the strips with spices . This was the Jewish custom for burial .
43019041	A garden was located in the place where Jesus was crucified . In that garden was a new tomb in which no one had yet been placed .
43019042	Joseph and Nicodemus put Jesus in that tomb , since that day was the Jewish day of preparation and since the tomb was nearby .
43020001	Early on Sunday morning , while it was still dark , Mary from Magdala went to the tomb . She saw that the stone had been removed from the tomb’s entrance .
43020002	So she ran to Simon Peter and the other disciple , whom Jesus loved . She told them , “ They have removed the Lord from the tomb , and we don’t know where they’ve put him . ”
43020003	So Peter and the other disciple headed for the tomb .
43020004	The two were running side by side , but the other disciple ran faster than Peter and came to the tomb first .
43020005	He bent over and looked inside the tomb . He saw the strips of linen lying there but didn’t go inside .
43020006	Simon Peter arrived after him and went into the tomb . He saw the strips of linen lying there .
43020007	He also saw the cloth that had been on Jesus’ head . It wasn’t lying with the strips of linen but was rolled up separately .
43020008	Then the other disciple , who arrived at the tomb first , went inside . He saw and believed .
43020009	They didn’t know yet what Scripture meant when it said that Jesus had to come back to life .
43020010	So the disciples went back home .
43020011	Mary , however , stood there and cried as she looked at the tomb . As she cried , she bent over and looked inside .
43020012	She saw two angels in white clothes . They were sitting where the body of Jesus had been lying . One angel was where Jesus’ head had been , and the other was where his feet had been .
43020013	The angels asked her why she was crying . Mary told them , “ They have removed my Lord , and I don’t know where they’ve put him . ”
43020014	After she said this , she turned around and saw Jesus standing there . However , she didn’t know that it was Jesus .
43020015	Jesus asked her , “ Why are you crying ? Who are you looking for ? ” Mary thought it was the gardener speaking to her . So she said to him , “ Sir , if you carried him away , tell me where you have put him , and I’ll remove him . ”
43020016	Jesus said to her , “ Mary ! ” Mary turned around and said to him in Hebrew , “ Rabboni ! ” ( This word means “ teacher . ” )
43020017	Jesus told her , “ Don’t hold on to me . I have not yet gone to the Father . But go to my brothers and sisters and tell them , ‘ I am going to my Father and your Father , to my God and your God . ’ ”
43020018	Mary from Magdala went to the disciples and told them , “ I have seen the Lord . ” She also told them what he had said to her .
43020019	That Sunday evening , the disciples were together behind locked doors because they were afraid of the Jews . Jesus stood among them and said to them , “ Peace be with you ! ”
43020020	When he said this , he showed them his hands and his side . The disciples were glad to see the Lord .
43020021	Jesus said to them again , “ Peace be with you ! As the Father has sent me , so I am sending you . ”
43020022	After he had said this , he breathed on the disciples and said , “ Receive the Holy Spirit .
43020023	Whenever you forgive sins , they are forgiven . Whenever you don’t forgive them , they are not forgiven . ”
43020024	Thomas , one of the twelve apostles , who was called Didymus , wasn’t with them when Jesus came .
43020025	The other disciples told him , “ We’ve seen the Lord . ” Thomas told them , “ I refuse to believe this unless I see the nail marks in his hands , put my fingers into them , and put my hand into his side . ”
43020026	A week later Jesus’ disciples were again in the house , and Thomas was with them . Even though the doors were locked , Jesus stood among them and said , “ Peace be with you ! ”
43020027	Then Jesus said to Thomas , “ Put your finger here , and look at my hands . Take your hand , and put it into my side . Stop doubting , and believe . ”
43020028	Thomas responded to Jesus , “ My Lord and my God ! ”
43020029	Jesus said to Thomas , “ You believe because you’ve seen me . Blessed are those who haven’t seen me but believe . ”
43020030	Jesus performed many other miracles that his disciples saw . Those miracles are not written in this book .
43020031	But these miracles have been written so that you will believe that Jesus is the Messiah , the Son of God , and so that you will have life by believing in him .
43021001	Later , by the Sea of Tiberias , Jesus showed himself again to the disciples . This is what happened .
43021002	Simon Peter , Thomas ( called Didymus ) , Nathanael from Cana in Galilee , Zebedee’s sons , and two other disciples of Jesus were together .
43021003	Simon Peter said to the others , “ I’m going fishing . ” They told him , “ We’re going with you . ” They went out in a boat but didn’t catch a thing that night .
43021004	As the sun was rising , Jesus stood on the shore . The disciples didn’t realize that it was Jesus .
43021005	Jesus asked them , “ Friends , haven’t you caught any fish ? ” They answered him , “ No , we haven’t . ”
43021006	He told them , “ Throw the net out on the right side of the boat , and you’ll catch some . ” So they threw the net out and were unable to pull it in because so many fish were in it .
43021007	The disciple whom Jesus loved said to Peter , “ It’s the Lord . ” When Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he put back on the clothes that he had taken off and jumped into the sea .
43021008	The other disciples came with the boat and dragged the net full of fish . They weren’t far from the shore , only about 100 yards .
43021009	When they went ashore , they saw a fire with a fish lying on the coals , and they saw a loaf of bread .
43021010	Jesus told them , “ Bring some of the fish you’ve just caught . ”
43021011	Simon Peter got into the boat and pulled the net ashore . Though the net was filled with 153 large fish , it was not torn .
43021012	Jesus told them , “ Come , have breakfast . ” None of the disciples dared to ask him who he was . They knew he was the Lord .
43021013	Jesus took the bread , gave it to them , and did the same with the fish .
43021014	This was the third time that Jesus showed himself to the disciples after he had come back to life .
43021015	After they had eaten breakfast , Jesus asked Simon Peter , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me more than the other disciples do ? ” Peter answered him , “ Yes , Lord , you know that I love you . ” Jesus told him , “ Feed my lambs . ”
43021016	Jesus asked him again , a second time , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me ? ” Peter answered him “ Yes , Lord , you know that I love you . ” Jesus told him , “ Take care of my sheep . ”
43021017	Jesus asked him a third time , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me ? ” Peter felt sad because Jesus had asked him a third time , “ Do you love me ? ” So Peter said to him , “ Lord , you know everything . You know that I love you . ” Jesus told him , “ Feed my sheep .
43021018	I can guarantee this truth : When you were young , you would get ready to go where you wanted . But when you’re old , you will stretch out your hands , and someone else will get you ready to take you where you don’t want to go . ”
43021019	Jesus said this to show by what kind of death Peter would bring glory to God . After saying this , Jesus told Peter , “ Follow me ! ”
43021020	Peter turned around and saw the disciple whom Jesus loved . That disciple was following them . He was the one who leaned against Jesus’ chest at the supper and asked , “ Lord , who is going to betray you ? ”
43021021	When Peter saw him , he asked Jesus , “ Lord , what about him ? ”
43021022	Jesus said to Peter , “ If I want him to live until I come again , how does that concern you ? Follow me ! ”
43021023	So a rumor that that disciple wouldn’t die spread among Jesus’ followers . But Jesus didn’t say that he wouldn’t die . What Jesus said was , “ If I want him to live until I come again , how does that concern you ? ”
43021024	This disciple was an eyewitness of these things and wrote them down . We know that what he says is true .
43021025	Jesus also did many other things . If every one of them were written down , I suppose the world wouldn’t have enough room for the books that would be written .
44001001	In my first book , Theophilus , I wrote about what Jesus began to do and teach . This included everything from the beginning of his life
44001002	until the day he was taken to heaven . Before he was taken to heaven , he gave instructions through the Holy Spirit to the apostles , whom he had chosen .
44001003	After his death Jesus showed the apostles a lot of convincing evidence that he was alive . For 40 days he appeared to them and talked with them about the kingdom of God .
44001004	Once , while he was meeting with them , he ordered them not to leave Jerusalem but to wait there for what the Father had promised . Jesus said to them , “ I’ve told you what the Father promises :
44001005	John baptized with water , but in a few days you will be baptized by the Holy Spirit . ”
44001006	So when the apostles came together , they asked him , “ Lord , is this the time when you’re going to restore the kingdom to Israel ? ”
44001007	Jesus told them , “ You don’t need to know about times or periods that the Father has determined by his own authority .
44001008	But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes to you . Then you will be my witnesses to testify about me in Jerusalem , throughout Judea and Samaria , and to the ends of the earth . ”
44001009	After he had said this , he was taken to heaven . A cloud hid him so that they could no longer see him .
44001010	They were staring into the sky as he departed . Suddenly , two men in white clothes stood near them .
44001011	They asked , “ Why are you men from Galilee standing here looking at the sky ? Jesus , who was taken from you to heaven , will come back in the same way that you saw him go to heaven . ”
44001012	Then they returned to Jerusalem from the mountain called the Mount of Olives . It is near Jerusalem , about half a mile away .
44001013	When they came into the city , Peter , John , James , Andrew , Philip , Thomas , Bartholomew , Matthew , James ( son of Alphaeus ) , Simon the Zealot , and Judas ( son of James ) went to the second-story room where they were staying .
44001014	The apostles had a single purpose as they devoted themselves to prayer . They were joined by some women , including Mary ( the mother of Jesus ) , and they were joined by his brothers .
44001015	At a time when about 120 disciples had gathered together , Peter got up and spoke to them . He said ,
44001016	“ Brothers , what the Holy Spirit predicted through David in Scripture about Judas had to come true . Judas led the men to arrest Jesus .
44001017	He had been one of us and had been given an active role in this ministry .
44001018	With the money he received from the wrong he had done , he bought a piece of land where he fell headfirst to his death . His body split open , and all his internal organs came out .
44001019	Everyone living in Jerusalem knows about this . They even call that piece of land , which means ‘ Field of Blood ’ in their dialect .
44001020	You’ve read in Psalms , ‘ Let his home be deserted , and let no one live there , ’ and ‘ Let someone else take his position . ’ ” “ Therefore , someone must be added to our number to serve with us as a witness that Jesus came back to life .
44001021	He must be one of the men who accompanied Jesus with us the entire time that the Lord Jesus was among us .
44001022	This person must have been with us from the time that John was baptizing people to the day that Jesus was taken from us . ”
44001023	The disciples determined that two men were qualified . These men were Joseph ( who was called Barsabbas and was also known as Justus ) and Matthias .
44001024	Then they prayed , “ Lord , you know everyone’s thoughts . Show us which of these two you have chosen .
44001025	Show us who is to take the place of Judas as an apostle , since Judas abandoned his position to go to the place where he belongs . ”
44001026	They drew names to choose an apostle . Matthias was chosen and joined the eleven apostles .
44002001	When Pentecost , the fiftieth day after Passover , came , all the believers were together in one place .
44002002	Suddenly , a sound like a violently blowing wind came from the sky and filled the whole house where they were staying .
44002003	Tongues that looked like fire appeared to them . The tongues arranged themselves so that one came to rest on each believer .
44002004	All the believers were filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak in other languages as the Spirit gave them the ability to speak .
44002005	Devout Jewish men from every nation were living in Jerusalem .
44002006	They gathered when they heard the wind . Each person was startled to recognize his own dialect when the disciples spoke .
44002007	Stunned and amazed , the people in the crowd said , “ All of these men who are speaking are Galileans .
44002008	Why do we hear them speaking in our native dialects ?
44002009	We’re Parthians , Medes , and Elamites . We’re people from Mesopotamia , Judea , Cappadocia , Pontus , the province of Asia ,
44002010	Phrygia , Pamphylia , Egypt , and the country near Cyrene in Libya . We’re Jewish people , converts to Judaism , and visitors from Rome ,
44002011	Crete , and Arabia . We hear these men in our own languages as they tell about the miracles that God has done . ”
44002012	All of these devout men were stunned and puzzled . They asked each other , “ What can this mean ? ”
44002013	Others said jokingly , “ They’re drunk on sweet wine . ”
44002014	Then Peter stood up with the eleven apostles . In a loud voice he said to them , “ Men of Judea and everyone living in Jerusalem ! You must understand this , so pay attention to what I say .
44002015	These men are not drunk as you suppose . It’s only nine in the morning .
44002016	Rather , this is what the prophet Joel spoke about :
44002017	‘ In the last days , God says , I will pour my Spirit on everyone . Your sons and daughters will speak what God has revealed . Your young men will see visions . Your old men will dream dreams .
44002018	In those daysI will pour my Spirit on my servants , on both men and women . They will speak what God has revealed .
44002019	I will work miracles in the sky and give signs on the earth : blood , fire , and clouds of smoke .
44002020	The sun will become dark , and the moon will become as red as bloodbefore the terrifying day of the Lord comes .
44002021	Then whoever calls on the name of the Lord will be saved . ’
44002022	“ Men of Israel , listen to what I say : Jesus from Nazareth was a man whom God brought to your attention . You know that through this man God worked miracles , did amazing things , and gave signs .
44002023	By using men who don’t acknowledge Moses’ Teachings , you crucified Jesus , who was given over to death by a plan that God had determined in advance .
44002024	But God raised him from death to life and destroyed the pains of death , because death had no power to hold him .
44002025	This is what David meant when he said about Jesus : ‘ I always see the Lord in front of me . I cannot be moved because he is by my side .
44002026	That is why my heart is glad and my tongue rejoices . My body also rests securely
44002027	because you do not abandon my soul to the graveor allow your holy one to decay .
44002028	You make the path of life known to me . In your presence there is complete joy . ’
44002029	“ Brothers , I can tell you confidently that our ancestor David died and was buried and that his tomb is here to this day .
44002030	David was a prophet and knew that God had promised with an oath that he would place one of David’s descendants on his throne .
44002031	David knew that the Messiah would come back to life , and he spoke about that before it ever happened . He said that the Messiah wouldn’t be left in the grave and that his body wouldn’t decay .
44002032	“ God brought this man Jesus back to life . We are all witnesses to that .
44002033	God used his power to give Jesus the highest position . Jesus has also received and has poured out the Holy Spirit as the Father had promised , and this is what you’re seeing and hearing .
44002034	David didn’t go up to heaven , but he said , ‘ The Lord said to my Lord , “ Take my highest position of power
44002035	until I put your enemies under your control . ” ’
44002036	“ All the people of Israel should know beyond a doubt that God made Jesus , whom you crucified , both Lord and Christ . ”
44002037	When the people heard this , they were deeply upset . They asked Peter and the other apostles , “ Brothers , what should we do ? ”
44002038	Peter answered them , “ All of you must turn to God and change the way you think and act , and each of you must be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ so that your sins will be forgiven . Then you will receive the Holy Spirit as a gift .
44002039	This promise belongs to you and to your children and to everyone who is far away . It belongs to everyone who worships the Lord our God . ”
44002040	Peter said much more to warn them . He urged , “ Save yourselves from this corrupt generation . ”
44002041	Those who accepted what Peter said were baptized . That day about 3,000 people were added to the group .
44002042	The disciples were devoted to the teachings of the apostles , to fellowship , to the breaking of bread , and to prayer .
44002043	A feeling of fear came over everyone as many amazing things and miraculous signs happened through the apostles .
44002044	All the believers kept meeting together , and they shared everything with each other .
44002045	From time to time , they sold their property and other possessions and distributed the money to anyone who needed it .
44002046	The believers had a single purpose and went to the temple every day . They were joyful and humble as they ate at each other’s homes and shared their food .
44002047	At the same time , they praised God and had the good will of all the people . Every day the Lord saved people , and they were added to the group .
44003001	Peter and John were going to the temple courtyard for the three o’clock prayer .
44003002	At the same time , a man who had been lame from birth was being carried by some men . Every day these men would put the lame man at a gate in the temple courtyard . The gate was called Beautiful Gate . There he would beg for handouts from people going into the courtyard .
44003003	When the man saw that Peter and John were about to go into the courtyard , he asked them for a handout .
44003004	Peter and John stared at him . “ Look at us ! ” Peter said .
44003005	So the man watched them closely . He expected to receive something from them .
44003006	However , Peter said to him , “ I don’t have any money , but I’ll give you what I do have . Through the power of Jesus Christ from Nazareth , walk ! ”
44003007	Peter took hold of the man’s right hand and began to help him up . Immediately , the man’s feet and ankles became strong .
44003008	Springing to his feet , he stood up and started to walk . He went with Peter and John into the temple courtyard . The man was walking , jumping , and praising God .
44003009	All the people saw him walking and praising God .
44003010	They knew that he was the man who used to sit and beg at the temple’s Beautiful Gate . The people were amazed and stunned to see what had happened to him .
44003011	They were excited , and everyone ran to see them at the place called Solomon’s Porch . The man wouldn’t let go of Peter and John .
44003012	When Peter saw this , he said to the people , “ Men of Israel , why are you amazed about this man ? Why are you staring at us as though we have made him walk by our own power or godly life ?
44003013	The God of our ancestors Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob has glorified his servant Jesus . You handed Jesus over to Pilate . You rejected him in Pilate’s presence , even though Pilate had decided to let him go free .
44003014	You rejected the man who was holy and innocent . You asked to have a murderer given to you ,
44003015	and you killed the source of life . But God brought him back to life , and we are witnesses to that .
44003016	We believe in the one named Jesus . Through his power alone this man , whom you know , was healed , as all of you saw .
44003017	“ And now , brothers , I know that like your rulers you didn’t know what you were doing .
44003018	But in this way God made the sufferings of his Messiah come true . God had predicted these sufferings through all the prophets .
44003019	So change the way you think and act , and turn to God to have your sins removed .
44003020	Then times will come when the Lord will refresh you . He will send you Jesus , whom he has appointed to be the Christ .
44003021	Heaven must receive Jesus until the time when everything will be restored as God promised through his holy prophets long ago .
44003022	“ Moses said , ‘ The Lord your God will send you a prophet , an Israelite like me . Listen to everything he tells you .
44003023	Those who won’t listen to that prophet will be excluded from the people . ’
44003024	Samuel and all the prophets who followed him spoke about these days .
44003025	You are the descendants of the prophets and the heirs of the promise that God made to our ancestors when he said to Abraham , ‘ Through your descendant all people on earth will be blessed . ’
44003026	God has brought his servant back to life and has sent him to you first . God did this to bless you by turning every one of you from your evil ways . ”
44004001	Some priests , the officer in charge of the temple guards , and some Sadducees approached Peter and John while they were speaking to the people .
44004002	These religious authorities were greatly annoyed . Peter and John were teaching the people and spreading the message that the dead will come back to life through Jesus .
44004003	So the temple guards arrested them . Since it was already evening , they put Peter and John in jail until the next day .
44004004	But many of those who had heard the message became believers , so the number of men who believed grew to about 5,000 .
44004005	The next day the Jewish rulers , leaders , and scribes met in Jerusalem .
44004006	The chief priest Annas , Caiaphas , John , Alexander , and the rest of the chief priest’s family were present .
44004007	They made Peter and John stand in front of them and then asked , “ By what power or in whose name did you do this ? ”
44004008	Then Peter , because he was filled with the Holy Spirit , said to them , “ Rulers and leaders of the people ,
44004009	today you are cross-examining us about the good we did for a crippled man . You want to know how he was made well .
44004010	You and all the people of Israel must understand that this man stands in your presence with a healthy body because of the power of Jesus Christ from Nazareth . You crucified Jesus Christ , but God has brought him back to life .
44004011	He is the stone that the builders rejected , the stone that has become the cornerstone .
44004012	No one else can save us . Indeed , we can be saved only by the power of the one named Jesus and not by any other person . ”
44004013	After they found out that Peter and John had no education or special training , they were surprised to see how boldly they spoke . They realized that these men had been with Jesus .
44004014	When they saw the man who was healed standing with Peter and John , they couldn’t say anything against the two apostles .
44004015	So they ordered Peter and John to leave the council room and began to discuss the matter among themselves .
44004016	They said , “ What should we do to these men ? Clearly , they’ve performed a miracle that everyone in Jerusalem knows about . We can’t deny that .
44004017	So let’s threaten them . Let’s tell them that they must never speak to anyone about the one named Jesus . Then the news about the miracle that they have performed will not spread any further among the people . ”
44004018	They called Peter and John and ordered them never to teach about Jesus or even mention his name .
44004019	Peter and John answered them , “ Decide for yourselves whether God wants people to listen to you rather than to him .
44004020	We cannot stop talking about what we’ve seen and heard . ”
44004021	The authorities threatened them even more and then let them go . Since all the people were praising God for what had happened , the authorities couldn’t find any way to punish Peter and John .
44004022	( The man who was healed by this miracle was over 40 years old . )
44004023	When Peter and John were released , they went to the other apostles and told them everything the chief priests and leaders had said .
44004024	When the apostles heard this , they were united and loudly prayed to God , “ Master , you made the sky , the land , the sea , and everything in them .
44004025	You said through the Holy Spirit , who spoke through your servant David ( our ancestor ) , ‘ Why do the nations act arrogantly ? Why do their people devise useless plots ?
44004026	Kings take their stand . Rulers make plans togetheragainst the Lord and against his Messiah . ’
44004027	“ In this city Herod and Pontius Pilate made plans together with non-Jewish people and the people of Israel . They made their plans against your holy servant Jesus , whom you anointed .
44004028	Through your will and power , they did everything that you had already decided should be done .
44004029	“ Lord , pay attention to their threats now , and allow us to speak your word boldly .
44004030	Show your power by healing , performing miracles , and doing amazing things through the power and the name of your holy servant Jesus . ”
44004031	When the apostles had finished praying , their meeting place shook . All of them were filled with the Holy Spirit and continued to speak the word of God boldly .
44004032	The whole group of believers lived in harmony . No one called any of his possessions his own . Instead , they shared everything .
44004033	With great power the apostles continued to testify that the Lord Jesus had come back to life . God’s abundant good will was with all of them .
44004034	None of them needed anything . From time to time , people sold land or houses and brought the money
44004035	to the apostles . Then the money was distributed to anyone who needed it .
44004036	Joseph , a descendant of Levi , had been born on the island of Cyprus . The apostles called him Barnabas , which means “ a person who encourages . ”
44004037	He had some land . He sold it and turned the money over to the apostles .
44005001	A man named Ananias and his wife Sapphira sold some property .
44005002	They agreed to hold back some of the money they had pledged and turned only part of it over to the apostles .
44005003	Peter asked , “ Ananias , why did you let Satan fill you with the idea that you could deceive the Holy Spirit ? You’ve held back some of the money you received for the land .
44005004	While you had the land , it was your own . After it was sold , you could have done as you pleased with the money . So how could you do a thing like this ? You didn’t lie to people but to God ! ”
44005005	When Ananias heard Peter say this , he dropped dead . Everyone who heard about his death was terrified .
44005006	Some young men got up , wrapped his body in a sheet , carried him outside , and buried him .
44005007	About three hours later Ananias’ wife arrived . She didn’t know what had happened .
44005008	So Peter asked her , “ Tell me , did you sell the land for that price ? ” She answered , “ Yes , that was the price . ”
44005009	Then Peter said to her , “ How could you and your husband agree to test the Lord’s Spirit ? Those who buried your husband are standing at the door , and they will carry you outside for burial . ”
44005010	Immediately , she dropped dead in front of Peter . When the young men came back , they found Sapphira dead . So they carried her outside and buried her next to her husband .
44005011	The whole church and everyone else who heard about what had happened were terrified .
44005012	The people saw the apostles perform many miracles and do amazing things . The believers had a common faith in Jesus as they met on Solomon’s Porch .
44005013	None of the other people dared to join them , although everyone spoke highly of them .
44005014	More men and women than ever began to believe in the Lord .
44005015	As a result , people carried their sick into the streets . They placed them on stretchers and cots so that at least Peter’s shadow might fall on some sick people as he went by .
44005016	Crowds from the cities around Jerusalem would gather . They would bring their sick and those who were troubled by evil spirits , and each person was cured .
44005017	The chief priest and the whole party of the Sadducees who were with him were extremely jealous . So they took action
44005018	by arresting the apostles and putting them in the city jail .
44005019	But at night an angel from the Lord opened the doors to their cell and led them out of the prison .
44005020	The angel told them , “ Stand in the temple courtyard , and tell the people everything about life in Christ . ”
44005021	Early in the morning , after they had listened to the angel , the apostles went into the temple courtyard and began to teach . The chief priest and those who were with him called together the Jewish council , that is , all the leaders of Israel . They also sent men to the prison to get the apostles .
44005022	When the temple guards arrived at the prison , they didn’t find the apostles . The guards came back and reported ,
44005023	“ We found the prison securely locked and the guards standing at the doors . However , when we opened the doors , we found no one inside . ”
44005024	When the officer of the temple guards and the chief priests heard this , they were puzzled about what could have happened .
44005025	Then someone told them , “ The men you put in prison are standing in the temple courtyard . They’re teaching the people . ”
44005026	Then the officer of the temple guards went with some of his men to bring back the apostles without using force . After all , the officer and his guards were afraid that the people would stone them to death for using force .
44005027	When they brought back the apostles , they made them stand in front of the council . The chief priest questioned them .
44005028	He said , “ We gave you strict orders not to mention Jesus’ name when you teach . Yet , you’ve filled Jerusalem with your teachings . You want to take revenge on us for putting that man to death . ”
44005029	Peter and the other apostles answered , “ We must obey God rather than people .
44005030	You murdered Jesus by hanging him on a cross . But the God of our ancestors brought him back to life .
44005031	God used his power to give Jesus the highest position as leader and savior . He did this to lead the people of Israel to him , to change the way they think and act , and to forgive their sins .
44005032	We are witnesses to these things , and so is the Holy Spirit , whom God has given to those who obey him . ”
44005033	When the men on the council heard this , they became furious and wanted to execute the apostles .
44005034	But a Pharisee named Gamaliel stood up . He was a highly respected expert in Moses’ Teachings . He ordered that the apostles should be taken outside for a little while .
44005035	Then he said to the council , “ Men of Israel , consider carefully what you do with these men .
44005036	Some time ago Theudas appeared . He claimed that he was important , and about four hundred men joined him . He was killed , and all his followers were scattered . The whole movement was a failure .
44005037	“ After that man , at the time of the census , Judas from Galilee appeared and led people in a revolt . He , too , died , and all his followers were scattered .
44005038	“ We should keep away from these men for now . We should leave them alone . I can guarantee that if the plan they put into action is of human origin , it will fail .
44005039	However , if it’s from God , you won’t be able to stop them . You may even discover that you’re fighting against God . ”
44005040	The council took his advice . They called the apostles , beat them , ordered them not to speak about the one named Jesus , and let them go .
44005041	The apostles left the council room . They were happy to have been considered worthy to suffer dishonor for speaking about Jesus .
44005042	Every day in the temple courtyard and from house to house , they refused to stop teaching and telling the Good News that Jesus is the Messiah .
44006001	At that time , as the number of disciples grew , Greek-speaking Jews complained about the Hebrew-speaking Jews . The Greek-speaking Jews claimed that the widows among them were neglected every day when food and other assistance was distributed .
44006002	The twelve apostles called all the disciples together and told them , “ It’s not right for us to give up God’s word in order to distribute food .
44006003	So , brothers and sisters , choose seven men whom the people know are spiritually wise . We will put them in charge of this problem .
44006004	However , we will devote ourselves to praying and to serving in ways that are related to the word . ”
44006005	The suggestion pleased the whole group . So they chose Stephen , who was a man full of faith and the Holy Spirit , and they chose Philip , Prochorus , Nicanor , Timon , Parmenas , and Nicolaus , who had converted to Judaism in the city of Antioch .
44006006	The disciples had these men stand in front of the apostles , who prayed and placed their hands on these seven men .
44006007	The word of God continued to spread , and the number of disciples in Jerusalem grew very large . A large number of priests accepted the faith .
44006008	Stephen was a man filled with God’s favor and power . He did amazing things and performed miracles .
44006009	One day some men from the cities of Cyrene and Alexandria and the provinces of Cilicia and Asia started an argument with Stephen . They belonged to a synagogue called Freedmen’s Synagogue .
44006010	They couldn’t argue with Stephen because he spoke with the wisdom that the Spirit had given him .
44006011	Then they bribed some men to lie . These men said , “ We heard him slander Moses and God . ”
44006012	The liars stirred up trouble among the people , the leaders , and the scribes . So they went to Stephen , took him by force , and brought him in front of the Jewish council .
44006013	Some witnesses stood up and lied about Stephen . They said , “ This man never stops saying bad things about the holy place and Moses’ Teachings .
44006014	We heard him say that Jesus from Nazareth will destroy the temple and change the customs that Moses gave us . ”
44006015	Everyone who sat in the council stared at him and saw that his face looked like an angel’s face .
44007001	Then the chief priest asked Stephen , “ Is this true ? ”
44007002	Stephen answered , “ Brothers and fathers , listen to me . The God who reveals his glory appeared to our ancestor Abraham in Mesopotamia . This happened before Abraham lived in Haran .
44007003	God told him , ‘ Leave your land and your relatives . Go to the land that I will show you . ’
44007004	“ Then Abraham left the country of Chaldea and lived in the city of Haran . After his father died , God made him move from there to this land where we now live .
44007005	“ Yet , God didn’t give Abraham anything in this land to call his own , not even a place to rest his feet . But God promised to give this land to him and to his descendants , even though Abraham didn’t have a child .
44007006	God told Abraham that his descendants would be foreigners living in another country and that the people there would make them slaves and mistreat them for 400 years .
44007007	God also told him , “ I will punish the people whom they will serve . After that , they will leave that country and worship me here . ’
44007008	“ God gave Abraham circumcision to confirm his promise . So when Abraham’s son Isaac was born , Abraham circumcised him on the eighth day . Isaac did the same to his son Jacob , and Jacob did the same to his twelve sons ( the ancestors of our tribes ) .
44007009	“ Jacob’s sons were jealous of their brother Joseph . They sold him into slavery , and he was taken to Egypt . But God was with Joseph
44007010	and rescued him from all his suffering . When Joseph stood in the presence of Pharaoh ( the king of Egypt ) , God gave Joseph divine favor and wisdom so that he became ruler of Egypt and of Pharaoh’s whole palace .
44007011	Then a famine throughout Egypt and Canaan brought a lot of suffering . Our ancestors couldn’t find any food .
44007012	When Jacob heard that Egypt had food , he sent our ancestors there . That was their first trip .
44007013	On the second trip , Joseph told his brothers who he was , and Pharaoh learned about Joseph’s family .
44007014	Joseph sent for his father Jacob and his relatives , 75 people in all .
44007015	So Jacob went to Egypt , and he and our ancestors died there .
44007016	They were taken to Shechem for burial in the tomb that Abraham purchased in Shechem from Hamor’s sons .
44007017	“ When the time that God had promised to Abraham had almost come , the number of our people in Egypt had grown very large .
44007018	Then a different king , who knew nothing about Joseph , began to rule in Egypt .
44007019	This king was shrewd in the way he took advantage of our people . He mistreated our ancestors . He made them abandon their newborn babies outdoors , where they would die .
44007020	“ At that time Moses was born , and he was a very beautiful child . His parents took care of him for three months .
44007021	When Moses was abandoned outdoors , Pharaoh’s daughter adopted him and raised him as her son .
44007022	So Moses was educated in all the wisdom of the Egyptians and became a great man in what he said and did .
44007023	When he was 40 years old , he decided to visit his own people , the Israelites .
44007024	When he saw an Israelite man being treated unfairly by an Egyptian , he defended the Israelite . He took revenge by killing the Egyptian .
44007025	Moses thought his own people would understand that God was going to use him to give them freedom . But they didn’t understand .
44007026	The next day Moses saw two Israelites fighting , and he tried to make peace between them . He said to them , ‘ Men , you are brothers . Why are you treating each other unfairly ? ’
44007027	“ But one of the men pushed Moses aside . He asked Moses , ‘ Who made you our ruler and judge ?
44007028	Do you want to kill me as you killed the Egyptian yesterday ? ’
44007029	After he said that , Moses quickly left Egypt and lived in Midian as a foreigner . In Midian he fathered two sons .
44007030	“ Forty years later , a messenger appeared to him in the flames of a burning bush in the desert of Mount Sinai .
44007031	Moses was surprised when he saw this . As he went closer to look at the bush , the voice of the Lord said to him ,
44007032	‘ I am the God of your ancestors—the God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob . ’ Moses began to tremble and didn’t dare to look at the bush .
44007033	The Lord told him , ‘ Take off your sandals . The place where you’re standing is holy ground .
44007034	I’ve seen how my people are mistreated in Egypt . I’ve heard their groaning and have come to rescue them . So now I’m sending you to Egypt . ’
44007035	“ This is the Moses whom the Israelites rejected by saying , ‘ Who made you our ruler and judge ? ’ This is the one God sent to free them and to rule them with the help of the messenger who appeared to him in the bush .
44007036	This is the man who led our ancestors out of Egypt . He is the person who did amazing things and worked miracles in Egypt , at the Red Sea , and in the desert for 40 years .
44007037	This is the same Moses who told the Israelites , ‘ God will send you a prophet , an Israelite like me . ’
44007038	This is the Moses who was in the assembly in the desert . Our ancestors and the messenger who spoke to him on Mount Sinai were there with him . Moses received life-giving messages to give to us ,
44007039	but our ancestors were not willing to obey him . Instead , they pushed him aside , and in their hearts they turned back to Egypt .
44007040	They told Aaron , ‘ We don’t know what has happened to this Moses , who led us out of Egypt . So make gods who will lead us . ’
44007041	That was the time they made a calf . They offered a sacrifice to that false god and delighted in what they had made .
44007042	“ So God turned away from them and let them worship the sun , moon , and stars . This is written in the book of the prophets : ‘ Did you bring me sacrifices and grain offerings in the desert for 40 years , nation of Israel ?
44007043	You carried along the shrine of Moloch , the star of the god Rephan , and the statues you made for yourselves to worship . I will send you into exile beyond the city of Babylon . ’
44007044	“ In the desert our ancestors had the tent of God’s promise . Moses built this tent exactly as God had told him . He used the model he had seen .
44007045	After our ancestors received the tent , they brought it into this land . They did this with Joshua’s help when they took possession of the land from the nations that God forced out of our ancestors’ way . This tent remained here until the time of David ,
44007046	who won God’s favor . David asked that he might provide a permanent place for the family of Jacob .
44007047	But Solomon was the one who built a house for God .
44007048	“ However , the Most High doesn’t live in a house built by humans , as the prophet says :
44007049	‘ The Lord says , “ Heaven is my throne . The earth is my footstool . What kind of house are you going to build for me ? Where will I rest ?
44007050	Didn’t I make all these things ? ” ’
44007051	“ How stubborn can you be ? How can you be so heartless and disobedient ? You’re just like your ancestors . They always opposed the Holy Spirit , and so do you !
44007052	Was there ever a prophet your ancestors didn’t persecute ? They killed those who predicted that a man with God’s approval would come . You have now become the people who betrayed and murdered that man .
44007053	You are the people who received Moses’ Teachings , which were put into effect by angels . But you haven’t obeyed those teachings . ”
44007054	As council members listened to Stephen , they became noticeably furious .
44007055	But Stephen was full of the Holy Spirit . He looked into heaven , saw God’s glory , and Jesus in the position of authority that God gives .
44007056	So Stephen said , “ Look , I see heaven opened and the Son of Man in the position of authority that God has given him ! ”
44007057	But the council members shouted and refused to listen . Then they rushed at Stephen with one purpose in mind ,
44007058	and after they had thrown him out of the city , they began to stone him to death . The witnesses left their coats with a young man named Saul .
44007059	While council members were executing Stephen , he called out , “ Lord Jesus , welcome my spirit . ”
44007060	Then he knelt down and shouted , “ Lord , don’t hold this sin against them . ” After he had said this , he died .
44008001	Saul approved of putting Stephen to death . On that day widespread persecution broke out against the church in Jerusalem . Most believers , except the apostles , were scattered throughout Judea and Samaria .
44008002	Devout men buried Stephen as they mourned loudly for him .
44008003	Saul tried to destroy the church . He dragged men and women out of one home after another and threw them into prison .
44008004	The believers who were scattered went from place to place , where they spread the word .
44008005	Philip went to the city of Samaria and told people about the Messiah .
44008006	The crowds paid close attention to what Philip said . They listened to him and saw the miracles that he performed .
44008007	Evil spirits screamed as they came out of the many people they had possessed . Many paralyzed and lame people were cured .
44008008	As a result , that city was extremely happy .
44008009	A man named Simon lived in that city . He amazed the people of Samaria with his practice of magic . He claimed that he was great .
44008010	Everyone from children to adults paid attention to him . They said , “ This man is the power of God , and that power is called great . ”
44008011	They paid attention to Simon because he had amazed them for a long time with his practice of magic .
44008012	However , when Philip spread the Good News about the kingdom of God and the one named Jesus Christ , men and women believed him and were baptized .
44008013	Even Simon believed , and after he was baptized , he became devoted to Philip . Simon was amazed to see the miracles and impressive things that were happening .
44008014	When the apostles in Jerusalem heard that the Samaritans had accepted the word of God , they sent Peter and John to them .
44008015	Peter and John went to Samaria and prayed that the Samaritans would receive the Holy Spirit .
44008016	( Before this the Holy Spirit had not come to any of the Samaritans . They had only been baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus . )
44008017	Then Peter and John placed their hands on them , and the Samaritans received the Holy Spirit .
44008018	Simon saw that the Spirit was given to the Samaritans when the apostles placed their hands on them . So he offered Peter and John money
44008019	and said , “ Give me this power so that anyone I place my hands on will receive the Holy Spirit . ”
44008020	Peter told Simon , “ May your money be destroyed with you because you thought you could buy God’s gift .
44008021	You won’t have any share in this because God can see how twisted your thinking is .
44008022	So change your wicked thoughts , and ask the Lord if he will forgive you for thinking like this .
44008023	I can see that you are bitter with jealousy and wrapped up in your evil ways . ”
44008024	Simon answered , “ Pray to the Lord for me that none of the things you said will happen to me . ”
44008025	After they had boldly spoken about the message of the Lord , they spread the Good News in many Samaritan villages on their way back to Jerusalem .
44008026	An angel from the Lord said to Philip , “ Get up , and take the desert road that goes south from Jerusalem to Gaza . ”
44008027	So Philip went . An Ethiopian man who had come to Jerusalem to worship was on his way home . The man was a eunuch , a high-ranking official in charge of all the treasures of Queen Candace of Ethiopia .
44008028	As the official rode along in his carriage , he was reading the prophet Isaiah out loud .
44008029	The Spirit said to Philip , “ Go to that carriage , and stay close to it . ”
44008030	Philip ran to the carriage and could hear the official reading the prophet Isaiah out loud . Philip asked him , “ Do you understand what you’re reading ? ”
44008031	The official answered , “ How can I understand unless someone guides me ? ” So he invited Philip to sit with him in his carriage .
44008032	This was the part of the Scriptures that the official was reading : “ He was led like a lamb to the slaughter . He was like a sheep that is silentwhen its wool is cut off . He didn’t open his mouth .
44008033	When he humbled himself , he was not judged fairly . Who from his generationwill talk about his life on earth being cut short ? ”
44008034	The official said to Philip , “ I would like to know who the prophet is talking about . Is he talking about himself or someone else ? ”
44008035	Then Philip spoke . Starting with that passage , Philip told the official the Good News about Jesus .
44008036	As they were going along the road , they came to some water . The official said to Philip , “ Look , there’s some water . What can keep me from being baptized ? ”
44008038	The official ordered the carriage to stop . He and Philip stepped into the water , and Philip baptized him .
44008039	When they had stepped out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord suddenly took Philip away . The official joyfully continued on his way and didn’t see Philip again .
44008040	Philip found himself in the city of Azotus . He traveled through all the cities and spread the Good News until he came to the city of Caesarea .
44009001	Saul kept threatening to murder the Lord’s disciples . He went to the chief priest
44009002	and asked him to write letters of authorization to the synagogue leaders in the city of Damascus . Saul wanted to arrest any man or woman who followed the way of Christ and imprison them in Jerusalem .
44009003	As Saul was coming near the city of Damascus , a light from heaven suddenly flashed around him .
44009004	He fell to the ground and heard a voice say to him , “ Saul ! Saul ! Why are you persecuting me ? ”
44009005	Saul asked , “ Who are you , sir ? ” The person replied , “ I’m Jesus , the one you’re persecuting .
44009006	Get up ! Go into the city , and you’ll be told what you should do . ”
44009007	Meanwhile , the men traveling with him were speechless . They heard the voice but didn’t see anyone .
44009008	Saul was helped up from the ground . When he opened his eyes , he was blind . So his companions led him into Damascus .
44009009	For three days he couldn’t see and didn’t eat or drink .
44009010	A disciple named Ananias lived in the city of Damascus . The Lord said to him in a vision , “ Ananias ! ” Ananias answered , “ Yes , Lord . ”
44009011	The Lord told him , “ Get up ! Go to Judas’ house on Straight Street , and ask for a man named Saul from the city of Tarsus . He’s praying .
44009012	In a vision he has seen a man named Ananias place his hands on him to restore his sight . ”
44009013	Ananias replied , “ Lord , I’ve heard a lot of people tell about the many evil things this man has done to your people in Jerusalem .
44009014	Saul has come here to Damascus with authority from the chief priests to put anyone who calls on your name in prison . ”
44009015	The Lord told Ananias , “ Go ! I’ve chosen this man to bring my name to nations , to kings , and to the people of Israel .
44009016	I’ll show him how much he has to suffer for the sake of my name . ”
44009017	Ananias left and entered Judas’ house . After he placed his hands on Saul , Ananias said , “ Brother Saul , the Lord Jesus , who appeared to you on your way to Damascus , sent me to you . He wants you to see again and to be filled with the Holy Spirit . ”
44009018	Immediately , something like fish scales fell from Saul’s eyes , and he could see again . Then Saul stood up and was baptized .
44009019	After he had something to eat , his strength came back to him . Saul was with the disciples in the city of Damascus for several days .
44009020	He immediately began to spread the word in their synagogues that Jesus was the Son of God .
44009021	Everyone who heard him was amazed . They asked , “ Isn’t this the man who destroyed those who worshiped the one named Jesus in Jerusalem ? Didn’t he come here to take these worshipers as prisoners to the chief priests in Jerusalem ? ”
44009022	Saul grew more powerful , and he confused the Jews living in Damascus by proving that Jesus was the Messiah .
44009023	Later the Jews planned to murder Saul ,
44009024	but Saul was told about their plot . They were watching the city gates day and night in order to murder him .
44009025	However , Saul’s disciples lowered him in a large basket through an opening in the wall one night .
44009026	After Saul arrived in Jerusalem , he tried to join the disciples . But everyone was afraid of him . They wouldn’t believe that he was a disciple .
44009027	Then Barnabas took an interest in Saul and brought him to the apostles . Barnabas told the apostles how Saul had seen the Lord on the road and that the Lord had spoken to him . Barnabas also told them how boldly Saul had spoken about the one named Jesus in the city of Damascus .
44009028	Then Saul went throughout Jerusalem with the disciples . He spoke boldly with the power and authority of the Lord .
44009029	He talked and argued with Greek-speaking Jews , but they tried to murder him .
44009030	As soon as the disciples found out about this , they took Saul to Caesarea and sent him to Tarsus .
44009031	Then the church throughout Judea , Galilee , and Samaria had peace . The number of people increased as people lived in the fear of the Lord and the comfort of the Holy Spirit .
44009032	When Peter was going around to all of God’s people , he came to those who lived in the city of Lydda .
44009033	In Lydda Peter found a man named Aeneas who was paralyzed and confined to a cot for eight years .
44009034	Peter said to him , “ Aeneas , Jesus Christ makes you well . Get up , and pick up your cot . ” Aeneas immediately got up .
44009035	Everyone who lived in the city of Lydda and the coastal region of Sharon saw what had happened to Aeneas and turned to the Lord in faith .
44009036	A disciple named Tabitha lived in the city of Joppa . Her Greek name was Dorcas . She always helped people and gave things to the poor .
44009037	She became sick and died . Her body was prepared for burial and was laid in an upstairs room .
44009038	Lydda is near the city of Joppa . When the disciples heard that Peter was in Lydda , they sent two men to him . They begged Peter , “ Hurry to Joppa ! We need your help ! ”
44009039	So Peter went with them . When he arrived , he was taken upstairs . All the widows stood around him . They were crying and showing Peter the articles of clothing that Dorcas had made while she was still with them .
44009040	Peter made everyone leave the room . He knelt and prayed . Then he turned toward the body and said , “ Tabitha , get up ! ” Tabitha opened her eyes , saw Peter , and sat up .
44009041	Peter took her hand and helped her stand up . After he called the believers , especially the widows , he presented Tabitha to them . She was alive .
44009042	The news about this spread throughout the city of Joppa , and as a result , many people believed in the Lord .
44009043	Peter stayed in Joppa for a number of days with Simon , a leatherworker .
44010001	A man named Cornelius lived in the city of Caesarea . He was a Roman army officer in the Italian Regiment .
44010002	He and everyone in his home were devout and respected God . Cornelius gave many gifts to poor Jewish people and always prayed to God .
44010003	One day , about three in the afternoon , he had a vision . He clearly saw an angel from God come to him and say , “ Cornelius ! ”
44010004	He stared at the angel and was terrified . Cornelius asked the angel , “ What do you want , sir ? ” The angel answered him , “ God is aware of your prayers and your gifts to the poor , and he has remembered you .
44010005	Send messengers now to the city of Joppa , and summon a man whose name is Simon Peter .
44010006	He is a guest of Simon , a leatherworker , whose house is by the sea . ”
44010007	After saying this , the angel left . Cornelius called two of his household servants and a devout soldier , one of those who served him regularly .
44010008	Cornelius explained everything to them and sent them to Joppa .
44010009	Around noon the next day , while Cornelius’ men were on their way and coming close to Joppa , Peter went on the roof to pray .
44010010	He became hungry and wanted to eat . While the food was being prepared , he fell into a trance .
44010011	He saw the sky open and something like a large linen sheet being lowered by its four corners to the ground .
44010012	In the sheet were all kinds of four-footed animals , reptiles , and birds .
44010013	A voice told him , “ Get up , Peter ! Kill these animals , and eat them . ”
44010014	Peter answered , “ I can’t do that , Lord ! I’ve never eaten anything that is impure or unclean . ”
44010015	A voice spoke to him a second time , “ Don’t say that the things which God has made clean are impure . ”
44010016	This happened three times . Then the sheet was quickly taken into the sky .
44010017	While Peter was puzzled by the meaning of the vision , the men sent by Cornelius found Simon’s house and went to the gate .
44010018	They asked if Simon Peter was staying there .
44010019	Peter was still thinking about the vision when the Spirit said to him , “ Three men are looking for you .
44010020	Get up , and go downstairs . Don’t hesitate to go with these men . I have sent them . ”
44010021	So Peter went to the men . He said , “ I’m the man you’re looking for . Why are you here ? ”
44010022	The men replied , “ Cornelius , a Roman army officer , sent us . He’s a man who has God’s approval and who respects God . Also , the Jewish people respect him . A holy angel told him to summon you to his home to hear what you have to say . ”
44010023	Peter asked the men to come into the house and had them stay overnight . The next day Peter left with them . Some disciples from Joppa went along .
44010024	The following day they arrived in Caesarea . Cornelius was expecting them and had called his relatives and close friends together .
44010025	When Peter was about to enter Cornelius’ house , Cornelius met him , bowed down , and worshiped Peter .
44010026	But Peter made him get up . He told him , “ Stand up ! I’m only a man . ”
44010027	As Peter talked , he entered Cornelius’ house and found that many people had gathered .
44010028	He said to them , “ You understand how wrong it is for a Jewish man to associate or visit with anyone of another race . But God has shown me that I should no longer call anyone impure or unclean .
44010029	That is why I didn’t object to coming here when you sent for me . I want to know why you sent for me . ”
44010030	Cornelius answered , “ Four days ago I was praying at home . It was at this same time , three o’clock in the afternoon . Suddenly , a man dressed in radiant clothes stood in front of me .
44010031	He said to me , ‘ Cornelius , God has heard your prayer and has remembered your gifts to the poor .
44010032	So send messengers to Joppa , and summon a man whose name is Simon Peter . He’s a guest in the home of Simon , a leatherworker who lives by the sea . ’
44010033	So I sent for you immediately . Thank you for coming . All of us are here now in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has ordered you to say . ”
44010034	Then Peter said , “ Now I understand that God doesn’t play favorites .
44010035	Rather , whoever respects God and does what is right is acceptable to him in any nation .
44010036	God sent his word to the people of Israel and brought them the Good News of peace through Jesus Christ . This Jesus Christ is everyone’s Lord .
44010037	You know what happened throughout Judea . Everything began in Galilee after John spread the news about baptism .
44010038	You know that God anointed Jesus from Nazareth with the Holy Spirit and with power . Jesus went everywhere and did good things , such as healing everyone who was under the devil’s power . Jesus did these things because God was with him .
44010039	We can testify to everything Jesus did in the land of the Jews and in Jerusalem . People hung him on a cross and killed him ,
44010040	but God brought him back to life on the third day . God didn’t show him
44010041	to all the people . He showed Jesus to witnesses , apostles he had already chosen . We apostles are those men who ate and drank with Jesus after he came back to life .
44010042	He ordered us to warn the people , ‘ God has appointed Jesus to judge the living and the dead . ’
44010043	In addition , all the prophets testify that people who believe in the one named Jesus receive forgiveness for their sins through him . ”
44010044	While Peter was still speaking , the Holy Spirit came to everyone who heard his message .
44010045	All the believers who were circumcised and who had come with Peter were amazed that the gift of the Holy Spirit had been poured on people who were not Jewish .
44010046	They heard these non-Jewish people speaking in other languages and praising God . Then Peter said ,
