44026026	I can easily speak to a king who knows about these things . I’m sure that none of these things has escaped his attention . None of this was done secretly .
44026027	King Agrippa , do you believe the prophets ? I know you believe them ! ”
44026028	Agrippa said to Paul , “ Do you think you can quickly persuade me to become a Christian ? ”
44026029	Paul replied , “ I wish to God that you and everyone listening to me today would quickly and completely become as I am ( except for being a prisoner ) . ”
44026030	The king , the governor , Bernice , and the people who were sitting with them got up .
44026031	As they were leaving , they said to each other , “ This man isn’t doing anything for which he deserves to die or be put in prison . ”
44026032	Agrippa told Festus , “ This man could have been set free if he hadn’t appealed his case to the emperor . ”
44027001	When it was decided that we should sail to Italy , Paul and some other prisoners were turned over to an army officer . His name was Julius , and he belonged to the emperor’s division .
44027002	We set sail on a ship from the city of Adramyttium . The ship was going to stop at ports on the coast of the province of Asia . Aristarchus , a Macedonian from the city of Thessalonica , went with us .
44027003	The next day we arrived at the city of Sidon . Julius treated Paul kindly and allowed him to visit his friends and receive any care he needed .
44027004	Leaving Sidon , we sailed on the northern side of the island of Cyprus because we were traveling against the wind .
44027005	We sailed along the coast of the provinces of Cilicia and Pamphylia and arrived at the city of Myra in the province of Lycia .
44027006	In Myra the officer found a ship from Alexandria that was on its way to Italy and put us on it .
44027007	We were sailing slowly for a number of days . Our difficulties began along the coast of the city of Cnidus because the wind would not let us go further . So at Cape Salmone , we started to sail for the south side of the island of Crete .
44027008	We had difficulty sailing along the shore of Crete . We finally came to a port called Fair Harbors . The port was near the city of Lasea .
44027009	We had lost so much time that the day of fasting had already past . Sailing was now dangerous , so Paul advised them ,
44027010	“ Men , we’re going to face a disaster and heavy losses on this voyage . This disaster will cause damage to the cargo and the ship , and it will affect our lives . ”
44027011	However , the officer was persuaded by what the pilot and the owner of the ship said and not by what Paul said .
44027012	Since the harbor was not a good place to spend the winter , most of the men decided to sail from there . They hoped to reach the city of Phoenix somehow and spend the winter there . ( Phoenix is a harbor that faces the southwest and northwest winds and is located on the island of Crete . )
44027013	When a gentle breeze began to blow from the south , the men thought their plan would work . They raised the anchor and sailed close to the shore of Crete .
44027014	Soon a powerful wind ( called a northeaster ) blew from the island .
44027015	The wind carried the ship away , and we couldn’t sail against the wind . We couldn’t do anything , so we were carried along by the wind .
44027016	As we drifted to the sheltered side of a small island called Cauda , we barely got control of the ship’s lifeboat .
44027017	The men pulled it up on deck . Then they passed ropes under the ship to reinforce it . Fearing that they would hit the large sandbank off the shores of Libya , they lowered the sail and were carried along by the wind .
44027018	We continued to be tossed so violently by the storm that the next day the men began to throw the cargo overboard .
44027019	On the third day they threw the ship’s equipment overboard .
44027020	For a number of days we couldn’t see the sun or the stars . The storm wouldn’t let up . It was so severe that we finally began to lose any hope of coming out of it alive .
44027021	Since hardly anyone wanted to eat , Paul stood among them and said , “ Men , you should have followed my advice not to sail from Crete . You would have avoided this disaster and loss .
44027022	Now I advise you to have courage . No one will lose his life . Only the ship will be destroyed .
44027023	I know this because an angel from the God to whom I belong and whom I serve stood by me last night .
44027024	The angel told me , ‘ Don’t be afraid , Paul ! You must present your case to the emperor . God has granted safety to everyone who is sailing with you . ’
44027025	So have courage , men ! I trust God that everything will turn out as he told me .
44027026	However , we will run aground on some island . ”
44027027	On the fourteenth night we were still drifting through the Mediterranean Sea . About midnight the sailors suspected that we were approaching land .
44027028	So they threw a line with a weight on it into the water . It sank 120 feet . They waited a little while and did the same thing again . This time the line sank 90 feet .
44027029	Fearing we might hit rocks , they dropped four anchors from the back of the ship and prayed for morning to come .
44027030	The sailors tried to escape from the ship . They let the lifeboat down into the sea and pretended they were going to lay out the anchors from the front of the ship .
44027031	Paul told the officer and the soldiers , “ If these sailors don’t stay on the ship , you have no hope of staying alive . ”
44027032	Then the soldiers cut the ropes that held the lifeboat and let it drift away .
44027033	Just before daybreak Paul was encouraging everyone to have something to eat . “ This is the fourteenth day you have waited and have had nothing to eat .
44027034	So I’m encouraging you to eat something . Eating will help you survive , since not a hair from anyone’s head will be lost . ”
44027035	After Paul said this , he took some bread , thanked God in front of everyone , broke it , and began to eat .
44027036	Everyone was encouraged and had something to eat .
44027037	( There were 276 of us on the ship . )
44027038	After the people had eaten all they wanted , they lightened the ship by dumping the wheat into the sea .
44027039	In the morning they couldn’t recognize the land , but they could see a bay with a beach . So they decided to try to run the ship ashore .
44027040	They cut the anchors free and left them in the sea . At the same time they untied the ropes that held the steering oars . Then they raised the top sail to catch the wind and steered the ship to the shore .
44027041	They struck a sandbar in the water and ran the ship aground . The front of the ship stuck and couldn’t be moved , while the back of the ship was broken to pieces by the force of the waves .
44027042	The soldiers had a plan to kill the prisoners to keep them from swimming away and escaping .
44027043	However , the officer wanted to save Paul , so he stopped the soldiers from carrying out their plan . He ordered those who could swim to jump overboard first and swim ashore .
44027044	Then he ordered the rest to follow on planks or some other pieces of wood from the ship . In this way everyone got to shore safely .
44028001	When we were safely on shore , we found out that the island was called Malta .
44028002	The people who lived on the island were unusually kind to us . They made a fire and welcomed all of us around it because of the rain and the cold .
44028003	Paul gathered a bundle of brushwood and put it on the fire . The heat forced a poisonous snake out of the brushwood . The snake bit Paul’s hand and wouldn’t let go .
44028004	When the people who lived on the island saw the snake hanging from his hand , they said to each other , “ This man must be a murderer ! He may have escaped from the sea , but justice won’t let him live . ”
44028005	Paul shook the snake into the fire and wasn’t harmed .
44028006	The people were waiting for him to swell up or suddenly drop dead . But after they had waited a long time and saw nothing unusual happen to him , they changed their minds and said he was a god .
44028007	A man named Publius , who was the governor of the island , had property around the area . He welcomed us and treated us kindly , and for three days we were his guests .
44028008	His father happened to be sick in bed . He was suffering from fever and dysentery . Paul went to him , prayed , placed his hands on him , and made him well .
44028009	After that had happened , other sick people on the island went to Paul and were made well .
44028010	They showed respect for us in many ways , and when we were going to set sail , they put whatever we needed on board .
44028011	After three months we sailed on an Alexandrian ship that had spent the winter at the island . The ship had the gods Castor and Pollux carved on its front .
44028012	We stopped at the city of Syracuse and stayed there for three days .
44028013	We sailed from Syracuse and arrived at the city of Rhegium . The next day a south wind began to blow , and two days later we arrived at the city of Puteoli .
44028014	In Puteoli we discovered some believers who begged us to spend a week with them .
44028015	Believers in Rome heard that we were coming , so they came as far as the cities of Appius’ Market and Three Taverns to meet us . When Paul saw them , he thanked God and felt encouraged . So we finally arrived in the city of Rome .
44028016	After our arrival , Paul was allowed to live by himself , but he had a soldier who guarded him .
44028017	After three days Paul invited the most influential Jews in Rome to meet with him . When they assembled , he said to them , “ Brothers , I haven’t done anything against the Jewish people or violated the customs handed down by our ancestors . Yet , I’m a prisoner from Jerusalem , and I’ve been handed over to the Roman authorities .
44028018	The Roman authorities cross-examined me and wanted to let me go because I was accused of nothing for which I deserved to die .
44028019	But when the Jews objected , I was forced to appeal my case to the emperor . That doesn’t mean I have any charges to bring against my own people .
44028020	That’s why I asked to see you and speak with you . I’m wearing these chains because of what Israel hopes for . ”
44028021	The Jewish leaders told Paul , “ We haven’t received any letters from Judea about you , and no Jewish person who has come to Rome has reported or mentioned anything bad about you .
44028022	However , we would like to hear what you think . We know that everywhere people are talking against this sect . ”
44028023	On a designated day a larger number of influential Jews than expected went to the place where Paul was staying . From morning until evening , Paul was explaining the kingdom of God to them . He was trying to convince them about Jesus from Moses’ Teachings and the Prophets .
44028024	Some of them were convinced by what he said , but others continued to disbelieve .
44028025	The Jews , unable to agree among themselves , left after Paul had quoted this particular passage to them : “ How well the Holy Spirit spoke to your ancestors through the prophet Isaiah !
44028026	The Spirit said : ‘ Go to these people and say , “ You will hear clearly but never understand . You will see clearly but never comprehend .
44028027	These people have become close-mindedand hard of hearing . They have shut their eyesso that their eyes never see . Their ears never hear . Their minds never understand . And they never turn to me for healing . ” ’
44028028	“ You need to know that God has sent his salvation to people who are not Jews . They will listen . ”
44028030	Paul rented a place to live for two full years and welcomed everyone who came to him .
44028031	He spread the message about God’s kingdom and taught very boldly about the Lord Jesus Christ . No one stopped him .
45001001	From Paul , a servant of Jesus Christ , called to be an apostle and appointed to spread the Good News of God .
45001002	( God had already promised this Good News through his prophets in the Holy Scriptures .
45001003	This Good News is about his Son , our Lord Jesus Christ . In his human nature he was a descendant of David .
45001004	In his spiritual , holy nature he was declared the Son of God . This was shown in a powerful way when he came back to life .
45001005	Through him we have received God’s kindness and the privilege of being apostles who bring people from every nation to the obedience that is associated with faith . This is for the honor of his name .
45001006	You are among those who have been called to belong to Jesus Christ . )
45001007	To everyone in Rome whom God loves and has called to be his holy people . Good will and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ are yours !
45001008	First , I thank my God through Jesus Christ for every one of you because the news of your faith is spreading throughout the whole world .
45001009	I serve God by spreading the Good News about his Son . God is my witness that I always mention you
45001010	every time I pray . I ask that somehow God will now at last make it possible for me to visit you .
45001011	I long to see you to share a spiritual blessing with you so that you will be strengthened .
45001012	What I mean is that we may be encouraged by each other’s faith .
45001013	I want you to know , brothers and sisters , that I often planned to visit you . However , until now I have been kept from doing so . What I want is to enjoy some of the results of working among you as I have also enjoyed the results of working among the rest of the nations .
45001014	I have an obligation to those who are civilized and those who aren’t , to those who are wise and those who aren’t .
45001015	That’s why I’m eager to tell you who live in Rome the Good News also .
45001016	I’m not ashamed of the Good News . It is God’s power to save everyone who believes , Jews first and Greeks as well .
45001017	God’s approval is revealed in this Good News . This approval begins and ends with faith as Scripture says , “ The person who has God’s approval will live because of faith . ”
45001018	God’s anger is revealed from heaven against every ungodly and immoral thing people do as they try to suppress the truth by their immoral living .
45001019	What can be known about God is clear to them because he has made it clear to them .
45001020	From the creation of the world , God’s invisible qualities , his eternal power and divine nature , have been clearly observed in what he made . As a result , people have no excuse .
45001021	They knew God but did not praise and thank him for being God . Instead , their thoughts were total nonsense , and their misguided minds were plunged into darkness .
45001022	While claiming to be wise , they became fools .
45001023	They exchanged the glory of the immortal God for statues that looked like mortal humans , birds , animals , and snakes .
45001024	For this reason God allowed their lusts to control them . As a result , they dishonor their bodies by sexual perversion with each other .
45001025	These people have exchanged God’s truth for a lie . So they have become ungodly and serve what is created rather than the Creator , who is blessed forever . Amen !
45001026	For this reason God allowed their shameful passions to control them . Their women have exchanged natural sexual relations for unnatural ones .
45001027	Likewise , their men have given up natural sexual relations with women and burn with lust for each other . Men commit indecent acts with men , so they experience among themselves the punishment they deserve for their perversion .
45001028	And because they thought it was worthless to acknowledge God , God allowed their own immoral minds to control them . So they do these indecent things .
45001029	Their lives are filled with of all kinds of sexual sins , wickedness , and greed . They are mean . They are filled with envy , murder , quarreling , deceit , and viciousness . They are gossips ,
45001030	slanderers , haters of God , haughty , arrogant , and boastful . They think up new ways to be cruel . They don’t obey their parents ,
45001031	don’t have any sense , don’t keep promises , and don’t show love to their own families or mercy to others .
45001032	Although they know God’s judgment that those who do such things deserve to die , they not only do these things but also approve of others who do them .
45002001	No matter who you are , if you judge anyone , you have no excuse . When you judge another person , you condemn yourself , since you , the judge , do the same things .
45002002	We know that God’s judgment is right when he condemns people for doing these things .
45002003	When you judge people for doing these things but then do them yourself , do you think you will escape God’s judgment ?
45002004	Do you have contempt for God , who is very kind to you , puts up with you , and deals patiently with you ? Don’t you realize that it is God’s kindness that is trying to lead you to him and change the way you think and act ?
45002005	Since you are stubborn and don’t want to change the way you think and act , you are adding to the anger that God will have against you on that day when God vents his anger . At that time God will reveal that his decisions are fair .
45002006	He will pay all people back for what they have done .
45002007	He will give everlasting life to those who search for glory , honor , and immortality by persisting in doing what is good . But he will bring
45002008	anger and fury on those who , in selfish pride , refuse to believe the truth and who follow what is wrong .
45002009	There will be suffering and distress for every person who does evil , for Jews first and Greeks as well .
45002010	But there will be glory , honor , and peace for every person who does what is good , for Jews first and Greeks as well .
45002011	God does not play favorites .
45002012	Here’s the reason : Whoever sins without having laws from God will still be condemned to destruction . And whoever has laws from God and still sins will be judged by them .
45002013	People who merely listen to laws from God don’t have God’s approval . Rather , people who do what those laws demand will have God’s approval .
45002014	For example , whenever non-Jews who don’t have laws from God do by nature the things that Moses’ Teachings contain , they are a law to themselves even though they don’t have any laws from God .
45002015	They show that some requirements found in Moses’ Teachings are written in their hearts . Their consciences speak to them . Their thoughts accuse them on one occasion and defend them on another .
45002016	This happens as they face the day when God , through Christ Jesus , will judge people’s secret thoughts . He will use the Good News that I am spreading to make that judgment .
45002017	You call yourself a Jew , rely on the laws in Moses’ Teachings , brag about your God ,
45002018	know what he wants , and distinguish right from wrong because you have been taught Moses’ Teachings .
45002019	You are confident that you are a guide for the blind , a light to those in the dark ,
45002020	an instructor of ignorant people , and a teacher of children because you have the full content of knowledge and truth in Moses’ Teachings .
45002021	As you teach others , are you failing to teach yourself ? As you preach against stealing , are you stealing ?
45002022	As you tell others not to commit adultery , are you committing adultery ? As you treat idols with disgust , are you robbing temples ?
45002023	As you brag about the laws in Moses’ Teachings , are you dishonoring God by ignoring Moses’ Teachings ?
45002024	As Scripture says , “ God’s name is cursed among the nations because of you . ”
45002025	For example , circumcision is valuable if you follow Moses’ laws . If you don’t follow those laws , your circumcision amounts to uncircumcision .
45002026	So if a man does what Moses’ Teachings demand , won’t he be considered circumcised even if he is uncircumcised ?
45002027	The uncircumcised man who carries out what Moses’ Teachings say will condemn you for not following them . He will condemn you in spite of the fact that you are circumcised and have Moses’ Teachings in writing .
45002028	A person is not a Jew because of his appearance , nor is circumcision a matter of how the body looks .
45002029	Rather , a person is a Jew inwardly , and circumcision is something that happens in a person’s heart . Circumcision is spiritual , not just a written rule . That person’s praise will come from God , not from people .
45003001	Is there any advantage , then , in being a Jew ? Or is there any value in being circumcised ?
45003002	There are all kinds of advantages . First of all , God entrusted them with his word .
45003003	What if some of them were unfaithful ? Can their unfaithfulness cancel God’s faithfulness ?
45003004	That would be unthinkable ! God is honest , and everyone else is a liar , as Scripture says , “ So you hand down justice when you speak , and you win your case in court . ”
45003005	But if what we do wrong shows that God is fair , what should we say ? Is God unfair when he vents his anger on us ? ( I’m arguing the way humans would . )
45003006	That’s unthinkable ! Otherwise , how would God be able to judge the world ?
45003007	If my lie increases the glory that God receives by showing that God is truthful , why am I still judged as a sinner ?
45003008	Or can we say , “ Let’s do evil so that good will come from it ” ? Some slander us and claim that this is what we say . They are condemned , and that’s what they deserve .
45003009	What , then , is the situation ? Do we have any advantage ? Not at all . We have already accused everyone ( both Jews and Greeks ) of being under the power of sin ,
45003010	as Scripture says , “ Not one person has God’s approval .
45003011	No one has understanding . No one searches for God .
45003012	Everyone has turned away . Together they have become rotten to the core . No one does anything good , not even one person .
45003013	Their throats are open graves . Their tongues practice deception . Their lips hide the venom of poisonous snakes .
45003014	Their mouths are full of curses and bitter resentment .
45003015	They run quickly to murder people .
45003016	There is ruin and suffering wherever they go .
45003017	They have not learned to live in peace .
45003018	They are not terrified of God . ”
45003019	We know that whatever is in Moses’ Teachings applies to everyone under their influence , and no one can say a thing . The whole world is brought under the judgment of God .
45003020	Not one person can have God’s approval by following Moses’ Teachings . Moses’ Teachings show what sin is .
45003021	Now , the way to receive God’s approval has been made plain in a way other than Moses’ Teachings . Moses’ Teachings and the Prophets tell us this .
45003022	Everyone who believes has God’s approval through faith in Jesus Christ . There is no difference between people .
45003023	Because all people have sinned , they have fallen short of God’s glory .
45003024	They receive God’s approval freely by an act of his kindness through the price Christ Jesus paid to set us free from sin .
45003025	God showed that Christ is the throne of mercy where God’s approval is given through faith in Christ’s blood . In his patience God waited to deal with sins committed in the past .
45003026	He waited so that he could display his approval at the present time . This shows that he is a God of justice , a God who approves of people who believe in Jesus .
45003027	So , do we have anything to brag about ? Bragging has been eliminated . On what basis was it eliminated ? On the basis of our own efforts ? No , indeed ! Rather , it is eliminated on the basis of faith .
45003028	We conclude that a person has God’s approval because of faith , not because of his own efforts .
45003029	Is God only the God of the Jews ? Isn’t he also the God of people who are not Jewish ? Certainly , he is ,
45003030	since it is the same God who approves circumcised people because of faith and uncircumcised people through this same faith .
45003031	Are we abolishing Moses’ Teachings by this faith ? That’s unthinkable ! Rather , we are supporting Moses’ Teachings .
45004001	What can we say that we have discovered about our ancestor Abraham ?
45004002	If Abraham had God’s approval because of something he did , he would have had a reason to brag . But he could not brag to God about it .
45004003	What does Scripture say ? “ Abraham believed God , and that faith was regarded by God to be his approval of Abraham . ”
45004004	When people work , their pay is not regarded as a gift but something they have earned .
45004005	However , when people don’t work but believe God , the one who approves ungodly people , their faith is regarded as God’s approval .
45004006	David says the same thing when he speaks this blessing : God approves of a person without that person’s earning it . David said ,
45004007	“ Blessed are those whose disobedience is forgivenand whose sins are pardoned .
45004008	Blessed is the person whom the Lord never considers sinful . ”
45004009	Are only the circumcised people blessed , or are uncircumcised people blessed as well ? We say , “ Abraham’s faith was regarded as God’s approval of him . ”
45004010	How was his faith regarded as God’s approval ? Was he circumcised or was he uncircumcised at that time ? He had not been circumcised .
45004011	Abraham’s faith was regarded as God’s approval while he was still uncircumcised . The mark of circumcision is the seal of that approval . Therefore , he is the father of every believer who is not circumcised , and their faith , too , is regarded as God’s approval of them .
45004012	He is also the father of those who not only are circumcised but also are following in the footsteps of his faith . Our father Abraham had that faith before he was circumcised .
45004013	So it was not by obeying Moses’ Teachings that Abraham or his descendants received the promise that he would inherit the world . Rather , it was through God’s approval of his faith .
45004014	If those who obey Moses’ Teachings are the heirs , then faith is useless and the promise is worthless .
45004015	The laws in Moses’ Teachings bring about anger . But where laws don’t exist , they can’t be broken .
45004016	Therefore , the promise is based on faith so that it can be a gift . Consequently , the promise is guaranteed for every descendant , not only for those who are descendants by obeying Moses’ Teachings but also for those who are descendants by believing as Abraham did . He is the father of all of us ,
45004017	as Scripture says : “ I have made you a father of many nations . ” Abraham believed when he stood in the presence of the God who gives life to dead people and calls into existence nations that don’t even exist .
45004018	When there was nothing left to hope for , Abraham still hoped and believed . As a result , he became a father of many nations , as he had been told : “ That is how many descendants you will have . ”
45004019	Abraham didn’t weaken . Through faith he regarded the facts : His body was already as good as dead now that he was about a hundred years old , and Sarah was unable to have children .
45004020	He didn’t doubt God’s promise out of a lack of faith . Instead , giving honor to God for the promise , he became strong because of faith
45004021	and was absolutely confident that God would do what he promised .
45004022	That is why his faith was regarded as God’s approval of him .
45004023	But the words “ his faith was regarded as God’s approval of him ” were written not only for him
45004024	but also for us . Our faith will be regarded as God’s approval of us who believe in the one who brought Jesus , our Lord , back to life .
45004025	Jesus , our Lord , was handed over to death because of our failures and was brought back to life so that we could receive God’s approval .
45005001	Now that we have God’s approval because of faith , we have peace with God because of what our Lord Jesus Christ has done .
45005002	Through Christ we can approach God and stand in his favor . So we brag because of our confidence that we will receive glory from God .
45005003	But that’s not all . We also brag when we are suffering . We know that suffering creates endurance ,
45005004	endurance creates character , and character creates confidence .
45005005	We’re not ashamed to have this confidence , because God’s love has been poured into our hearts by the Holy Spirit , who has been given to us .
45005006	Look at it this way : At the right time , while we were still helpless , Christ died for ungodly people .
45005007	Finding someone who would die for a godly person is rare . Maybe someone would have the courage to die for a good person .
45005008	Christ died for us while we were still sinners . This demonstrates God’s love for us .
45005009	Since Christ’s blood has now given us God’s approval , we are even more certain that Christ will save us from God’s anger .
45005010	If the death of his Son restored our relationship with God while we were still his enemies , we are even more certain that , because of this restored relationship , the life his Son lived will save us .
45005011	In addition , our Lord Jesus Christ lets us continue to brag about God . After all , it is through Christ that we now have this restored relationship with God .
45005012	So sin came into the world through one person , and death came through sin . Death spread to everyone , because everyone sinned .
45005013	Sin was in the world before there were any laws . But no record of sin can be kept when there are no laws .
45005014	Yet , death ruled from the time of Adam to the time of Moses , even over those who did not sin in the same way Adam did when he disobeyed . Adam is an image of the one who would come .
45005015	There is no comparison between God’s gift and Adam’s failure . If humanity died as the result of one person’s failure , it is certainly true that God’s kindness and the gift given through the kindness of one person , Jesus Christ , have been showered on humanity .
45005016	There is also no comparison between God’s gift and the one who sinned . The verdict which followed one person’s failure condemned everyone . But , even after many failures , the gift brought God’s approval .
45005017	It is certain that death ruled because of one person’s failure . It’s even more certain that those who receive God’s overflowing kindness and the gift of his approval will rule in life because of one person , Jesus Christ .
45005018	Therefore , everyone was condemned through one failure , and everyone received God’s life-giving approval through one verdict .
45005019	Clearly , through one person’s disobedience humanity became sinful , and through one person’s obedience humanity will receive God’s approval .
45005020	Rules were added to increase the failure . But where sin increased , God’s kindness increased even more .
45005021	As sin ruled by bringing death , God’s kindness would rule by bringing us his approval . This results in our living forever because of Jesus Christ our Lord .
45006001	What should we say then ? Should we continue to sin so that God’s kindness will increase ?
45006002	That’s unthinkable ! As far as sin is concerned , we have died . So how can we still live under sin’s influence ?
45006003	Don’t you know that all of us who were baptized into Christ Jesus were baptized into his death ?
45006004	When we were baptized into his death , we were placed into the tomb with him . As Christ was brought back from death to life by the glorious power of the Father , so we , too , should live a new kind of life .
45006005	If we’ve become united with him in a death like his , certainly we will also be united with him when we come back to life as he did .
45006006	We know that the person we used to be was crucified with him to put an end to sin in our bodies . Because of this we are no longer slaves to sin .
45006007	The person who has died has been freed from sin .
45006008	If we have died with Christ , we believe that we will also live with him .
45006009	We know that Christ , who was brought back to life , will never die again . Death no longer has any power over him .
45006010	When he died , he died once and for all to sin’s power . But now he lives , and he lives for God .
45006011	So consider yourselves dead to sin’s power but living for God in the power Christ Jesus gives you .
45006012	Therefore , never let sin rule your physical body so that you obey its desires .
45006013	Never offer any part of your body to sin’s power . No part of your body should ever be used to do any ungodly thing . Instead , offer yourselves to God as people who have come back from death and are now alive . Offer all the parts of your body to God . Use them to do everything that God approves of .
45006014	Certainly , sin shouldn’t have power over you because you’re not controlled by laws , but by God’s favor .
45006015	Then what is the implication ? Should we sin because we are not controlled by laws but are controlled by God’s favor ? That’s unthinkable !
45006016	Don’t you know that if you offer to be someone’s slave , you must obey that master ? Either your master is sin , or your master is obedience . Letting sin be your master leads to death . Letting obedience be your master leads to God’s approval .
45006017	You were slaves to sin . But I thank God that you have become wholeheartedly obedient to the teachings which you were given .
45006018	Freed from sin , you were made slaves who do what God approves of .
45006019	I’m speaking in a human way because of the weakness of your corrupt nature . Clearly , you once offered all the parts of your body as slaves to sexual perversion and disobedience . This led you to live disobedient lives . Now , in the same way , offer all the parts of your body as slaves that do what God approves of . This leads you to live holy lives .
45006020	When you were slaves to sin , you were free from doing what God approves of .
45006021	What did you gain by doing those things ? You’re ashamed of what you used to do because it ended in death .
45006022	Now you have been freed from sin and have become God’s slaves . This results in a holy life and , finally , in everlasting life .
45006023	The reward for sin is death , but the gift that God freely gives is everlasting life found in Christ Jesus our Lord .
45007001	Don’t you realize , brothers and sisters , that laws have power over people only as long as they are alive ? ( I’m speaking to people who are familiar with Moses’ Teachings . )
45007002	For example , a married woman is bound by law to her husband as long as he is alive . But if her husband dies , that marriage law is no longer in effect for her .
45007003	So if she marries another man while her husband is still alive , she will be called an adulterer . But if her husband dies , she is free from this law , so she is not committing adultery if she marries another man .
45007004	In the same way , brothers and sisters , you have died to the laws in Moses’ Teachings through Christ’s body . You belong to someone else , the one who was brought back to life . As a result , we can do what God wants .
45007005	While we were living under the influence of our corrupt nature , sinful passions were at work throughout our bodies . Stirred up by Moses’ laws , they did things that result in death .
45007006	But now we have died to those laws that bound us . God has broken their effect on us so that we are serving in a new spiritual way , not in an old way dictated by written words .
45007007	What should we say , then ? Are Moses’ laws sinful ? That’s unthinkable ! In fact , I wouldn’t have recognized sin if those laws hadn’t shown it to me . For example , I wouldn’t have known that some desires are sinful if Moses’ Teachings hadn’t said , “ Never have wrong desires . ”
45007008	But sin took the opportunity provided by this commandment and made me have all kinds of wrong desires . Clearly , without laws sin is dead .
45007009	At one time I was alive without any laws . But when this commandment came , sin became alive
45007010	and I died . I found that the commandment which was intended to bring me life actually brought me death .
45007011	Sin , taking the opportunity provided by this commandment , deceived me and then killed me .
45007012	So Moses’ Teachings are holy , and the commandment is holy , right , and good .
45007013	Now , did something good cause my death ? That’s unthinkable ! Rather , my death was caused by sin so that sin would be recognized for what it is . Through a commandment sin became more sinful than ever .
45007014	I know that God’s standards are spiritual , but I have a corrupt nature , sold as a slave to sin .
45007015	I don’t realize what I’m doing . I don’t do what I want to do . Instead , I do what I hate .
45007016	I don’t do what I want to do , but I agree that God’s standards are good .
45007017	So I am no longer the one who is doing the things I hate , but sin that lives in me is doing them .
45007018	I know that nothing good lives in me ; that is , nothing good lives in my corrupt nature . Although I have the desire to do what is right , I don’t do it .
45007019	I don’t do the good I want to do . Instead , I do the evil that I don’t want to do .
45007020	Now , when I do what I don’t want to do , I am no longer the one who is doing it . Sin that lives in me is doing it .
45007021	So I’ve discovered this truth : Evil is present with me even when I want to do what God’s standards say is good .
45007022	I take pleasure in God’s standards in my inner being .
45007023	However , I see a different standard at work throughout my body . It is at war with the standards my mind sets and tries to take me captive to sin’s standards which still exist throughout my body .
45007024	What a miserable person I am ! Who will rescue me from my dying body ?
45007025	I thank God that our Lord Jesus Christ rescues me ! So I am obedient to God’s standards with my mind , but I am obedient to sin’s standards with my corrupt nature .
45008001	So those who are believers in Christ Jesus can no longer be condemned .
45008002	The standards of the Spirit , who gives life through Christ Jesus , have set you free from the standards of sin and death .
45008003	It is impossible to do what God’s standards demand because of the weakness our human nature has . But God sent his Son to have a human nature as sinners have and to pay for sin . That way God condemned sin in our corrupt nature .
45008004	Therefore , we , who do not live by our corrupt nature but by our spiritual nature , are able to meet God’s standards .
45008005	Those who live by the corrupt nature have the corrupt nature’s attitude . But those who live by the spiritual nature have the spiritual nature’s attitude .
45008006	The corrupt nature’s attitude leads to death . But the spiritual nature’s attitude leads to life and peace .
45008007	This is so because the corrupt nature has a hostile attitude toward God . It refuses to place itself under the authority of God’s standards because it can’t .
45008008	Those who are under the control of the corrupt nature can’t please God .
45008009	But if God’s Spirit lives in you , you are under the control of your spiritual nature , not your corrupt nature . Whoever doesn’t have the Spirit of Christ doesn’t belong to him .
45008010	However , if Christ lives in you , your bodies are dead because of sin , but your spirits are alive because you have God’s approval .
45008011	Does the Spirit of the one who brought Jesus back to life live in you ? Then the one who brought Christ back to life will also make your mortal bodies alive by his Spirit who lives in you .
45008012	So , brothers and sisters , we have no obligation to live the way our corrupt nature wants us to live .
45008013	If you live by your corrupt nature , you are going to die . But if you use your spiritual nature to put to death the evil activities of the body , you will live .
45008014	Certainly , all who are guided by God’s Spirit are God’s children .
45008015	You haven’t received the spirit of slaves that leads you into fear again . Instead , you have received the spirit of God’s adopted children by which we call out , “ Abba ! Father ! ”
45008016	The Spirit himself testifies with our spirit that we are God’s children .
45008017	If we are his children , we are also God’s heirs . If we share in Christ’s suffering in order to share his glory , we are heirs together with him .
45008018	I consider our present sufferings insignificant compared to the glory that will soon be revealed to us .
45008019	All creation is eagerly waiting for God to reveal who his children are .
45008020	Creation was subjected to frustration but not by its own choice . The one who subjected it to frustration did so in the hope
45008021	that it would also be set free from slavery to decay in order to share the glorious freedom that the children of God will have .
45008022	We know that all creation has been groaning with the pains of childbirth up to the present time .
45008023	However , not only creation groans . We , who have the Spirit as the first of God’s gifts , also groan inwardly . We groan as we eagerly wait for our adoption , the freeing of our bodies from sin .
45008024	We were saved with this hope in mind . If we hope for something we already see , it’s not really hope . Who hopes for what can be seen ?
45008025	But if we hope for what we don’t see , we eagerly wait for it with perseverance .
45008026	At the same time the Spirit also helps us in our weakness , because we don’t know how to pray for what we need . But the Spirit intercedes along with our groans that cannot be expressed in words .
45008027	The one who searches our hearts knows what the Spirit has in mind . The Spirit intercedes for God’s people the way God wants him to .
45008028	We know that all things work together for the good of those who love God—those whom he has called according to his plan .
45008029	This is true because he already knew his people and had already appointed them to have the same form as the image of his Son . Therefore , his Son is the firstborn among many children .
45008030	He also called those whom he had already appointed . He approved of those whom he had called , and he gave glory to those whom he had approved of .
45008031	What can we say about all of this ? If God is for us , who can be against us ?
45008032	God didn’t spare his own Son but handed him over to death for all of us . So he will also give us everything along with him .
45008033	Who will accuse those whom God has chosen ? God has approved of them .
45008034	Who will condemn them ? Christ has died , and more importantly , he was brought back to life . Christ has the highest position in heaven . Christ also intercedes for us .
45008035	What will separate us from the love Christ has for us ? Can trouble , distress , persecution , hunger , nakedness , danger , or violent death separate us from his love ?
45008036	As Scripture says : “ We are being killed all day long because of you . We are thought of as sheep to be slaughtered . ”
45008037	The one who loves us gives us an overwhelming victory in all these difficulties .
45008038	I am convinced that nothing can ever separate us from God’s love which Christ Jesus our Lord shows us . We can’t be separated by death or life , by angels or rulers , by anything in the present or anything in the future , by forces
45008039	or powers in the world above or in the world below , or by anything else in creation .
45009001	As a Christian , I’m telling you the truth . I’m not lying . The Holy Spirit , along with my own thoughts , supports me in this .
45009002	I have deep sorrow and endless heartache .
45009003	I wish I could be condemned and cut off from Christ for the sake of others who , like me , are Jewish by birth .
45009004	They are Israelites , God’s adopted children . They have the Lord’s glory , the pledges , Moses’ Teachings , the true worship , and the promises .
45009005	The Messiah is descended from their ancestors according to his human nature . The Messiah is God over everything , forever blessed . Amen .
45009006	Now it is not as though God’s word has failed . Clearly , not everyone descended from Israel is part of Israel
45009007	or a descendant of Abraham . However , as Scripture says , “ Through Isaac your descendants will carry on your name . ”
45009008	This means that children born by natural descent from Abraham are not necessarily God’s children . Instead , children born by the promise are considered Abraham’s descendants .
45009009	For example , this is what the promise said , “ I will come back at the right time , and Sarah will have a son . ”
45009010	The same thing happened to Rebekah . Rebekah became pregnant by our ancestor Isaac .
45009011	Before the children had been born or had done anything good or bad , Rebekah was told that the older child would serve the younger one . This was said to Rebekah so that God’s plan would remain a matter of his choice ,
45009012	a choice based on God’s call and not on anything people do .
45009013	The Scriptures say , “ I loved Jacob , but I hated Esau . ”
45009014	What can we say—that God is unfair ? That’s unthinkable !
45009015	For example , God said to Moses , “ I will be kind to anyone I want to . I will be merciful to anyone I want to . ”
45009016	Therefore , God’s choice does not depend on a person’s desire or effort , but on God’s mercy .
45009017	For example , Scripture says to Pharaoh , “ I put you here for this reason : to demonstrate my power through you and to spread my name throughout the earth . ”
45009018	Therefore , if God wants to be kind to anyone , he will be . If he wants to make someone stubborn , he will .
45009019	You may ask me , “ Why does God still find fault with anyone ? Who can resist whatever God wants to do ? ”
45009020	Who do you think you are to talk back to God like that ? Can an object that was made say to its maker , “ Why did you make me like this ? ”
45009021	A potter has the right to do whatever he wants with his clay . He can make something for a special occasion or something for everyday use from the same lump of clay .
45009022	If God wants to demonstrate his anger and reveal his power , he can do it . But can’t he be extremely patient with people who are objects of his anger because they are headed for destruction ?
45009023	Can’t God also reveal the riches of his glory to people who are objects of his mercy and who he had already prepared for glory ?
45009024	This is what God did for us whom he called—whether we are Jews or not .
45009025	As God says in Hosea : “ Those who are not my peopleI will call my people . Those who are not lovedI will call my loved ones .
45009026	Wherever they were told , ‘ You are not my people , ’they will be called children of the living God . ”
45009027	Isaiah also says about Israel : “ Although the descendants of Israel areas numerous as the grains of sand on the seashore , only a few will be saved .
45009028	The Lord will carry out his sentence on the land , completely and decisively . ”
45009029	This is what Isaiah predicted : “ If the Lord of Armies hadn’t left us some descendants , we would have been like Sodom and Gomorrah . ”
45009030	So what can we say ? We can say that non-Jewish people who were not trying to gain God’s approval won his approval , an approval based on faith .
45009031	The people of Israel tried to gain God’s approval by obeying Moses’ Teachings , but they did not reach their goal .
45009032	Why ? They didn’t rely on faith to gain God’s approval , but they relied on their own efforts . They stumbled over the rock that trips people .
45009033	As Scripture says , “ I am placing a rock in Zion that people trip over , a large rock that people find offensive . Whoever believes in him will not be ashamed . ”
45010001	Brothers and sisters , my heart’s desire and prayer to God on behalf of the Jewish people is that they would be saved .
45010002	I can assure you that they are deeply devoted to God , but they are misguided .
45010003	They don’t understand how to receive God’s approval . So they try to set up their own way to get it , and they have not accepted God’s way for receiving his approval .
45010004	Christ is the fulfillment of Moses’ Teachings so that everyone who has faith may receive God’s approval .
45010005	Moses writes about receiving God’s approval by following his laws . He says , “ The person who obeys laws will live because of the laws he obeys . ”
45010006	However , Scripture says about God’s approval which is based on faith , “ Don’t ask yourself who will go up to heaven , ” ( that is , to bring Christ down ) .
45010007	“ Don’t ask who will go down into the depths , ” ( that is , to bring Christ back from the dead ) .
45010008	However , what else does it say ? “ This message is near you . It’s in your mouth and in your heart . ” This is the message of faith that we spread .
45010009	If you declare that Jesus is Lord , and believe that God brought him back to life , you will be saved .
45010010	By believing you receive God’s approval , and by declaring your faith you are saved .
45010011	Scripture says , “ Whoever believes in him will not be ashamed . ”
45010012	There is no difference between Jews and Greeks . They all have the same Lord , who gives his riches to everyone who prays to him .
45010013	So then , “ Whoever prays in the name of the Lord will be saved . ”
45010014	But how can people pray to him if they have not believed in him ? How can they believe in him if they have not heard his message ? How can they hear if no one tells the Good News ?
45010015	How can people tell the Good News if no one sends them ? As Scripture says , “ How beautiful are the feet of the messengers who announce the Good News . ”
45010016	But not everyone has believed the Good News . Isaiah asks , “ Lord , who has believed our message ? ”
45010017	So faith comes from hearing the message , and the message that is heard is what Christ spoke .
45010018	But I ask , “ Didn’t they hear that message ? ” Certainly they did ! “ The voice of the messengers has gone out into the whole world and their words to the ends of the earth . ”
45010019	Again I ask , “ Didn’t Israel understand that message ? ” Moses was the first to say , “ I will make you jealous of people who are not a nation . I will make you angry about a nation that doesn’t understand . ”
45010020	Isaiah said very boldly , “ I was found by those who weren’t looking for me . I was revealed to those who weren’t asking for me . ”
45010021	Then Isaiah said about Israel , “ All day long I have stretched out my hands to disobedient and rebellious people . ”
45011001	So I ask , “ Has God rejected his people Israel ? ” That’s unthinkable ! Consider this . I’m an Israelite myself , a descendant of Abraham from the tribe of Benjamin .
45011002	God has not rejected his people whom he knew long ago . Don’t you know what Elijah says in the Scripture passage when he complains to God about Israel ? He says ,
45011003	“ Lord , they’ve killed your prophets and torn down your altars . I’m the only one left , and they’re trying to take my life . ” But what was God’s reply ? God said , “ I’ve kept 7,000 people for myself who have not knelt to worship Baal . ”
45011005	So , as there were then , there are now a few left that God has chosen by his kindness .
45011006	If they were chosen by God’s kindness , they weren’t chosen because of anything they did . Otherwise , God’s kindness wouldn’t be kindness .
45011007	So what does all this mean ? It means that Israel has never achieved what it has been striving for . However , those whom God has chosen have achieved it . The minds of the rest of Israel were closed ,
45011008	as Scripture says , “ To this day God has given them a spirit of deep sleep . Their eyes don’t see , and their ears don’t hear ! ”
45011009	And David says , “ Let the table set for them become a trap and a net , a snare and a punishment for them .
45011010	Let their vision become clouded so that they cannot see . Let them carry back-breaking burdens forever . ”
45011011	So I ask , “ Has Israel stumbled so badly that it can’t get up again ? ” That’s unthinkable ! By Israel’s failure , salvation has come to people who are not Jewish to make the Jewish people jealous .
45011012	The fall of the Jewish people made the world spiritually rich . Their failure made people who are not Jewish spiritually rich . So the inclusion of Jewish people will make the world even richer .
45011013	Now , I speak to you who are not Jewish . As long as I am an apostle sent to people who are not Jewish , I bring honor to my ministry .
45011014	Perhaps I can make my people jealous and save some of them .
45011015	If Israel’s rejection means that the world has been brought back to God , what does Israel’s acceptance mean ? It means that Israel has come back to life .
45011016	If the first handful of dough is holy , the whole batch of dough is holy . If the root is holy , the branches are holy .
45011017	But some of the olive branches have been broken off , and you , a wild olive branch , have been grafted in their place . You get your nourishment from the roots of the olive tree .
45011018	So don’t brag about being better than the other branches . If you brag , remember that you don’t support the root , the root supports you .
45011019	“ Well , ” you say , “ Branches were cut off so that I could be grafted onto the tree . ”
45011020	That’s right ! They were broken off because they didn’t believe , but you remain on the tree because you do believe . Don’t feel arrogant , but be afraid .
45011021	If God didn’t spare the natural branches , he won’t spare you , either .
45011022	Look at how kind and how severe God can be . He is severe to those who fell , but kind to you if you continue to hold on to his kindness . Otherwise , you , too , will be cut off from the tree .
45011023	If Jewish people do not continue in their unbelief , they will be grafted onto the tree again , because God is able to do that .
45011024	In spite of the fact that you have been cut from a wild olive tree , you have been grafted onto a cultivated one . So wouldn’t it be easier for these natural branches to be grafted onto the olive tree they belong to ?
45011025	Brothers and sisters , I want you to understand this mystery so that you won’t become arrogant . The minds of some Israelites have become closed until all of God’s non-Jewish people are included .
45011026	In this way Israel as a whole will be saved , as Scripture says , “ The Savior will come from Zion . He will remove godlessness from Jacob .
45011027	My promise to them will be fulfilledwhen I take away their sins . ”
45011028	The Good News made the Jewish people enemies because of you . But by God’s choice they are loved because of their ancestors .
45011029	God never changes his mind when he gives gifts or when he calls someone .
45011030	In the past , you disobeyed God . But now God has been merciful to you because of the disobedience of the Jewish people .
45011031	In the same way , the Jewish people have also disobeyed so that God may be merciful to them as he was to you .
45011032	God has placed all people into the prison of their own disobedience so that he could be merciful to all people .
45011033	God’s riches , wisdom , and knowledge are so deepthat it is impossible to explain his decisionsor to understand his ways .
45011034	“ Who knows how the Lord thinks ? Who can become his adviser ? ”
45011035	Who gave the Lord somethingwhich the Lord must pay back ?
45011036	Everything is from him and by him and for him . Glory belongs to him forever ! Amen !
45012001	Brothers and sisters , because of God’s compassion toward us , I encourage you to offer your bodies as living sacrifices , dedicated to God and pleasing to him . This kind of worship is appropriate for you .
45012002	Don’t become like the people of this world . Instead , change the way you think . Then you will always be able to determine what God really wants—what is good , pleasing , and perfect .
45012003	Because of the kindness that God has shown me , I ask you not to think of yourselves more highly than you should . Instead , your thoughts should lead you to use good judgment based on what God has given each of you as believers .
45012004	Our bodies have many parts , but these parts don’t all do the same thing .
45012005	In the same way , even though we are many individuals , Christ makes us one body and individuals who are connected to each other .
45012006	God in his kindness gave each of us different gifts . If your gift is speaking God’s word , make sure what you say agrees with the Christian faith .
45012007	If your gift is serving , then devote yourself to serving . If it is teaching , devote yourself to teaching .
45012008	If it is encouraging others , devote yourself to giving encouragement . If it is sharing , be generous . If it is leadership , lead enthusiastically . If it is helping people in need , help them cheerfully .
45012009	Love sincerely . Hate evil . Hold on to what is good .
45012010	Be devoted to each other like a loving family . Excel in showing respect for each other .
45012011	Don’t be lazy in showing your devotion . Use your energy to serve the Lord .
45012012	Be happy in your confidence , be patient in trouble , and pray continually .
45012013	Share what you have with God’s people who are in need . Be hospitable .
45012014	Bless those who persecute you . Bless them , and don’t curse them .
45012015	Be happy with those who are happy . Be sad with those who are sad .
45012016	Live in harmony with each other . Don’t be arrogant , but be friendly to humble people . Don’t think that you are smarter than you really are .
45012017	Don’t pay people back with evil for the evil they do to you . Focus your thoughts on those things that are considered noble .
45012018	As much as it is possible , live in peace with everyone .
45012019	Don’t take revenge , dear friends . Instead , let God’s anger take care of it . After all , Scripture says , “ I alone have the right to take revenge . I will pay back , says the Lord . ”
45012020	But , “ If your enemy is hungry , feed him . If he is thirsty , give him a drink . If you do this , you will make him feel guilty and ashamed . ”
45012021	Don’t let evil conquer you , but conquer evil with good .
45013001	Every person should obey the government in power . No government would exist if it hadn’t been established by God . The governments which exist have been put in place by God .
45013002	Therefore , whoever resists the government opposes what God has established . Those who resist will bring punishment on themselves .
45013003	People who do what is right don’t have to be afraid of the government . But people who do what is wrong should be afraid of it . Would you like to live without being afraid of the government ? Do what is right , and it will praise you .
45013004	The government is God’s servant working for your good . But if you do what is wrong , you should be afraid . The government has the right to carry out the death sentence . It is God’s servant , an avenger to execute God’s anger on anyone who does what is wrong .
45013005	Therefore , it is necessary for you to obey , not only because you’re afraid of God’s anger but also because of your own conscience .
45013006	That is also why you pay your taxes . People in the government are God’s servants while they do the work he has given them .
45013007	Pay everyone whatever you owe them . If you owe taxes , pay them . If you owe tolls , pay them . If you owe someone respect , respect that person . If you owe someone honor , honor that person .
45013008	Pay your debts as they come due . However , one debt you can never finish paying is the debt of love that you owe each other . The one who loves another person has fulfilled Moses’ Teachings .
45013009	The commandments , “ Never commit adultery ; never murder ; never steal ; never have wrong desires , ” and every other commandment are summed up in this statement : “ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ”
45013010	Love never does anything that is harmful to a neighbor . Therefore , love fulfills Moses’ Teachings .
45013011	You know the times in which we are living . It’s time for you to wake up . Our salvation is nearer now than when we first became believers .
45013012	The night is almost over , and the day is near . So we should get rid of the things that belong to the dark and take up the weapons that belong to the light .
45013013	We should live decently , as people who live in the light of day . Wild parties , drunkenness , sexual immorality , promiscuity , rivalry , and jealousy cannot be part of our lives .
45013014	Instead , live like the Lord Jesus Christ did , and forget about satisfying the desires of your sinful nature .
45014001	Welcome people who are weak in faith , but don’t get into an argument over differences of opinion .
45014002	Some people believe that they can eat all kinds of food . Other people with weak faith believe that they can eat only vegetables .
45014003	People who eat all foods should not despise people who eat only vegetables . In the same way , the vegetarians should not criticize people who eat all foods , because God has accepted those people .
45014004	Who are you to criticize someone else’s servant ? The Lord will determine whether his servant has been successful . The servant will be successful because the Lord makes him successful .
45014005	One person decides that one day is holier than another . Another person decides that all days are the same . Every person must make his own decision .
45014006	When people observe a special day , they observe it to honor the Lord . When people eat all kinds of foods , they honor the Lord as they eat , since they give thanks to God . Vegetarians also honor the Lord when they eat , and they , too , give thanks to God .
45014007	It’s clear that we don’t live to honor ourselves , and we don’t die to honor ourselves .
45014008	If we live , we honor the Lord , and if we die , we honor the Lord . So whether we live or die , we belong to the Lord .
45014009	For this reason Christ died and came back to life so that he would be the Lord of both the living and the dead .
45014010	Why do you criticize or despise other Christians ? Everyone will stand in front of God to be judged .
45014011	Scripture says , “ As certainly as I live , says the Lord , everyone will worship me , and everyone will praise God . ”
45014012	All of us will have to give an account of ourselves to God .
45014013	So let’s stop criticizing each other . Instead , you should decide never to do anything that would make other Christians have doubts or lose their faith .
45014014	The Lord Jesus has given me the knowledge and conviction that no food is unacceptable in and of itself . But it is unacceptable to a person who thinks it is .
45014015	So if what you eat hurts another Christian , you are no longer living by love . Don’t destroy anyone by what you eat . Christ died for that person .
45014016	Don’t allow anyone to say that what you consider good is evil .
45014017	God’s kingdom does not consist of what a person eats or drinks . Rather , God’s kingdom consists of God’s approval and peace , as well as the joy that the Holy Spirit gives .
45014018	The person who serves Christ with this in mind is pleasing to God and respected by people .
45014019	So let’s pursue those things which bring peace and which are good for each other .
45014020	Don’t ruin God’s work because of what you eat . All food is acceptable , but it’s wrong for a person to eat something if it causes someone else to have doubts .
45014021	The right thing to do is to avoid eating meat , drinking wine , or doing anything else that causes another Christian to have doubts .
45014022	So whatever you believe about these things , keep it between yourself and God . The person who does what he knows is right shouldn’t feel guilty . He is blessed .
45014023	But if a person has doubts and still eats , he is condemned because he didn’t act in faith . Anything that is not done in faith is sin .
45015001	So those of us who have a strong faith must be patient with the weaknesses of those whose faith is not so strong . We must not think only of ourselves .
45015002	We should all be concerned about our neighbor and the good things that will build his faith .
45015003	Christ did not think only of himself . Rather , as Scripture says , “ The insults of those who insult you have fallen on me . ”
45015004	Everything written long ago was written to teach us so that we would have confidence through the endurance and encouragement which the Scriptures give us .
45015005	May God , who gives you this endurance and encouragement , allow you to live in harmony with each other by following the example of Christ Jesus .
45015006	Then , having the same goal , you will praise the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
45015007	Therefore , accept each other in the same way that Christ accepted you . He did this to bring glory to God .
45015008	Let me explain . Christ became a servant for the Jewish people to reveal God’s truth . As a result , he fulfilled God’s promise to the ancestors of the Jewish people .
45015009	People who are not Jewish praise God for his mercy as well . This is what the Scriptures say , “ That is why I will give thanks to you among the nationsand I will sing praises to your name . ”
45015010	And Scripture says again , “ You nations , be happy together with his people ! ”
45015011	And again , “ Praise the Lord , all you nations ! Praise him , all you people of the world ! ”
45015012	Again , Isaiah says , “ There will be a root from Jesse . He will rise to rule the nations , and he will give the nations hope . ”
45015013	May God , the source of hope , fill you with joy and peace through your faith in him . Then you will overflow with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit .
45015014	I’m convinced , brothers and sisters , that you , too , are filled with goodness . I’m also convinced that you have all the knowledge you need and that you are able to instruct each other .
45015015	However , I’ve written you a letter , parts of which are rather bold , as a reminder to you . I’m doing this because God gave me the gift
45015016	to be a servant of Christ Jesus to people who are not Jewish . I serve as a priest by spreading the Good News of God . I do this in order that I might bring the nations to God as an acceptable offering , made holy by the Holy Spirit .
45015017	So Christ Jesus gives me the right to brag about what I’m doing for God .
45015018	I’m bold enough to tell you only what Christ has done through me to bring people who are not Jewish to obedience . By what I have said and done ,
45015019	by the power of miraculous and amazing signs , and by the power of God’s Spirit , I have finished spreading the Good News about Christ from Jerusalem to Illyricum .
45015020	My goal was to spread the Good News where the name of Christ was not known . I didn’t want to build on a foundation which others had laid .
45015021	As Scripture says , “ Those who were never told about him will see , and those who never heard will understand . ”
45015022	This is what has so often kept me from visiting you .
45015023	But now I have no new opportunities for work in this region . For many years I have wanted to visit you .
45015024	Now I am on my way to Spain , so I hope to see you when I come your way . After I have enjoyed your company for a while , I hope that you will support my trip to Spain .
45015025	Right now I’m going to Jerusalem to bring help to the Christians there .
45015026	Because the believers in Macedonia and Greece owe a debt to the Christians in Jerusalem , they have decided to take up a collection for the poor among the Christians in Jerusalem .
45015027	These Macedonians and Greeks have shared the spiritual wealth of the Christians in Jerusalem . So they are obligated to use their earthly wealth to help them .
45015028	When the collection is completed and I have officially turned the money over to the Christians in Jerusalem , I will visit you on my way to Spain .
45015029	I know that when I come to you I will bring the full blessing of Christ .
45015030	Brothers and sisters , I encourage you through our Lord Jesus Christ and by the love that the Spirit creates , to join me in my struggle . Pray to God for me
45015031	that I will be rescued from those people in Judea who refuse to believe . Pray that God’s people in Jerusalem will accept the help I bring .
45015032	Also pray that by the will of God I may come to you with joy and be refreshed when I am with you .
45015033	May the God of peace be with you all . Amen .
45016001	With this letter I’m introducing Phoebe to you . She is our sister in the Christian faith and a deacon of the church in the city of Cenchrea .
45016002	Give her a Christian welcome that shows you are God’s holy people . Provide her with anything she may need , because she has provided help to many people , including me .
45016003	Greet Prisca and Aquila , my coworkers in the service of Christ Jesus .
45016004	They risked their lives to save me . I’m thankful to them and so are all the churches among the nations .
45016005	Also greet the church that meets in their house . Greet my dear friend Epaenetus . He was the first person in the province of Asia to become a believer in Christ .
45016006	Greet Mary , who has worked very hard for you .
45016007	Greet Andronicus and Junias , who are Jewish by birth like me . They are prisoners like me and are prominent among the apostles . They also were Christians before I was .
45016008	Greet Ampliatus my dear friend in the service of the Lord .
45016009	Greet Urbanus our coworker in the service of Christ , and my dear friend Stachys .
45016010	Greet Apelles , a true Christian . Greet those who belong to the family of Aristobulus .
45016011	Greet Herodion , who is Jewish by birth like me . Greet those Christians who belong to the family of Narcissus .
45016012	Greet Tryphaena and Tryphosa , who have worked hard for the Lord . Greet dear Persis , who has worked very hard for the Lord .
45016013	Greet Rufus , that outstanding Christian , and his mother , who has been a mother to me too .
45016014	Greet Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermes , Patrobas , Hermas , and the brothers and sisters who are with them .
45016015	Greet Philologus and Julia , Nereus , and his sister , and Olympas , and all God’s people who are with them .
45016016	Greet each other with a holy kiss . All the churches of Christ greet you .
45016017	Brothers and sisters , I urge you to watch out for those people who create divisions and who make others fall away from the Christian faith by teaching doctrine that is not the same as you have learned . Stay away from them .
45016018	People like these are not serving Christ our Lord . They are serving their own desires . By their smooth talk and flattering words they deceive unsuspecting people .
45016019	Everyone has heard about your obedience and this makes me happy for you . I want you to do what is good and to avoid what is evil .
45016020	The God of peace will quickly crush Satan under your feet . May the good will of our Lord Jesus be with you !
45016021	Timothy my coworker greets you ; so do Lucius , Jason , and Sosipater , who are Jewish by birth like me .
45016022	I , Tertius , who wrote this letter , send you Christian greetings .
45016023	Gaius greets you . He is host to me and the whole church . Erastus , the city treasurer , greets you . Quartus , our brother in the Christian faith , greets you .
45016025	God can strengthen you by the Good News and the message I tell about Jesus Christ . He can strengthen you by revealing the mystery that was kept in silence for a very long time
45016026	but now is publicly known . The everlasting God ordered that what the prophets wrote must be shown to the people of every nation to bring them to the obedience that is associated with faith .
45016027	God alone is wise . Glory belongs to him through Jesus Christ forever ! Amen .
46001001	From Paul , called to be an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God , and from Sosthenes , our brother in the Christian faith .
46001002	To God’s church that was made holy by Christ Jesus and called to be God’s holy people in the city of Corinth and to people everywhere who call on the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
46001003	Good will and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ are yours !
46001004	I always thank God for you because Christ Jesus has shown you God’s good will .
46001005	Through Christ Jesus you have become rich in every way—in speech and knowledge of every kind .
46001006	Our message about Christ has been verified among you .
46001007	Therefore , you don’t lack any gift as you wait eagerly for our Lord Jesus Christ to be revealed .
46001008	He will continue to give you strength until the end so that no one can accuse you of anything on the day of our Lord Jesus Christ .
46001009	God faithfully keeps his promises . He called you to be partners with his Son Jesus Christ our Lord .
46001010	Brothers and sisters , I encourage all of you in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ to agree with each other and not to split into opposing groups . I want you to be united in your understanding and opinions .
46001011	Brothers and sisters , some people from Chloe’s family have made it clear to me that you are quarreling among yourselves .
46001012	This is what I mean : Each of you is saying , “ I follow Paul , ” or “ I follow Apollos , ” or “ I follow Cephas , ” or “ I follow Christ . ”
46001013	Has Christ been divided ? Was Paul crucified for you ? Were you baptized in Paul’s name ?
46001014	I thank God that I didn’t baptize any of you except Crispus and Gaius
46001015	so that no one can say you were baptized in my name .
46001016	I also baptized Stephanas and his family . Beyond that , I’m not sure whether I baptized anyone else .
46001017	Christ didn’t send me to baptize . Instead , he sent me to spread the Good News . I didn’t use intellectual arguments . That would have made the cross of Christ lose its meaning .
46001018	The message about the cross is nonsense to those who are being destroyed , but it is God’s power to us who are being saved .
46001019	Scripture says , “ I will destroy the wisdom of the wise . I will reject the intelligence of intelligent people . ”
46001020	Where is the wise person ? Where is the scholar ? Where is the persuasive speaker of our time ? Hasn’t God turned the wisdom of the world into nonsense ?
46001021	The world with its wisdom was unable to recognize God in terms of his own wisdom . So God decided to use the nonsense of the Good News we speak to save those who believe .
46001022	Jews ask for miraculous signs , and Greeks look for wisdom ,
46001023	but our message is that Christ was crucified . This offends Jewish people and makes no sense to people who are not Jewish .
46001024	But to those Jews and Greeks who are called , he is Christ , God’s power and God’s wisdom .
46001025	God’s nonsense is wiser than human wisdom , and God’s weakness is stronger than human strength .
46001026	Brothers and sisters , consider what you were when God called you to be Christians . Not many of you were wise from a human point of view . You were not in powerful positions or in the upper social classes .
46001027	But God chose what the world considers nonsense to put wise people to shame . God chose what the world considers weak to put what is strong to shame .
46001028	God chose what the world considers ordinary and what it despises—what it considers to be nothing—in order to destroy what it considers to be something .
46001029	As a result , no one can brag in God’s presence .
46001030	You are partners with Christ Jesus because of God . Jesus has become our wisdom sent from God , our righteousness , our holiness , and our ransom from sin .
46001031	As Scripture says , “ Whoever brags must brag about what the Lord has done . ”
46002001	Brothers and sisters , when I came to you , I didn’t speak about God’s mystery as if it were some kind of brilliant message or wisdom .
46002002	While I was with you , I decided to deal with only one subject—Jesus Christ , who was crucified .
46002003	When I came to you , I was weak . I was afraid and very nervous .
46002004	I didn’t speak my message with persuasive intellectual arguments . I spoke my message with a show of spiritual power
46002005	so that your faith would not be based on human wisdom but on God’s power .
46002006	However , we do use wisdom to speak to those who are mature . It is a wisdom that doesn’t belong to this world or to the rulers of this world who are in power today and gone tomorrow .
46002007	We speak about the mystery of God’s wisdom . It is a wisdom that has been hidden , which God had planned for our glory before the world began .
46002008	Not one of the rulers of this world has known it . If they had , they wouldn’t have crucified the Lord of glory .
46002009	But as Scripture says : “ No eye has seen , no ear has heard , and no mind has imaginedthe things that God has preparedfor those who love him . ”
46002010	God has revealed those things to us by his Spirit . The Spirit searches everything , especially the deep things of God .
46002011	After all , who knows everything about a person except that person’s own spirit ? In the same way , no one has known everything about God except God’s Spirit .
46002012	Now , we didn’t receive the spirit that belongs to the world . Instead , we received the Spirit who comes from God so that we could know the things which God has freely given us .
46002013	We don’t speak about these things using teachings that are based on intellectual arguments like people do . Instead , we use the Spirit’s teachings . We explain spiritual things to those who have the Spirit .
46002014	A person who isn’t spiritual doesn’t accept the teachings of God’s Spirit . He thinks they’re nonsense . He can’t understand them because a person must be spiritual to evaluate them .
46002015	Spiritual people evaluate everything but are subject to no one’s evaluation .
46002016	“ Who has known the mind of the Lordso that he can teach him ? ” However , we have the mind of Christ .
46003001	Brothers and sisters , I couldn’t talk to you as spiritual people but as people still influenced by your corrupt nature . You were infants in your faith in Christ .
46003002	I gave you milk to drink . I didn’t give you solid food because you weren’t ready for it . Even now you aren’t ready for it
46003003	because you’re still influenced by your corrupt nature . When you are jealous and quarrel among yourselves , aren’t you influenced by your corrupt nature and living by human standards ?
46003004	When some of you say , “ I follow Paul ” and others say , “ I follow Apollos , ” aren’t you acting like sinful humans ?
46003005	Who is Apollos ? Who is Paul ? They are servants who helped you come to faith . Each did what the Lord gave him to do .
46003006	I planted , and Apollos watered , but God made it grow .
46003007	So neither the one who plants nor the one who waters is important because only God makes it grow .
46003008	The one who plants and the one who waters have the same goal , and each will receive a reward for his own work .
46003009	We are God’s coworkers . You are God’s field . You are God’s building .
