46003010	As a skilled and experienced builder , I used the gift that God gave me to lay the foundation for that building . However , someone else is building on it . Each person must be careful how he builds on it .
46003011	After all , no one can lay any other foundation than the one that is already laid , and that foundation is Jesus Christ .
46003012	People may build on this foundation with gold , silver , precious stones , wood , hay , or straw .
46003013	The day will make what each one does clearly visible because fire will reveal it . That fire will determine what kind of work each person has done .
46003014	If what a person has built survives , he will receive a reward .
46003015	If his work is burned up , he will suffer the loss . However , he will be saved , though it will be like going through a fire .
46003016	Don’t you know that you are God’s temple and that God’s Spirit lives in you ?
46003017	If anyone destroys God’s temple , God will destroy him because God’s temple is holy . You are that holy temple !
46003018	Don’t deceive yourselves . If any of you think you are wise in the ways of this world , you should give up that wisdom in order to become really wise .
46003019	The wisdom of this world is nonsense in God’s sight . That’s why Scripture says , “ God catches the wise in their cleverness . ”
46003020	Again Scripture says , “ The Lord knows that the thoughts of the wise are pointless . ”
46003021	So don’t brag about people . Everything belongs to you .
46003022	Whether it is Paul , Apollos , Cephas , the world , life or death , present or future things , everything belongs to you .
46003023	You belong to Christ , and Christ belongs to God .
46004001	People should think of us as servants of Christ and managers who are entrusted with God’s mysteries .
46004002	Managers are required to be trustworthy .
46004003	It means very little to me that you or any human court should cross-examine me . I don’t even ask myself questions .
46004004	I have a clear conscience , but that doesn’t mean I have God’s approval . It is the Lord who cross-examines me .
46004005	Therefore , don’t judge anything before the appointed time . Wait until the Lord comes . He will also bring to light what is hidden in the dark and reveal people’s motives . Then each person will receive praise from God .
46004006	Brothers and sisters , I have applied this to Apollos and myself for your sake . You should learn from us not to go beyond what is written in Scripture . Then you won’t arrogantly place one of us in opposition to the other .
46004007	Who says that you are any better than other people ? What do you have that wasn’t given to you ? If you were given what you have , why are you bragging as if it weren’t a gift ?
46004008	You already have what you want ! You’ve already become rich ! You’ve become kings without us ! I wish you really were kings so that we could be kings with you .
46004009	As I see it , God has placed us apostles last in line , like people condemned to die . We have become a spectacle for people and angels to look at .
46004010	We have given up our wisdom for Christ , but you have insight because of Christ . We are weak , but you are strong . You are honored , but we are dishonored .
46004011	To this moment , we are hungry , thirsty , poorly dressed , roughly treated , and homeless .
46004012	We wear ourselves out doing physical labor . When people verbally abuse us , we bless them . When people persecute us , we endure it .
46004013	When our reputations are attacked , we remain courteous . Right now we have become garbage in the eyes of the world and trash in the sight of all people .
46004014	I’m not writing this to make you feel ashamed but to instruct you as my dear children .
46004015	You may have countless Christian guardians , but you don’t have many spiritual fathers . I became your father in the Christian life by telling you the Good News about Christ Jesus .
46004016	So I encourage you to imitate me .
46004017	That’s why I’ve sent Timothy to you to help you remember my Christian way of life as I teach it everywhere in every church . Timothy is my dear child , and he faithfully does the Lord’s work .
46004018	Some of you have become arrogant because you think I won’t pay you a visit .
46004019	If it’s the Lord’s will , I’ll visit you soon . Then I’ll know what these arrogant people are saying and what power they have .
46004020	God’s kingdom is not just talk , it is power .
46004021	When I come to visit you , would you prefer that I punish you or show you love and a gentle spirit ?
46005001	Your own members are aware that there is sexual sin going on among them . This kind of sin is not even heard of among unbelievers—a man is actually married to his father’s wife .
46005002	You’re being arrogant when you should have been more upset about this . If you had been upset , the man who did this would have been removed from among you .
46005003	Although I’m not physically present with you , I am with you in spirit . I have already judged the man who did this as though I were present with you .
46005004	When you have gathered together , I am with you in spirit . Then , in the name of our Lord Jesus , and with his power ,
46005005	hand such a person over to Satan to destroy his corrupt nature so that his spiritual nature may be saved on the day of the Lord .
46005006	It’s not good for you to brag . Don’t you know that a little yeast spreads through the whole batch of dough ?
46005007	Remove the old yeast of sin so that you may be a new batch of dough , since you don’t actually have the yeast of sin . Christ , our Passover lamb , has been sacrificed .
46005008	So we must not celebrate our festival with the old yeast of sin or with the yeast of vice and wickedness . Instead , we must celebrate it with the bread of purity and truth that has no yeast .
46005009	In my letter to you I told you not to associate with people who continue to commit sexual sins .
46005010	I didn’t tell you that you could not have any contact with unbelievers who commit sexual sins , are greedy , are dishonest , or worship false gods . If that were the case , you would have to leave this world .
46005011	Now , what I meant was that you should not associate with people who call themselves brothers or sisters in the Christian faith but live in sexual sin , are greedy , worship false gods , use abusive language , get drunk , or are dishonest . Don’t eat with such people .
46005012	After all , do I have any business judging those who are outside the Christian faith ? Isn’t it your business to judge those who are inside ?
46005013	God will judge those who are outside . Remove that wicked man from among you .
46006001	When one of you has a complaint against another , how dare you go to court to settle the matter in front of wicked people . Why don’t you settle it in front of God’s holy people ?
46006002	Don’t you know that God’s people will judge the world ? So if you’re going to judge the world , aren’t you capable of judging insignificant cases ?
46006003	Don’t you know that we will judge angels , not to mention things in this life ?
46006004	When you have cases dealing with this life , why do you allow people whom the church has a low opinion of to be your judges ?
46006005	You should be ashamed of yourselves ! Don’t you have at least one wise person who is able to settle disagreements between believers ?
46006006	Instead , one believer goes to court against another believer , and this happens in front of unbelievers .
46006007	You are already totally defeated because you have lawsuits against each other . Why don’t you accept the fact that you have been wronged ? Why don’t you accept that you have been cheated ?
46006008	Instead , you do wrong and cheat , and you do this to other believers .
46006009	Don’t you know that wicked people won’t inherit the kingdom of God ? Stop deceiving yourselves ! People who continue to commit sexual sins , who worship false gods , those who commit adultery , homosexuals ,
46006010	or thieves , those who are greedy or drunk , who use abusive language , or who rob people will not inherit the kingdom of God .
46006011	That’s what some of you were ! But you have been washed and made holy , and you have received God’s approval in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and in the Spirit of our God .
46006012	Someone may say , “ I’m allowed to do anything , ” but not everything is helpful . I’m allowed to do anything , but I won’t allow anything to gain control over my life .
46006013	Food is for the stomach , and the stomach is for food , but God will put an end to both of them . However , the body is not for sexual sin but for the Lord , and the Lord is for the body .
46006014	God raised the Lord , and by his power God will also raise us .
46006015	Don’t you realize that your bodies are parts of Christ’s body ? Should I take the parts of Christ’s body and make them parts of a prostitute’s body ? That’s unthinkable !
46006016	Don’t you realize that the person who unites himself with a prostitute becomes one body with her ? God says , “ The two will be one . ”
46006017	However , the person who unites himself with the Lord becomes one spirit with him .
46006018	Stay away from sexual sins . Other sins that people commit don’t affect their bodies the same way sexual sins do . People who sin sexually sin against their own bodies .
46006019	Don’t you know that your body is a temple that belongs to the Holy Spirit ? The Holy Spirit , whom you received from God , lives in you . You don’t belong to yourselves .
46006020	You were bought for a price . So bring glory to God in the way you use your body .
46007001	Now , concerning the things that you wrote about : It’s good for men not to get married .
46007002	But in order to avoid sexual sins , each man should have his own wife , and each woman should have her own husband .
46007003	Husbands and wives should satisfy each other’s sexual needs .
46007004	A wife doesn’t have authority over her own body , but her husband does . In the same way , a husband doesn’t have authority over his own body , but his wife does .
46007005	Don’t withhold yourselves from each other unless you agree to do so for a set time to devote yourselves to prayer . Then you should get back together so that Satan doesn’t use your lack of self-control to tempt you .
46007006	What I have just said is not meant as a command but as a suggestion .
46007007	I would like everyone to be like me . However , each person has a special gift from God , and these gifts vary from person to person .
46007008	I say to those who are not married , especially to widows : It is good for you to stay single like me .
46007009	However , if you cannot control your desires , you should get married . It is better for you to marry than to burn with sexual desire .
46007010	I pass this command along ( not really I , but the Lord ) : A wife shouldn’t leave her husband .
46007011	If she does , she should stay single or make up with her husband . Likewise , a husband should not divorce his wife .
46007012	I ( not the Lord ) say to the rest of you : If any Christian man is married to a woman who is an unbeliever , and she is willing to live with him , he should not divorce her .
46007013	If any Christian woman is married to a man who is an unbeliever , and he is willing to live with her , she should not divorce her husband .
46007014	Actually , the unbelieving husband is made holy because of his wife , and an unbelieving wife is made holy because of her husband . Otherwise , their children would be unacceptable to God , but now they are acceptable to him .
46007015	But if the unbelieving partners leave , let them go . Under these circumstances a Christian man or Christian woman is not bound by a marriage vow . God has called you to live in peace .
46007016	How do you as a wife know whether you will save your husband ? How do you as a husband know whether you will save your wife ?
46007017	Everyone should live the life that the Lord gave him when God called him . This is the guideline I use in every church .
46007018	Any man who was already circumcised when he was called to be a Christian shouldn’t undo his circumcision . Any man who was uncircumcised when he was called to be a Christian shouldn’t get circumcised .
46007019	Circumcision is nothing , and the lack of it is nothing . But keeping what God commands is everything .
46007020	All people should stay as they were when they were called .
46007021	Were you a slave when you were called ? That shouldn’t bother you . However , if you have a chance to become free , take it .
46007022	If the Lord called you when you were a slave , you are the Lord’s free person . In the same way , if you were free when you were called , you are Christ’s slave .
46007023	You were bought for a price . Don’t become anyone’s slaves .
46007024	Brothers and sisters , you should remain in whatever circumstances you were in when God called you . God is with you in those circumstances .
46007025	Concerning virgins : Even though I don’t have any command from the Lord , I’ll give you my opinion . I’m a person to whom the Lord has shown mercy , so I can be trusted .
46007026	Because of the present crisis I believe it is good for people to remain as they are .
46007027	Do you have a wife ? Don’t seek a divorce . Are you divorced from your wife ? Don’t look for another one .
46007028	But if you do get married , you have not sinned . If a virgin gets married , she has not sinned . However , these people will have trouble , and I would like to spare them from that .
46007029	This is what I mean , brothers and sisters : The time has been shortened . While it lasts , those who are married should live as though they were not .
46007030	Those who have eyes filled with tears should live as though they have no sorrow . Those who are happy should live as though there was nothing to be happy about . Those who buy something should live as though they didn’t own it .
46007031	Those who use the things in this world should do so but not depend on them . It is clear that this world in its present form is passing away .
46007032	So I don’t want you to have any concerns . An unmarried man is concerned about the things of the Lord , that is , about how he can please the Lord .
46007033	But the married man is concerned about earthly things , that is , about how he can please his wife .
46007034	His attention is divided . An unmarried woman or a virgin is concerned about the Lord’s things so that she may be holy in body and in spirit . But the married woman is concerned about earthly things , that is , about how she can please her husband .
46007035	I’m saying this for your benefit , not to restrict you . I’m showing you how to live a noble life of devotion to the Lord without being distracted by other things .
46007036	No father would want to do the wrong thing when his virgin daughter is old enough to get married . If she wants to get married , he isn’t sinning by letting her get married .
46007037	However , a father may have come to a decision about his daughter . If his decision is to keep her at home because she doesn’t want to get married , that’s fine .
46007038	So it’s fine for a father to give his daughter in marriage , but the father who doesn’t give his daughter in marriage does even better .
46007039	A married woman must remain with her husband as long as he lives . If her husband dies , she is free to marry anyone she wishes , but only if the man is a Christian .
46007040	However , she will be more blessed if she stays as she is . That is my opinion , and I think that I , too , have God’s Spirit .
46008001	Now , concerning food offered to false gods : We know that we all have knowledge . Knowledge makes people arrogant , but love builds them up .
46008002	Those who think they know something still have a lot to learn .
46008003	But if they love God , they are known by God .
46008004	Now about eating food that was offered to false gods : We know that the false gods in this world don’t really exist and that no god exists except the one God .
46008005	People may say that there are gods in heaven and on earth—many gods and many lords , as they would call them .
46008006	But for us , “ There is only one God , the Father . Everything came from him , and we live for him . There is only one Lord , Jesus Christ . Everything came into being through him , and we live because of him . ”
46008007	But not everyone knows this . Some people are so used to worshiping false gods that they believe they are eating food offered to a false god . So they feel guilty because their conscience is weak .
46008008	Food will not affect our relationship with God . We are no worse off if we eat that food and no better off if we don’t .
46008009	But be careful that by using your freedom you don’t somehow make a believer who is weak in faith fall into sin .
46008010	For example , suppose someone with a weak conscience sees you , who have this knowledge , eating in the temple of a false god . Won’t you be encouraging that person to eat food offered to a false god ?
46008011	In that case , your knowledge is ruining a believer whose faith is weak , a believer for whom Christ died .
46008012	When you sin against other believers in this way and harm their weak consciences , you are sinning against Christ .
46008013	Therefore , if eating food offered to false gods causes other believers to lose their faith , I will never eat that kind of food so that I won’t make other believers lose their faith .
46009001	Don’t you agree that I’m a free man ? Don’t you agree that I’m an apostle ? Haven’t I seen Jesus our Lord ? Aren’t you the result of my work for the Lord ?
46009002	If I’m not an apostle to other people , at least I’m an apostle to you . You are the seal which proves that I am the Lord’s apostle .
46009003	This is how I defend myself to those who cross-examine me .
46009004	Don’t we have the right to eat and drink ?
46009005	Don’t we have the right to take our wives along with us like the other apostles , the Lord’s brothers , and Cephas do ?
46009006	Or is it only Barnabas and I who don’t have any rights , except to find work to support ourselves ?
46009007	Does a soldier ever serve in the army at his own expense ? Does anyone plant a vineyard and not eat the grapes ? Does anyone take care of a flock and not drink milk from the sheep ?
46009008	Am I merely stating some human rule ? Don’t Moses’ Teachings say the same thing ?
46009009	Moses’ Teachings say , “ Never muzzle an ox when it is threshing grain . ” God’s concern isn’t for oxen .
46009010	Isn’t he speaking entirely for our benefit ? This was written for our benefit so that the person who plows or threshes should expect to receive a share of the crop .
46009011	If we have planted the spiritual seed that has been of benefit to you , is it too much if we receive part of the harvest from your earthly goods ?
46009012	If others have the right to expect this from you , don’t we deserve even more ? But we haven’t used our rights . Instead , we would put up with anything in order not to hinder the Good News of Christ in any way .
46009013	Don’t you realize that those who work at the temple get their food from the temple ? Don’t those who help at the altar get a share of what is on the altar ?
46009014	In the same way , the Lord has commanded that those who spread the Good News should earn their living from the Good News .
46009015	I haven’t used any of these rights , and I haven’t written this in order to use them now . I would rather die than have anyone turn my bragging into meaningless words .
46009016	If I spread the Good News , I have nothing to brag about because I have an obligation to do this . How horrible it will be for me if I don’t spread the Good News !
46009017	If I spread the Good News willingly , I’ll have a reward . But if I spread the Good News unwillingly , I’m only doing what I’ve been entrusted to do .
46009018	So what is my reward ? It is to spread the Good News free of charge . In that way I won’t use the rights that belong to those who spread the Good News .
46009019	Although I’m free from all people , I have made myself a slave for all people to win more of them .
46009020	I became Jewish for Jewish people . I became subject to Moses’ Teachings for those who are subject to those laws . I did this to win them even though I’m not subject to Moses’ Teachings .
46009021	I became like a person who does not have Moses’ Teachings for those who don’t have those teachings . I did this to win them even though I have God’s teachings . I’m really subject to Christ’s teachings .
46009022	I became like a person weak in faith to win those who are weak in faith . I have become everything to everyone in order to save at least some of them .
46009023	I do all this for the sake of the Good News in order to share what it offers .
46009024	Don’t you realize that everyone who runs in a race runs to win , but only one runner gets the prize ? Run like them , so that you can win .
46009025	Everyone who enters an athletic contest goes into strict training . They do it to win a temporary crown , but we do it to win one that will be permanent .
46009026	So I run—but not without a clear goal ahead of me . So I box—but not as if I were just shadow boxing .
46009027	Rather , I toughen my body with punches and make it my slave so that I will not be disqualified after I have spread the Good News to others .
46010001	I want you to know , brothers and sisters , that all our ancestors who left Egypt were under the cloud , and they all went through the sea .
46010002	They were all united with Moses by baptism in the cloud and in the sea .
46010003	All of them ate the same spiritual food ,
46010004	and all of them drank the same spiritual drink . They drank from the spiritual rock that went with them , and that rock was Christ .
46010005	Yet , God was not pleased with most of them , so their dead bodies were scattered over the desert .
46010006	These things have become examples for us so that we won’t desire what is evil , as they did .
46010007	So don’t worship false gods as some of them did , as Scripture says , “ The people sat down to a feast which turned into an orgy . ”
46010008	We shouldn’t sin sexually as some of them did . Twenty-three thousand of them died on one day .
46010009	We shouldn’t put the Lord to the test as some of them did . They were killed by snakes .
46010010	Don’t complain as some of them did . The angel of death destroyed them .
46010011	These things happened to make them an example for others . These things were written down as a warning for us who are living in the closing days of history .
46010012	So , people who think they are standing firmly should be careful that they don’t fall .
46010013	There isn’t any temptation that you have experienced which is unusual for humans . God , who faithfully keeps his promises , will not allow you to be tempted beyond your power to resist . But when you are tempted , he will also give you the ability to endure the temptation as your way of escape .
46010014	Therefore , my dear friends , get as far away from the worship of false gods as you can .
46010015	I’m talking to intelligent people . Judge for yourselves what I’m saying .
46010016	When we bless the cup of blessing aren’t we sharing the blood of Christ ? When we break the bread aren’t we sharing the body of Christ ?
46010017	Because there is one loaf , we are one body , although we are many individuals . All of us share one loaf .
46010018	Look at the people of Israel from a human point of view . Don’t those who eat the sacrifices share what is on the altar ?
46010019	Do I mean that an offering made to a false god is anything , or that a false god itself is anything ?
46010020	Hardly ! What I am saying is that these sacrifices which people make are made to demons and not to God . I don’t want you to be partners with demons .
46010021	You cannot drink the Lord’s cup and the cup of demons . You cannot participate at the table of the Lord and at the table of demons .
46010022	Are we trying to make the Lord jealous ? Are we stronger than he is ?
46010023	Someone may say , “ I’m allowed to do anything , ” but not everything is helpful . I’m allowed to do anything , but not everything encourages growth .
46010024	People should be concerned about others and not just about themselves .
46010025	Eat anything that is sold in the market without letting your conscience trouble you .
46010026	Certainly , “ The earth is the Lord’s and everything it contains is his . ”
46010027	If an unbeliever invites you to his house for dinner , and you wish to go , eat anything he serves you without letting your conscience trouble you .
46010028	However , if someone says to you , “ This was sacrificed to a god , ” don’t eat it because of the one who informed you and because of conscience .
46010029	I’m not talking about your conscience but the other person’s conscience . Why should my freedom be judged by someone else’s conscience ?
46010030	If I give thanks to God for the food I eat , why am I condemned for that ?
46010031	So , whether you eat or drink , or whatever you do , do everything to the glory of God .
46010032	Don’t cause others to stumble , whether they are Jewish , Greek , or members of God’s church .
46010033	I try to please everyone in every way . I don’t think about what would be good for me but about what would be good for many people so that they might be saved .
46011001	Imitate me as I imitate Christ .
46011002	I praise you for always thinking about me and for carefully following the traditions that I handed down to you .
46011003	However , I want you to realize that Christ has authority over every man , a husband has authority over his wife , and God has authority over Christ .
46011004	Every man who covers his head when he prays or speaks what God has revealed dishonors the one who has authority over him .
46011005	Every woman who prays or speaks what God has revealed and has her head uncovered while she speaks dishonors the one who has authority over her . She is like the woman who has her head shaved .
46011006	So if a woman doesn’t cover her head , she should cut off her hair . If it’s a disgrace for a woman to cut off her hair or shave her head , she should cover her head .
46011007	A man should not cover his head . He is God’s image and glory . The woman , however , is man’s glory .
46011008	Clearly , man wasn’t made from woman but woman from man .
46011009	Man wasn’t created for woman but woman for man .
46011010	Therefore , a woman should wear something on her head to show she is under someone’s authority , out of respect for the angels .
46011011	Yet , as believers in the Lord , women couldn’t exist without men and men couldn’t exist without women .
46011012	As a woman came into existence from a man , so men come into existence by women , but everything comes from God .
46011013	Judge your own situation . Is it proper for a woman to pray to God with her head uncovered ?
46011014	Doesn’t nature itself teach you that it is disgraceful for a man to have long hair ?
46011015	Doesn’t it teach you that it is a woman’s pride to wear her hair long ? Her hair is given to her in place of a covering .
46011016	If anyone wants to argue about this they can’t , because we don’t have any custom like this—nor do any of the churches of God .
46011017	I have no praise for you as I instruct you in the following matter : When you gather , it results in more harm than good .
46011018	In the first place , I hear that when you gather as a church you split up into opposing groups . I believe some of what I hear .
46011019	Factions have to exist in order to make it clear who the genuine believers among you are .
46011020	When you gather in the same place , you can’t possibly be eating the Lord’s Supper .
46011021	Each of you eats his own supper without waiting for each other . So one person goes hungry and another gets drunk .
46011022	Don’t you have homes in which to eat and drink ? Do you despise God’s church and embarrass people who don’t have anything to eat ? What can I say to you ? Should I praise you ? I won’t praise you for this .
46011023	After all , I passed on to you what I had received from the Lord . On the night he was betrayed , the Lord Jesus took bread
46011024	and spoke a prayer of thanksgiving . He broke the bread and said , “ This is my body , which is given for you . Do this to remember me . ”
46011025	When supper was over , he did the same with the cup . He said , “ This cup is the new promise made with my blood . Every time you drink from it , do it to remember me . ”
46011026	Every time you eat this bread and drink from this cup , you tell about the Lord’s death until he comes .
46011027	Therefore , whoever eats the bread or drinks from the Lord’s cup in an improper way will be held responsible for the Lord’s body and blood .
46011028	With this in mind , individuals must determine whether what they are doing is proper when they eat the bread and drink from the cup .
46011029	Anyone who eats and drinks is eating and drinking a judgment against himself when he doesn’t recognize the Lord’s body .
46011030	This is the reason why many of you are weak and sick and quite a number of you have died .
46011031	If we were judging ourselves correctly , we would not be judged .
46011032	But when the Lord judges us , he disciplines us so that we won’t be condemned along with the rest of the world .
46011033	Therefore , brothers and sisters , when you gather to eat , wait for each other .
46011034	Whoever is hungry should eat at home so that you don’t have a gathering that brings judgment on you . I will give directions concerning the other matters when I come .
46012001	Brothers and sisters , I don’t want there to be any misunderstanding concerning spiritual gifts .
46012002	You know that when you were unbelievers , every time you were led to worship false gods you were worshiping gods who couldn’t even speak .
46012003	So I want you to know that no one speaking by God’s Spirit says , “ Jesus is cursed . ” No one can say , “ Jesus is Lord , ” except by the Holy Spirit .
46012004	There are different spiritual gifts , but the same Spirit gives them .
46012005	There are different ways of serving , and yet the same Lord is served .
46012006	There are different types of work to do , but the same God produces every gift in every person .
46012007	The evidence of the Spirit’s presence is given to each person for the common good of everyone .
46012008	The Spirit gives one person the ability to speak with wisdom . The same Spirit gives another person the ability to speak with knowledge .
46012009	To another person the same Spirit gives courageous faith . To another person the same Spirit gives the ability to heal .
46012010	Another can work miracles . Another can speak what God has revealed . Another can tell the difference between spirits . Another can speak in different kinds of languages . Another can interpret languages .
46012011	There is only one Spirit who does all these things by giving what God wants to give to each person .
46012012	For example , the body is one unit and yet has many parts . As all the parts form one body , so it is with Christ .
46012013	By one Spirit we were all baptized into one body . Whether we are Jewish or Greek , slave or free , God gave all of us one Spirit to drink .
46012014	As you know , the human body is not made up of only one part , but of many parts .
46012015	Suppose a foot says , “ I’m not a hand , so I’m not part of the body ! ” Would that mean it’s no longer part of the body ?
46012016	Or suppose an ear says , “ I’m not an eye , so I’m not a part of the body ! ” Would that mean it’s no longer part of the body ?
46012017	If the whole body were an eye , how could it hear ? If the whole body were an ear , how could it smell ?
46012018	So God put each and every part of the body together as he wanted it .
46012019	How could it be a body if it only had one part ?
46012020	So there are many parts but one body .
46012021	An eye can’t say to a hand , “ I don’t need you ! ” Or again , the head can’t say to the feet , “ I don’t need you ! ”
46012022	The opposite is true . The parts of the body that we think are weaker are the ones we really need .
46012023	The parts of the body that we think are less honorable are the ones we give special honor . So our unpresentable parts are made more presentable .
46012024	However , our presentable parts don’t need this kind of treatment . God has put the body together and given special honor to the part that doesn’t have it .
46012025	God’s purpose was that the body should not be divided but rather that all of its parts should feel the same concern for each other .
46012026	If one part of the body suffers , all the other parts share its suffering . If one part is praised , all the others share in its happiness .
46012027	You are Christ’s body and each of you is an individual part of it .
46012028	In the church God has appointed first apostles , next prophets , third teachers , then those who perform miracles , then those who have the gift of healing , then those who help others , those who are managers , and those who can speak in a number of languages .
46012029	Not all believers are apostles , are they ? Are all of them prophets ? Do all of them teach ? Do all of them perform miracles
46012030	or have gifts of healing ? Can all of them speak in other languages or interpret languages ?
46012031	You only want the better gifts , but I will show you the best thing to do .
46013001	I may speak in the languages of humans and of angels . But if I don’t have love , I am a loud gong or a clashing cymbal .
46013002	I may have the gift to speak what God has revealed , and I may understand all mysteries and have all knowledge . I may even have enough faith to move mountains . But if I don’t have love , I am nothing .
46013003	I may even give away all that I have and give up my body to be burned . But if I don’t have love , none of these things will help me .
46013004	Love is patient . Love is kind . Love isn’t jealous . It doesn’t sing its own praises . It isn’t arrogant .
46013005	It isn’t rude . It doesn’t think about itself . It isn’t irritable . It doesn’t keep track of wrongs .
46013006	It isn’t happy when injustice is done , but it is happy with the truth .
46013007	Love never stops being patient , never stops believing , never stops hoping , never gives up .
46013008	Love never comes to an end . There is the gift of speaking what God has revealed , but it will no longer be used . There is the gift of speaking in other languages , but it will stop by itself . There is the gift of knowledge , but it will no longer be used .
46013009	Our knowledge is incomplete and our ability to speak what God has revealed is incomplete .
46013010	But when what is complete comes , then what is incomplete will no longer be used .
46013011	When I was a child , I spoke like a child , thought like a child , and reasoned like a child . When I became an adult , I no longer used childish ways .
46013012	Now we see a blurred image in a mirror . Then we will see very clearly . Now my knowledge is incomplete . Then I will have complete knowledge as God has complete knowledge of me .
46013013	So these three things remain : faith , hope , and love . But the best one of these is love .
46014001	Pursue love , and desire spiritual gifts , but especially the gift of speaking what God has revealed .
46014002	When a person speaks in another language , he doesn’t speak to people but to God . No one understands him . His spirit is speaking mysteries .
46014003	But when a person speaks what God has revealed , he speaks to people to help them grow , to encourage them , and to comfort them .
46014004	When a person speaks in another language , he helps himself grow . But when a person speaks what God has revealed , he helps the church grow .
46014005	I wish that all of you could speak in other languages , but especially that you could speak what God has revealed . The person who speaks what God has revealed is more important than the person who speaks in other languages . This is true unless he can interpret what he says to help the church grow .
46014006	Brothers and sisters , it wouldn’t do you any good if I came to you speaking in other languages , unless I explained revelation , knowledge , prophecy , or doctrine to you .
46014007	Musical instruments like the flute or harp produce sounds . If there is no difference in the notes , how can a person tell what tune is being played ?
46014008	For example , if the trumpet doesn’t sound a clear call , who will get ready for battle ?
46014009	In the same way , if you don’t speak in a way that can be understood , how will anyone know what you’re saying ? You will be talking into thin air .
46014010	No matter how many different languages there are in the world , not one of them is without meaning .
46014011	If I don’t know what a language means , I will be a foreigner to the person who speaks it and that person will be a foreigner to me .
46014012	In the same way , since you’re eager to have spiritual gifts , try to excel in them so that you help the church grow .
46014013	So the person who speaks in another language should pray for an interpretation of what he says .
46014014	If I pray in another language , my spirit prays , but my mind is not productive .
46014015	So what does this mean ? It means that I will pray with my spirit , and I will pray with my mind . I will sing psalms with my spirit , and I will sing psalms with my mind .
46014016	Otherwise , if you praise God only with your spirit , how can outsiders say “ Amen ! ” to your prayer of thanksgiving ? They don’t know what you’re saying .
46014017	Your prayer of thanksgiving may be very good , but it doesn’t help other people grow .
46014018	I thank God that I speak in other languages more than any of you .
46014019	Yet , in order to teach others in church , I would rather say five words that can be understood than ten thousand words in another language .
46014020	Brothers and sisters , don’t think like children . When it comes to evil , be like babies , but think like mature people .
46014021	God’s word says , “ Through people who speak foreign languagesand through the mouths of foreignersI will speak to these people , but even then they will not listen to me , says the Lord . ”
46014022	So the gift of speaking in other languages is a sign for unbelievers , not for believers . The gift of speaking what God had revealed is a sign for believers , not for unbelievers .
46014023	Suppose the whole congregation gathers in the same place and you speak in other languages . When outsiders or unbelievers come in , won’t they say that you’re out of your mind ?
46014024	Now suppose you speak what God has revealed . When unbelievers or outsiders come in you will show them where they are wrong and convince them that they are sinners .
46014025	The secrets in their hearts will become known , and in this way they will quickly bow with their faces touching the ground , worship God , and confess that God is truly among you .
46014026	So what does this mean , brothers and sisters ? When you gather , each person has a psalm , doctrine , revelation , another language , or an interpretation . Everything must be done to help each other grow .
46014027	If people speak in other languages , only two or three at the most should speak . They should do it one at a time , and someone must interpret what each person says .
46014028	But if an interpreter isn’t present , those people should remain silent in church . They should only speak to themselves and to God .
46014029	Two or three people should speak what God has revealed . Everyone else should decide whether what each person said is right or wrong .
46014030	If God reveals something to another person who is seated , the first speaker should be silent .
46014031	All of you can take your turns speaking what God has revealed . In that way , everyone will learn and be encouraged .
46014032	People who speak what God has revealed must control themselves .
46014033	God is not a God of disorder but a God of peace . As in all the churches of God’s holy people ,
46014034	the women must keep silent . They don’t have the right to speak . They must take their place as Moses’ Teachings say .
46014035	If they want to know anything they should ask their husbands at home . It’s shameful for a woman to speak in church .
46014036	Did God’s word originate with you ? Are you the only ones it has reached ?
46014037	Whoever thinks that he speaks for God or that he is spiritually gifted must acknowledge that what I write to you is what the Lord commands .
46014038	But whoever ignores what I write should be ignored .
46014039	So , brothers and sisters , desire to speak what God has revealed , and don’t keep anyone from speaking in other languages .
46014040	Everything must be done in a proper and orderly way .
46015001	Brothers and sisters , I’m making known to you the Good News which I already told you , which you received , and on which your faith is based .
46015002	In addition , you are saved by this Good News if you hold on to the doctrine I taught you , unless you believed it without thinking it over .
46015003	I passed on to you the most important points of doctrine that I had received : Christ died to take away our sins as the Scriptures predicted .
46015004	He was placed in a tomb . He was brought back to life on the third day as the Scriptures predicted .
46015005	He appeared to Cephas . Next he appeared to the twelve apostles .
46015006	Then he appeared to more than 500 believers at one time . ( Most of these people are still living , but some have died . )
46015007	Next he appeared to James . Then he appeared to all the apostles .
46015008	Last of all , he also appeared to me . I’m like an aborted fetus who was given life .
46015009	I’m the least of the apostles . I’m not even fit to be called an apostle because I persecuted God’s church .
46015010	But God’s kindness made me what I am , and that kindness was not wasted on me . Instead , I worked harder than all the others . It was not I who did it , but God’s kindness was with me .
46015011	So , whether it was I or someone else , this is the message we brought you , and this is what you believed .
46015012	If we have told you that Christ has been brought back to life , how can some of you say that coming back from the dead is impossible ?
46015013	If the dead can’t be brought back to life , then Christ hasn’t come back to life .
46015014	If Christ hasn’t come back to life , our message has no meaning and your faith also has no meaning .
46015015	In addition , we are obviously witnesses who lied about God because we testified that he brought Christ back to life . But if it’s true that the dead don’t come back to life , then God didn’t bring Christ back to life .
46015016	Certainly , if the dead don’t come back to life , then Christ hasn’t come back to life either .
46015017	If Christ hasn’t come back to life , your faith is nonsense and sin still has you in its power .
46015018	Then those who have died as believers in Christ no longer exist .
46015019	If Christ is our hope in this life only , we deserve more pity than any other people .
46015020	But now Christ has come back from the dead . He is the very first person of those who have died to come back to life .
46015021	Since a man brought death , a man also brought life back from death .
46015022	As everyone dies because of Adam , so also everyone will be made alive because of Christ .
46015023	This will happen to each person in his own turn . Christ is the first , then at his coming , those who belong to him will be made alive .
46015024	Then the end will come . Christ will hand over the kingdom to God the Father as he destroys every ruler , authority , and power .
46015025	Christ must rule until God has put every enemy under his control .
46015026	The last enemy he will destroy is death .
46015027	Clearly , God has put everything under Christ’s authority . When God says that everything has been put under Christ’s authority , this clearly excludes God , since God has put everything under Christ’s authority .
46015028	But when God puts everything under Christ’s authority , the Son will put himself under God’s authority , since God had put everything under the Son’s authority . Then God will be in control of everything .
46015029	However , people are baptized because the dead will come back to life . What will they do ? If the dead can’t come back to life , why do people get baptized as if they can come back to life ?
46015030	Why are we constantly putting ourselves in danger ?
46015031	Brothers and sisters , I swear to you on my pride in you which Christ Jesus our Lord has given me : I face death every day .
46015032	If I have fought with wild animals in Ephesus , what have I gained according to the way people look at things ? If the dead are not raised , “ Let’s eat and drink because tomorrow we’re going to die ! ”
46015033	Don’t let anyone deceive you . Associating with bad people will ruin decent people .
46015034	Come back to the right point of view , and stop sinning . Some people don’t know anything about God . You should be ashamed of yourselves .
46015035	But someone will ask , “ How do the dead come back to life ? With what kind of body will they come back ? ”
46015036	You fool ! The seed you plant doesn’t come to life unless it dies first .
46015037	What you plant , whether it’s wheat or something else , is only a seed . It doesn’t have the form that the plant will have .
46015038	God gives the plant the form he wants it to have . Each kind of seed grows into its own form .
46015039	Not all flesh is the same . Humans have one kind of flesh , animals have another , birds have another , and fish have still another .
46015040	There are heavenly bodies and earthly bodies . Heavenly bodies don’t all have the same splendor , neither do earthly bodies .
46015041	The sun has one kind of splendor , the moon has another kind of splendor , and the stars have still another kind of splendor . Even one star differs in splendor from another star .
46015042	That is how it will be when the dead come back to life . When the body is planted , it decays . When it comes back to life , it cannot decay .
46015043	When the body is planted , it doesn’t have any splendor and is weak . When it comes back to life , it has splendor and is strong .
46015044	It is planted as a physical body . It comes back to life as a spiritual body . As there is a physical body , so there is also a spiritual body .
46015045	This is what Scripture says : “ The first man , Adam , became a living being . ” The last Adam became a life-giving spirit .
46015046	The spiritual does not come first , but the physical and then the spiritual .
46015047	The first man was made from the dust of the earth . He came from the earth . The second man came from heaven .
46015048	The people on earth are like the man who was made from the dust of the earth . The people in heaven are like the man who came from heaven .
46015049	As we have worn the likeness of the man who was made from the dust of the earth , we will also wear the likeness of the man who came from heaven .
46015050	Brothers and sisters , this is what I mean : Flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God . What decays cannot inherit what doesn’t decay .
46015051	I’m telling you a mystery . Not all of us will die , but we will all be changed .
46015052	It will happen in an instant , in a split second at the sound of the last trumpet . Indeed , that trumpet will sound , and then the dead will come back to life . They will be changed so that they can live forever .
46015053	This body that decays must be changed into a body that cannot decay . This mortal body must be changed into a body that will live forever .
46015054	When this body that decays is changed into a body that cannot decay , and this mortal body is changed into a body that will live forever , then the teaching of Scripture will come true : “ Death is turned into victory !
46015055	Death , where is your victory ? Death , where is your sting ? ”
46015056	Sin gives death its sting , and God’s standards give sin its power .
46015057	Thank God that he gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
46015058	So , then , brothers and sisters , don’t let anyone move you off the foundation of your faith . Always excel in the work you do for the Lord . You know that the hard work you do for the Lord is not pointless .
46016001	Now , concerning the money to be collected for God’s people in Jerusalem : I want you to do as I directed the churches in Galatia .
46016002	Every Sunday each of you should set aside some of your money and save it . Then money won’t have to be collected when I come .
46016003	When I come , I will give letters of introduction to the people whom you choose . You can send your gift to Jerusalem with them .
46016004	If I think it’s worthwhile for me to go , they can go with me .
46016005	After I go through the province of Macedonia , I’ll visit you . ( I will be going through Macedonia . )
46016006	I’ll probably stay with you . I might even spend the winter . Then you can give me your support as I travel , wherever I decide to go .
46016007	Right now all I could do is visit you briefly , but if the Lord lets me , I hope to spend some time with you .
46016008	I will be staying here in Ephesus until Pentecost .
46016009	I have a great opportunity to do effective work here , although there are many people who oppose me .
46016010	If Timothy comes , make sure that he doesn’t have anything to be afraid of while he is with you . He’s doing the Lord’s work as I am ,
46016011	so no one should treat him with contempt . Without quarreling , give him your support for his trip so that he may come to me . I’m expecting him to arrive with the other Christians .
46016012	Concerning Apollos , our brother in the Christian faith : I tried hard to get him to visit you with the other Christians . He didn’t want to at this time . However , he will visit you when he has an opportunity .
46016013	Be alert . Be firm in the Christian faith . Be courageous and strong .
46016014	Do everything with love .
46016015	You know that the family of Stephanas was the first family to be won for Christ in Greece . This family has devoted itself to serving God’s people . So I encourage you , brothers and sisters ,
46016016	to follow the example of people like these and anyone else who shares their labor and hard work .
46016017	I am glad that Stephanas , Fortunatus , and Achaicus came here . They have made up for your absence .
46016018	They have comforted me , and they have comforted you . Therefore , show people like these your appreciation .
46016019	The churches in the province of Asia greet you . Aquila and Prisca and the church that meets in their house send their warmest Christian greetings .
46016020	All the brothers and sisters here greet you . Greet each other with a holy kiss .
46016021	I , Paul , am writing this greeting with my own hand .
46016022	If anyone doesn’t love the Lord , let him be cursed ! Our Lord , come !
46016023	May the good will of the Lord Jesus be with you .
46016024	Through Christ Jesus my love is with all of you .
47001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God , and from Timothy our brother . To God’s church in the city of Corinth and to all God’s holy people everywhere in Greece .
47001002	Good will and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ are yours !
47001003	Praise the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ! He is the Father who is compassionate and the God who gives comfort .
47001004	He comforts us whenever we suffer . That is why whenever other people suffer , we are able to comfort them by using the same comfort we have received from God .
47001005	Because Christ suffered so much for us , we can receive so much comfort from him .
47001006	Besides , if we suffer , it brings you comfort and salvation . If we are comforted , we can effectively comfort you when you endure the same sufferings that we endure .
47001007	We have confidence in you . We know that as you share our sufferings , you also share our comfort .
47001008	Brothers and sisters , we don’t want you to be ignorant about the suffering we experienced in the province of Asia . It was so extreme that it was beyond our ability to endure . We even wondered if we could go on living .
47001009	In fact , we still feel as if we’re under a death sentence . But we suffered so that we would stop trusting ourselves and learn to trust God , who brings the dead back to life .
47001010	He has rescued us from a terrible death , and he will rescue us in the future . We are confident that he will continue to rescue us ,
47001011	since you are also joining to help us when you pray for us . Then many people will thank God for the favor he will show us because many people prayed for us .
47001012	We are proud that our conscience is clear . We are proud of the way that we have lived in this world . We have lived with a God-given holiness and sincerity , especially toward you . It was not by human wisdom that we have lived but by God’s kindness .
47001013	We are only writing you what you already knew before you read this . I hope you will understand this as long as you live ,
47001014	even though you now understand it only partially . We are your reason to be proud , as you will be our reason to be proud on the day of our Lord Jesus .
47001015	Confident of this , I had previously wanted to visit you so that you could benefit twice .
47001016	My plans had been to go from the city of Corinth to the province of Macedonia . Then from Macedonia I had planned to return to you again in Corinth and have you support my trip to Judea .
47001017	You don’t think that I made these plans lightly , do you ? Do you think that when I make plans , I make them in a sinful way ? Why would I say that something is true when it isn’t ?
47001018	You can depend on God . Our message to you isn’t false ; it’s true .
47001019	God’s Son , Jesus Christ , whom I , Silvanus , and Timothy told you about , was true not false . Because of him our message was always true .
47001020	Certainly , Christ made God’s many promises come true . For that reason , because of our message , people also honor God by saying , “ Amen ! ”
47001021	God establishes us , together with you , in a relationship with Christ . He has also anointed us .
47001022	In addition , he has put his seal of ownership on us and has given us the Spirit as his guarantee .
47001023	I appeal to God as a witness on my behalf , that I stayed away from Corinth because I wanted to spare you .
47001024	It isn’t that we want to have control over your Christian faith . Rather , we want to work with you so that you will be happy . Certainly , you are firmly established in the Christian faith .
47002001	I decided not to visit you again while I was distressed .
47002002	After all , if I had made you uncomfortable , how could you have cheered me up when you were uncomfortable ?
47002003	This is the very reason I wrote to you . I didn’t want to visit you and be distressed by those who should make me happy . I’m confident about all of you that whatever makes me happy also makes you happy .
47002004	I was deeply troubled and anguished . In fact , I had tears in my eyes when I wrote to you . I didn’t write to make you uncomfortable but to let you know how much I love you .
47002005	If someone caused distress , I’m not the one really affected . To some extent—although I don’t want to emphasize this too much—it has affected all of you .
47002006	The majority of you have imposed a severe enough punishment on that person .
47002007	So now forgive and comfort him . Such distress could overwhelm someone like that if he’s not forgiven and comforted .
47002008	That is why I urge you to assure him that you love him .
47002009	I had also written to you to test you . I wanted to see if you would be obedient in every way .
47002010	If you forgive someone , so do I . Indeed , what I have forgiven , if I have forgiven anything , I did in the presence of Christ for your benefit .
47002011	I don’t want Satan to outwit us . After all , we are not ignorant about Satan’s scheming .
47002012	When I went to the city of Troas , the Lord gave me an opportunity to spread the Good News about Christ .
47002013	But I didn’t have any peace of mind , because I couldn’t find Titus , our brother , there . So I said goodbye to the people in Troas and went to the province of Macedonia .
47002014	But I thank God , who always leads us in victory because of Christ . Wherever we go , God uses us to make clear what it means to know Christ . It’s like a fragrance that fills the air .
47002015	To God we are the aroma of Christ among those who are saved and among those who are dying .
47002016	To some people we are a deadly fragrance , while to others we are a life-giving fragrance . Who is qualified to tell about Christ ?
47002017	At least we don’t go around selling an impure word of God like many others . The opposite is true . As Christ’s spokesmen and in God’s presence , we speak the pure message that comes from God .
47003001	Do we have to show you our qualifications again ? Do we , like some people , need letters that recommend us to you or letters from you that recommend us to others ?
47003002	You’re our letter of recommendation written in our hearts that everyone knows and reads .
47003003	It’s clear that you are Christ’s letter , written as a result of our ministry . You are a letter written not with ink but with the Spirit of the living God , a letter written not on tablets of stone but on tablets of human hearts .
47003004	Christ gives us confidence about you in God’s presence .
47003005	By ourselves we are not qualified in any way to claim that we can do anything . Rather , God makes us qualified .
47003006	He has also qualified us to be ministers of a new promise , a spiritual promise , not a written one . Clearly , what was written brings death , but the Spirit brings life .
47003007	The ministry that brought death was inscribed on stone . Yet , it came with such glory that the people of Israel couldn’t look at Moses’ face . His face was shining with glory , even though that glory was fading .
47003008	Won’t the ministry that brings the Spirit have even more glory ?
47003009	If the ministry that brings punishment has glory , then the ministry that brings God’s approval has an overwhelming glory .
47003010	In fact , the ministry that brings punishment lost its glory because of the superior glory of the other ministry .
47003011	If that former ministry faded away despite its glory , how much more does that ministry which remains continue to be glorious ?
47003012	Since we have confidence in the new promise , we speak very boldly .
47003013	We are not like Moses . He kept covering his face with a veil . He didn’t want the people of Israel to see the glory fading away .
47003014	However , their minds became closed . In fact , to this day the same veil is still there when they read the Old Testament . It isn’t removed , because only Christ can remove it .
47003015	Yet , even today , when they read the books of Moses , a veil covers their minds .
47003016	But whenever a person turns to the Lord , the veil is taken away .
47003017	This Lord is the Spirit . Wherever the Lord’s Spirit is , there is freedom .
47003018	As all of us reflect the Lord’s glory with faces that are not covered with veils , we are being changed into his image with ever-increasing glory . This comes from the Lord , who is the Spirit .
47004001	We don’t become discouraged , since God has given us this ministry through his mercy .
47004002	Instead , we have refused to use secret and shameful ways . We don’t use tricks , and we don’t distort God’s word . As God watches , we clearly reveal the truth to everyone . This is our letter of recommendation .
47004003	So if the Good News that we tell others is covered with a veil , it is hidden from those who are dying .
47004004	The god of this world has blinded the minds of those who don’t believe . As a result , they don’t see the light of the Good News about Christ’s glory . It is Christ who is God’s image .
47004005	Our message is not about ourselves . It is about Jesus Christ as the Lord . We are your servants for his sake .
47004006	We are his servants because the same God who said that light should shine out of darkness has given us light . For that reason we bring to light the knowledge about God’s glory which shines from Christ’s face .
47004007	Our bodies are made of clay , yet we have the treasure of the Good News in them . This shows that the superior power of this treasure belongs to God and doesn’t come from us .
47004008	In every way we’re troubled , but we aren’t crushed by our troubles . We’re frustrated , but we don’t give up .
47004009	We’re persecuted , but we’re not abandoned . We’re captured , but we’re not killed .
47004010	We always carry around the death of Jesus in our bodies so that the life of Jesus is also shown in our bodies .
47004011	While we are alive , we are constantly handed over to death for Jesus’ sake so that the life of Jesus is also shown in our mortal nature .
47004012	Death is at work in us , but life is at work in you .
47004013	The following is written , “ I believed ; therefore , I spoke . ” We have that same spirit of faith . We also believe ; therefore , we also speak .
47004014	We know that the one who brought the Lord Jesus back to life will also bring us back to life through Jesus . He will present us to God together with you .
47004015	All this is for your sake so that , as God’s kindness overflows in the lives of many people , it will produce even more thanksgiving to the glory of God .
47004016	That is why we are not discouraged . Though outwardly we are wearing out , inwardly we are renewed day by day .
47004017	Our suffering is light and temporary and is producing for us an eternal glory that is greater than anything we can imagine .
47004018	We don’t look for things that can be seen but for things that can’t be seen . Things that can be seen are only temporary . But things that can’t be seen last forever .
47005001	We know that if the life we live here on earth is ever taken down like a tent , we still have a building from God . It is an eternal house in heaven that isn’t made by human hands .
47005002	In our present tent-like existence we sigh , since we long to put on the house we will have in heaven .
47005003	After we have put it on , we won’t be naked .
47005004	While we are in this tent , we sigh . We feel distressed because we don’t want to take off the tent , but we do want to put on the eternal house . Then eternal life will put an end to our mortal existence .
47005005	God has prepared us for this and has given us his Spirit to guarantee it .
47005006	So we are always confident . We know that as long as we are living in these bodies , we are living away from the Lord .
47005007	Indeed , our lives are guided by faith , not by sight .
47005008	We are confident and prefer to live away from this body and to live with the Lord .
47005009	Whether we live in the body or move out of it , our goal is to be pleasing to him .
47005010	All of us must appear in front of Christ’s judgment seat . Then all people will receive what they deserve for the good or evil they have done while living in their bodies .
47005011	As people who know what it means to fear the Lord , we try to persuade others . God already knows what we are , and I hope that you also know what we are .
47005012	We are not trying to show you our qualifications again , but we are giving you an opportunity to be proud of us . Then you can answer those who are proud of their appearance rather than their character .
47005013	So if we were crazy , it was for God . If we are sane , it is for you .
47005014	Clearly , Christ’s love guides us . We are convinced of the fact that one man has died for all people . Therefore , all people have died .
47005015	He died for all people so that those who live should no longer live for themselves but for the man who died and was brought back to life for them .
47005016	So from now on we don’t think of anyone from a human point of view . If we did think of Christ from a human point of view , we don’t anymore .
47005017	Whoever is a believer in Christ is a new creation . The old way of living has disappeared . A new way of living has come into existence .
47005018	God has done all this . He has restored our relationship with him through Christ , and has given us this ministry of restoring relationships .
47005019	In other words , God was using Christ to restore his relationship with humanity . He didn’t hold people’s faults against them , and he has given us this message of restored relationships to tell others .
47005020	Therefore , we are Christ’s representatives , and through us God is calling you . We beg you on behalf of Christ to become reunited with God .
47005021	God had Christ , who was sinless , take our sin so that we might receive God’s approval through him .
47006001	Since we are God’s coworkers , we urge you not to let God’s kindness be wasted on you .
47006002	God says , “ At the right time I heard you . On the day of salvation I helped you . ” Listen , now is God’s acceptable time ! Now is the day of salvation !
47006003	We don’t give people any opportunity to find fault with how we serve .
47006004	Instead , our lives demonstrate that we are God’s servants . We have endured many things : suffering , distress , anxiety ,
47006005	beatings , imprisonments , riots , hard work , sleepless nights , and lack of food .
47006006	People can see our purity , knowledge , patience , kindness , the Holy Spirit’s presence in our lives , our sincere love ,
47006007	truthfulness , and the presence of God’s power . We demonstrate that we are God’s servants
47006008	as we are praised and dishonored , as we are slandered and honored , and as we use what is right to attack what is wrong and to defend the truth . We are treated as dishonest although we are honest ,
47006009	as unknown although we are well-known , as dying although , as you see , we go on living . We are punished , but we are not killed .
47006010	People think we are sad although we’re always glad , that we’re beggars although we make many people spiritually rich , that we have nothing although we possess everything .
47006011	We have been very open in speaking to you Corinthians . We have a place for you in our hearts .
47006012	We haven’t cut you off . Your own emotions have cut you off from us .
47006013	I’m talking to you as I would talk to children . Treat us the same way we’ve treated you . Make a place for us in your hearts too .
47006014	Stop forming inappropriate relationships with unbelievers . Can right and wrong be partners ? Can light have anything in common with darkness ?
47006015	Can Christ agree with the devil ? Can a believer share life with an unbeliever ?
47006016	Can God’s temple contain false gods ? Clearly , we are the temple of the living God . As God said , “ I will live and walk among them . I will be their God , and they will be my people . ”
47006017	The Lord says , “ Get away from unbelievers . Separate yourselves from them . Have nothing to do with anything unclean . Then I will welcome you . ”
47006018	The Lord Almighty says , “ I will be your Father , and you will be my sons and daughters . ”
47007001	Since we have these promises , dear friends , we need to cleanse ourselves from everything that contaminates body and spirit and live a holy life in the fear of God .
47007002	Open your hearts to us . We haven’t treated anyone unjustly , ruined anyone , or cheated anyone .
47007003	I’m not saying this to condemn you . I’ve already told you that you are in our hearts so that we will live and die together .
47007004	I have great confidence in you , and I have a lot of reasons to be proud of you . Even as we suffer , I’m encouraged and feel very happy .
47007005	Ever since we arrived in the province of Macedonia , we’ve had no rest . Instead , we suffer in a number of ways . Outwardly we have conflicts , and inwardly we have fears .
47007006	Yet God , who comforts those who are dejected , comforted us when Titus arrived .
47007007	We were comforted not only by his arrival but also by learning about the comfort he had received while he was with you . He told us how you wanted to see me , how sorry you are for what you’ve done , and how concerned you are about me . This made me even happier .
47007008	If my letter made you uncomfortable , I’m not sorry . But since my letter did make you uncomfortable for a while , I was sorry .
47007009	But I’m happy now , not because I made you uncomfortable , but because the distress I caused you has led you to change the way you think and act . You were distressed in a godly way , so we haven’t done you any harm .
47007010	In fact , to be distressed in a godly way causes people to change the way they think and act and leads them to be saved . No one can regret that . But the distress that the world causes brings only death .
47007011	When you became distressed in a godly way , look at how much devotion it caused you to have . You were ready to clear yourselves of the charges against you . You were disgusted with the wrong that had been done . You were afraid . You wanted to see us . You wanted to show your concern for us . You were ready to punish the wrong that had been done . In every way you have demonstrated that you are people who are innocent in this matter .
47007012	So , when I wrote to you , I didn’t write because of the man who did the wrong or the man who was hurt by it . Rather , I wrote because I wanted you to show your devotion to us in God’s sight .
47007013	This is what has comforted us . In addition to being comforted , we were especially pleased to see how happy Titus was . All of you had put his mind at ease .
47007014	I didn’t have to be ashamed of anything I had said to him when I bragged about you . Since everything we told you was true , our bragging to Titus has also proved to be true .
47007015	His deepest feelings go out to you even more as he remembers how obedient all of you were , and how you welcomed him with fear and trembling .
47007016	I’m pleased that I can be confident about you in every way .
47008001	Brothers and sisters , we want you to know how God showed his kindness to the churches in the province of Macedonia .
47008002	While they were being severely tested by suffering , their overflowing joy , along with their extreme poverty , has made them even more generous .
47008003	I assure you that by their own free will they have given all they could , even more than they could afford .
47008004	They made an appeal to us , begging us to let them participate in the ministry of God’s kindness to his holy people in Jerusalem .
47008005	They did more than we had expected . First , they gave themselves to the Lord and to us , since this was God’s will .
47008006	This led us to urge Titus to finish his work of God’s kindness among you in the same way as he had already started it .
47008007	Indeed , the more your faith , your ability to speak , your knowledge , your dedication , and your love for us increase , the more we want you to participate in this work of God’s kindness .
47008008	I’m not commanding you , but I’m testing how genuine your love is by pointing out the dedication of others .
47008009	You know about the kindness of our Lord Jesus Christ . He was rich , yet for your sake he became poor in order to make you rich through his poverty .
47008010	I’m giving you my opinion because it will be helpful to you . Last year you were not only willing to take a collection but had already started to do it .
47008011	So finish what you began to do . Then your willingness will be matched by what you accomplish
47008012	with whatever contributions you have . Since you are willing to do this , remember that people are accepted if they give what they are able to give . God doesn’t ask for what they don’t have .
47008013	I don’t mean that others should have relief while you have hardship . Rather , it’s a matter of striking a balance .
47008014	At the present time , your surplus fills their need so that their surplus may fill your need . In this way things balance out .
47008015	This is what Scripture says : “ Those who had gathered a lot didn’t have too much , and those who gathered a little didn’t have too little . ”
47008016	I thank God for making Titus as dedicated to you as I am .
47008017	He accepted my request and eagerly went to visit you by his own free will .
47008018	With him we have sent our Christian brother whom all the churches praise for the way he tells the Good News .
47008019	More than that , the churches elected him to travel with us and bring this gift of God’s kindness . We are administering it in a way that brings glory to the Lord and shows that we are doing it willingly .
47008020	We don’t want anyone to find fault with the way we are administering this generous gift .
47008021	We intend to do what is right , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of people .
47008022	We have also sent with them our Christian brother whom we have often tested in many ways and found to be a dedicated worker . We find that he is much more dedicated now than ever because he has so much confidence in you .
47008023	If any questions are raised , remember that Titus is my partner and coworker to help you . The other men are representatives of the churches and bring glory to Christ .
47008024	So give these men a demonstration of your love . Show their congregations that we were right to be proud of you .
47009001	I don’t need to write anything further to you about helping the Christians in Jerusalem .
47009002	I know how willing you are to help , and I brag about you to the believers in the province of Macedonia . I tell them , “ The people of Greece have been ready to send their collection since last year , ” and your enthusiasm has moved most of them to act .
47009003	I’ve sent my coworkers so that when we brag that you’re ready , we can back it up .
47009004	Otherwise , if any Macedonians come with me , they might find out that you’re not ready after all . This would embarrass us for feeling so confident as much as it would embarrass you .
47009005	So I thought that I should encourage our coworkers to visit you before I do and make arrangements for this gift that you had already promised to give . Then it will be the blessing it was intended to be , and it won’t be something you’re forced to do .
47009006	Remember this : The farmer who plants a few seeds will have a very small harvest . But the farmer who plants because he has received God’s blessings will receive a harvest of God’s blessings in return .
47009007	Each of you should give whatever you have decided . You shouldn’t be sorry that you gave or feel forced to give , since God loves a cheerful giver .
47009008	Besides , God will give you his constantly overflowing kindness . Then , when you always have everything you need , you can do more and more good things .
47009009	Scripture says , “ The righteous person gives freely to the poor . His righteousness continues forever . ”
47009010	God gives seed to the farmer and food to those who need to eat . God will also give you seed and multiply it . In your lives he will increase the things you do that have his approval .
47009011	God will make you rich enough so that you can always be generous . Your generosity will produce thanksgiving to God because of us .
47009012	What you do to serve others not only provides for the needs of God’s people , but also produces more and more prayers of thanksgiving to God .
47009013	You will honor God through this genuine act of service because of your commitment to spread the Good News of Christ and because of your generosity in sharing with them and everyone else .
47009014	With deep affection they will pray for you because of the extreme kindness that God has shown you .
47009015	I thank God for his gift that words cannot describe .
47010001	I , Paul , make my appeal to you with the gentleness and kindness of Christ . I’m the one who is humble when I’m with you but forceful toward you when I’m not with you .
47010002	I beg you that when I am with you I won’t have to deal forcefully with you . I expect I will have to because some people think that we are only guided by human motives .
47010003	Of course we are human , but we don’t fight like humans .
47010004	The weapons we use in our fight are not made by humans . Rather , they are powerful weapons from God . With them we destroy people’s defenses , that is , their arguments
47010005	and all their intellectual arrogance that oppose the knowledge of God . We take every thought captive so that it is obedient to Christ .
47010006	We are ready to punish every act of disobedience when you have become completely obedient .
47010007	Look at the plain facts ! If anyone is confident he belongs to Christ , he should take note that we also belong to Christ .
47010008	So , if I brag a little too much about the authority which the Lord gave us , I’m not ashamed . The Lord gave us this authority to help you , not to hurt you .
47010009	I don’t want you to think that I’m trying to frighten you with my letters .
47010010	I know that someone is saying that my letters are powerful and strong , but that I’m a weakling and a terrible speaker .
47010011	The person who is saying those things should take note of this fact : When we are with you we will do the things that we wrote about in our letters when we weren’t with you .
47010012	We wouldn’t put ourselves in the same class with or compare ourselves to those who are bold enough to make their own recommendations . Certainly , when they measure themselves by themselves and compare themselves to themselves , they show how foolish they are .
47010013	How can we brag about things that no one can evaluate ? Instead , we will only brag about what God has given us to do—coming to the city of Corinth where you live .
47010014	It’s not as though we hadn’t already been to Corinth . We’re not overstating the facts . The fact is that we were the first to arrive in Corinth with the Good News about Christ .
47010015	How can we brag about things done by others that can’t be evaluated ? We have confidence that as your faith grows , you will think enough of us to give us the help we need to carry out our assignment—
47010016	spreading the Good News in the regions far beyond you . We won’t brag about things already accomplished by someone else .
47010017	“ Whoever brags should brag about what the Lord has done . ”
47010018	It isn’t the person who makes his own recommendation who receives approval , but the person whom the Lord recommends .
47011001	I want you to put up with a little foolishness from me . I’m sure that you will .
47011002	I’m as protective of you as God is . After all , you’re a virgin whom I promised in marriage to one man—Christ .
47011003	However , I’m afraid that as the snake deceived Eve by its tricks , so your minds may somehow be lured away from your sincere and pure devotion to Christ .
47011004	When someone comes to you telling about another Jesus whom we didn’t tell you about , you’re willing to put up with it . When you receive a spirit that is different from the Spirit you received earlier , you’re also willing to put up with that .
