When someone tells you good news that is different from the Good News you already accepted , you’re willing to put up with that too .
47011005	I don’t think I’m inferior in any way to your super-apostles .
47011006	Even though I’m not good with words , I know what I’m talking about . Timothy and I have made this clear to you in every possible way .
47011007	Did I commit a sin when I humbled myself by telling you the Good News of God free of charge so that you could become important ?
47011008	I robbed other churches by taking pay from them to serve you .
47011009	When I was with you and needed something , I didn’t bother any of you for help . My friends from the province of Macedonia supplied everything I needed . I kept myself from being a financial burden to you in any way , and I will continue to do that .
47011010	As surely as I have Christ’s truth , my bragging will not be silenced anywhere in Greece .
47011011	Why ? Because I don’t love you ? God knows that I do love you .
47011012	But I’ll go on doing what I’m doing . This will take away the opportunity of those people who want to brag because they think they’re like us .
47011013	People who brag like this are false apostles . They are dishonest workers , since they disguise themselves as Christ’s apostles .
47011014	And no wonder , even Satan disguises himself as an angel of light .
47011015	So it’s not surprising if his servants also disguise themselves as servants who have God’s approval . In the end they will get what they deserve .
47011016	Again I say that no one should think that I’m a fool . But if you do , then take me for a fool so that I can also brag a little .
47011017	What I say as I start bragging is foolishness . It’s not something I would say if I were speaking for the Lord .
47011018	Since it’s common for people to brag , I’ll do it too .
47011019	You’re wise , so you’ll gladly put up with fools .
47011020	When someone makes you slaves , consumes your wealth , seizes your property , orders you around , or slaps your faces , you put up with it .
47011021	I’m ashamed to admit it , but Timothy and I don’t have the strength to do those things to you . Whatever other people dare to brag about , I , like a fool , can also brag about .
47011022	Are they Hebrews ? So am I . Are they Israelites ? So am I . Are they Abraham’s descendants ? So am I .
47011023	Are they Christ’s servants ? It’s insane to say it , but I’m a far better one . I’ve done much more work , been in prison many more times , been beaten more severely , and have faced death more often .
47011024	Five times the Jewish leaders had me beaten with 39 lashes ;
47011025	three times Roman officials had me beaten with clubs . Once people tried to stone me to death ; three times I was shipwrecked , and I drifted on the sea for a night and a day .
47011026	Because I’ve traveled a lot , I’ve faced dangers from raging rivers , from robbers , from my own people , and from other people . I’ve faced dangers in the city , in the open country , on the sea , and from believers who turned out to be false friends .
47011027	Because I’ve had to work so hard , I’ve often gone without sleep , been hungry and thirsty , and gone without food and without proper clothes during cold weather .
47011028	Besides these external matters , I have the daily pressure of my anxiety about all the churches .
47011029	When anyone is weak , I’m weak too . When anyone is caught in a trap , I’m also harmed .
47011030	If I must brag , I will brag about the things that show how weak I am .
47011031	The God and Father of the Lord Jesus , who is praised forever , knows that I’m not lying .
47011032	The governor under King Aretas put guards around the city of Damascus to catch me .
47011033	So I was let down in a basket through an opening in the wall and escaped from him .
47012001	I must brag , although it doesn’t do any good . I’ll go on to visions and revelations from the Lord .
47012002	I know a follower of Christ who was snatched away to the third heaven fourteen years ago . I don’t know whether this happened to him physically or spiritually . Only God knows .
47012003	I know that this person
47012004	was snatched away to paradise where he heard things that can’t be expressed in words , things that humans cannot put into words . I don’t know whether this happened to him physically or spiritually . Only God knows .
47012005	I’ll brag about this person , but I won’t brag about myself unless it’s about my weaknesses .
47012006	If I ever wanted to brag , I wouldn’t be a fool . Instead , I would be telling the truth . But I’m going to spare you so that no one may think more of me than what he sees or hears about me ,
47012007	especially because of the excessive number of revelations that I’ve had . Therefore , to keep me from becoming conceited , I am forced to deal with a recurring problem . That problem , Satan’s messenger , torments me to keep me from being conceited .
47012008	I begged the Lord three times to take it away from me .
47012009	But he told me : “ My kindness is all you need . My power is strongest when you are weak . ” So I will brag even more about my weaknesses in order that Christ’s power will live in me .
47012010	Therefore , I accept weakness , mistreatment , hardship , persecution , and difficulties suffered for Christ . It’s clear that when I’m weak , I’m strong .
47012011	I have become a fool . You forced me to be one . You should have recommended me to others . Even if I’m nothing , I wasn’t inferior in any way to your super-apostles .
47012012	While I was among you I patiently did the signs , wonders , and miracles which prove that I’m an apostle .
47012013	How were you treated worse than the other churches , except that I didn’t bother you for help ? Forgive me for this wrong !
47012014	I’m ready to visit you for a third time , and I won’t bother you for help . I don’t want your possessions . Instead , I want you . Children shouldn’t have to provide for their parents , but parents should provide for their children .
47012015	I will be very glad to spend whatever I have . I’ll even give myself for you . Do you love me less because I love you so much ?
47012016	You agree , then , that I haven’t been a burden to you . Was I a clever person who trapped you by some trick ?
47012017	Did I take advantage of you through any of the men I sent you ?
47012018	I encouraged Titus to visit you , and I sent my friend with him . Did Titus take advantage of you ? Didn’t we have the same motives and do things the same way ?
47012019	Have you been thinking all along that we’re trying to defend ourselves to you ? We speak as Christ’s people in God’s sight . Everything we do , dear friends , is for your benefit .
47012020	I’m afraid that I may come and find you different from what I want you to be , and that you may find me different from what you want me to be . I’m afraid that there may be rivalry , jealousy , hot tempers , selfish ambition , slander , gossip , arrogance , and disorderly conduct .
47012021	I’m afraid that when I come to you again , my God may humble me . I may have to grieve over many who formerly led sinful lives and have not changed the way they think and act about the perversion , sexual sins , and promiscuity in which they have been involved .
47013001	This is the third time that I’ll be visiting you . Every accusation must be verified by two or three witnesses .
47013002	I already warned you when I was with you the second time , and even though I’m not there now , I’m warning you again . When I visit you again , I won’t spare you . That goes for all those who formerly led sinful lives as well as for all the others .
47013003	Since you want proof that Christ is speaking through me , that’s what you’ll get . Christ isn’t weak in dealing with you . Instead , he makes his power felt among you .
47013004	He was weak when he was crucified , but by God’s power he lives . We are weak with him , but by God’s power we will live for you with his help .
47013005	Examine yourselves to see whether you are still in the Christian faith . Test yourselves ! Don’t you recognize that you are people in whom Jesus Christ lives ? Could it be that you’re failing the test ?
47013006	I hope that you will realize that we haven’t failed the test .
47013007	We pray to God that you won’t do anything wrong . It’s not that we want to prove that we’ve passed the test . Rather , we want you to do whatever is right , even if we seem to have failed .
47013008	We can’t do anything against the truth but only to help the truth .
47013009	We’re glad when we are weak and you are strong . We are also praying for your improvement .
47013010	That’s why I’m writing this letter while I’m not with you . When I am with you I don’t want to be harsh by using the authority that the Lord gave me . The Lord gave us this authority to help you , not to hurt you .
47013011	With that , brothers and sisters , I must say goodbye . Make sure that you improve . Accept my encouragement . Share the same attitude and live in peace . The God of love and peace will be with you .
47013012	Greet one another with a holy kiss . All of God’s holy people greet you .
47013013	
47013014	May the Lord Jesus Christ’s good will , God’s love , and the Holy Spirit’s presence be with all of you !
48001001	From Paul—an apostle chosen not by any group or individual but by Jesus Christ and God the Father who brought him back to life—
48001002	and all the believers who are with me . To the churches in Galatia .
48001003	Good will and peace from God the Father and our Lord Jesus Christ are yours !
48001004	In order to free us from this present evil world , Christ took the punishment for our sins , because that was what our God and Father wanted .
48001005	Glory belongs to our God and Father forever ! Amen .
48001006	I’m surprised that you’re so quickly deserting Christ , who called you in his kindness , to follow a different kind of good news .
48001007	But what some people are calling good news is not really good news at all . They are confusing you . They want to distort the Good News about Christ .
48001008	Whoever tells you good news that is different from the Good News we gave you should be condemned to hell , even if he is one of us or an angel from heaven .
48001009	I’m now telling you again what we’ve told you in the past : If anyone tells you good news that is different from the Good News you received , that person should be condemned to hell .
48001010	Am I saying this now to win the approval of people or God ? Am I trying to please people ? If I were still trying to please people , I would not be Christ’s servant .
48001011	I want you to know , brothers and sisters , that the Good News I have spread is not a human message .
48001012	I didn’t receive it from any person . I wasn’t taught it , but Jesus Christ revealed it to me .
48001013	You heard about the way I once lived when I followed the Jewish religion . You heard how I violently persecuted God’s church and tried to destroy it .
48001014	You also heard how I was far ahead of other Jews in my age group in following the Jewish religion . I had become that fanatical for the traditions of my ancestors .
48001015	But God , who appointed me before I was born and who called me by his kindness , was pleased
48001016	to show me his Son . He did this so that I would tell people who are not Jewish that his Son is the Good News . When this happened , I didn’t talk it over with any other person .
48001017	I didn’t even go to Jerusalem to see those who were apostles before I was . Instead , I went to Arabia and then came back to Damascus .
48001018	Then , three years later I went to Jerusalem to become personally acquainted with Cephas . I stayed with him for fifteen days .
48001019	I didn’t see any other apostle . I only saw James , the Lord’s brother .
48001020	( God is my witness that what I’m writing is not a lie . )
48001021	Then I went to the regions of Syria and Cilicia .
48001022	The churches of Christ in Judea didn’t know me personally .
48001023	The only thing they had heard was this : “ The man who persecuted us is now spreading the faith that he once tried to destroy . ”
48001024	So they praised God for what had happened to me .
48002001	Then 14 years later I went to Jerusalem again with Barnabas . I also took Titus along .
48002002	I went in response to a revelation from God . I showed them the way I spread the Good News among people who are not Jewish . I did this in a private meeting with those recognized as important people to see whether all my efforts have been wasted .
48002003	Titus was with me , and although he is Greek , no one forced him to be circumcised .
48002004	False Christians were brought in . They slipped in as spies to learn about the freedom Christ Jesus gives us . They hoped to find a way to control us .
48002005	But we did not give in to them for a moment , so that the truth of the Good News would always be yours .
48002006	Those who were recognized as important people didn’t add a single thing to my message . ( What sort of people they were makes no difference to me , since God doesn’t play favorites . )
48002007	In fact , they saw that I had been entrusted with telling the Good News to people who are not circumcised as Peter had been entrusted to tell it to those who are circumcised .
48002008	The one who made Peter an apostle to Jewish people also made me an apostle to people who are not Jewish .
48002009	James , Cephas , and John ( who were recognized as the most important people ) acknowledged that God had given me this special gift . So they shook hands with Barnabas and me , agreeing to be our partners . It was understood that we would work among the people who are not Jewish and they would work among Jewish people .
48002010	The only thing they asked us to do was to remember the poor , the very thing which I was eager to do .
48002011	When Cephas came to Antioch , I had to openly oppose him because he was completely wrong .
48002012	He ate with people who were not Jewish until some men James had sent from Jerusalem arrived . Then Cephas drew back and would not associate with people who were not Jewish . He was afraid of those who insisted that circumcision was necessary .
48002013	The other Jewish Christians also joined him in this hypocrisy . Even Barnabas was swept along with them .
48002014	But I saw that they were not properly following the truth of the Good News . So I told Cephas in front of everyone , “ You’re Jewish , but you live like a person who is not Jewish . So how can you insist that people who are not Jewish must live like Jews ? ”
48002015	We are Jewish by birth , not sinners from other nations .
48002016	Yet , we know that people don’t receive God’s approval because of their own efforts to live according to a set of standards , but only by believing in Jesus Christ . So we also believed in Jesus Christ in order to receive God’s approval because of faith in Christ and not because of our own efforts . People won’t receive God’s approval because of their own efforts to live according to a set of standards .
48002017	If we , the same people who are searching for God’s approval in Christ , are still sinners , does that mean that Christ encourages us to sin ? That’s unthinkable !
48002018	If I rebuild something that I’ve torn down , I admit that I was wrong to tear it down .
48002019	When I tried to obey the law’s standards , those laws killed me . As a result , I live in a relationship with God . I have been crucified with Christ .
48002020	I no longer live , but Christ lives in me . The life I now live I live by believing in God’s Son , who loved me and took the punishment for my sins .
48002021	I don’t reject God’s kindness . If we receive God’s approval by obeying laws , then Christ’s death was pointless .
48003001	You stupid people of Galatia ! Who put you under an evil spell ? Wasn’t Christ Jesus’ crucifixion clearly described to you ?
48003002	I want to learn only one thing from you . Did you receive the Spirit by your own efforts to live according to a set of standards or by believing what you heard ?
48003003	Are you that stupid ? Did you begin in a spiritual way only to end up doing things in a human way ?
48003004	Did you suffer so much for nothing ? I doubt that it was for nothing !
48003005	Does God supply you with the Spirit and work miracles among you through your own efforts or through believing what you heard ?
48003006	Abraham serves as an example . He believed God , and that faith was regarded by God to be his approval of Abraham .
48003007	You must understand that people who have faith are Abraham’s descendants .
48003008	Scripture saw ahead of time that God would give his approval to non-Jewish people who have faith . So Scripture announced the Good News to Abraham ahead of time when it said , “ Through you all the people of the world will be blessed . ”
48003009	So people who believe are blessed together with Abraham , the man of faith .
48003010	Certainly , there is a curse on all who rely on their own efforts to live according to a set of standards because Scripture says , “ Whoever doesn’t obey everything that is written in Moses’ Teachings is cursed . ”
48003011	No one receives God’s approval by obeying the law’s standards since , “ The person who has God’s approval will live because of faith . ”
48003012	Laws have nothing to do with faith , but , “ Whoever obeys laws will live because of the laws he obeys . ”
48003013	Christ paid the price to free us from the curse that God’s laws bring by becoming cursed instead of us . Scripture says , “ Everyone who is hung on a tree is cursed . ”
48003014	Christ paid the price so that the blessing promised to Abraham would come to all the people of the world through Jesus Christ and we would receive the promised Spirit through faith .
48003015	Brothers and sisters , let me use an example from everyday life . No one can cancel a person’s will or add conditions to it once that will is put into effect .
48003016	The promises were spoken to Abraham and to his descendant . Scripture doesn’t say , “ descendants , ” referring to many , but “ your descendant , ” referring to one . That descendant is Christ .
48003017	This is what I mean : The laws given to Moses 430 years after God had already put his promise to Abraham into effect didn’t cancel the promise to Abraham .
48003018	If we have to gain the inheritance by following those laws , then it no longer comes to us because of the promise . However , God freely gave the inheritance to Abraham through a promise .
48003019	What , then , is the purpose of the laws given to Moses ? They were added to identify what wrongdoing is . Moses’ laws did this until the descendant to whom the promise was given came . It was put into effect through angels , using a mediator .
48003020	A mediator is not used when there is only one person involved , and God has acted on his own .
48003021	Does this mean , then , that the laws given to Moses contradict God’s promises ? That’s unthinkable ! If those laws could give us life , then certainly we would receive God’s approval because we obeyed them .
48003022	But Scripture states that the whole world is controlled by the power of sin . Therefore , a promise based on faith in Jesus Christ could be given to those who believe .
48003023	We were kept under control by Moses’ laws until this faith came . We were under their control until this faith which was about to come would be revealed .
48003024	Before Christ came , Moses’ laws served as our guardian . Christ came so that we could receive God’s approval because of faith .
48003025	But now that this faith has come , we are no longer under the control of a guardian .
48003026	You are all God’s children by believing in Christ Jesus .
48003027	Clearly , all of you who were baptized in Christ’s name have clothed yourselves with Christ .
48003028	There are neither Jews nor Greeks , slaves nor free people , males nor females . You are all the same in Christ Jesus .
48003029	If you belong to Christ , then you are Abraham’s descendants and heirs , as God promised .
48004001	Let me explain further . As long as an heir is a child , he is no better off than a slave , even though he owns everything .
48004002	He is placed under the control of guardians and trustees until the time set by his father .
48004003	It was the same way with us . When we were children , we were slaves to the principles of this world .
48004004	But when the right time came , God sent his Son into the world . A woman gave birth to him , and he came under the control of God’s laws .
48004005	God sent him to pay for the freedom of those who were controlled by these laws so that we would be adopted as his children .
48004006	Because you are God’s children , God has sent the Spirit of his Son into us to call out , “ Abba ! Father ! ”
48004007	So you are no longer slaves but God’s children . Since you are God’s children , God has also made you heirs .
48004008	When you didn’t know God , you were slaves to things which are really not gods at all .
48004009	But now you know God , or rather , God knows you . So how can you turn back again to the powerless and bankrupt principles of this world ? Why do you want to become their slaves all over again ?
48004010	You religiously observe days , months , seasons , and years !
48004011	I’m afraid for you . Maybe the hard work I spent on you has been wasted .
48004012	Brothers and sisters , I beg you to become like me . After all , I became like you were . You didn’t do anything wrong to me .
48004013	You know that the first time I brought you the Good News I was ill .
48004014	Even though my illness was difficult for you , you didn’t despise or reject me . Instead , you welcomed me as if I were God’s messenger or Christ Jesus himself .
48004015	What happened to your positive attitude ? It’s a fact that if it had been possible , you would have torn out your eyes and given them to me .
48004016	Can it be that I have become your enemy for telling you the truth ?
48004017	These people who distort the Good News are devoted to you , but not in a good way . They don’t want you to associate with me so that you will be devoted only to them .
48004018	( Devotion to a good cause is always good , even when I’m not with you . )
48004019	My children , I am suffering birth pains for you again until Christ is formed in you .
48004020	I wish I were with you right now so that I could change the tone of my voice . I’m completely puzzled by what you’ve done !
48004021	Those who want to be controlled by Moses’ laws should tell me something . Are you really listening to what Moses’ Teachings say ?
48004022	Scripture says that Abraham had two sons , one by a woman who was a slave and the other by a free woman .
48004023	Now , the son of the slave woman was conceived in a natural way , but the son of the free woman was conceived through a promise made to Abraham .
48004024	I’m going to use these historical events as an illustration . The women illustrate two arrangements . The one woman , Hagar , is the arrangement made on Mount Sinai . Her children are born into slavery .
48004025	Hagar is Mount Sinai in Arabia . She is like Jerusalem today because she and her children are slaves .
48004026	But the Jerusalem that is above is free , and she is our mother .
48004027	Scripture says : “ Rejoice , women who cannot get pregnant , who cannot give birth to any children ! Break into shouting , those who feel no pains of childbirth ! Because the deserted woman will have more childrenthan the woman who has a husband . ”
48004028	Now you , brothers and sisters , are children of the promise like Isaac .
48004029	Furthermore , at that time the son who was conceived in a natural way persecuted the son conceived in a spiritual way . That’s exactly what’s happening now .
48004030	But what does Scripture say ? “ Get rid of the slave woman and her son , because the son of the slave woman must never share the inheritance with the son of the free woman . ”
48004031	Brothers and sisters , we are not children of a slave woman but of the free woman .
48005001	Christ has freed us so that we may enjoy the benefits of freedom . Therefore , be firm in this freedom , and don’t become slaves again .
48005002	I , Paul , can guarantee that if you allow yourselves to be circumcised , Christ will be of no benefit to you .
48005003	Again , I insist that everyone who allows himself to be circumcised must realize that he obligates himself to do everything Moses’ Teachings demand .
48005004	Those of you who try to earn God’s approval by obeying his laws have been cut off from Christ . You have fallen out of God’s favor .
48005005	However , in our spiritual nature , faith causes us to wait eagerly for the confidence that comes with God’s approval .
48005006	As far as our relationship to Christ Jesus is concerned , it doesn’t matter whether we are circumcised or not . But what matters is a faith that expresses itself through love .
48005007	You were doing so well . Who stopped you from being influenced by the truth ?
48005008	The arguments of the person who is influencing you do not come from the one who is calling you .
48005009	A little yeast spreads through the whole batch of dough .
48005010	The Lord gives me confidence that you will not disagree with this . However , the one who is confusing you will suffer God’s judgment regardless of who he is .
48005011	Brothers and sisters , if I am still preaching that circumcision is necessary , why am I still being persecuted ? In that case the cross wouldn’t be offensive anymore .
48005012	I wish those troublemakers would castrate themselves .
48005013	You were indeed called to be free , brothers and sisters . Don’t turn this freedom into an excuse for your corrupt nature to express itself . Rather , serve each other through love .
48005014	All of Moses’ Teachings are summarized in a single statement , “ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ”
48005015	But if you criticize and attack each other , be careful that you don’t destroy each other .
48005016	Let me explain further . Live your life as your spiritual nature directs you . Then you will never follow through on what your corrupt nature wants .
48005017	What your corrupt nature wants is contrary to what your spiritual nature wants , and what your spiritual nature wants is contrary to what your corrupt nature wants . They are opposed to each other . As a result , you don’t always do what you intend to do .
48005018	If your spiritual nature is your guide , you are not subject to Moses’ laws .
48005019	Now , the effects of the corrupt nature are obvious : illicit sex , perversion , promiscuity ,
48005020	idolatry , drug use , hatred , rivalry , jealousy , angry outbursts , selfish ambition , conflict , factions ,
48005021	envy , drunkenness , wild partying , and things like that . I’ve told you in the past and I’m telling you again that people who do things like that will not inherit the kingdom of God .
48005022	But the spiritual nature produces love , joy , peace , patience , kindness , goodness , faithfulness ,
48005023	gentleness , and self-control . There are no laws against things like that .
48005024	Those who belong to Christ Jesus have crucified their corrupt nature along with its passions and desires .
48005025	If we live by our spiritual nature , then our lives need to conform to our spiritual nature .
48005026	We can’t allow ourselves to act arrogantly and to provoke or envy each other .
48006001	Brothers and sisters , if a person gets trapped by wrongdoing , those of you who are spiritual should help that person turn away from doing wrong . Do it in a gentle way . At the same time watch yourself so that you also are not tempted .
48006002	Help carry each other’s burdens . In this way you will follow Christ’s teachings .
48006003	So if any one of you thinks you’re important when you’re really not , you’re only fooling yourself .
48006004	Each of you must examine your own actions . Then you can be proud of your own accomplishments without comparing yourself to others .
48006005	Assume your own responsibility .
48006006	The person who is taught God’s word should share all good things with his teacher .
48006007	Make no mistake about this : You can never make a fool out of God . Whatever you plant is what you’ll harvest .
48006008	If you plant in the soil of your corrupt nature , you will harvest destruction . But if you plant in the soil of your spiritual nature , you will harvest everlasting life .
48006009	We can’t allow ourselves to get tired of living the right way . Certainly , each of us will receive everlasting life at the proper time , if we don’t give up .
48006010	Whenever we have the opportunity , we have to do what is good for everyone , especially for the family of believers .
48006011	Look at how large the letters in these words are because I’m writing this myself .
48006012	These people who want to make a big deal out of a physical thing are trying to force you to be circumcised . Their only aim is to avoid persecution because of the cross of Christ .
48006013	It’s clear that not even those who had themselves circumcised did this to follow Jewish laws . Yet , they want you to be circumcised so that they can brag about what was done to your body .
48006014	But it’s unthinkable that I could ever brag about anything except the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ . By his cross my relationship to the world and its relationship to me have been crucified .
48006015	Certainly , it doesn’t matter whether a person is circumcised or not . Rather , what matters is being a new creation .
48006016	Peace and mercy will come to rest on all those who conform to this principle . They are the Israel of God .
48006017	From now on , don’t make any trouble for me ! After all , I carry the scars of Jesus on my body .
48006018	May the good will of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit , brothers and sisters ! Amen .
49001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by God’s will . To God’s holy and faithful people who are united with Christ in the city of Ephesus .
49001002	Good will and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ are yours !
49001003	Praise the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ! Through Christ , God has blessed us with every spiritual blessing that heaven has to offer .
49001004	Before the creation of the world , he chose us through Christ to be holy and perfect in his presence .
49001005	Because of his love he had already decided to adopt us through Jesus Christ . He freely chose to do this
49001006	so that the kindness he had given us in his dear Son would be praised and given glory .
49001007	Through the blood of his Son , we are set free from our sins . God forgives our failures because of his overflowing kindness .
49001008	He poured out his kindness by giving us every kind of wisdom and insight
49001009	when he revealed the mystery of his plan to us . He had decided to do this through Christ .
49001010	He planned to bring all of history to its goal in Christ . Then Christ would be the head of everything in heaven and on earth .
49001011	God also decided ahead of time to choose us through Christ according to his plan , which makes everything work the way he intends .
49001012	He planned all of this so that we who had already focused our hope on Christ would praise him and give him glory .
49001013	You heard and believed the message of truth , the Good News that he has saved you . In him you were sealed with the Holy Spirit whom he promised .
49001014	This Holy Spirit is the guarantee that we will receive our inheritance . We have this guarantee until we are set free to belong to him . God receives praise and glory for this .
49001015	I , too , have heard about your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all of God’s people . For this reason
49001016	I never stop thanking God for you . I always remember you in my prayers .
49001017	I pray that the glorious Father , the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , would give you a spirit of wisdom and revelation as you come to know Christ better .
49001018	Then you will have deeper insight . You will know the confidence that he calls you to have and the glorious wealth that God’s people will inherit .
49001019	You will also know the unlimited greatness of his power as it works with might and strength for us , the believers .
49001020	He worked with that same power in Christ when he brought him back to life and gave him the highest position in heaven .
49001021	He is far above all rulers , authorities , powers , lords , and all other names that can be named , not only in this present world but also in the world to come .
49001022	God has put everything under the control of Christ . He has made Christ the head of everything for the good of the church .
49001023	The church is Christ’s body and completes him as he fills everything in every way .
49002001	You were once dead because of your failures and sins .
49002002	You followed the ways of this present world and its spiritual ruler . This ruler continues to work in people who refuse to obey God .
49002003	All of us once lived among these people , and followed the desires of our corrupt nature . We did what our corrupt desires and thoughts wanted us to do . So , because of our nature , we deserved God’s anger just like everyone else .
49002004	But God is rich in mercy because of his great love for us .
49002005	We were dead because of our failures , but he made us alive together with Christ . ( It is God’s kindness that saved you . )
49002006	God has brought us back to life together with Christ Jesus and has given us a position in heaven with him .
49002007	He did this through Christ Jesus out of his generosity to us in order to show his extremely rich kindness in the world to come .
49002008	God saved you through faith as an act of kindness . You had nothing to do with it . Being saved is a gift from God .
49002009	It’s not the result of anything you’ve done , so no one can brag about it .
49002010	God has made us what we are . He has created us in Christ Jesus to live lives filled with good works that he has prepared for us to do .
49002011	Remember that once you were not Jewish physically . Those who called themselves “ the circumcised ” because of what they had done to their bodies called you “ the uncircumcised . ”
49002012	Also , at that time you were without Christ . You were excluded from citizenship in Israel , and the pledges God made in his promise were foreign to you . You had no hope and were in the world without God .
49002013	But now through Christ Jesus you , who were once far away , have been brought near by the blood of Christ .
49002014	So he is our peace . In his body he has made Jewish and non-Jewish people one by breaking down the wall of hostility that kept them apart .
49002015	He brought an end to the commandments and demands found in Moses’ Teachings so that he could take Jewish and non-Jewish people and create one new humanity in himself . So he made peace .
49002016	He also brought them back to God in one body by his cross , on which he killed the hostility .
49002017	He came with the Good News of peace for you who were far away and for those who were near .
49002018	So Jewish and non-Jewish people can go to the Father in one Spirit .
49002019	That is why you are no longer foreigners and outsiders but citizens together with God’s people and members of God’s family .
49002020	You are built on the foundation of the apostles and prophets . Christ Jesus himself is the cornerstone .
49002021	In him all the parts of the building fit together and grow into a holy temple in the Lord .
49002022	Through him you , also , are being built in the Spirit together with others into a place where God lives .
49003001	This is the reason I , Paul , am the prisoner of Christ Jesus for those of you who are not Jewish .
49003002	Certainly , you have heard how God gave me the responsibility of bringing his kindness to you .
49003003	You have heard that he let me know this mystery through a revelation . I’ve already written to you about this briefly .
49003004	When you read this , you’ll see that I understand the mystery about Christ .
49003005	In the past , this mystery was not known by people as it is now . The Spirit has now revealed it to his holy apostles and prophets .
49003006	This mystery is the Good News that people who are not Jewish have the same inheritance as Jewish people do . They belong to the same body and share the same promise that God made in Christ Jesus .
49003007	I became a servant of this Good News through God’s kindness freely given to me when his power worked in me .
49003008	I am the least of all God’s people . Yet , God showed me his kindness by allowing me to spread the Good News of the immeasurable wealth of Christ to people who are not Jewish .
49003009	He allowed me to explain the way this mystery works . God , who created all things , kept it hidden in the past .
49003010	He did this so that now , through the church , he could let the rulers and authorities in heaven know his infinite wisdom .
49003011	This was God’s plan for all of history which he carried out through Christ Jesus our Lord .
49003012	We can go to God with bold confidence through faith in Christ .
49003013	So then , I ask you not to become discouraged by the troubles I suffer for you . In fact , my troubles bring you glory .
49003014	This is the reason I kneel in the presence of the Father
49003015	from whom all the family in heaven and on earth receives its name .
49003016	I’m asking God to give you a gift from the wealth of his glory . I pray that he would give you inner strength and power through his Spirit .
49003017	Then Christ will live in you through faith . I also pray that love may be the ground into which you sink your roots and on which you have your foundation .
49003018	This way , with all of God’s people you will be able to understand how wide , long , high , and deep his love is .
49003019	You will know Christ’s love , which goes far beyond any knowledge . I am praying this so that you may be completely filled with God .
49003020	Glory belongs to God , whose power is at work in us . By this power he can do infinitely more than we can ask or imagine .
49003021	Glory belongs to God in the church and in Christ Jesus for all time and eternity ! Amen .
49004001	I , a prisoner in the Lord , encourage you to live the kind of life which proves that God has called you .
49004002	Be humble and gentle in every way . Be patient with each other and lovingly accept each other .
49004003	Through the peace that ties you together , do your best to maintain the unity that the Spirit gives .
49004004	There is one body and one Spirit . In the same way you were called to share one hope .
49004005	There is one Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
49004006	one God and Father of all , who is over everything , through everything , and in everything .
49004007	God’s favor has been given to each of us . It was measured out to us by Christ who gave it .
49004008	That’s why the Scriptures say : “ When he went to the highest place , he took captive those who had captured usand gave gifts to people . ”
49004009	Now what does it mean that he went up except that he also had gone down to the lowest parts of the earth ?
49004010	The one who had gone down also went up above all the heavens so that he fills everything .
49004011	He also gave apostles , prophets , missionaries , as well as pastors and teachers as gifts to his church .
49004012	Their purpose is to prepare God’s people to serve and to build up the body of Christ .
49004013	This is to continue until all of us are united in our faith and in our knowledge about God’s Son , until we become mature , until we measure up to Christ , who is the standard .
49004014	Then we will no longer be little children , tossed and carried about by all kinds of teachings that change like the wind . We will no longer be influenced by people who use cunning and clever strategies to lead us astray .
49004015	Instead , as we lovingly speak the truth , we will grow up completely in our relationship to Christ , who is the head .
49004016	He makes the whole body fit together and unites it through the support of every joint . As each and every part does its job , he makes the body grow so that it builds itself up in love .
49004017	So I tell you and encourage you in the Lord’s name not to live any longer like other people in the world . Their minds are set on worthless things .
49004018	They can’t understand because they are in the dark . They are excluded from the life that God approves of because of their ignorance and stubbornness .
49004019	Since they no longer have any sense of shame , they have become promiscuous . They practice every kind of sexual perversion with a constant desire for more .
49004020	But that is not what you learned from Christ’s teachings .
49004021	You have certainly heard his message and have been taught his ways . The truth is in Jesus .
49004022	You were taught to change the way you were living . The person you used to be will ruin you through desires that deceive you .
49004023	However , you were taught to have a new attitude .
49004024	You were also taught to become a new person created to be like God , truly righteous and holy .
49004025	So then , get rid of lies . Speak the truth to each other , because we are all members of the same body .
49004026	Be angry without sinning . Don’t go to bed angry .
49004027	Don’t give the devil any opportunity to work .
49004028	Thieves must quit stealing and , instead , they must work hard . They should do something good with their hands so that they’ll have something to share with those in need .
49004029	Don’t say anything that would hurt another person . Instead , speak only what is good so that you can give help wherever it is needed . That way , what you say will help those who hear you .
49004030	Don’t give God’s Holy Spirit any reason to be upset with you . He has put his seal on you for the day you will be set free from the world of sin .
49004031	Get rid of your bitterness , hot tempers , anger , loud quarreling , cursing , and hatred .
49004032	Be kind to each other , sympathetic , forgiving each other as God has forgiven you through Christ .
49005001	Imitate God , since you are the children he loves .
49005002	Live in love as Christ also loved us . He gave his life for us as an offering and sacrifice , a soothing aroma to God .
49005003	Don’t let sexual sin , perversion of any kind , or greed even be mentioned among you . This is not appropriate behavior for God’s holy people .
49005004	It’s not right that dirty stories , foolish talk , or obscene jokes should be mentioned among you either . Instead , give thanks to God .
49005005	You know very well that no person who is involved in sexual sin , perversion , or greed ( which means worshiping wealth ) can have any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
49005006	Don’t let anyone deceive you with meaningless words . It is because of sins like these that God’s anger comes to those who refuse to obey him .
49005007	Don’t be partners with them .
49005008	Once you lived in the dark , but now the Lord has filled you with light . Live as children who have light .
49005009	Light produces everything that is good , that has God’s approval , and that is true .
49005010	Determine which things please the Lord .
49005011	Have nothing to do with the useless works that darkness produces . Instead , expose them for what they are .
49005012	It is shameful to talk about what some people do in secret .
49005013	Light exposes the true character of everything
49005014	because light makes everything easy to see . That’s why it says : “ Wake up , sleeper ! Rise from the dead , and Christ will shine on you . ”
49005015	So then , be very careful how you live . Don’t live like foolish people but like wise people .
49005016	Make the most of your opportunities because these are evil days .
49005017	So don’t be foolish , but understand what the Lord wants .
49005018	Don’t get drunk on wine , which leads to wild living . Instead , be filled with the Spirit
49005019	by reciting psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs for your own good . Sing and make music to the Lord with your hearts .
49005020	Always thank God the Father for everything in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
49005021	Place yourselves under each other’s authority out of respect for Christ .
49005022	Wives , place yourselves under your husbands’ authority as you have placed yourselves under the Lord’s authority .
49005023	The husband is the head of his wife as Christ is the head of the church . It is his body , and he is its Savior .
49005024	As the church is under Christ’s authority , so wives are under their husbands’ authority in everything .
49005025	Husbands , love your wives as Christ loved the church and gave his life for it .
49005026	He did this to make the church holy by cleansing it , washing it using water along with spoken words .
49005027	Then he could present it to himself as a glorious church , without any kind of stain or wrinkle—holy and without faults .
49005028	So husbands must love their wives as they love their own bodies . A man who loves his wife loves himself .
49005029	No one ever hated his own body . Instead , he feeds and takes care of it , as Christ takes care of the church .
49005030	We are parts of his body .
49005031	That’s why a man will leave his father and mother and be united with his wife , and the two will be one .
49005032	This is a great mystery . ( I’m talking about Christ’s relationship to the church . )
49005033	But every husband must love his wife as he loves himself , and wives should respect their husbands .
49006001	Children , obey your parents because you are Christians . This is the right thing to do .
49006002	“ Honor your father and mother
49006003	that everything may go well for you , and you may have a long life on earth . ” This is an important commandment with a promise .
49006004	Fathers , don’t make your children bitter about life . Instead , bring them up in Christian discipline and instruction .
49006005	Slaves , obey your earthly masters with proper respect . Be as sincere as you are when you obey Christ .
49006006	Don’t obey them only while you’re being watched , as if you merely wanted to please people . But obey like slaves who belong to Christ , who have a deep desire to do what God wants them to do .
49006007	Serve eagerly as if you were serving your heavenly master and not merely serving human masters .
49006008	You know that your heavenly master will reward all of us for whatever good we do , whether we’re slaves or free people .
49006009	Masters , treat your slaves with respect . Don’t threaten a slave . You know that there is one master in heaven who has authority over both of you , and he doesn’t play favorites .
49006010	Finally , receive your power from the Lord and from his mighty strength .
49006011	Put on all the armor that God supplies . In this way you can take a stand against the devil’s strategies .
49006012	This is not a wrestling match against a human opponent . We are wrestling with rulers , authorities , the powers who govern this world of darkness , and spiritual forces that control evil in the heavenly world .
49006013	For this reason , take up all the armor that God supplies . Then you will be able to take a stand during these evil days . Once you have overcome all obstacles , you will be able to stand your ground .
49006014	So then , take your stand ! Fasten truth around your waist like a belt . Put on God’s approval as your breastplate .
49006015	Put on your shoes so that you are ready to spread the Good News that gives peace .
49006016	In addition to all these , take the Christian faith as your shield . With it you can put out all the flaming arrows of the evil one .
49006017	Also take salvation as your helmet and the word of God as the sword that the Spirit supplies .
49006018	Pray in the Spirit in every situation . Use every kind of prayer and request there is . For the same reason be alert . Use every kind of effort and make every kind of request for all of God’s people .
49006019	Also pray that God will give me the right words to say . Then I will speak boldly when I reveal the mystery of the Good News .
49006020	Because I have already been doing this as Christ’s representative , I am in prison . So pray that I speak about this Good News as boldly as I have to .
49006021	I’m sending Tychicus to you . He is our dear brother and a faithful deacon in the Lord’s work . He will tell you everything that is happening to me so that you will know how I’m getting along .
49006022	That’s why I’m sending him to you so that you may know how we’re doing and that he may encourage you .
49006023	May God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give our brothers and sisters peace and love along with faith .
49006024	His favor is with everyone who has an undying love for our Lord Jesus Christ .
50001001	From Paul and Timothy , servants of Christ Jesus . To God’s people in the city of Philippi and their bishops and deacons—to everyone who is united with Christ Jesus .
50001002	Good will and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ are yours !
50001003	I thank my God for all the memories I have of you .
50001004	Every time I pray for all of you , I do it with joy .
50001005	I can do this because of the partnership we’ve had with you in the Good News from the first day you believed until now .
50001006	I’m convinced that God , who began this good work in you , will carry it through to completion on the day of Christ Jesus .
50001007	You have a special place in my heart . So it’s right for me to think this way about all of you . All of you are my partners . Together we share God’s favor , whether I’m in prison or defending and confirming the truth of the Good News .
50001008	God is my witness that , with all the compassion of Christ Jesus , I long to see every one of you .
50001009	I pray that your love will keep on growing because of your knowledge and insight .
50001010	That way you will be able to determine what is best and be pure and blameless until the day of Christ .
50001011	Jesus Christ will fill your lives with everything that God’s approval produces . Your lives will then bring glory and praise to God .
50001012	I want you to know , brothers and sisters , that what happened to me has helped to spread the Good News .
50001013	As a result , it has become clear to all the soldiers who guard the emperor and to everyone else that I am in prison because of Christ .
50001014	So through my being in prison , the Lord has given most of our brothers and sisters confidence to speak God’s word more boldly and fearlessly than ever .
50001015	Some people tell the message about Christ because of their jealousy and envy . Others tell the message about him because of their good will .
50001016	Those who tell the message about Christ out of love know that God has put me here to defend the Good News .
50001017	But the others are insincere . They tell the message about Christ out of selfish ambition in order to stir up trouble for me while I’m in prison .
50001018	But what does it matter ? Nothing matters except that , in one way or another , people are told the message about Christ , whether with honest or dishonest motives , and I’m happy about that . Yes , I will continue to be happy
50001019	for another reason . I know that I will be set free through your prayers and through the help that comes from the Spirit of Jesus Christ .
50001020	I eagerly expect and hope that I will have nothing to be ashamed of . I will speak very boldly and honor Christ in my body , now as always , whether I live or die .
50001021	Christ means everything to me in this life , and when I die I’ll have even more .
50001022	If I continue to live in this life , my work will produce more results . I don’t know which I would prefer .
50001023	I find it hard to choose between the two . I would like to leave this life and be with Christ . That’s by far the better choice .
50001024	But for your sake it’s better that I remain in this life .
50001025	Since I’m convinced of this , I know that I will continue to live and be with all of you . This will help you to grow and be joyful in your faith .
50001026	So by coming to you again , I want to give you even more reason to have pride in Christ Jesus with me .
50001027	Live as citizens who reflect the Good News about Christ . Then , whether I come to see you or whether I stay away , I’ll hear all about you . I’ll hear that you are firmly united in spirit , united in fighting for the faith that the Good News brings .
50001028	So don’t let your opponents intimidate you in any way . This is God’s way of showing them that they will be destroyed and that you will be saved .
50001029	God has given you the privilege not only to believe in Christ but also to suffer for him .
50001030	You are involved in the same struggle that you saw me having . Now you hear that I’m still involved in it .
50002001	So then , as Christians , do you have any encouragement ? Do you have any comfort from love ? Do you have any spiritual relationships ? Do you have any sympathy and compassion ?
50002002	Then fill me with joy by having the same attitude and the same love , living in harmony , and keeping one purpose in mind .
50002003	Don’t act out of selfish ambition or be conceited . Instead , humbly think of others as being better than yourselves .
50002004	Don’t be concerned only about your own interests , but also be concerned about the interests of others .
50002005	Have the same attitude that Christ Jesus had .
50002006	Although he was in the form of God and equal with God , he did not take advantage of this equality .
50002007	Instead , he emptied himself by taking on the form of a servant , by becoming like other humans , by having a human appearance .
50002008	He humbled himself by becoming obedient to the point of death , death on a cross .
50002009	This is why God has given him an exceptional honor—the name honored above all other names—
50002010	so that at the name of Jesus everyone in heaven , on earth , and in the world below will kneel
50002011	and confess that Jesus Christ is Lordto the glory of God the Father .
50002012	My dear friends , you have always obeyed , not only when I was with you but even more now that I’m absent . In the same way continue to work out your salvation with fear and trembling .
50002013	It is God who produces in you the desires and actions that please him .
50002014	Do everything without complaining or arguing .
50002015	Then you will be blameless and innocent . You will be God’s children without any faults among people who are crooked and corrupt . You will shine like stars among them in the world
50002016	as you hold firmly to the word of life . Then I can brag on the day of Christ that my effort was not wasted and that my work produced results .
50002017	My life is being poured out as a part of the sacrifice and service I offer to God for your faith . Yet , I am filled with joy , and I share that joy with all of you .
50002018	For this same reason you also should be filled with joy and share that joy with me .
50002019	I hope that the Lord Jesus will allow me to send Timothy to you soon so that I can receive some encouraging news about you .
50002020	I don’t have anyone else like Timothy . He takes a genuine interest in your welfare .
50002021	Everyone else looks after his own interests , not after those of Jesus Christ .
50002022	But you know what kind of person Timothy proved to be . Like a father and son we worked hard together to spread the Good News .
50002023	I hope to send him as soon as I see how things are going to turn out for me .
50002024	But the Lord gives me confidence that I will come to visit you soon .
50002025	I feel that I must send Epaphroditus—my brother , coworker , and fellow soldier—back to you . You sent him as your personal representative to help me in my need .
50002026	He has been longing to see all of you and is troubled because you heard that he was sick .
50002027	Indeed , he was so sick that he almost died . But God had mercy not only on him but also on me and kept me from having one sorrow on top of another .
50002028	So I’m especially eager to send him to you . In this way you will have the joy of seeing him again and I will feel relieved .
50002029	Give him a joyful Christian welcome . Make sure you honor people like Epaphroditus highly .
50002030	He risked his life and almost died for the work of Christ in order to make up for the help you couldn’t give me .
50003001	Now then , brothers and sisters , be joyful in the Lord . It’s no trouble for me to write the same things to you , and it’s for your safety .
50003002	Beware of dogs ! Beware of those who do evil things . Beware of those who insist on circumcision .
50003003	We are the true circumcised people of God because we serve God’s Spirit and take pride in Christ Jesus . We don’t place any confidence in physical things ,
50003004	although I could have confidence in my physical qualifications . If anyone else thinks that he can trust in something physical , I can claim even more .
50003005	I was circumcised on the eighth day . I’m a descendant of Israel . I’m from the tribe of Benjamin . I’m a pure-blooded Hebrew . When it comes to living up to standards , I was a Pharisee .
50003006	When it comes to being enthusiastic , I was a persecutor of the church . When it comes to winning God’s approval by keeping Jewish laws , I was perfect .
50003007	These things that I once considered valuable , I now consider worthless for Christ .
50003008	It’s far more than that ! I consider everything else worthless because I’m much better off knowing Christ Jesus my Lord . It’s because of him that I think of everything as worthless . I threw it all away in order to gain Christ
50003009	and to have a relationship with him . This means that I didn’t receive God’s approval by obeying his laws . The opposite is true ! I have God’s approval through faith in Christ . This is the approval that comes from God and is based on faith
50003010	that knows Christ . Faith knows the power that his coming back to life gives and what it means to share his suffering . In this way I’m becoming like him in his death ,
50003011	with the confidence that I’ll come back to life from the dead .
50003012	It’s not that I’ve already reached the goal or have already completed the course . But I run to win that which Jesus Christ has already won for me .
50003013	Brothers and sisters , I can’t consider myself a winner yet . This is what I do : I don’t look back , I lengthen my stride , and
50003014	I run straight toward the goal to win the prize that God’s heavenly call offers in Christ Jesus .
50003015	Whoever has a mature faith should think this way . And if you think differently , God will show you how to think .
50003016	However , we should be guided by what we have learned so far .
50003017	Brothers and sisters , imitate me , and pay attention to those who live by the example we have given you .
50003018	I have often told you , and now tell you with tears in my eyes , that many live as the enemies of the cross of Christ .
50003019	In the end they will be destroyed . Their own emotions are their god , and they take pride in the shameful things they do . Their minds are set on worldly things .
50003020	We , however , are citizens of heaven . We look forward to the Lord Jesus Christ coming from heaven as our Savior .
50003021	Through his power to bring everything under his authority , he will change our humble bodies and make them like his glorified body .
50004001	So , brothers and sisters , I love you and miss you . You are my joy and my crown . Therefore , dear friends , keep your relationship with the Lord firm !
50004002	I encourage both Euodia and Syntyche to have the attitude the Lord wants them to have .
50004003	Yes , I also ask you , Syzugus , my true partner , to help these women . They fought beside me to spread the Good News along with Clement and the rest of my coworkers , whose names are in the Book of Life .
50004004	Always be joyful in the Lord ! I’ll say it again : Be joyful !
50004005	Let everyone know how considerate you are . The Lord is near .
50004006	Never worry about anything . But in every situation let God know what you need in prayers and requests while giving thanks .
50004007	Then God’s peace , which goes beyond anything we can imagine , will guard your thoughts and emotions through Christ Jesus .
50004008	Finally , brothers and sisters , keep your thoughts on whatever is right or deserves praise : things that are true , honorable , fair , pure , acceptable , or commendable .
50004009	Practice what you’ve learned and received from me , what you heard and saw me do . Then the God who gives this peace will be with you .
50004010	The Lord has filled me with joy because you again showed interest in me . You were interested but did not have an opportunity to show it .
50004011	I’m not saying this because I’m in any need . I’ve learned to be content in whatever situation I’m in .
50004012	I know how to live in poverty or prosperity . No matter what the situation , I’ve learned the secret of how to live when I’m full or when I’m hungry , when I have too much or when I have too little .
50004013	I can do everything through Christ who strengthens me .
50004014	Nevertheless , it was kind of you to share my troubles .
50004015	You Philippians also know that in the early days , when I left the province of Macedonia to spread the Good News , you were the only church to share your money with me . You gave me what I needed , and you received what I gave you .
50004016	Even while I was in Thessalonica , you provided for my needs twice .
50004017	It’s not that I’m looking for a gift . The opposite is true . I’m looking for your resources to increase .
50004018	You have paid me in full , and I have more than enough . Now that Epaphroditus has brought me your gifts , you have filled my needs . Your gifts are a soothing aroma , a sacrifice that God accepts and with which he is pleased .

51001002	To God’s holy and faithful people , our brothers and sisters who are united with Christ in the city of Colossae . Good will and peace from God our Father are yours !
51001003	We always thank God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , in our prayers for you .
51001004	We thank God because we have heard about your faith in Christ Jesus and your love for all of God’s people .
51001005	You have these because of the hope which is kept safe for you in heaven . Some time ago you heard about this hope in the Good News which is the message of truth .
51001006	This Good News is present with you now . It is producing results and spreading all over the world as it did among you from the first day you heard it . At that time you came to know what God’s kindness truly means .
51001007	You learned about this Good News from Epaphras , our dear fellow servant . He is taking your place here as a trustworthy deacon for Christ
51001008	and has told us about the love that the Spirit has given you .

51001011	We ask him to strengthen you by his glorious might with all the power you need to patiently endure everything with joy .
51001012	You will also thank the Father , who has made you able to share the light , which is what God’s people inherit .

51001014	His Son paid the price to free us , which means that our sins are forgiven .
51001015	He is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of all creation .
51001016	He created all things in heaven and on earth , visible and invisible . Whether they are kings or lords , rulers or powers—everything has been created through him and for him .

51001018	He is also the head of the church , which is his body . He is the beginning , the first to come back to lifeso that he would have first place in everything .

51001020	God was also pleased to bring everything on earth and in heaven back to himself through Christ . He did this by making peace through Christ’s blood sacrificed on the cross .
51001021	Once you were separated from God . The evil things you did showed your hostile attitude .
51001022	But now Christ has brought you back to God by dying in his physical body . He did this so that you could come into God’s presence without sin , fault , or blame .
51001023	This is on the condition that you continue in faith without being moved from the solid foundation of the hope that the Good News contains . You’ve heard this Good News of which I , Paul , became a servant . It has been spread throughout all creation under heaven .
51001024	I am happy to suffer for you now . In my body I am completing whatever remains of Christ’s sufferings . I am doing this on behalf of his body , the church .
51001025	I became a servant of the church when God gave me the work of telling you his entire message .
51001026	In the past God hid this mystery , but now he has revealed it to his people .
51001027	God wanted his people throughout the world to know the glorious riches of this mystery—which is Christ living in you , giving you the hope of glory .

51001029	I work hard and struggle to do this while his mighty power works in me .
51002001	I want you to know how hard I work for you , for the people of Laodicea , and for people I have never met .
51002002	Because they are united in love , I work so that they may be encouraged by all the riches that come from a complete understanding of Christ . He is the mystery of God .
51002003	God has hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge in Christ .
51002004	I say this so that no one will mislead you with arguments that merely sound good .
51002005	Although I’m absent from you physically , I’m with you in spirit . I’m happy to see how orderly you are and how firm your faith in Christ is .
51002006	You received Christ Jesus the Lord , so continue to live as Christ’s people .
51002007	Sink your roots in him and build on him . Be strengthened by the faith that you were taught , and overflow with thanksgiving .
51002008	Be careful not to let anyone rob you of this faith through a shallow and misleading philosophy . Such a person follows human traditions and the world’s way of doing things rather than following Christ .
51002009	All of God lives in Christ’s body ,
51002010	and God has made you complete in Christ . Christ is in charge of every ruler and authority .
51002011	In him you were also circumcised . It was not a circumcision performed by human hands . But it was a removal of the corrupt nature in the circumcision performed by Christ .
51002012	This happened when you were placed in the tomb with Christ through baptism . In baptism you were also brought back to life with Christ through faith in the power of God , who brought him back to life .
51002013	You were once dead because of your failures and your uncircumcised corrupt nature . But God made you alive with Christ when he forgave all our failures .
51002014	He did this by erasing the charges that were brought against us by the written laws God had established . He took the charges away by nailing them to the cross .
51002015	He stripped the rulers and authorities of their power and made a public spectacle of them as he celebrated his victory in Christ .
51002016	Therefore , let no one judge you because of what you eat or drink or about the observance of annual holy days , New Moon Festivals , or weekly worship days .
51002017	These are a shadow of the things to come , but the body that casts the shadow belongs to Christ .
51002018	Let no one who delights in false humility and the worship of angels tell you that you don’t deserve a prize . Such a person , whose sinful mind fills him with arrogance , gives endless details of the visions he has seen .
51002019	He doesn’t hold on to Christ , the head . Christ makes the whole body grow as God wants it to , through support and unity given by the joints and ligaments .
51002020	If you have died with Christ to the world’s way of doing things , why do you let others tell you how to live ? It’s as though you were still under the world’s influence .
51002021	People will tell you , “ Don’t handle this ! Don’t taste or touch that ! ”
51002022	All of these things deal with objects that are only used up anyway .
51002023	These things look like wisdom with their self-imposed worship , false humility , and harsh treatment of the body . But they have no value for holding back the constant desires of your corrupt nature .
51003001	Since you were brought back to life with Christ , focus on the things that are above—where Christ holds the highest position .
51003002	Keep your mind on things above , not on worldly things .
51003003	You have died , and your life is hidden with Christ in God .
51003004	When Christ your life appears , then you , too , will appear with him in glory .
51003005	Therefore , put to death whatever is worldly in you : your sexual sin , perversion , passion , lust , and greed ( which is the same thing as worshiping wealth ) .
51003006	It is because of these sins that God’s anger comes on those who refuse to obey him .
51003007	You used to live that kind of sinful life .
51003008	Also get rid of your anger , hot tempers , hatred , cursing , obscene language , and all similar sins .
51003009	Don’t lie to each other . You’ve gotten rid of the person you used to be and the life you used to live ,
51003010	and you’ve become a new person . This new person is continually renewed in knowledge to be like its Creator .
51003011	Where this happens , there is no Greek or Jew , circumcised or uncircumcised , barbarian , uncivilized person , slave , or free person . Instead , Christ is everything and in everything .
51003012	As holy people whom God has chosen and loved , be sympathetic , kind , humble , gentle , and patient .
51003013	Put up with each other , and forgive each other if anyone has a complaint . Forgive as the Lord forgave you .
51003014	Above all , be loving . This ties everything together perfectly .
51003015	Also , let Christ’s peace control you . God has called you into this peace by bringing you into one body . Be thankful .
51003016	Let Christ’s word with all its wisdom and richness live in you . Use psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs to teach and instruct yourselves about God’s kindness . Sing to God in your hearts .
51003017	Everything you say or do should be done in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God the Father through him .
51003018	Wives , place yourselves under your husbands’ authority . This is appropriate behavior for the Lord’s people .
51003019	Husbands , love your wives , and don’t be harsh with them .
51003020	Children , always obey your parents . This is pleasing to the Lord .
51003021	Fathers , don’t make your children resentful , or they will become discouraged .
51003022	Slaves , always obey your earthly masters . Don’t obey them only while you’re being watched , as if you merely wanted to please people . Be sincere in your motives out of respect for your real master .
51003023	Whatever you do , do it wholeheartedly as though you were working for your real master and not merely for humans .
51003024	You know that your real master will give you an inheritance as your reward . It is Christ , your real master , whom you are serving .
51003025	The person who does wrong will be paid back for the wrong he has done . God does not play favorites .
51004001	Masters , be just and fair to your slaves because you know that you also have a master in heaven .
51004002	Keep praying . Pay attention when you offer prayers of thanksgiving .
51004003	At the same time also pray for us . Pray that God will give us an opportunity to speak the word so that we may tell the mystery about Christ . It is because of this mystery that I am a prisoner .
51004004	Pray that I may make this mystery as clear as possible . This is what I have to do .
51004005	Be wise in the way you act toward those who are outside the Christian faith . Make the most of your opportunities .
51004006	Everything you say should be kind and well thought out so that you know how to answer everyone .
51004007	I’m sending Tychicus to you . He is our dear brother , trustworthy deacon , and partner in the Lord’s work . He will tell you everything that is happening to me .
51004008	I’m sending him to you so that you may know how we are doing and so that he may encourage you .
51004009	I’m sending Onesimus with him . Onesimus is from your city and is our faithful and dear brother . They will tell you about everything that’s happening here .
51004010	Aristarchus , who is a prisoner like me , sends greetings . So does Mark , the cousin of Barnabas . You have received instructions about Mark . If he comes to you , welcome him .
51004011	Jesus , called Justus , also greets you . They are the only converts from the Jewish religion who are working with me for God’s kingdom . They have provided me with comfort .
51004012	Epaphras , a servant of Christ Jesus from your city , greets you . He always prays intensely for you . He prays that you will continue to be mature and completely convinced of everything that God wants .
51004013	I assure you that he works hard for you and the people in Laodicea and Hierapolis .
51004014	My dear friend Luke , the physician , and Demas greet you .
51004015	Greet our brothers and sisters in Laodicea , especially Nympha and the church that meets in her house .
51004016	After you have read this letter , read it in the church at Laodicea . Make sure that you also read the letter from Laodicea .
51004017	Tell Archippus to complete all the work that he started as the Lord’s servant .
51004018	I , Paul , am writing this greeting with my own hand . Remember that I’m a prisoner . God’s good will be with you .
52001001	From Paul , Silas , and Timothy . To the church at Thessalonica united with God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ . Good will and peace are yours !
52001002	We always thank God for all of you as we remember you in our prayers .
52001003	In the presence of our God and Father , we never forget that your faith is active , your love is working hard , and your confidence in our Lord Jesus Christ is enduring .
52001004	Brothers and sisters , we never forget this because we know that God loves you and has chosen you .
52001005	We know this because the Good News we brought came to you not only with words but also with power , with the Holy Spirit , and with complete certainty . In the same way you know what kind of people we were while we were with you and the good things we did for you .
52001006	You imitated us and the Lord . In spite of a lot of suffering , you welcomed God’s word with the kind of joy that the Holy Spirit gives .
52001007	This way , you became a model for all the believers in the province of Macedonia and Greece .
52001008	From you the Lord’s word has spread out not only through the province of Macedonia and Greece but also to people everywhere who have heard about your faith in God . We don’t need to say a thing about it .
52001009	They talk about how you welcomed us when we arrived . They even report how you turned away from false gods to serve the real , living God
52001010	and to wait for his Son to come from heaven . His Son is Jesus , whom he brought back to life . Jesus is the one who rescues us from God’s coming anger .
52002001	You know , brothers and sisters , that our time with you was not wasted .
52002002	As you know , we suffered rough and insulting treatment in Philippi . But our God gave us the courage to tell you his Good News in spite of strong opposition .
52002003	When we encouraged you , we didn’t use unethical schemes , corrupt practices , or deception .
52002004	Rather , we are always spreading the Good News . God trusts us to do this because we passed his test . We don’t try to please people but God , who tests our motives .
52002005	As you know , we never used flattery or schemes to make money . God is our witness !
52002006	We didn’t seek praise from people , from you or from anyone else ,
52002007	although as apostles of Christ we had the right to do this . Instead , we were gentle when we were with you , like a mother taking care of her children .
52002008	We felt so strongly about you that we were determined to share with you not only the Good News of God but also our lives . That’s how dear you were to us !
52002009	You remember , brothers and sisters , our work and what we did to earn a living . We worked night and day so that we could bring you the Good News of God without being a burden to any of you .
52002010	You and God are witnesses of how pure , honest , and blameless we were in our dealings with you believers .
52002011	You know very well that we treated each of you the way a father treats his children . We comforted you and encouraged you . Yet , we insisted that
52002012	you should live in a way that proves you belong to the God who calls you into his kingdom and glory .
52002013	Here is another reason why we never stop thanking God : When you received God’s word from us , you realized it wasn’t the word of humans . Instead , you accepted it for what it really is—the word of God . This word is at work in you believers .
52002014	You , brothers and sisters , were like the churches of God in Judea that are united with Christ Jesus . You suffered the same persecutions from the people of your own country as those churches did from the Jews
52002015	who killed the Lord Jesus and the prophets and who have persecuted us severely . They are displeasing to God . They are enemies of the whole human race
52002016	because they try to keep us from telling people who are not Jewish how they can be saved . The result is that those Jews always commit as many sins as possible . So at last they are receiving God’s anger .
52002017	Brothers and sisters , we have been separated from you for a little while . Although we may not be able to see you , you’re always in our thoughts . We have made every possible effort to fulfill our desire to see you .
52002018	We wanted to visit you . I , Paul , wanted to visit you twice already , but Satan made that impossible .
52002019	Who is our hope , joy , or prize that we can brag about in the presence of our Lord Jesus when he comes ? Isn’t it you ?
52002020	You are our glory and joy !
52003001	We thought it best to remain in Athens by ourselves . But , because we couldn’t wait any longer for news about you ,
52003002	we sent our brother Timothy to you . He serves God by spreading the Good News about Christ . His mission was to strengthen and encourage you in your faith
52003003	so that these troubles don’t disturb any of you . You know that we’re destined to suffer persecution .
52003004	In fact , when we were with you , we told you ahead of time that we were going to suffer persecution . And as you know , that’s what happened .
52003005	But when I couldn’t wait any longer , I sent Timothy to find out about your faith . I wanted to see whether the tempter had in some way tempted you , making our work meaningless .
52003006	But Timothy has just now come back to us from you and has told us the good news about your faith and love . He also told us that you always have fond memories of us and want to see us , as we want to see you .
52003007	So brothers and sisters , your faith has encouraged us in all our distress and trouble .
52003008	Now we can go on living as long as you keep your relationship with the Lord firm .
52003009	We can never thank God enough for all the joy you give us as we rejoice in God’s presence .
