52003010	We pray very hard night and day that we may see you again so that we can supply whatever you still need for your faith .
52003011	We pray that God our Father and the Lord Jesus will guide us to you .
52003012	We also pray that the Lord will greatly increase your love for each other and for everyone else , just as we love you .
52003013	Then he will strengthen you to be holy . Then you will be blameless in the presence of our God and Father when our Lord Jesus comes with all God’s holy people .
52004001	Now then , brothers and sisters , because of the Lord Jesus we ask and encourage you to excel in living a God-pleasing life even more than you already do . Do this the way we taught you .
52004002	You know what orders we gave you through the Lord Jesus .
52004003	It is God’s will that you keep away from sexual sin as a mark of your devotion to him .
52004004	Each of you should know that finding a husband or wife for yourself is to be done in a holy and honorable way ,
52004005	not in the passionate , lustful way of people who don’t know God .
52004006	No one should take advantage of or exploit other believers that way . The Lord is the one who punishes people for all these things . We’ve already told you and warned you about this .
52004007	God didn’t call us to be sexually immoral but to be holy .
52004008	Therefore , whoever rejects this order is not rejecting human authority but God , who gives you his Holy Spirit .
52004009	You don’t need anyone to write to you about the way Christians should love each other . God has taught you to love each other .
52004010	In fact , you are showing love to all the Christians throughout the province of Macedonia . We encourage you as believers to excel in love even more .
52004011	Also , make it your goal to live quietly , do your work , and earn your own living , as we ordered you .
52004012	Then your way of life will win respect from those outside the church , and you won’t have to depend on anyone else for what you need .
52004013	Brothers and sisters , we don’t want you to be ignorant about those who have died . We don’t want you to grieve like other people who have no hope .
52004014	We believe that Jesus died and came back to life . We also believe that , through Jesus , God will bring back those who have died . They will come back with Jesus .
52004015	We are telling you what the Lord taught . We who are still alive when the Lord comes will not go into his kingdom ahead of those who have already died .
52004016	The Lord will come from heaven with a command , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trumpet call of God . First , the dead who believed in Christ will come back to life .
52004017	Then , together with them , we who are still alive will be taken in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air . In this way we will always be with the Lord .
52004018	So then , comfort each other with these words !
52005001	Brothers and sisters , you don’t need anyone to write to you about times and dates .
52005002	You know very well that the day of the Lord will come like a thief in the night .
52005003	When people say , “ Everything is safe and sound ! ” destruction will suddenly strike them . It will be as sudden as labor pains come to a pregnant woman . They won’t be able to escape .
52005004	But , brothers and sisters , you don’t live in the dark . That day won’t take you by surprise as a thief would .
52005005	You belong to the day and the light not to the night and the dark .
52005006	Therefore , we must not fall asleep like other people , but we must stay awake and be sober .
52005007	People who sleep , sleep at night ; people who get drunk , get drunk at night .
52005008	Since we belong to the day , we must be sober . We must put on faith and love as a breastplate and the hope of salvation as a helmet .
52005009	It was not God’s intention that we experience his anger but that we obtain salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ .
52005010	He died for us so that , whether we are awake in this life or asleep in death , we will live together with him .
52005011	Therefore , encourage each other and strengthen one another as you are doing .
52005012	Brothers and sisters , we ask you to show your appreciation for those leaders who work among you and instruct you .
52005013	We ask you to love them and think very highly of them because of the work they are doing . Live in peace with each other .
52005014	We encourage you , brothers and sisters , to instruct those who are not living right , cheer up those who are discouraged , help the weak , and be patient with everyone .
52005015	Make sure that no one ever pays back one wrong with another wrong . Instead , always try to do what is good for each other and everyone else .
52005016	Always be joyful .
52005017	Never stop praying .
52005018	Whatever happens , give thanks , because it is God’s will in Christ Jesus that you do this .
52005019	Don’t put out the Spirit’s fire .
52005020	Don’t despise what God has revealed .
52005021	Instead , test everything . Hold on to what is good .
52005022	Keep away from every kind of evil .
52005023	May the God who gives peace make you holy in every way . May he keep your whole being—spirit , soul , and body—blameless when our Lord Jesus Christ comes .
52005024	The one who calls you is faithful , and he will do this .
52005025	Brothers and sisters , pray for us .
52005026	Greet all the brothers and sisters with a holy kiss .
52005027	In the Lord’s name , I order you to read this letter to all the brothers and sisters .
52005028	The good will of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
53001001	From Paul , Silas , and Timothy . To the church at Thessalonica united with God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53001002	Good will and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ are yours !
53001003	We always have to thank God for you , brothers and sisters . It’s right to do this because your faith is showing remarkable growth and your love for each other is increasing .
53001004	That’s why we brag in God’s churches about your endurance and faith in all the persecutions and suffering you are experiencing .
53001005	Your suffering proves that God’s judgment is right and that you are considered worthy of his kingdom .
53001006	Certainly , it is right for God to give suffering to those who cause you to suffer .
53001007	It is also right for God to give all of us relief from our suffering . He will do this when the Lord Jesus is revealed , coming from heaven with his mighty angels in a blazing fire .
53001008	He will take revenge on those who refuse to acknowledge God and on those who refuse to respond to the Good News about our Lord Jesus .
53001009	They will pay the penalty by being destroyed forever , by being separated from the Lord’s presence and from his glorious power .
53001010	This will happen on that day when he comes to be honored among all his holy people and admired by all who have believed in him . This includes you because you believed the testimony we gave you .
53001011	With this in mind , we always pray that our God will make you worthy of his call . We also pray that through his power he will help you accomplish every good desire and help you do everything your faith produces .
53001012	That way the name of our Lord Jesus will be honored among you . Then , because of the good will of Jesus Christ , our God and Lord , you will be honored by him .
53002001	Brothers and sisters , we have this request to make of you about our Lord Jesus Christ’s coming and our gathering to meet him .
53002002	Don’t get upset right away or alarmed when someone claims that we said through some spirit , conversation , or letter that the day of the Lord has already come .
53002003	Don’t let anyone deceive you about this in any way . That day cannot come unless a revolt takes place first , and the man of sin , the man of destruction , is revealed .
53002004	He opposes every so-called god or anything that is worshiped and places himself above them , sitting in God’s temple and claiming to be God .
53002005	Don’t you remember that I told you about these things when I was still with you ?
53002006	You know what it is that now holds him back , so that he will be revealed when his time comes .
53002007	The mystery of this sin is already at work . But it cannot work effectively until the person now holding it back gets out of the way .
53002008	Then the man of sin will be revealed and the Lord Jesus will destroy him by what he says . When the Lord Jesus comes , his appearance will put an end to this man .
53002009	The man of sin will come with the power of Satan . He will use every kind of power , including miraculous and wonderful signs . But they will be lies .
53002010	He will use everything that God disapproves of to deceive those who are dying , those who refused to love the truth that would save them .
53002011	That’s why God will send them a powerful delusion so that they will believe a lie .
53002012	Then everyone who did not believe the truth , but was delighted with what God disapproves of , will be condemned .
53002013	We always have to thank God for you , brothers and sisters . You are loved by the Lord and we thank God that in the beginning he chose you to be saved through a life of spiritual devotion and faith in the truth .
53002014	With this in mind he called you by the Good News which we told you so that you would obtain the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
53002015	Then , brothers and sisters , firmly hold on to the traditions we taught you either when we spoke to you or in our letter .
53002016	God our Father loved us and by his kindness gave us everlasting encouragement and good hope . Together with our Lord Jesus Christ ,
53002017	may he encourage and strengthen you to do and say everything that is good .
53003001	Finally , brothers and sisters , pray that we spread the Lord’s word rapidly and that it will be honored the way it was among you .
53003002	Also pray that we may be rescued from worthless and evil people , since not everyone shares our faith .
53003003	But the Lord is faithful and will strengthen you and protect you against the evil one .
53003004	The Lord gives us confidence that you are doing and will continue to do what we ordered you to do .
53003005	May the Lord direct your lives as you show God’s love and Christ’s endurance .
53003006	Brothers and sisters , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ we order you not to associate with any believer who doesn’t live a disciplined life and doesn’t follow the tradition you received from us .
53003007	You know what you must do to imitate us . We lived a disciplined life among you .
53003008	We didn’t eat anyone’s food without paying for it . Instead , we worked hard and struggled night and day in order not to be a burden to any of you .
53003009	It’s not as though we didn’t have a right to receive support . Rather , we wanted to set an example for you to follow .
53003010	While we were with you , we gave you the order : “ Whoever doesn’t want to work shouldn’t be allowed to eat . ”
53003011	We hear that some of you are not living disciplined lives . You’re not working , so you go around interfering in other people’s lives .
53003012	We order and encourage such people by the Lord Jesus Christ to pay attention to their own work so they can support themselves .
53003013	Brothers and sisters , we can’t allow ourselves to get tired of doing what is right .
53003014	It may be that some people will not listen to what we say in this letter . Take note of them and don’t associate with them so that they will feel ashamed .
53003015	Yet , don’t treat them like enemies , but instruct them like brothers and sisters .
53003016	May the Lord of peace give you his peace at all times and in every way . The Lord be with all of you .
53003017	I , Paul , am writing this greeting with my own hand . In every letter that I send , this is proof that I wrote it .
53003018	The good will of our Lord Jesus Christ be with all of you .
54001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the command of God our Savior and Christ Jesus our confidence .
54001002	To Timothy , a genuine child in faith . Good will , mercy , and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord are yours !
54001003	When I was going to the province of Macedonia , I encouraged you to stay in the city of Ephesus . That way you could order certain people to stop teaching false doctrine
54001004	and occupying themselves with myths and endless genealogies . These myths and genealogies raise a lot of questions rather than promoting God’s plan , which centers in faith .
54001005	My goal in giving you this order is for love to flow from a pure heart , from a clear conscience , and from a sincere faith .
54001006	Some people have left these qualities behind and have turned to useless discussions .
54001007	They want to be experts in Moses’ Teachings . However , they don’t understand what they’re talking about or the things about which they speak so confidently .
54001008	We know that Moses’ Teachings are good if they are used as they were intended to be used .
54001009	For example , a person must realize that laws are not intended for people who have God’s approval . Laws are intended for lawbreakers and rebels , for ungodly people and sinners , for those who think nothing is holy or sacred , for those who kill their fathers , their mothers , or other people .
54001010	Laws are intended for people involved in sexual sins , for homosexuals , for kidnappers , for liars , for those who lie when they take an oath , and for whatever else is against accurate teachings .
54001011	Moses’ Teachings were intended to be used in agreement with the Good News that contains the glory of the blessed God . I was entrusted with that Good News .
54001012	I thank Christ Jesus our Lord that he has trusted me and has appointed me to do his work with the strength he has given me .
54001013	In the past I cursed him , persecuted him , and acted arrogantly toward him . However , I was treated with mercy because I acted ignorantly in my unbelief .
54001014	Our Lord was very kind to me . Through his kindness he brought me to faith and gave me the love that Christ Jesus shows people .
54001015	This is a statement that can be trusted and deserves complete acceptance : Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners , and I am the foremost sinner .
54001016	However , I was treated with mercy so that Christ Jesus could use me , the foremost sinner , to demonstrate his patience . This patience serves as an example for those who would believe in him and live forever .
54001017	Worship and glory belong forever to the eternal king , the immortal , invisible , and only God . Amen .
54001018	Timothy , my child , I’m giving you this order about the prophecies that are still coming to you : Use these prophecies in faith and with a clear conscience to fight this noble war .
54001019	Some have refused to let their faith guide their conscience and their faith has been destroyed like a wrecked ship .
54001020	Among these people are Hymenaeus and Alexander , whom I have handed over to Satan in order to teach them not to dishonor God .
54002001	First of all , I encourage you to make petitions , prayers , intercessions , and prayers of thanks for all people ,
54002002	for rulers , and for everyone who has authority over us . Pray for these people so that we can have a quiet and peaceful life always lived in a godly and reverent way .
54002003	This is good and pleases God our Savior .
54002004	He wants all people to be saved and to learn the truth .
54002005	There is one God . There is also one mediator between God and humans—a human , Christ Jesus .
54002006	He sacrificed himself for all people to free them from their sins . This message is valid for every era .
54002007	I was appointed to spread this Good News and to be an apostle to teach people who are not Jewish about faith and truth . I’m telling you the truth . I’m not lying .
54002008	I want men to offer prayers everywhere . They should raise their hands in prayer after putting aside their anger and any quarrels they have with anyone .
54002009	I want women to show their beauty by dressing in appropriate clothes that are modest and respectable . Their beauty will be shown by what they do , not by their hair styles or the gold jewelry , pearls , or expensive clothes they wear .
54002010	This is what is proper for women who claim to have reverence for God .
54002011	A woman must learn in silence , in keeping with her position .
54002012	I don’t allow a woman to teach or to have authority over a man . Instead , she should be quiet .
54002013	After all , Adam was formed first , then Eve .
54002014	Besides that , Adam was not deceived . It was the woman who was deceived and brought sin into the world .
54002015	However , she and all women will be saved through the birth of the child , if they lead respectable lives in faith , love , and holiness .
54003001	This is a statement that can be trusted : If anyone sets his heart on being a bishop , he desires something excellent .
54003002	A bishop must have a good reputation . He must have only one wife , be sober , use good judgment , be respectable , be hospitable , and be able to teach .
54003003	He must not drink excessively or be a violent person , but he must be gentle . He must not be quarrelsome or love money .
54003004	He must manage his own family well . His children should respectfully obey him .
54003005	( If a man doesn’t know how to manage his own family , how can he take care of God’s church ? )
54003006	He must not be a new Christian , or he might become arrogant like the devil and be condemned .
54003007	People who are not Christians must speak well of him , or he might become the victim of disgraceful insults that the devil sets as traps for him .
54003008	Deacons must also be of good character . They must not be two-faced or addicted to alcohol . They must not use shameful ways to make money .
54003009	They must have clear consciences about possessing the mystery of the Christian faith .
54003010	First , a person must be evaluated . Then , if he has a good reputation , he may become a deacon .
54003011	Their wives must also be of good character . They must not be gossips , but they must control their tempers and be trustworthy in every way .
54003012	A deacon must have only one wife . Deacons must manage their children and their families well .
54003013	Those deacons who serve well gain an excellent reputation and will have confidence as a result of their faith in Christ Jesus .
54003014	I hope to visit you soon . However , I’m writing this to you
54003015	in case I’m delayed . I want you to know how people who are members of God’s family must live . God’s family is the church of the living God , the pillar and foundation of the truth .
54003016	The mystery that gives us our reverence for God is acknowledged to be great : He appeared in his human nature , was approved by the Spirit , was seen by angels , was announced throughout the nations , was believed in the world , and was taken to heaven in glory .
54004001	The Spirit says clearly that in later times some believers will desert the Christian faith . They will follow spirits that deceive , and they will believe the teachings of demons .
54004002	These people will speak lies disguised as truth . Their consciences have been scarred as if branded by a red-hot iron .
54004003	They will try to stop others from getting married and from eating certain foods . God created food to be received with prayers of thanks by those who believe and know the truth .
54004004	Everything God created is good . Nothing should be rejected if it is received with prayers of thanks .
54004005	The word of God and prayer set it apart as holy .
54004006	You are a good servant of Christ Jesus when you point these things out to our brothers and sisters . Then you will be nourished by the words of the Christian faith and the excellent teachings which you have followed closely .
54004007	Don’t have anything to do with godless myths that old women like to tell . Rather , train yourself to live a godly life .
54004008	Training the body helps a little , but godly living helps in every way . Godly living has the promise of life now and in the world to come .
54004009	This is a statement that can be trusted and deserves complete acceptance .
54004010	Certainly , we work hard and struggle to live a godly life , because we place our confidence in the living God . He is the Savior of all people , especially of those who believe .
54004011	Insist on these things and teach them .
54004012	Don’t let anyone look down on you for being young . Instead , make your speech , behavior , love , faith , and purity an example for other believers .
54004013	Until I get there , concentrate on reading Scripture in worship , giving encouraging messages , and teaching people .
54004014	Don’t neglect the gift which you received through prophecy when the spiritual leaders placed their hands on you to ordain you .
54004015	Practice these things . Devote your life to them so that everyone can see your progress .
54004016	Focus on your life and your teaching . Continue to do what I’ve told you . If you do this , you will save yourself and those who hear you .
54005001	Never use harsh words when you correct an older man , but talk to him as if he were your father . Talk to younger men as if they were your brothers ,
54005002	older women as if they were your mothers , and younger women as if they were your sisters , while keeping yourself morally pure .
54005003	Honor widows who have no families .
54005004	The children or grandchildren of a widow must first learn to respect their own family by repaying their parents . This is pleasing in God’s sight .
54005005	A widow who has no family has placed her confidence in God by praying and asking for his help night and day .
54005006	But the widow who lives for pleasure is dead although she is still alive .
54005007	Insist on these things so that widows will have good reputations .
54005008	If anyone doesn’t take care of his own relatives , especially his immediate family , he has denied the Christian faith and is worse than an unbeliever .
54005009	Any widow who had only one husband and is at least 60 years old should be put on your list of widows .
54005010	People should tell about the good things she has done : raising children , being hospitable , taking care of believers’ needs , helping the suffering , or always doing good things .
54005011	Don’t include younger widows on your list . Whenever their natural desires become stronger than their devotion to Christ , they’ll want to marry .
54005012	They condemn themselves by rejecting the Christian faith , the faith they first accepted .
54005013	At the same time , they learn to go around from house to house since they have nothing else to do . Not only this , but they also gossip and get involved in other people’s business , saying things they shouldn’t say .
54005014	So I want younger widows to marry , have children , manage their homes , and not give the enemy any chance to ridicule them .
54005015	Some of them have already turned away to follow Satan .
54005016	If any woman is a believer and has relatives who are widows , she should help them . In this way the church is not burdened and can help widows who have no families .
54005017	Give double honor to spiritual leaders who handle their duties well . This is especially true if they work hard at teaching the word of God .
54005018	After all , Scripture says , “ Never muzzle an ox when it is threshing grain , ” and “ The worker deserves his pay . ”
54005019	Don’t pay attention to an accusation against a spiritual leader unless it is supported by two or three witnesses .
54005020	Reprimand those leaders who sin . Do it in front of everyone so that the other leaders will also be afraid .
54005021	I solemnly call on you in the sight of God , Christ Jesus , and the chosen angels to be impartial when you follow what I’ve told you . Never play favorites .
54005022	Don’t be in a hurry to place your hands on anyone to ordain him . Don’t participate in the sins of others . Keep yourself morally pure .
54005023	Stop drinking only water . Instead , drink a little wine for your stomach because you are frequently sick .
54005024	The sins of some people are obvious , going ahead of them to judgment . The sins of others follow them there .
54005025	In the same way , the good things that people do are obvious , and those that aren’t obvious can’t remain hidden .
54006001	All slaves who believe must give complete respect to their own masters . In this way no one will speak evil of God’s name and what we teach .
54006002	Slaves whose masters also believe should respect their masters even though their masters are also believers . As a result , believers who are slaves should serve their masters even better because those who receive the benefit of their work are believers whom they love . Teach and encourage people to do these things .
54006003	Whoever teaches false doctrine and doesn’t agree with the accurate words of our Lord Jesus Christ and godly teachings
54006004	is a conceited person . He shows that he doesn’t understand anything . Rather , he has an unhealthy desire to argue and quarrel about words . This produces jealousy , rivalry , cursing , suspicion ,
54006005	and conflict between people whose corrupt minds have been robbed of the truth . They think that a godly life is a way to make a profit .
54006006	A godly life brings huge profits to people who are content with what they have .
54006007	We didn’t bring anything into the world , and we can’t take anything out of it .
54006008	As long as we have food and clothes , we should be satisfied .
54006009	But people who want to get rich keep falling into temptation . They are trapped by many stupid and harmful desires which drown them in destruction and ruin .
54006010	Certainly , the love of money is the root of all kinds of evil . Some people who have set their hearts on getting rich have wandered away from the Christian faith and have caused themselves a lot of grief .
54006011	But you , man of God , must avoid these things . Pursue what God approves of : a godly life , faith , love , endurance , and gentleness .
54006012	Fight the good fight for the Christian faith . Take hold of everlasting life to which you were called and about which you made a good testimony in front of many witnesses .
54006013	In the sight of God , who gives life to everything , and in the sight of Christ Jesus , who gave a good testimony in front of Pontius Pilate ,
54006014	I insist that , until our Lord Jesus Christ appears , you obey this command completely . Then you cannot be blamed for doing anything wrong .
54006015	At the right time God will make this known . God is the blessed and only ruler . He is the King of kings and Lord of lords .
54006016	He is the only one who cannot die . He lives in light that no one can come near . No one has seen him , nor can they see him . Honor and power belong to him forever ! Amen .
54006017	Tell those who have the riches of this world not to be arrogant and not to place their confidence in anything as uncertain as riches . Instead , they should place their confidence in God who richly provides us with everything to enjoy .
54006018	Tell them to do good , to do a lot of good things , to be generous , and to share .
54006019	By doing this they store up a treasure for themselves which is a good foundation for the future . In this way they take hold of what life really is .
54006020	Timothy , guard the Good News which has been entrusted to you . Turn away from pointless discussions and the claims of false knowledge that people use to oppose the Christian faith .
54006021	Although some claim to have knowledge , they have abandoned the faith . God’s good will be with all of you .
55001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by God’s will—a will that contains Christ Jesus’ promise of life .
55001002	To Timothy , my dear child . Good will , mercy , and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord !
55001003	I constantly remember you in my prayers night and day when I thank God , whom I serve with a clear conscience as my ancestors did .
55001004	I remember your tears and want to see you so that I can be filled with happiness .
55001005	I’m reminded of how sincere your faith is . That faith first lived in your grandmother Lois and your mother Eunice . I’m convinced that it also lives in you .
55001006	You received a gift from God when I placed my hands on you to ordain you . Now I’m reminding you to fan that gift into flames .
55001007	God didn’t give us a cowardly spirit but a spirit of power , love , and good judgment .
55001008	So never be ashamed to tell others about our Lord or be ashamed of me , his prisoner . Instead , by God’s power , join me in suffering for the sake of the Good News .
55001009	God saved us and called us to be holy , not because of what we had done , but because of his own plan and kindness . Before the world began , God planned that Christ Jesus would show us God’s kindness .
55001010	Now with the coming of our Savior Christ Jesus , he has revealed it . Christ has destroyed death , and through the Good News he has brought eternal life into full view .
55001011	I was appointed to be an apostle and teacher and to spread this Good News .
55001012	For this reason I suffer as I do . However , I’m not ashamed . I know whom I trust . I’m convinced that he is able to protect what he had entrusted to me until that day .
55001013	With faith and love for Christ Jesus , consider what you heard me say to be the pattern of accurate teachings .
55001014	With the help of the Holy Spirit who lives in us , protect the Good News that has been entrusted to you .
55001015	You know that everyone in the province of Asia has deserted me , including Phygelus and Hermogenes .
55001016	May the Lord be merciful to the family of Onesiphorus . He often took care of my needs and wasn’t ashamed that I was a prisoner .
55001017	When he arrived in Rome , he searched hard for me and found me .
55001018	May the Lord grant that Onesiphorus finds mercy when that day comes . You know very well that he did everything possible to help me in Ephesus .
55002001	My child , find your source of strength in the kindness of Christ Jesus .
55002002	You’ve heard my message , and it’s been confirmed by many witnesses . Entrust this message to faithful individuals who will be competent to teach others .
55002003	Join me in suffering like a good soldier of Christ Jesus .
55002004	Whoever serves in the military doesn’t get mixed up in non-military activities . This pleases his commanding officer .
55002005	Whoever enters an athletic competition wins the prize only when playing by the rules .
55002006	A hard-working farmer should have the first share of the crops .
55002007	Understand what I’m saying . The Lord will help you understand all these things .
55002008	Always think about Jesus Christ . He was brought back to life and is a descendant of David . This is the Good News that I tell others .
55002009	I’m suffering disgrace for spreading this Good News . I have even been put into prison like a criminal . However , God’s word is not imprisoned .
55002010	For that reason , I endure everything for the sake of those who have been chosen so that they , too , may receive salvation from Christ Jesus with glory that lasts forever .
55002011	This is a statement that can be trusted : If we have died with him , we will live with him .
55002012	If we endure , we will rule with him . If we disown him , he will disown us .
55002013	If we are unfaithful , he remains faithfulbecause he cannot be untrue to himself .
55002014	Remind believers about these things , and warn them in the sight of God not to quarrel over words . Quarreling doesn’t do any good but only destroys those who are listening .
55002015	Do your best to present yourself to God as a tried-and-true worker who isn’t ashamed to teach the word of truth correctly .
55002016	Avoid pointless discussions . People who pay attention to these pointless discussions will become more ungodly ,
55002017	and what they say will spread like cancer . Hymenaeus and Philetus are like that .
55002018	They have abandoned the truth . They are destroying the faith of others by saying that people who have died have already come back to life .
55002019	In spite of all that , God’s people have a solid foundation . These words are engraved on it : “ The Lord knows those who belong to him , ” and “ Whoever worships the Lord must give up doing wrong . ”
55002020	In a large house there are not only objects made of gold and silver , but also those made of wood and clay . Some objects are honored when they are used ; others aren’t .
55002021	Those who stop associating with dishonorable people will be honored . They will be set apart for the master’s use , prepared to do good things .
55002022	Stay away from lusts which tempt young people . Pursue what has God’s approval . Pursue faith , love , and peace together with those who worship the Lord with a pure heart .
55002023	Don’t have anything to do with foolish and stupid arguments . You know they cause quarrels .
55002024	A servant of the Lord must not quarrel . Instead , he must be kind to everyone . He must be a good teacher . He must be willing to suffer wrong .
55002025	He must be gentle in correcting those who oppose the Good News . Maybe God will allow them to change the way they think and act and lead them to know the truth .
55002026	Then they might come back to their senses and God will free them from the devil’s snare so that they can do his will .
55003001	You must understand this : In the last days there will be violent periods of time .
55003002	People will be selfish and love money . They will brag , be arrogant , and use abusive language . They will curse their parents , show no gratitude , have no respect for what is holy ,
55003003	and lack normal affection for their families . They will refuse to make peace with anyone . They will be slanderous , lack self-control , be brutal , and have no love for what is good .
55003004	They will be traitors . They will be reckless and conceited . They will love pleasure rather than God .
55003005	They will appear to have a godly life , but they will not let its power change them . Stay away from such people .
55003006	Some of these men go into homes and mislead weak-minded women who are burdened with sins and led by all kinds of desires .
55003007	These women are always studying but are never able to recognize the truth .
55003008	As Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses , so these men oppose the truth . Their minds are corrupt , and the faith they teach is counterfeit .
55003009	Certainly , they won’t get very far . Like the stupidity of Jannes and Jambres , their stupidity will be plain to everyone .
55003010	But you know all about my teachings , my way of life , my purpose , my faith , my patience , my love , and my endurance .
55003011	You also know about the kind of persecutions and sufferings which happened to me in the cities of Antioch , Iconium , and Lystra . I endured those persecutions , and the Lord rescued me from all of them .
55003012	Those who try to live a godly life because they believe in Christ Jesus will be persecuted .
55003013	But evil people and phony preachers will go from bad to worse as they mislead people and are themselves misled .
55003014	However , continue in what you have learned and found to be true . You know who your teachers were .
55003015	From infancy you have known the Holy Scriptures . They have the power to give you wisdom so that you can be saved through faith in Christ Jesus .
55003016	Every Scripture passage is inspired by God . All of them are useful for teaching , pointing out errors , correcting people , and training them for a life that has God’s approval .
55003017	They equip God’s servants so that they are completely prepared to do good things .
55004001	I solemnly call on you in the presence of God and Christ Jesus , who is going to judge those who are living and those who are dead . I do this because Christ Jesus will come to rule the world .
55004002	Be ready to spread the word whether or not the time is right . Point out errors , warn people , and encourage them . Be very patient when you teach .
55004003	A time will come when people will not listen to accurate teachings . Instead , they will follow their own desires and surround themselves with teachers who tell them what they want to hear .
55004004	People will refuse to listen to the truth and turn to myths .
55004005	But you must keep a clear head in everything . Endure suffering . Do the work of a missionary . Devote yourself completely to your work .
55004006	My life is coming to an end , and it is now time for me to be poured out as a sacrifice to God .
55004007	I have fought the good fight . I have completed the race . I have kept the faith .
55004008	The prize that shows I have God’s approval is now waiting for me . The Lord , who is a fair judge , will give me that prize on that day . He will give it not only to me but also to everyone who is eagerly waiting for him to come again .
55004009	Hurry to visit me soon .
55004010	Demas has abandoned me . He fell in love with this present world and went to the city of Thessalonica . Crescens went to the province of Galatia , and Titus went to the province of Dalmatia .
55004011	Only Luke is with me . Get Mark and bring him with you . He is useful to me in my work .
55004012	I’m sending Tychicus to the city of Ephesus as my representative .
55004013	When you come , bring the warm coat I left with Carpus in the city of Troas . Also bring the scrolls and especially the parchments .
55004014	Alexander the metalworker did me a great deal of harm . The Lord will pay him back for what he did .
55004015	Watch out for him . He violently opposed what we said .
55004016	At my first hearing no one stood up in my defense . Everyone abandoned me . I pray that it won’t be held against them .
55004017	However , the Lord stood by me and gave me strength so that I could finish spreading the Good News for all the nations to hear . I was snatched out of a lion’s mouth .
55004018	The Lord will rescue me from all harm and will take me safely to his heavenly kingdom . Glory belongs to him forever ! Amen .
55004019	Give my greetings to Prisca and Aquila and the family of Onesiphorus .
55004020	Erastus stayed in the city of Corinth and I left Trophimus in the city of Miletus because he was sick .
55004021	Hurry to visit me before winter comes . Eubulus , Pudens , Linus , Claudia and all the brothers and sisters send you greetings .
55004022	The Lord be with you . His good will be with all of you .
56001001	From Paul , a servant of God and an apostle of Jesus Christ . I was sent to lead God’s chosen people to faith and to the knowledge of the truth that leads to a godly life .
56001002	My message is based on the confidence of eternal life . God , who never lies , promised this eternal life before the world began .
56001003	God has revealed this in every era by spreading his word . I was entrusted with this word by the command of God our Savior .
56001004	To Titus , a genuine child in the faith we share . Good will and peace from God the Father and from Christ Jesus our Savior are yours !
56001005	I left you in Crete to do what still needed to be done—appointing spiritual leaders in every city as I directed you .
56001006	A spiritual leader must have a good reputation . He must have only one wife and have children who are believers . His children shouldn’t be known for having wild lifestyles or being rebellious .
56001007	Because a bishop is a supervisor appointed by God , he must have a good reputation . He must not be a stubborn or irritable person . He must not drink too much or be a violent person . He must not use shameful ways to make money .
56001008	Instead , he must be hospitable , love what is good , use good judgment , be fair and moral , and have self-control .
56001009	He must be devoted to the trustworthy message we teach . Then he can use these accurate teachings to encourage people and correct those who oppose the word .
56001010	There are many believers , especially converts from Judaism , who are rebellious . They speak nonsense and deceive people .
56001011	They must be silenced because they are ruining whole families by teaching what they shouldn’t teach . This is the shameful way they make money .
56001012	Even one of their own prophets said , “ Cretans are always liars , savage animals , and lazy gluttons . ”
56001013	That statement is true . For this reason , sharply correct believers so that they continue to have faith that is alive and well .
56001014	They shouldn’t pay attention to Jewish myths or commands given by people who are always rejecting the truth .
56001015	Everything is clean to those who are clean . But nothing is clean to corrupt unbelievers . Indeed , their minds and their consciences are corrupted .
56001016	They claim to know God , but they deny him by what they do . They are detestable , disobedient , and unfit to do anything good .
56002001	Tell believers to live the kind of life that goes along with accurate teachings .
56002002	Tell older men to be sober . Tell them to be men of good character , to use good judgment , and to be well-grounded in faith , love , and endurance .
56002003	Tell older women to live their lives in a way that shows they are dedicated to God . Tell them not to be gossips or addicted to alcohol , but to be examples of virtue .
56002004	In this way they will teach young women to show love to their husbands and children ,
56002005	to use good judgment , and to be morally pure . Also , tell them to teach young women to be homemakers , to be kind , and to place themselves under their husbands’ authority . Then no one can speak evil of God’s word .
56002006	Encourage young men to use good judgment .
56002007	Always set an example by doing good things . When you teach , be an example of moral purity and dignity .
56002008	Speak an accurate message that cannot be condemned . Then those who oppose us will be ashamed because they cannot say anything bad about us .
56002009	Tell slaves who are believers to place themselves under their masters’ authority in everything they do . Tell them to please their masters , not to argue with them
56002010	or steal from them . Instead , tell slaves to show their masters how good and completely loyal they can be . Then they will show the beauty of the teachings about God our Savior in everything they do .
56002011	After all , God’s saving kindness has appeared for the benefit of all people .
56002012	It trains us to avoid ungodly lives filled with worldly desires so that we can live self-controlled , moral , and godly lives in this present world .
56002013	At the same time we can expect what we hope for—the appearance of the glory of our great God and Savior , Jesus Christ .
56002014	He gave himself for us to set us free from every sin and to cleanse us so that we can be his special people who are enthusiastic about doing good things .
56002015	Tell these things to the believers . Encourage and correct them , using your full authority . Don’t let anyone ignore you .
56003001	Remind believers to willingly place themselves under the authority of government officials . Believers should obey them and be ready to help them with every good thing they do .
56003002	Believers shouldn’t curse anyone or be quarrelsome , but they should be gentle and show courtesy to everyone .
56003003	Indeed , we , too , were once stupid , disobedient , and misled . We were slaves to many kinds of lusts and pleasures . We were mean and jealous . We were hated , and we hated each other .
56003004	However , when God our Savior made his kindness and love for humanity appear ,
56003005	he saved us , but not because of anything we had done to gain his approval . Instead , because of his mercy he saved us through the washing in which the Holy Spirit gives us new birth and renewal .
56003006	God poured a generous amount of the Spirit on us through Jesus Christ our Savior .
56003007	As a result , God in his kindness has given us his approval and we have become heirs who have the confidence that we have everlasting life .
56003008	This is a statement that can be trusted . I want you to insist on these things so that those who believe in God can concentrate on setting an example by doing good things . This is good and helps other people .
56003009	Avoid foolish controversies , arguments about genealogies , quarrels , and fights about Moses’ Teachings . This is useless nonsense .
56003010	Have nothing to do with people who continue to teach false doctrine after you have warned them once or twice .
56003011	You know that people like this are corrupt . They are sinners condemned by their own actions .
56003012	When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you , hurry to visit me in the city of Nicopolis . I have decided to spend the winter there .
56003013	Give Zenas the lawyer and Apollos your best support for their trip so that they will have everything they need .
56003014	Our people should also learn how to set an example by doing good things when urgent needs arise so that they can live productive lives .
56003015	Everyone with me sends you greetings . Greet our faithful friends . God’s good will be with all of you .
57001001	From Paul , who is a prisoner for Christ Jesus , and our brother Timothy . To our dear coworker Philemon ,
57001002	our sister Apphia , our fellow soldier Archippus , and the church that meets in your house .
57001003	Good will and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ are yours !
57001004	Philemon , I always thank my God when I mention you in my prayers because
57001005	I hear about your faithfulness to the Lord Jesus and your love for all of God’s people .
57001006	As you share the faith you have in common with others , I pray that you may come to have a complete knowledge of every blessing we have in Christ .
57001007	Your love for God’s people gives me a lot of joy and encouragement . You , brother , have comforted God’s people .
57001008	Christ makes me bold enough to order you to do the right thing .
57001009	However , I would prefer to make an appeal on the basis of love . I , Paul , as an old man and now a prisoner for Christ Jesus ,
57001010	appeal to you for my child Onesimus [ Useful ] . I became his spiritual father here in prison .
57001011	Once he was useless to you , but now he is very useful to both of us .
57001012	I am sending him back to you . This is like sending you a part of myself .
57001013	I wanted to keep him here with me . Then he could have served me in your place while I am in prison for spreading the Good News .
57001014	Yet , I didn’t want to do anything without your consent . I want you to do this favor for me out of your own free will without feeling forced to do it .
57001015	Maybe Onesimus was gone for a while so that you could have him back forever—
57001016	no longer as a slave but better than a slave—as a dear brother . He is especially dear to me , but even more so to you , both as a person and as a Christian .
57001017	If you think of me as your partner , welcome him as you would welcome me .
57001018	If he wronged you in any way or owes you anything , charge it to me .
57001019	I , Paul , promise to pay it back . I’m writing this with my own hand . I won’t even mention that you owe me your life .
57001020	So , because we’re brothers in the Lord , do something for me . Give me some comfort because of Christ .
57001021	I am confident as I write to you that you will do this . And I know that you will do even more than I ask .
57001022	One more thing—have a guest room ready for me . I hope that , because of your prayers , God will give me back to you .
57001023	Epaphras , who is a prisoner because of Christ Jesus like I am ,
57001024	and my coworkers Mark , Aristarchus , Demas , and Luke send you greetings .
57001025	The good will of our Lord Jesus Christ be yours .
58001001	In the past God spoke to our ancestors at many different times and in many different ways through the prophets .
58001002	In these last days he has spoken to us through his Son . God made his Son responsible for everything . His Son is the one through whom God made the universe .
58001003	His Son is the reflection of God’s glory and the exact likeness of God’s being . He holds everything together through his powerful words . After he had cleansed people from their sins , he received the highest position , the one next to the Father in heaven .
58001004	The Son has become greater than the angels since he has been given a name that is superior to theirs .
58001005	God never said to any of his angels , “ You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . ” And God never said to any of his angels , “ I will be his Father , and he will be my Son . ”
58001006	When God was about to send his firstborn Son into the world , he said , “ All of God’s angels must worship him . ”
58001007	God said about the angels , “ He makes his messengers winds . He makes his servants flames of fire . ”
58001008	But God said about his Son , “ Your throne , O God , is forever and ever . The scepter in your kingdom is a scepter for justice .
58001009	You have loved what is right and hated what is wrong . That is why God , your God , anointed you , rather than your companions , with the oil of joy . ”
58001010	God also said , “ Lord , in the beginning you laid the foundation of the earth . With your own hands you made the heavens .
58001011	They will come to an end , but you will live forever . They will all wear out like clothes .
58001012	They will be taken off like a coat . You will change them like clothes . But you remain the same , and your life will never end .
58001013	But God never said to any of the angels , “ Sit in the highest position in heavenuntil I make your enemies your footstool . ”
58001014	What are all the angels ? They are spirits sent to serve those who are going to receive salvation .
58002001	For this reason we must pay closer attention to what we have heard . Then we won’t drift away from the truth .
58002002	After all , the message that the angels brought was reliable , and every violation and act of disobedience was properly punished .
58002003	So how will we escape punishment if we reject the important message , the message that God saved us ? First , the Lord told this saving message . Then those who heard him confirmed that message .
58002004	God verified what they said through miraculous signs , amazing things , other powerful acts , and with other gifts from the Holy Spirit as he wanted .
58002005	He didn’t put the world that will come ( about which we are talking ) under the angels’ control .
58002006	Instead , someone has declared this somewhere in Scripture : “ What is a mortal that you should remember him , or the Son of Man that you take care of him ?
58002007	You made him a little lower than the angels . You crowned him with glory and honor .
58002008	You put everything under his control . ” When God put everything under his Son’s control , nothing was left out . However , at the present time we still don’t see everything under his Son’s control .
58002009	Jesus was made a little lower than the angels , but we see him crowned with glory and honor because he suffered death . Through God’s kindness he died on behalf of everyone .
58002010	God is the one for whom and through whom everything exists . Therefore , while God was bringing many sons and daughters to glory , it was the right time to bring Jesus , the source of their salvation , to the end of his work through suffering .
58002011	Jesus , who makes people holy , and all those who are made holy have the same Father . That is why Jesus isn’t ashamed to call them brothers and sisters .
58002012	He says , “ I will tell my people about your name . I will praise you within the congregation . ”
58002013	In addition , Jesus says , “ I will trust him . ” And Jesus says , “ I am here with the sons and daughters God has given me . ”
58002014	Since all of these sons and daughters have flesh and blood , Jesus took on flesh and blood to be like them . He did this so that by dying he would destroy the one who had power over death ( that is , the devil ) .
58002015	In this way he would free those who were slaves all their lives because they were afraid of dying .
58002016	So Jesus helps Abraham’s descendants rather than helping angels .
58002017	Therefore , he had to become like his brothers and sisters so that he could be merciful . He became like them so that he could serve as a faithful chief priest in God’s presence and make peace with God for their sins .
58002018	Because Jesus experienced temptation when he suffered , he is able to help others when they are tempted .
58003001	Brothers and sisters , you are holy partners in a heavenly calling . So look carefully at Jesus , the apostle and chief priest about whom we make our declaration of faith .
58003002	Jesus is faithful to God , who appointed him , in the same way that Moses was faithful when he served in God’s house .
58003003	Jesus deserves more praise than Moses in the same way that the builder of a house is praised more than the house .
58003004	After all , every house has a builder , but the builder of everything is God .
58003005	Moses was a faithful servant in God’s household . He told the people what God would say in the future .
58003006	But Christ is a faithful son in charge of God’s household . We are his household if we continue to have courage and to be proud of the confidence we have .
58003007	As the Holy Spirit says , “ If you hear God speak today , don’t be stubborn .
58003008	Don’t be stubborn like those who rebelledand tested me in the desert .
58003009	That is where your ancestors tested me ,
58003010	although they had seen what I had done for 40 years . That is why I was angry with those people . So I said , ‘ Their hearts continue to stray , and they have not learned my ways . ’
58003011	So I angrily took a solemn oaththat they would never enter my place of rest . ”
58003012	Be careful , brothers and sisters , that none of you ever develop a wicked , unbelieving heart that turns away from the living God .
58003013	Encourage each other every day while you have the opportunity . If you do this , none of you will be deceived by sin and become stubborn .
58003014	After all , we will remain Christ’s partners only if we continue to hold on to our original confidence until the end .
58003015	Scripture says , “ If you hear God speak today , don’t be stubborn . Don’t be stubborn like those who rebelled . ”
58003016	Who heard God and rebelled ? All those whom Moses led out of Egypt rebelled .
58003017	With whom was God angry for 40 years ? He was angry with those who sinned and died in the desert .
58003018	Who did God swear would never enter his place of rest ? He was talking about those who didn’t obey him .
58003019	So we see that they couldn’t enter his place of rest because they didn’t believe .
58004001	God’s promise that we may enter his place of rest still stands . We are afraid that some of you think you won’t enter his place of rest .
58004002	We have heard the same Good News that your ancestors heard . But the message didn’t help those who heard it in the past because they didn’t believe .
58004003	We who believe are entering that place of rest . As God said , “ So I angrily took a solemn oath that they would never enter my place of rest . ” God said this even though he had finished his work when he created the world .
58004004	Somewhere in Scripture God has said this about the seventh day : “ On the seventh day God rested from all his work . ”
58004005	God also said in the same passage , “ They will never enter my place of rest . ”
58004006	However , some people enter that place of rest . Those who heard the Good News in the past did not enter God’s place of rest because they did not obey God .
58004007	So God set another day . That day is today . Many years after your ancestors failed to enter that place of rest God spoke about it through David in the passage already quoted : “ If you hear God speak today , don’t be stubborn . ”
58004008	If Joshua had given the people rest , God would not have spoken about another day .
58004009	Therefore , a time of rest and worship exists for God’s people .
58004010	Those who entered his place of rest also rested from their work as God did from his .
58004011	So we must make every effort to enter that place of rest . Then no one will be lost by following the example of those who refused to obey .
58004012	God’s word is living and active . It is sharper than any two-edged sword and cuts as deep as the place where soul and spirit meet , the place where joints and marrow meet . God’s word judges a person’s thoughts and intentions .
58004013	No creature can hide from God . Everything is uncovered and exposed for him to see . We must answer to him .
58004014	We need to hold on to our declaration of faith : We have a superior chief priest who has gone through the heavens . That person is Jesus , the Son of God .
58004015	We have a chief priest who is able to sympathize with our weaknesses . He was tempted in every way that we are , but he didn’t sin .
58004016	So we can go confidently to the throne of God’s kindness to receive mercy and find kindness , which will help us at the right time .
58005001	Every chief priest is chosen from humans to represent them in front of God , that is , to offer gifts and sacrifices for sin .
58005002	The chief priest can be gentle with people who are ignorant and easily deceived , because he also has weaknesses .
58005003	Because he has weaknesses , he has to offer sacrifices for his own sins in the same way that he does for the sins of his people .
58005004	No one takes this honor for himself . Instead , God calls him as he called Aaron .
58005005	So Christ did not take the glory of being a chief priest for himself . Instead , the glory was given to him by God , who said , “ You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . ”
58005006	In another place in Scripture , God said , “ You are a priest forever , in the way Melchizedek was a priest . ”
58005007	During his life on earth , Jesus prayed to God , who could save him from death . He prayed and pleaded with loud crying and tears , and he was heard because of his devotion to God .
58005008	Although Jesus was the Son of God , he learned to be obedient through his sufferings .
58005009	After he had finished his work , he became the source of eternal salvation for everyone who obeys him .
58005010	God appointed him chief priest in the way Melchizedek was a priest .
58005011	We have a lot to explain about this . But since you have become too lazy to pay attention , explaining it to you is hard .
58005012	By now you should be teachers . Instead , you still need someone to teach you the elementary truths of God’s word . You need milk , not solid food .
58005013	All those who live on milk lack the experience to talk about what is right . They are still babies .
58005014	However , solid food is for mature people , whose minds are trained by practice to know the difference between good and evil .
58006001	With this in mind , we should stop going over the elementary truths about Christ and move on to topics for more mature people . We shouldn’t repeat the basics about turning away from the useless things we did and the basics about faith in God .
58006002	We shouldn’t repeat the basic teachings about such things as baptisms , setting people apart for holy tasks , dead people coming back to life , and eternal judgment .
58006003	If God permits , we will do this .
58006004	Some people once had God’s light . They experienced the heavenly gift and shared in the Holy Spirit .
58006005	They experienced the goodness of God’s word and the powers of the world to come .
58006006	Yet , they have deserted Christ . They are crucifying the Son of God again and publicly disgracing him . Therefore , they cannot be led a second time to God .
58006007	God blesses the earth . So rain often falls on it , and it produces useful crops for farmers .
58006008	However , if the earth produces thorns and thistles , it is worthless and in danger of being cursed . In the end it will be burned .
58006009	Dear friends , even though we say these things , we are still convinced that better things are in store for you and that they will save you .
58006010	God is fair . He won’t forget what you’ve done or the love you’ve shown for him . You helped his holy people , and you continue to help them .
58006011	We want each of you to prove that you’re working hard so that you will remain confident until the end .
58006012	Then , instead of being lazy , you will imitate those who are receiving the promises through faith and patience .
58006013	God made a promise to Abraham . Since he had no one greater on whom to base his oath , he based it on himself .
58006014	He said , “ I will certainly bless you and give you many descendants . ”
58006015	So Abraham received what God promised because he waited patiently for it .
58006016	When people take oaths , they base their oaths on someone greater than themselves . Their oaths guarantee what they say and end all arguments .
58006017	God wouldn’t change his plan . He wanted to make this perfectly clear to those who would receive his promise , so he took an oath .
58006018	God did this so that we would be encouraged . God cannot lie when he takes an oath or makes a promise . These two things can never be changed . Those of us who have taken refuge in him hold on to the confidence we have been given .
58006019	We have this confidence as a sure and strong anchor for our lives . This confidence goes into the holy place behind the curtain
58006020	where Jesus went before us on our behalf . He has become the chief priest forever in the way Melchizedek was a priest .
58007001	Melchizedek was king of Salem and priest of the Most High God . He met Abraham and blessed him when Abraham was returning from defeating the kings .
58007002	Abraham gave Melchizedek a tenth of everything he had captured . In the first place , Melchizedek’s name means king of righteousness . He is also called king of Salem ( which means king of peace ) .
58007003	No one knows anything about Melchizedek’s father , mother , or ancestors . No one knows when he was born or when he died . Like the Son of God , Melchizedek continues to be a priest forever .
58007004	You can see how important Melchizedek was . Abraham gave him a tenth of what he had captured , even though Abraham was the father of the chosen people .
58007005	Moses’ Teachings say that members of the tribe of Levi who become priests must receive a tenth of everything from the people . The priests collect it from their own people , Abraham’s descendants .
58007006	Although Melchizedek was not from the tribe of Levi , he received a tenth of everything from Abraham . Then Melchizedek blessed Abraham , who had God’s promises .
58007007	No one can deny that the more important person blesses the less important person .
58007008	Priests receive a tenth of everything , but they die . Melchizedek received a tenth of everything , but we are told that he lives .
58007009	We could even say that when Abraham gave Melchizedek a tenth of everything , Levi was giving a tenth of everything . Levi gave , although later his descendants would receive a tenth of everything .
58007010	Even though Levi had not yet been born , he was in the body of Abraham when Melchizedek met him .
58007011	The people established the Levitical priesthood based on instructions they received . If the work of the Levitical priests had been perfect , we wouldn’t need to speak about another kind of priest . However , we speak about another kind of priest , a priest like Melchizedek , not a Levitical priest like Aaron .
58007012	When a different kind of priesthood is established , the regulations for those priests are different .
58007013	The priest whom we are talking about was a member of a different tribe . No one from that tribe ever served as a priest at the altar .
58007014	Everyone knows that our Lord came from the tribe of Judah . Moses never said anything about priests coming from that tribe .
58007015	The regulations were different . This became clear when a different priest who is like Melchizedek appeared .
58007016	That person is a priest , not because he met human requirements , but because he has power that comes from a life that cannot be destroyed .
58007017	The Scriptures say the following about him : “ You are a priest forever , in the way Melchizedek was a priest . ”
58007018	The former requirements are rejected because they are weak and useless .
58007019	Moses’ Teachings couldn’t accomplish everything that God required . But we have something else that gives us greater confidence and allows us to approach God .
58007020	None of this happened without an oath . The men from the tribe of Levi may have become priests without an oath ,
58007021	but Jesus became a priest when God took an oath . God said about him , “ The Lord has taken an oath and will not change his mind . You are a priest forever . ”
58007022	In this way Jesus has become the guarantee of a better promise .
58007023	There was a long succession of priests because when a priest died he could no longer serve .
58007024	But Jesus lives forever , so he serves as a priest forever .
58007025	That is why he is always able to save those who come to God through him . He can do this because he always lives and intercedes for them .
58007026	We need a chief priest who is holy , innocent , pure , set apart from sinners , and who has the highest position in heaven .
58007027	We need a priest who doesn’t have to bring daily sacrifices as those chief priests did . First they brought sacrifices for their own sins , and then they brought sacrifices for the sins of the people . Jesus brought the sacrifice for the sins of the people once and for all when he sacrificed himself .
58007028	Moses’ Teachings designated mortals as chief priests even though they had weaknesses . But God’s promise , which came after Moses’ Teachings , designated the Son who forever accomplished everything that God required .
58008001	The main point we want to make is this : We do have this kind of chief priest . This chief priest has received the highest position , the throne of majesty in heaven .
58008002	He serves as priest of the holy place and of the true tent set up by the Lord and not by any human .
58008003	Every chief priest is appointed to offer gifts and sacrifices . Therefore , this chief priest had to offer something .
58008004	If he were on earth , he would not even be a priest . On earth other priests offer gifts by following the instructions that Moses gave .
58008005	They serve at a place that is a pattern , a shadow , of what is in heaven . When Moses was about to make the tent , God warned him , “ Be sure to make everything based on the plan I showed you on the mountain . ”
58008006	Jesus has been given a priestly work that is superior to the Levitical priests’ work . He also brings a better promise from God that is based on better guarantees .
58008007	If nothing had been wrong with the first promise , no one would look for another one .
58008008	But God found something wrong with his people and said to them , “ The days are coming , says the Lord , when I will make a new promise to Israel and Judah .
58008009	It will not be like the promise that I made to their ancestors when I took them by the hand and brought them out of Egypt . They rejected that promise , so I ignored them , says the Lord .
58008010	But this is the promise that I will make to Israel after those days , says the Lord : I will put my teachings inside them , and I will write those teachings on their hearts . I will be their God , and they will be my people .
58008011	No longer will each person teach his neighbors or his relatives by saying , ‘ Know the Lord . ’ All of them from the least important to the most important will all know me
58008012	because I will forgive their wickedness and I will no longer hold their sins against them . ”
58008013	God made this new promise and showed that the first promise was outdated . What is outdated and aging will soon disappear .
58009001	The first promise had rules for the priests’ service . It also had a holy place on earth .
58009002	A tent was set up . The first part of this tent was called the holy place . The lamp stand , the table , and the bread of the presence were in this part of the tent .
58009003	Behind the second curtain was the part of the tent called the most holy place .
58009004	It contained the gold incense burner and the ark of the Lord’s promise . The ark was completely covered with gold . In the ark were the gold jar filled with manna , Aaron’s staff that had blossomed , and the tablets on which the promise was written .
58009005	Above the ark were the angels of glory with their wings overshadowing the throne of mercy . ( Discussing these things in detail isn’t possible now . )
58009006	That is how these two parts of the tent were set up . The priests always went into the first part of the tent to perform their duties .
58009007	But only the chief priest went into the second part of the tent . Once a year he entered and brought blood that he offered for himself and for the things that the people did wrong unintentionally .
58009008	The Holy Spirit used this to show that the way into the most holy place was not open while the tent was still in use .
58009009	The first part of the tent is an example for the present time . The gifts and sacrifices that were brought there could not give the worshiper a clear conscience .
58009010	These gifts and sacrifices were meant to be food , drink , and items used in various purification ceremonies . These ceremonies were required for the body until God would establish a new way of doing things .
58009011	But Christ came as a chief priest of the good things that are now here . Christ went through a better , more perfect tent that was not made by human hands and that is not part of this created world .
58009012	He used his own blood , not the blood of goats and bulls , for the sacrifice . He went into the most holy place and offered this sacrifice once and for all to free us forever .
58009013	The blood of goats and bulls and the ashes of cows sprinkled on unclean people made their bodies holy and clean .
58009014	The blood of Christ , who had no defect , does even more . Through the eternal Spirit he offered himself to God and cleansed our consciences from the useless things we had done . Now we can serve the living God .
58009015	Because Christ offered himself to God , he is able to bring a new promise from God . Through his death he paid the price to set people free from the sins they committed under the first promise . He did this so that those who are called can be guaranteed an inheritance that will last forever .
58009016	In order for a will to take effect , it must be shown that the one who made it has died .
58009017	A will is used only after a person is dead because it goes into effect only when a person dies .
58009018	That is why even the first promise was made with blood .
58009019	As Moses’ Teachings tell us , Moses told all the people every commandment . Then he took the blood of calves and goats together with some water , red yarn , and hyssop and sprinkled the scroll and all the people .
58009020	He said , “ Here is the blood that seals the promise God has made to you . ”
58009021	In the same way , Moses sprinkled blood on the tent and on everything used in worship .
58009022	As Moses’ Teachings tell us , blood was used to cleanse almost everything , because if no blood is shed , no sins can be forgiven .
58009023	The copies of the things in heaven had to be cleansed by these sacrifices . But the heavenly things themselves had to be cleansed by better sacrifices .
58009024	Christ didn’t go into a holy place made by human hands . He didn’t go into a model of the real thing . Instead , he went into heaven to appear in God’s presence on our behalf .
58009025	Every year the chief priest went into the holy place to make a sacrifice with blood that isn’t his own . However , Christ didn’t go into heaven to sacrifice himself again and again .
58009026	Otherwise , he would have had to suffer many times since the world was created . But now , at the end of the ages , he has appeared once to remove sin by his sacrifice .
58009027	People die once , and after that they are judged .
58009028	Likewise , Christ was sacrificed once to take away the sins of humanity , and after that he will appear a second time . This time he will not deal with sin , but he will save those who eagerly wait for him .
58010001	Moses’ Teachings with their yearly cycle of sacrifices are only a shadow of the good things in the future . They aren’t an exact likeness of those things . They can never make those who worship perfect .
58010002	If these sacrifices could have made the worshipers perfect , the sacrifices would have stopped long ago . Those who worship would have been cleansed once and for all . Their consciences would have been free from sin .
58010003	Instead , this yearly cycle of sacrifices reminded people of their sins .
58010004	( The blood of bulls and goats cannot take away sins . )
58010005	For this reason , when Christ came into the world , he said , “ ‘ You did not want sacrifices and offerings , but you prepared a body for me .
58010006	You did not approve of burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin . ’
58010007	Then I said , ‘ I have come ! ( It is written about me in the scroll of the book . ) I have come to do what you want , my God . ’ ”
58010008	In this passage Christ first said , “ You did not want sacrifices , offerings , burnt offerings , and sacrifices for sin . You did not approve of them . ” ( These are the sacrifices that Moses’ Teachings require people to offer . )
58010009	Then Christ says , “ I have come to do what you want . ” He did away with sacrifices in order to establish the obedience that God wants .
58010010	We have been set apart as holy because Jesus Christ did what God wanted him to do by sacrificing his body once and for all .
58010011	Every day each priest performed his religious duty . He offered the same type of sacrifice again and again . Yet , these sacrifices could never take away sins .
58010012	However , this chief priest made one sacrifice for sins , and this sacrifice lasts forever . Then he received the highest position in heaven .
58010013	Since that time , he has been waiting for his enemies to be made his footstool .
58010014	With one sacrifice he accomplished the work of setting them apart for God forever .
58010015	The Holy Spirit tells us the same thing :
58010016	“ This is the promise that I will make to them after those days , says the Lord : ‘ I will put my teachings in their hearts and write them in their minds . ’ ”
58010017	Then he adds , “ I will no longer hold their sins and their disobedience against them . ”
58010018	When sins are forgiven , there is no longer any need to sacrifice for sins .
58010019	Brothers and sisters , because of the blood of Jesus we can now confidently go into the holy place .
58010020	Jesus has opened a new and living way for us to go through the curtain . ( The curtain is his own body . )
58010021	We have a superior priest in charge of God’s house .
58010022	We have been sprinkled with his blood to free us from a guilty conscience , and our bodies have been washed with clean water . So we must continue to come to him with a sincere heart and strong faith .
58010023	We must continue to hold firmly to our declaration of faith . The one who made the promise is faithful .
58010024	We must also consider how to encourage each other to show love and to do good things .
58010025	We should not stop gathering together with other believers , as some of you are doing . Instead , we must continue to encourage each other even more as we see the day of the Lord coming .
58010026	If we go on sinning after we have learned the truth , no sacrifice can take away our sins .
58010027	All that is left is a terrifying wait for judgment and a raging fire that will consume God’s enemies .
58010028	If two or three witnesses accused someone of rejecting Moses’ Teachings , that person was shown no mercy as he was executed .
58010029	What do you think a person who shows no respect for the Son of God deserves ? That person looks at the blood of the promise ( the blood that made him holy ) as no different from other people’s blood , and he insults the Spirit that God gave us out of his kindness . He deserves a much worse punishment .
58010030	We know the God who said , “ I alone have the right to take revenge . I will pay back . ” God also said , “ The Lord will judge his people . ”
58010031	Falling into the hands of the living God is a terrifying thing .
58010032	Remember the past , when you first learned the truth . You endured a lot of hardship and pain .
58010033	At times you were publicly insulted and mistreated . At times you associated with people who were treated this way .
58010034	You suffered with prisoners . You were cheerful even though your possessions were stolen , since you know that you have a better and more permanent possession .
58010035	So don’t lose your confidence . It will bring you a great reward .
58010036	You need endurance so that after you have done what God wants you to do , you can receive what he has promised .
58010037	“ Yet , the one who is coming will come soon . He will not delay .
58010038	The person who has God’s approval will live because of faith . But if he turns back , I will not be pleased with him . ”
58010039	We don’t belong with those who turn back and are destroyed . Instead , we belong with those who have faith and are saved .
58011001	Faith assures us of things we expect and convinces us of the existence of things we cannot see .
58011002	God accepted our ancestors because of their faith .
58011003	Faith convinces us that God created the world through his word . This means what can be seen was made by something that could not be seen .
58011004	Faith led Abel to offer God a better sacrifice than Cain’s sacrifice . Through his faith Abel received God’s approval , since God accepted his sacrifices . Through his faith Abel still speaks , even though he is dead .
58011005	Faith enabled Enoch to be taken instead of dying . No one could find him , because God had taken him . Scripture states that before Enoch was taken , God was pleased with him .
58011006	No one can please God without faith . Whoever goes to God must believe that God exists and that he rewards those who seek him .
58011007	Faith led Noah to listen when God warned him about the things in the future that he could not see . He obeyed God and built a ship to save his family . Through faith Noah condemned the world and received God’s approval that comes through faith .
58011008	Faith led Abraham to obey when God called him to go to a place that he would receive as an inheritance . Abraham left his own country without knowing where he was going .
58011009	Faith led Abraham to live as a foreigner in the country that God had promised him . He lived in tents , as did Isaac and Jacob , who received the same promise from God .
58011010	Abraham was waiting for the city that God had designed and built , the city with permanent foundations .
