58011011	Faith enabled Abraham to become a father , even though he was old and Sarah had never been able to have children . Abraham trusted that God would keep his promise .
58011012	Abraham was as good as dead . Yet , from this man came descendants as numerous as the stars in the sky and as countless as the grains of sand on the seashore .
58011013	All these people died having faith . They didn’t receive the things that God had promised them , but they saw these things coming in the distant future and rejoiced . They acknowledged that they were living as strangers with no permanent home on earth .
58011014	Those who say such things make it clear that they are looking for their own country .
58011015	If they had been thinking about the country that they had left , they could have found a way to go back .
58011016	Instead , these men were longing for a better country—a heavenly country . That is why God is not ashamed to be called their God . He has prepared a city for them .
58011017	When God tested Abraham , faith led him to offer his son Isaac . Abraham , the one who received the promises from God , was willing to offer his only son as a sacrifice .
58011018	God had said to him , “ Through Isaac your descendants will carry on your name . ”
58011019	Abraham believed that God could bring Isaac back from the dead . Abraham did receive Isaac back from the dead in a figurative sense .
58011020	Faith led Isaac to bless Jacob and Esau .
58011021	While Jacob was dying , faith led him to bless each of Joseph’s sons . He leaned on the top of his staff and worshiped God .
58011022	While Joseph was dying , faith led him to speak about the Israelites leaving Egypt and give them instructions about burying his bones .
58011023	Faith led Moses’ parents to hide him for three months after he was born . They did this because they saw that Moses was a beautiful baby and they were not afraid to disobey the king’s order .
58011024	When Moses grew up , faith led him to refuse to be known as a son of Pharaoh’s daughter .
58011025	He chose to suffer with God’s people rather than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a little while .
58011026	He thought that being insulted for Christ would be better than having the treasures of Egypt . He was looking ahead to his reward .
58011027	Faith led Moses to leave Egypt without being afraid of the king’s anger . Moses didn’t give up but continued as if he could actually see the invisible God .
58011028	Faith led Moses to establish the Passover and spread the blood on the doorposts so that the destroying angel would not kill the firstborn sons .
58011029	Faith caused the people to go through the Red Sea as if it were dry land . The Egyptians also tried this , but they drowned .
58011030	Faith caused the walls of Jericho to fall after the Israelites marched around them for seven days .
58011031	Faith led the prostitute Rahab to welcome the spies as friends . She was not killed with those who refused to obey God .
58011032	What more should I say ? I don’t have enough time to tell you about Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , David , Samuel , and the prophets .
58011033	Through faith they conquered kingdoms , did what God approved , and received what God had promised . They shut the mouths of lions ,
58011034	put out raging fires , and escaped death . They found strength when they were weak . They were powerful in battle and defeated other armies .
58011035	Women received their loved ones back from the dead . Other believers were brutally tortured but refused to be released so that they might gain eternal life .
58011036	Some were made fun of and whipped , and some were chained and put in prison .
58011037	Some were stoned to death , sawed in half , and killed with swords . Some wore the skins of sheep and goats . Some were poor , abused , and mistreated .
58011038	The world didn’t deserve these good people . Some wandered around in deserts and mountains and lived in caves and holes in the ground .
58011039	All these people were known for their faith , but none of them received what God had promised .
58011040	God planned to give us something very special so that we would gain eternal life with them .
58012001	Since we are surrounded by so many examples of faith , we must get rid of everything that slows us down , especially sin that distracts us . We must run the race that lies ahead of us and never give up .
58012002	We must focus on Jesus , the source and goal of our faith . He saw the joy ahead of him , so he endured death on the cross and ignored the disgrace it brought him . Then he received the highest position in heaven , the one next to the throne of God .
58012003	Think about Jesus , who endured opposition from sinners , so that you don’t become tired and give up .
58012004	You struggle against sin , but your struggles haven’t killed you .
58012005	You have forgotten the encouraging words that God speaks to you as his children : “ My child , pay attention when the Lord disciplines you . Don’t give up when he corrects you .
58012006	The Lord disciplines everyone he loves . He severely disciplines everyone he accepts as his child . ” Endure your discipline . God corrects you as a father corrects his children . All children are disciplined by their fathers .
58012008	If you aren’t disciplined like the other children , you aren’t part of the family .
58012009	On earth we have fathers who disciplined us , and we respect them . Shouldn’t we place ourselves under the authority of God , the father of spirits , so that we will live ?
58012010	For a short time our fathers disciplined us as they thought best . Yet , God disciplines us for our own good so that we can become holy like him .
58012011	We don’t enjoy being disciplined . It always seems to cause more pain than joy . But later on , those who learn from that discipline have peace that comes from doing what is right .
58012012	Strengthen your tired arms and weak knees .
58012013	Keep walking along straight paths so that your injured leg won’t get worse . Instead , let it heal .
58012014	Try to live peacefully with everyone , and try to live holy lives , because if you don’t , you will not see the Lord .
58012015	Make sure that everyone has kindness from God so that bitterness doesn’t take root and grow up to cause trouble that corrupts many of you .
58012016	Make sure that no one commits sexual sin or is as concerned about earthly things as Esau was . He sold his rights as the firstborn son for a single meal .
58012017	You know that afterwards , when he wanted to receive the blessing that the firstborn son was to receive , he was rejected . Even though he begged and cried for the blessing , he couldn’t do anything to change what had happened .
58012018	You have not come to something that you can feel , to a blazing fire , to darkness , to gloom , to a storm ,
58012019	to a trumpet’s blast , and to a voice . When your ancestors heard that voice , they begged not to hear it say another word .
58012020	They couldn’t obey the command that was given , “ If even an animal touches the mountain , it must be stoned to death . ”
58012021	The sight was so terrifying that even Moses said he was trembling and afraid .
58012022	Instead , you have come to Mount Zion , to the city of the living God , to the heavenly Jerusalem . You have come to tens of thousands of angels joyfully gathered together
58012023	and to the assembly of God’s firstborn children ( whose names are written in heaven ) . You have come to a judge ( the God of all people ) and to the spirits of people who have God’s approval and have gained eternal life .
58012024	You have come to Jesus , who brings the new promise from God , and to the sprinkled blood that speaks a better message than Abel’s .
58012025	Be careful that you do not refuse to listen when God speaks . Your ancestors didn’t escape when they refused to listen to God , who warned them on earth . We certainly won’t escape if we turn away from God , who warns us from heaven .
58012026	When God spoke to your ancestors , his voice shook the earth . But now he has promised , “ Once more I will shake not only the earth but also the sky . ”
58012027	The words show clearly that God will change what he has made . These are the things that can be shaken . Then only the things that cannot be shaken will remain .
58012028	Therefore , we must be thankful that we have a kingdom that cannot be shaken . Because we are thankful , we must serve God with fear and awe in a way that pleases him .
58012029	After all , our God is a destructive fire .
58013001	Continue to love each other .
58013002	Don’t forget to show hospitality to believers you don’t know . By doing this some believers have shown hospitality to angels without being aware of it .
58013003	Remember those in prison as if you were in prison with them . Remember those who are mistreated as if you were being mistreated .
58013004	Marriage is honorable in every way , so husbands and wives should be faithful to each other . God will judge those who commit sexual sins , especially those who commit adultery .
58013005	Don’t love money . Be happy with what you have because God has said , “ I will never abandon you or leave you . ”
58013006	So we can confidently say , “ The Lord is my helper . I will not be afraid . What can mortals do to me ? ”
58013007	Remember your leaders who have spoken God’s word to you . Think about how their lives turned out , and imitate their faith .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday , today , and forever .
58013009	Don’t get carried away by all kinds of unfamiliar teachings . Gaining inner strength from God’s kindness is good for us . This strength does not come from following rules about food , rules that don’t help those who follow them .
58013010	Those who serve at the tent have no right to eat what is sacrificed at our altar .
58013011	The chief priest brings the blood of animals into the holy place as an offering for sin . But the bodies of those animals were burned outside the Israelite camp .
58013012	That is why Jesus suffered outside the gates of Jerusalem . He suffered to make the people holy with his own blood .
58013013	So we must go to him outside the camp and endure the insults he endured .
58013014	We don’t have a permanent city here on earth , but we are looking for the city that we will have in the future .
58013015	Through Jesus we should always bring God a sacrifice of praise , that is , words that acknowledge him .
58013016	Don’t forget to do good things for others and to share what you have with them . These are the kinds of sacrifices that please God .
58013017	Obey your leaders , and accept their authority . They take care of you because they are responsible for you . Obey them so that they may do this work joyfully and not complain about you . ( Causing them to complain would not be to your advantage . )
58013018	Pray for us . We are sure that our consciences are clear because we want to live honorably in every way .
58013019	I especially ask for your prayers so that I may come back to you soon .
58013020	The God of peace brought the great shepherd of the sheep , our Lord Jesus , back to life through the blood of an eternal promise .
58013021	May this God of peace prepare you to do every good thing he wants . May he work in us through Jesus Christ to do what is pleasing to him . Glory belongs to Jesus Christ forever . Amen .
58013022	I urge you , brothers and sisters , to listen patiently to my encouraging words . I have written you a short letter .
58013023	You know that Timothy , our brother , has been freed . If he comes here soon , both of us will visit you .
58013024	Greet all your leaders and all God’s holy people . Those who are with us from Italy greet you .
58013025	May God’s good will be with all of you !
59001001	From James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ . To God’s faithful people who have been scattered . Greetings .
59001002	My brothers and sisters , be very happy when you are tested in different ways .
59001003	You know that such testing of your faith produces endurance .
59001004	Endure until your testing is over . Then you will be mature and complete , and you won’t need anything .
59001005	If any of you needs wisdom to know what you should do , you should ask God , and he will give it to you . God is generous to everyone and doesn’t find fault with them .
59001006	When you ask for something , don’t have any doubts . A person who has doubts is like a wave that is blown by the wind and tossed by the sea .
59001007	A person who has doubts shouldn’t expect to receive anything from the Lord .
59001008	A person who has doubts is thinking about two different things at the same time and can’t make up his mind about anything .
59001009	Humble believers should be proud because being humble makes them important .
59001010	Rich believers should be proud because being rich should make them humble . Rich people will wither like flowers .
59001011	The sun rises with its scorching heat and dries up plants . The flowers drop off , and the beauty is gone . The same thing will happen to rich people . While they are busy , they will die .
59001012	Blessed are those who endure when they are tested . When they pass the test , they will receive the crown of life that God has promised to those who love him .
59001013	When someone is tempted , he shouldn’t say that God is tempting him . God can’t be tempted by evil , and God doesn’t tempt anyone .
59001014	Everyone is tempted by his own desires as they lure him away and trap him .
59001015	Then desire becomes pregnant and gives birth to sin . When sin grows up , it gives birth to death .
59001016	My dear brothers and sisters , don’t be fooled .
59001017	Every good present and every perfect gift comes from above , from the Father who made the sun , moon , and stars . The Father doesn’t change like the shifting shadows produced by the sun and the moon .
59001018	God decided to give us life through the word of truth to make us his most important creatures .
59001019	Remember this , my dear brothers and sisters : Everyone should be quick to listen , slow to speak , and should not get angry easily .
59001020	An angry person doesn’t do what God approves of .
59001021	So get rid of all immoral behavior and all the wicked things you do . Humbly accept the word that God has placed in you . This word can save you .
59001022	Do what God’s word says . Don’t merely listen to it , or you will fool yourselves .
59001023	If someone listens to God’s word but doesn’t do what it says , he is like a person who looks at his face in a mirror ,
59001024	studies his features , goes away , and immediately forgets what he looks like .
59001025	However , the person who continues to study God’s perfect teachings that make people free and who remains committed to them will be blessed . People like that don’t merely listen and forget ; they actually do what God’s teachings say .
59001026	If a person thinks that he is religious but can’t control his tongue , he is fooling himself . That person’s religion is worthless .
59001027	Pure , unstained religion , according to God our Father , is to take care of orphans and widows when they suffer and to remain uncorrupted by this world .
59002001	My brothers and sisters , practice your faith in our glorious Lord Jesus Christ by not favoring one person over another .
59002002	For example , two men come to your worship service . One man is wearing gold rings and fine clothes ; the other man , who is poor , is wearing shabby clothes .
59002003	Suppose you give special attention to the man wearing fine clothes and say to him , “ Please have a seat . ” But you say to the poor man , “ Stand over there , ” or “ Sit on the floor at my feet . ”
59002004	Aren’t you discriminating against people and using a corrupt standard to make judgments ?
59002005	Listen , my dear brothers and sisters ! Didn’t God choose poor people in the world to become rich in faith and to receive the kingdom that he promised to those who love him ?
59002006	Yet , you show no respect to poor people . Don’t rich people oppress you and drag you into court ?
59002007	Don’t they curse the good name of Jesus , the name that was used to bless you ?
59002008	You are doing right if you obey this law from the highest authority : “ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ”
59002009	If you favor one person over another , you’re sinning , and this law convicts you of being disobedient .
59002010	If someone obeys all of God’s laws except one , that person is guilty of breaking all of them .
59002011	After all , the one who said , “ Never commit adultery , ” is the same one who said , “ Never murder . ” If you do not commit adultery but you murder , you become a person who disobeys God’s laws .
59002012	Talk and act as people who are going to be judged by laws that bring freedom .
59002013	No mercy will be shown to those who show no mercy to others . Mercy triumphs over judgment .
59002014	My brothers and sisters , what good does it do if someone claims to have faith but doesn’t do any good things ? Can this kind of faith save him ?
59002015	Suppose a believer , whether a man or a woman , needs clothes or food
59002016	and one of you tells that person , “ God be with you ! Stay warm , and make sure you eat enough . ” If you don’t provide for that person’s physical needs , what good does it do ?
59002017	In the same way , faith by itself is dead if it doesn’t cause you to do any good things .
59002018	Another person might say , “ You have faith , but I do good things . ” Show me your faith apart from the good things you do . I will show you my faith by the good things I do .
59002019	You believe that there is one God . That’s fine ! The demons also believe that , and they tremble with fear .
59002020	You fool ! Do you have to be shown that faith which does nothing is useless ?
59002021	Didn’t our ancestor Abraham receive God’s approval as a result of what he did when he offered his son Isaac as a sacrifice on the altar ?
59002022	You see that Abraham’s faith and what he did worked together . His faith was shown to be genuine by what he did .
59002023	The Scripture passage came true . It says , “ Abraham believed God , and that faith was regarded by God to be his approval of Abraham . ” So Abraham was called God’s friend .
59002024	You see that a person receives God’s approval because of what he does , not only because of what he believes .
59002025	The same is true of the prostitute Rahab who welcomed the spies and sent them away on another road . She received God’s approval because of what she did .
59002026	A body that doesn’t breathe is dead . In the same way faith that does nothing is dead .
59003001	Brothers and sisters , not many of you should become teachers . You know that we who teach will be judged more severely .
59003002	All of us make a lot of mistakes . If someone doesn’t make any mistakes when he speaks , he would be perfect . He would be able to control everything he does .
59003003	We put bits in the mouths of horses to make them obey us , and we have control over everything they do .
59003004	The same thing is true for ships . They are very big and are driven by strong winds . Yet , by using small rudders , pilots steer ships wherever they want them to go .
59003005	In the same way the tongue is a small part of the body , but it can brag about doing important things . A large forest can be set on fire by a little flame .
59003006	The tongue is that kind of flame . It is a world of evil among the parts of our bodies , and it completely contaminates our bodies . The tongue sets our lives on fire , and is itself set on fire from hell .
59003007	People have tamed all kinds of animals , birds , reptiles , and sea creatures .
59003008	Yet , no one can tame the tongue . It is an uncontrollable evil filled with deadly poison .
59003009	With our tongues we praise our Lord and Father . Yet , with the same tongues we curse people , who were created in God’s likeness .
59003010	Praise and curses come from the same mouth . My brothers and sisters , this should not happen !
59003011	Do clean and polluted water flow out of the same spring ?
59003012	My brothers and sisters , can a fig tree produce olives ? Can a grapevine produce figs ? In the same way , a pool of salt water can’t produce fresh water .
59003013	Do any of you have wisdom and insight ? Show this by living the right way with the humility that comes from wisdom .
59003014	But if you are bitterly jealous and filled with self-centered ambition , don’t brag . Don’t say that you are wise when it isn’t true .
59003015	That kind of wisdom doesn’t come from above . It belongs to this world . It is self-centered and demonic .
59003016	Wherever there is jealousy and rivalry , there is disorder and every kind of evil .
59003017	However , the wisdom that comes from above is first of all pure . Then it is peaceful , gentle , obedient , filled with mercy and good deeds , impartial , and sincere .
59003018	A harvest that has God’s approval comes from the peace planted by peacemakers .
59004001	What causes fights and quarrels among you ? Aren’t they caused by the selfish desires that fight to control you ?
59004002	You want what you don’t have , so you commit murder . You’re determined to have things , but you can’t get what you want . You quarrel and fight . You don’t have the things you want , because you don’t pray for them .
59004003	When you pray for things , you don’t get them because you want them for the wrong reason—for your own pleasure .
59004004	You unfaithful people ! Don’t you know that love for this evil world is hatred toward God ? Whoever wants to be a friend of this world is an enemy of God .
59004005	Do you think this passage means nothing ? It says , “ The Spirit that lives in us wants us to be his own . ”
59004006	But God shows us even more kindness . Scripture says , “ God opposes arrogant people , but he is kind to humble people . ”
59004007	So place yourselves under God’s authority . Resist the devil , and he will run away from you .
59004008	Come close to God , and he will come close to you . Clean up your lives , you sinners , and clear your minds , you doubters .
59004009	Be miserable , mourn , and cry . Turn your laughter into mourning and your joy into gloom .
59004010	Humble yourselves in the Lord’s presence . Then he will give you a high position .
59004011	Brothers and sisters , stop slandering each other . Those who slander and judge other believers slander and judge God’s teachings . If you judge God’s teachings , you are no longer following them . Instead , you are judging them .
59004012	There is only one teacher and judge . He is able to save or destroy you . So who are you to judge your neighbor ?
59004013	Pay attention to this ! You’re saying , “ Today or tomorrow we will go into some city , stay there a year , conduct business , and make money . ”
59004014	You don’t know what will happen tomorrow . What is life ? You are a mist that is seen for a moment and then disappears .
59004015	Instead , you should say , “ If the Lord wants us to , we will live and carry out our plans . ”
59004016	However , you brag because you’re arrogant . All such bragging is evil .
59004017	Whoever knows what is right but doesn’t do it is sinning .
59005001	Pay attention to this if you’re rich . Cry and moan about the misery that is coming to you .
59005002	Your riches have decayed , and your clothes have been eaten by moths .
59005003	Your gold and silver are corroded , and their corrosion will be used as evidence against you . Like fire , it will destroy your body . You have stored up riches in these last days .
59005004	The wages you refused to pay the people who harvested your fields shout to God against you . The Lord of Armies has heard the cries of those who gather the crops .
59005005	You have lived in luxury and pleasure here on earth . You have fattened yourselves for the day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned and murdered people who have God’s approval , even though they didn’t resist you .
59005007	Brothers and sisters , be patient until the Lord comes again . See how farmers wait for their precious crops to grow . They wait patiently for fall and spring rains .
59005008	You , too , must be patient . Don’t give up hope . The Lord will soon be here .
59005009	Brothers and sisters , stop complaining about each other , or you will be condemned . Realize that the judge is standing at the door .
59005010	Brothers and sisters , follow the example of the prophets who spoke in the name of the Lord . They were patient when they suffered unjustly .
59005011	We consider those who endure to be blessed . You have heard about Job’s endurance . You saw that the Lord ended Job’s suffering because the Lord is compassionate and merciful .
59005012	Above all things , my brothers and sisters , do not take an oath on anything in heaven or on earth . Do not take any oath . If you mean yes , say yes . If you mean no , say no . Do this so that you won’t be condemned .
59005013	If any of you are having trouble , pray . If you are happy , sing psalms .
59005014	If you are sick , call for the church leaders . Have them pray for you and anoint you with olive oil in the name of the Lord .
59005015	( Prayers offered in faith will save those who are sick , and the Lord will cure them . ) If you have sinned , you will be forgiven .
59005016	So admit your sins to each other , and pray for each other so that you will be healed . Prayers offered by those who have God’s approval are effective .
59005017	Elijah was human like us . Yet , when he prayed that it wouldn’t rain , no rain fell on the ground for three-and-a-half years .
59005018	Then he prayed again . It rained , and the ground produced crops .
59005019	My brothers and sisters , if one of you wanders from the truth , someone can bring that person back .
59005020	Realize that whoever brings a sinner back from the error of his ways will save him from death , and many sins will be forgiven .
60001001	From Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ . To God’s chosen people who are temporary residents in the world and are scattered throughout the provinces of Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia .
60001002	God the Father knew you long ago and chose you to live holy lives with the Spirit’s help so that you are obedient to Jesus Christ and are sprinkled with his blood . May good will and peace fill your lives !
60001003	Praise the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ! God has given us a new birth because of his great mercy . We have been born into a new life that has a confidence which is alive because Jesus Christ has come back to life .
60001004	We have been born into a new life which has an inheritance that can’t be destroyed or corrupted and can’t fade away . That inheritance is kept in heaven for you ,
60001005	since you are guarded by God’s power through faith for a salvation that is ready to be revealed at the end of time .
60001006	You are extremely happy about these things , even though you have to suffer different kinds of trouble for a little while now .
60001007	The purpose of these troubles is to test your faith as fire tests how genuine gold is . Your faith is more precious than gold , and by passing the test , it gives praise , glory , and honor to God . This will happen when Jesus Christ appears again .
60001008	Although you have never seen Christ , you love him . You don’t see him now , but you believe in him . You are extremely happy with joy and praise that can hardly be expressed in words
60001009	as you obtain the salvation that is the goal of your faith .
60001010	The prophets carefully researched and investigated this salvation . Long ago they spoke about God’s kindness that would come to you .
60001011	So they tried to find out what time or situation the Spirit of Christ kept referring to whenever he predicted Christ’s sufferings and the glory that would follow .
60001012	God revealed to the prophets that the things they had spoken were not for their own benefit but for yours . What the prophets had spoken , the Holy Spirit , who was sent from heaven , has now made known to you by those who spread the Good News among you . These are things that even the angels want to look into .
60001013	Therefore , your minds must be clear and ready for action . Place your confidence completely in what God’s kindness will bring you when Jesus Christ appears again .
60001014	Because you are children who obey God , don’t live the kind of lives you once lived . Once you lived to satisfy your desires because you didn’t know any better .
60001015	But because the God who called you is holy you must be holy in every aspect of your life .
60001016	Scripture says , “ Be holy , because I am holy . ”
60001017	So if you call God your Father , live your time as temporary residents on earth in fear . He is the God who judges all people by what they have done , and he doesn’t play favorites .
60001018	Realize that you weren’t set free from the worthless life handed down to you from your ancestors by a payment of silver or gold which can be destroyed .
60001019	Rather , the payment that freed you was the precious blood of Christ , the lamb with no defects or imperfections .
60001020	He is the lamb who was known long ago before the world existed , but for your good he became publicly known in the last period of time .
60001021	Through him you believe in God who brought Christ back to life and gave him glory . So your faith and confidence are in God .
60001022	Love each other with a warm love that comes from the heart . After all , you have purified yourselves by obeying the truth . As a result you have a sincere love for each other .
60001023	You have been born again , not from a seed that can be destroyed , but through God’s everlasting word that can’t be destroyed . That’s why Scripture says ,
60001024	“ All people are like grass , and all their beauty is like a flower of the field . The grass dries up and the flower drops off ,
60001025	but the word of the Lord lasts forever . ” This word is the Good News that was told to you .
60002001	So get rid of every kind of evil , every kind of deception , hypocrisy , jealousy , and every kind of slander .
60002002	Desire God’s pure word as newborn babies desire milk . Then you will grow in your salvation .
60002003	Certainly you have tasted that the Lord is good !
60002004	You are coming to Christ , the living stone who was rejected by humans but was chosen as precious by God .
60002005	You come to him as living stones , a spiritual house that is being built into a holy priesthood . So offer spiritual sacrifices that God accepts through Jesus Christ .
60002006	That is why Scripture says , “ I am laying a chosen and precious cornerstone in Zion , and the person who believes in himwill never be ashamed . ”
60002007	This honor belongs to those who believe . But to those who don’t believe : “ The stone that the builders rejectedhas become the cornerstone ,
60002008	a stone that people trip over , a large rock that people find offensive . ” The people tripped over the word because they refused to believe it . Therefore , this is how they ended up .
60002009	However , you are chosen people , a royal priesthood , a holy nation , people who belong to God . You were chosen to tell about the excellent qualities of God , who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light .
60002010	Once you were not God’s people , but now you are . Once you were not shown mercy , but now you have been shown mercy .
60002011	Dear friends , since you are foreigners and temporary residents in the world , I’m encouraging you to keep away from the desires of your corrupt nature . These desires constantly attack you .
60002012	Live decent lives among unbelievers . Then , although they ridicule you as if you were doing wrong while they are watching you do good things , they will praise God on the day he comes to help you .
60002013	Place yourselves under the authority of human governments to please the Lord . Obey the emperor . He holds the highest position of authority .
60002014	Also obey governors . They are people the emperor has sent to punish those who do wrong and to praise those who do right .
60002015	God wants you to silence the ignorance of foolish people by doing what is right .
60002016	Live as free people , but don’t hide behind your freedom when you do evil . Instead , use your freedom to serve God .
60002017	Honor everyone . Love your brothers and sisters in the faith . Fear God . Honor the emperor .
60002018	Slaves , place yourselves under the authority of your owners and show them complete respect . Obey not only those owners who are good and kind , but also those who are unfair .
60002019	God is pleased if a person is aware of him while enduring the pains of unjust suffering .
60002020	What credit do you deserve if you endure a beating for doing something wrong ? But if you endure suffering for doing something good , God is pleased with you .
60002021	God called you to endure suffering because Christ suffered for you . He left you an example so that you could follow in his footsteps .
60002022	Christ never committed any sin . He never spoke deceitfully .
60002023	Christ never verbally abused those who verbally abused him . When he suffered , he didn’t make any threats but left everything to the one who judges fairly .
60002024	Christ carried our sins in his body on the cross so that freed from our sins , we could live a life that has God’s approval . His wounds have healed you .
60002025	You were like lost sheep . Now you have come back to the shepherd and bishop of your lives .
60003001	Wives , in a similar way , place yourselves under your husbands’ authority . Some husbands may not obey God’s word . Their wives could win these men for Christ by the way they live without saying anything .
60003002	Their husbands would see how pure and reverent their lives are .
60003003	Wives must not let their beauty be something external . Beauty doesn’t come from hairstyles , gold jewelry , or clothes .
60003004	Rather , beauty is something internal that can’t be destroyed . Beauty expresses itself in a gentle and quiet attitude which God considers precious .
60003005	After all , this is how holy women who had confidence in God expressed their beauty in the past . They placed themselves under their husbands’ authority
60003006	as Sarah did . Sarah obeyed Abraham and spoke to him respectfully . You became Sarah’s daughters by not letting anything make you afraid to do good .
60003007	Husbands , in a similar way , live with your wives with understanding since they are weaker than you are . Honor your wives as those who share God’s life-giving kindness so that nothing will interfere with your prayers .
60003008	Finally , everyone must live in harmony , be sympathetic , love each other , have compassion , and be humble .
60003009	Don’t pay people back with evil for the evil they do to you , or ridicule those who ridicule you . Instead , bless them , because you were called to inherit a blessing .
60003010	“ People who want to live a full life and enjoy good daysmust keep their tongues from saying evil things , and their lips from speaking deceitful things .
60003011	They must turn away from evil and do good . They must seek peace and pursue it .
60003012	The Lord’s eyes are on those who do what he approves . His ears hear their prayer . The Lord confronts those who do evil . ”
60003013	Who will harm you if you are devoted to doing what is good ?
60003014	But even if you suffer for doing what God approves , you are blessed . Don’t be afraid of those who want to harm you . Don’t get upset .
60003015	But dedicate your lives to Christ as Lord . Always be ready to defend your confidence in God when anyone asks you to explain it . However , make your defense with gentleness and respect .
60003016	Keep your conscience clear . Then those who treat the good Christian life you live with contempt will feel ashamed that they have ridiculed you .
60003017	After all , if it is God’s will , it’s better to suffer for doing good than for doing wrong .
60003018	This is true because Christ suffered for our sins once . He was an innocent person , but he suffered for guilty people so that he could bring you to God . His body was put to death , but he was brought to life through his spirit .
60003019	In it he also went to proclaim his victory to the spirits kept in prison .
60003020	They are like those who disobeyed long ago in the days of Noah when God waited patiently while Noah built the ship . In this ship a few people—eight in all—were saved by water .
60003021	Baptism , which is like that water , now saves you . Baptism doesn’t save by removing dirt from the body . Rather , baptism is a request to God for a clear conscience . It saves you through Jesus Christ , who came back from death to life .
60003022	Christ has gone to heaven where he has the highest position that God gives . Angels , rulers , and powers have been placed under his authority .
60004001	Since Christ has suffered physically , take the same attitude that he had . ( A person who has suffered physically no longer sins . )
60004002	That way you won’t be guided by sinful human desires as you live the rest of your lives on earth . Instead , you will be guided by what God wants you to do .
60004003	You spent enough time in the past doing what unbelievers like to do . You were promiscuous , had sinful desires , got drunk , went to wild parties , and took part in the forbidden worship of false gods .
60004004	Unbelievers insult you now because they are surprised that you no longer join them in the same excesses of wild living .
60004005	They will give an account to the one who is ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	After all , the Good News was told to people like that , although they are now dead . It was told to them so that they could be judged like humans in their earthly lives and live like God in their spiritual lives .
60004007	The end of everything is near . Therefore , practice self-control , and keep your minds clear so that you can pray .
60004008	Above all , love each other warmly , because love covers many sins .
60004009	Welcome each other as guests without complaining .
60004010	Each of you as a good manager must use the gift that God has given you to serve others .
60004011	Whoever speaks must speak God’s words . Whoever serves must serve with the strength God supplies so that in every way God receives glory through Jesus Christ . Glory and power belong to Jesus Christ forever and ever ! Amen .
60004012	Dear friends , don’t be surprised by the fiery troubles that are coming in order to test you . Don’t feel as though something strange is happening to you ,
60004013	but be happy as you share Christ’s sufferings . Then you will also be full of joy when he appears again in his glory .
60004014	If you are insulted because of the name of Christ , you are blessed because the Spirit of glory—the Spirit of God—is resting on you .
60004015	If you suffer , you shouldn’t suffer for being a murderer , thief , criminal , or troublemaker .
60004016	If you suffer for being a Christian , don’t feel ashamed , but praise God for being called that name .
60004017	The time has come for the judgment to begin , and it will begin with God’s family . If it starts with us , what will be the end for those who refuse to obey the Good News of God ? If it’s hard for the person who has God’s approval to be saved , what will happen to the godless sinner ?
60004019	Those who suffer because that is God’s will for them must entrust themselves to a faithful creator and continue to do what is good .
60005001	I appeal to your spiritual leaders . I make this appeal as a spiritual leader who also witnessed Christ’s sufferings and will share in the glory that will be revealed .
60005002	Be shepherds over the flock God has entrusted to you . Watch over it as God does : Don’t do this because you have to , but because you want to . Don’t do it out of greed , but out of a desire to serve .
60005003	Don’t be rulers over the people entrusted to you , but be examples for the flock to follow .
60005004	Then , when the chief shepherd appears , you will receive the crown of glory that will never fade away .
60005005	Young people , in a similar way , place yourselves under the authority of spiritual leaders . Furthermore , all of you must serve each other with humility , because God opposes the arrogant but favors the humble .
60005006	Be humbled by God’s power so that when the right time comes he will honor you .
60005007	Turn all your anxiety over to God because he cares for you .
60005008	Keep your mind clear , and be alert . Your opponent the devil is prowling around like a roaring lion as he looks for someone to devour .
60005009	Be firm in the faith and resist him , knowing that other believers throughout the world are going through the same kind of suffering .
60005010	God , who shows you his kindness and who has called you through Christ Jesus to his eternal glory , will restore you , strengthen you , make you strong , and support you as you suffer for a little while .
60005011	Power belongs to him forever . Amen .
60005012	I’ve written this short letter to you and I’m sending it by Silvanus , whom I regard as a faithful brother . I’ve written to encourage you and to testify that this is God’s genuine good will . Remain firmly established in it !
60005013	Your sister church in Babylon , chosen by God , and my son Mark send you greetings .
60005014	Greet each other with a kiss of love . Peace to all of you who are in Christ .
61001001	From Simon Peter , a servant and apostle of Jesus Christ . To those who have obtained a faith that is as valuable as ours , a faith based on the approval that comes from our God and Savior , Jesus Christ .
61001002	May good will and peace fill your lives through your knowledge about Jesus , our God and Lord !
61001003	God’s divine power has given us everything we need for life and for godliness . This power was given to us through knowledge of the one who called us by his own glory and integrity .
61001004	Through his glory and integrity he has given us his promises that are of the highest value . Through these promises you will share in the divine nature because you have escaped the corruption that sinful desires cause in the world .
61001005	Because of this , make every effort to add integrity to your faith ; and to integrity add knowledge ;
61001006	to knowledge add self-control ; to self-control add endurance ; to endurance add godliness ;
61001007	to godliness add Christian affection ; and to Christian affection add love .
61001008	If you have these qualities and they are increasing , it demonstrates that your knowledge about our Lord Jesus Christ is living and productive .
61001009	If these qualities aren’t present in your life , you’re shortsighted and have forgotten that you were cleansed from your past sins .
61001010	Therefore , brothers and sisters , use more effort to make God’s calling and choosing of you secure . If you keep doing this , you will never fall away .
61001011	Then you will also be given the wealth of entering into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ .
61001012	Therefore , I will always remind you about these qualities , although you already know about them and are well-grounded in the truth that you now have .
61001013	As long as I’m still alive , I think it’s right to refresh your memory .
61001014	I know that I will die soon . Our Lord Jesus Christ has made that clear to me .
61001015	So I will make every effort to see that you remember these things after I die .
61001016	When we apostles told you about the powerful coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , we didn’t base our message on clever myths that we made up . Rather , we witnessed his majesty with our own eyes .
61001017	For example , we were eyewitnesses when he received honor and glory from God the Father and when the voice of our majestic God spoke these words to him : “ This is my Son , whom I love and in whom I delight . ”
61001018	We heard that voice speak to him from heaven when we were with him on the holy mountain .
61001019	So we regard the words of the prophets as confirmed beyond all doubt . You’re doing well by paying attention to their words . Continue to pay attention as you would to a light that shines in a dark place as you wait for day to come and the morning star to rise in your hearts .
61001020	First , you must understand this : No prophecy in Scripture is a matter of one’s own interpretation .
61001021	No prophecy ever originated from humans . Instead , it was given by the Holy Spirit as humans spoke under God’s direction .
61002001	False prophets were among God’s people in the past , as false teachers will be among you . They will secretly bring in their own destructive teachings . They will deny the Lord , who has bought them , and they will bring themselves swift destruction .
61002002	Many people will follow them in their sexual freedom and will cause others to dishonor the way of truth .
61002003	In their greed they will use good-sounding arguments to exploit you . The verdict against them from long ago is still in force , and their destruction is not asleep .
61002004	God didn’t spare angels who sinned . He threw them into hell , where he has secured them with chains of darkness and is holding them for judgment .
61002005	God didn’t spare the ancient world either . He brought the flood on the world of ungodly people , but he protected Noah and seven other people . Noah was his messenger who told people about the kind of life that has God’s approval .
61002006	God condemned the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah and destroyed them by burning them to ashes . He made those cities an example to ungodly people of what is going to happen to them .
61002007	Yet , God rescued Lot , a man who had his approval . Lot was distressed by the lifestyle of people who had no principles and lived in sexual freedom .
61002008	Although he was a man who had God’s approval , he lived among the people of Sodom and Gomorrah . Each day was like torture to him as he saw and heard the immoral things that people did .
61002009	Since the Lord did all this , he knows how to rescue godly people when they are tested . He also knows how to hold immoral people for punishment on the day of judgment .
61002010	This is especially true of those who follow their corrupt nature along the path of impure desires and who despise the Lord’s authority . These false teachers are bold and arrogant . They aren’t afraid to insult the Lord’s glory .
61002011	Angels , who have more strength and power than these teachers , don’t bring an insulting judgment against them from the Lord .
61002012	These false teachers insult what they don’t understand . They are like animals , which are creatures of instinct that are born to be caught and killed . So they will be destroyed like animals
61002013	and lose what their wrongdoing earned them . These false teachers are stains and blemishes . They take pleasure in holding wild parties in broad daylight . They especially enjoy deceiving you while they eat with you .
61002014	They’re always looking for an adulterous woman . They can’t stop looking for sin as they seduce people who aren’t sure of what they believe . Their minds are focused on their greed . They are cursed .
61002015	These false teachers have left the straight path and wandered off to follow the path of Balaam , son of Beor . Balaam loved what his wrongdoing earned him .
61002016	But he was convicted for his evil . A donkey , which normally can’t talk , spoke with a human voice and wouldn’t allow the prophet to continue his insanity .
61002017	These false teachers are dried-up springs . They are a mist blown around by a storm . Gloomy darkness has been kept for them .
61002018	They arrogantly use nonsense to seduce people by appealing to their sexual desires , especially to sexual freedom . They seduce people who have just escaped from those who live in error .
61002019	They promise these people freedom , but they themselves are slaves to corruption . A person is a slave to whatever he gives in to .
61002020	People can know our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ and escape the world’s filth . But if they get involved in this filth again and give in to it , they are worse off than they were before .
61002021	It would have been better for them never to have known the way of life that God approves of than to know it and turn their backs on the holy life God told them to live .
61002022	These proverbs have come true for them : “ A dog goes back to its vomit , ” and “ A sow that has been washed goes back to roll around in the mud . ”
61003001	Dear friends , this is the second letter I’m writing to you . In both letters I’m trying to refresh your memory .
61003002	I want you to remember the words spoken in the past by the holy prophets and what the Lord and Savior commanded you through your apostles .
61003003	First , you must understand this : In the last days people who follow their own desires will appear . These disrespectful people will ridicule God’s promise
61003004	by saying , “ What’s happened to his promise to return ? Ever since our ancestors died , everything continues as it did from the beginning of the world . ”
61003005	They are deliberately ignoring one fact : Because of God’s word , heaven and earth existed a long time ago . The earth appeared out of water and was kept alive by water .
61003006	Water also flooded and destroyed that world .
61003007	By God’s word , the present heaven and earth are designated to be burned . They are being kept until the day ungodly people will be judged and destroyed .
61003008	Dear friends , don’t ignore this fact : One day with the Lord is like a thousand years , and a thousand years are like one day .
61003009	The Lord isn’t slow to do what he promised , as some people think . Rather , he is patient for your sake . He doesn’t want to destroy anyone but wants all people to have an opportunity to turn to him and change the way they think and act .
61003010	The day of the Lord will come like a thief . On that day heaven will pass away with a roaring sound . Everything that makes up the universe will burn and be destroyed . The earth and everything that people have done on it will be exposed .
61003011	All these things will be destroyed in this way . So think of the kind of holy and godly lives you must live
61003012	as you look forward to the day of God and eagerly wait for it to come . When that day comes , heaven will be on fire and will be destroyed . Everything that makes up the universe will burn and melt .
61003013	But we look forward to what God has promised—a new heaven and a new earth—a place where everything that has God’s approval lives .
61003014	Therefore , dear friends , with this to look forward to , make every effort to have him find you at peace , without spiritual stains or blemishes .
61003015	Think of our Lord’s patience as an opportunity for us to be saved . This is what our dear brother Paul wrote to you about , using the wisdom God gave him .
61003016	He talks about this subject in all his letters . Some things in his letters are hard to understand . Ignorant people and people who aren’t sure of what they believe distort what Paul says in his letters the same way they distort the rest of the Scriptures . These people will be destroyed .
61003017	Dear friends , you already know these things . So be on your guard not to be carried away by the deception of people who have no principles . Then you won’t fall from your firm position .
61003018	But grow in the good will and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . Glory belongs to him now and for that eternal day ! Amen .
62001001	The Word of life existed from the beginning . We have heard it . We have seen it . We observed and touched it .
62001002	This life was revealed to us . We have seen it , and we testify about it . We are reporting to you about this eternal life that was in the presence of the Father and was revealed to us .
62001003	This is the life we have seen and heard . We are reporting about it to you also so that you , too , can have a relationship with us . Our relationship is with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ .
62001004	We are writing this so that we can be completely filled with joy .
62001005	This is the message we heard from Christ and are reporting to you : God is light , and there isn’t any darkness in him .
62001006	If we say , “ We have a relationship with God ” and yet live in the dark , we’re lying . We aren’t being truthful .
62001007	But if we live in the light in the same way that God is in the light , we have a relationship with each other . And the blood of his Son Jesus cleanses us from every sin .
62001008	If we say , “ We aren’t sinful ” we are deceiving ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
62001009	God is faithful and reliable . If we confess our sins , he forgives them and cleanses us from everything we’ve done wrong .
62001010	If we say , “ We have never sinned , ” we turn God into a liar and his Word is not in us .
62002001	My dear children , I’m writing this to you so that you will not sin . Yet , if anyone does sin , we have Jesus Christ , who has God’s full approval . He speaks on our behalf when we come into the presence of the Father .
62002002	He is the payment for our sins , and not only for our sins , but also for the sins of the whole world .
62002003	We are sure that we know Christ if we obey his commandments .
62002004	The person who says , “ I know him , ” but doesn’t obey his commandments is a liar . The truth isn’t in that person .
62002005	But whoever obeys what Christ says is the kind of person in whom God’s love is perfected . That’s how we know we are in Christ .
62002006	Those who say that they live in him must live the same way he lived .
62002007	Dear friends , it’s not as though I’m writing to give you a new commandment . Rather , I’m giving you an old commandment that you’ve had from the beginning . It’s the old commandment you’ve already heard .
62002008	On the other hand , I’m writing to give you a new commandment . It’s a truth that exists in Christ and in you : The darkness is fading , and the true light is already shining .
62002009	Those who say that they are in the light but hate other believers are still in the dark .
62002010	Those who love other believers live in the light . Nothing will destroy the faith of those who live in the light .
62002011	Those who hate other believers are in the dark and live in the dark . They don’t know where they’re going , because they can’t see in the dark .
62002012	I’m writing to you , dear children , because your sins are forgiven through Christ .
62002013	I’m writing to you , fathers , because you know Christ who has existed from the beginning . I’m writing to you , young people , because you have won the victory over the evil one .
62002014	I’ve written to you , children , because you know the Father . I’ve written to you , fathers , because you know Christ , who has existed from the beginning . I’ve written to you , young people , because you are strong and God’s word lives in you . You have won the victory over the evil one .
62002015	Don’t love the world and what it offers . Those who love the world don’t have the Father’s love in them .
62002016	Not everything that the world offers—physical gratification , greed , and extravagant lifestyles—comes from the Father . It comes from the world , and
62002017	the world and its evil desires are passing away . But the person who does what God wants lives forever .
62002018	Children , it’s the end of time . You’ve heard that an antichrist is coming . Certainly , many antichrists are already here . That’s how we know it’s the end of time .
62002019	They left us . However , they were never really part of us . If they had been , they would have stayed with us . But by leaving they made it clear that none of them were part of us .
62002020	The Holy One has anointed you , so all of you have knowledge .
62002021	I’m writing to you because you know the truth , not because you don’t know the truth . You know that no lie ever comes from the truth .
62002022	Who is a liar ? Who else but the person who rejects Jesus as the Messiah ? The person who rejects the Father and the Son is an antichrist .
62002023	Everyone who rejects the Son doesn’t have the Father either . The person who acknowledges the Son also has the Father .
62002024	Make sure that the message you heard from the beginning lives in you . If that message lives in you , you will also live in the Son and in the Father .
62002025	Christ has given us the promise of eternal life .
62002026	I’m writing to you about those who are trying to deceive you .
62002027	The anointing you received from Christ lives in you . You don’t need anyone to teach you something else . Instead , Christ’s anointing teaches you about everything . His anointing is true and contains no lie . So live in Christ as he taught you to do .
62002028	Now , dear children , live in Christ . Then , when he appears we will have confidence , and when he comes we won’t turn from him in shame .
62002029	If you know that Christ has God’s approval , you also know that everyone who does what God approves of has been born from God .
62003001	Consider this : The Father has given us his love . He loves us so much that we are actually called God’s dear children . And that’s what we are . For this reason the world doesn’t recognize us , and it didn’t recognize him either .
62003002	Dear friends , now we are God’s children . What we will be isn’t completely clear yet . We do know that when Christ appears we will be like him because we will see him as he is .
62003003	So all people who have this confidence in Christ keep themselves pure , as Christ is pure .
62003004	Those who live sinful lives are disobeying God . Sin is disobedience .
62003005	You know that Christ appeared in order to take away our sins . He isn’t sinful .
62003006	Those who live in Christ don’t go on sinning . Those who go on sinning haven’t seen or known Christ .
62003007	Dear children , don’t let anyone deceive you . Whoever does what God approves of has God’s approval as Christ has God’s approval .
62003008	The person who lives a sinful life belongs to the devil , because the devil has been committing sin since the beginning . The reason that the Son of God appeared was to destroy what the devil does .
62003009	Those who have been born from God don’t live sinful lives . What God has said lives in them , and they can’t live sinful lives . They have been born from God .
62003010	This is the way God’s children are distinguished from the devil’s children . Everyone who doesn’t do what is right or love other believers isn’t God’s child .
62003011	The message that you have heard from the beginning is to love each other .
62003012	Don’t be like Cain . He was a child of the evil one and murdered his brother . And why did Cain murder his brother ? Because the things Cain did were evil and the things his brother did had God’s approval .
62003013	Brothers and sisters , don’t be surprised if the world hates you .
62003014	We know that we have passed from death to life , because we love other believers . The person who doesn’t grow in love remains in death .
62003015	Everyone who hates another believer is a murderer , and you know that a murderer doesn’t have eternal life .
62003016	We understand what love is when we realize that Christ gave his life for us . That means we must give our lives for other believers .
62003017	Now , suppose a person has enough to live on and notices another believer in need . How can God’s love be in that person if he doesn’t bother to help the other believer ?
62003018	Dear children , we must show love through actions that are sincere , not through empty words .
62003019	This is how we will know that we belong to the truth and how we will be reassured in his presence .
62003020	Whenever our conscience condemns us , we will be reassured that God is greater than our conscience and knows everything .
62003021	Dear friends , if our conscience doesn’t condemn us , we can boldly look to God
62003022	and receive from him anything we ask . We receive it because we obey his commandments and do what pleases him .
62003023	This is his commandment : to believe in his Son , the one named Jesus Christ , and to love each other as he commanded us .
62003024	Those who obey Christ’s commandments live in God , and God lives in them . We know that he lives in us because he has given us the Spirit .
62004001	Dear friends , don’t believe all people who say that they have the Spirit . Instead , test them . See whether the spirit they have is from God , because there are many false prophets in the world .
62004002	This is how you can recognize God’s Spirit : Every person who declares that Jesus Christ has come as a human has the Spirit that is from God .
62004003	But every person who doesn’t declare that Jesus Christ has come as a human has a spirit that isn’t from God . This is the spirit of the antichrist that you have heard is coming . That spirit is already in the world .
62004004	Dear children , you belong to God . So you have won the victory over these people , because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world .
62004005	These people belong to the world . That’s why they speak the thoughts of the world , and the world listens to them .
62004006	We belong to God . The person who knows God listens to us . Whoever doesn’t belong to God doesn’t listen to us . That’s how we can tell the Spirit of truth from the spirit of lies .
62004007	Dear friends , we must love each other because love comes from God . Everyone who loves has been born from God and knows God .
62004008	The person who doesn’t love doesn’t know God , because God is love .
62004009	God has shown us his love by sending his only Son into the world so that we could have life through him .
62004010	This is love : not that we have loved God , but that he loved us and sent his Son to be the payment for our sins .
62004011	Dear friends , if this is the way God loved us , we must also love each other .
62004012	No one has ever seen God . If we love each other , God lives in us , and his love is perfected in us .
62004013	We know that we live in him and he lives in us because he has given us his Spirit .
62004014	We have seen and testify to the fact that the Father sent his Son as the Savior of the world .
62004015	God lives in those who declare that Jesus is the Son of God , and they live in God .
62004016	We have known and believed that God loves us . God is love . Those who live in God’s love live in God , and God lives in them .
62004017	God’s love has reached its goal in us . So we look ahead with confidence to the day of judgment . While we are in this world , we are exactly like him with regard to love .
62004018	No fear exists where his love is . Rather , perfect love gets rid of fear , because fear involves punishment . The person who lives in fear doesn’t have perfect love .
62004019	We love because God loved us first .
62004020	Whoever says , “ I love God , ” but hates another believer is a liar . People who don’t love other believers , whom they have seen , can’t love God , whom they have not seen .
62004021	Christ has given us this commandment : The person who loves God must also love other believers .
62005001	Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Messiah has been born from God . Everyone who loves the Father also loves his children .
62005002	We know that we love God’s children when we love God by obeying his commandments .
62005003	To love God means that we obey his commandments . Obeying his commandments isn’t difficult
62005004	because everyone who has been born from God has won the victory over the world . Our faith is what wins the victory over the world .
62005005	Who wins the victory over the world ? Isn’t it the person who believes that Jesus is the Son of God ?
62005006	This Son of God is Jesus Christ , who came by water and blood . He didn’t come with water only , but with water and with blood . The Spirit is the one who verifies this , because the Spirit is the truth .
62005007	There are three witnesses :
62005008	the Spirit , the water , and the blood . These three witnesses agree .
62005009	We accept human testimony . God’s testimony is greater because it is the testimony that he has given about his Son .
62005010	Those who believe in the Son of God have the testimony of God in them . Those who don’t believe God have made God a liar . They haven’t believed the testimony that God has given about his Son .
62005011	This is the testimony : God has given us eternal life , and this life is found in his Son .
62005012	The person who has the Son has this life . The person who doesn’t have the Son of God doesn’t have this life .
62005013	I’ve written this to those who believe in the Son of God so that they will know that they have eternal life .
62005014	We are confident that God listens to us if we ask for anything that has his approval .
62005015	We know that he listens to our requests . So we know that we already have what we ask him for .
62005016	If you see another believer committing a sin that doesn’t lead to death , you should pray that God would give that person life . This is true for those who commit sins that don’t lead to death . There is a sin that leads to death . I’m not telling you to pray about that .
62005017	Every kind of wrongdoing is sin , yet there are sins that don’t lead to death .
62005018	We know that those who have been born from God don’t go on sinning . Rather , the Son of God protects them , and the evil one can’t harm them .
62005019	We know that we are from God , and that the whole world is under the control of the evil one .
62005020	We know that the Son of God has come and has given us understanding so that we know the real God . We are in the one who is real , his Son Jesus Christ . This Jesus Christ is the real God and eternal life .
62005021	Dear children , guard yourselves from false gods .
63001001	From the church leader . To the chosen lady and her children , whom I love because we share the truth . I’m not the only one who loves you . Everyone who knows the truth also loves you .
63001002	We love you because of the truth which lives in us and will be with us forever .
63001003	Good will , mercy , and peace will be with us ! They come from God the Father and from Jesus Christ , who in truth and love is the Father’s Son .
63001004	I was very happy to find some of your children living in the truth as the Father has commanded us .
63001005	Dear lady , I’m now requesting that we continue to love each other . It’s not as though I’m writing to give you a new commandment . Rather , from the beginning we were commanded to love each other .
63001006	Love means that we live by doing what he commands . We were commanded to live in love , and you have heard this from the beginning .
63001007	Many people who deceive others have gone into the world . They refuse to declare that Jesus Christ came in flesh and blood . This is the mark of a deceiver and an antichrist .
63001008	Be careful that you don’t destroy what we’ve worked for , but that you receive your full reward .
63001009	Everyone who doesn’t continue to teach what Christ taught doesn’t have God . The person who continues to teach what Christ taught has both the Father and the Son .
63001010	If anyone comes to you and doesn’t bring these teachings , don’t take him into your home or even greet him .
63001011	Whoever greets him shares the evil things he’s doing .
63001012	I have a lot to write to you . I would prefer not to write a letter . Instead , I hope to visit and talk things over with you personally . Then we will be completely filled with joy .
63001013	The children of your chosen sister greet you .
64001001	From the church leader . To my dear friend Gaius , whom I love because we share the truth .
64001002	Dear friend , I know that you are spiritually well . I pray that you’re doing well in every other way and that you’re healthy .
64001003	I was very happy when some believers came and told us that you are living according to the truth .
64001004	Nothing makes me happier than to hear that my children are living according to the truth .
64001005	Dear friend , you are showing your faith in whatever you do for other believers , especially when they’re your guests .
64001006	These believers have told the congregation about your love . You will do well to support them on their trip in a way that proves you belong to God .
64001007	After all , they went on their trip to serve the one named Christ , and they didn’t accept any help from the people to whom they went .
64001008	We must support believers who go on trips like this so that we can work together with them in spreading the truth .
64001009	I wrote a letter to the congregation . But Diotrephes , who loves to be in charge , won’t accept us .
64001010	For this reason , when I come I will bring up what he’s doing . He’s not satisfied with saying malicious things about us . He also refuses to accept the believers we send as guests . He even tries to stop others who want to accept them and attempts to throw those people out of the congregation .
64001011	Dear friend , never imitate evil , but imitate good . The person who does good is from God . The person who does evil has never seen God .
64001012	Everyone , including the truth itself , says good things about Demetrius . We also say good things about him , and you know that what we say is true .
64001013	I have a lot to write to you . However , I would rather not write .
64001014	I hope to visit you very soon . Then we can talk things over personally .
64001015	Peace be with you ! Your friends here send you their greetings . Greet each of our friends by name .
65001001	From Jude , a servant of Jesus Christ and brother of James . To those who have been called , who are loved by God the Father , and who are kept safe for Jesus Christ .
65001002	May mercy , peace , and love fill your lives !
65001003	Dear friends , I had intended to write to you about the salvation we share . But something has come up . It demands that I write to you and encourage you to continue your fight for the Christian faith that was entrusted to God’s holy people once for all time .
65001004	Some people have slipped in among you unnoticed . Not long ago they were condemned in writing for the following reason : They are people to whom God means nothing . They use God’s kindness as an excuse for sexual freedom and deny our only Master and Lord , Jesus Christ .
65001005	I want to remind you about what you already know : The Lord once saved his people from Egypt . But on another occasion he destroyed those who didn’t believe .
65001006	He held angels for judgment on the great day . They were held in darkness , bound by eternal chains . These are the angels who didn’t keep their position of authority but abandoned their assigned place .
65001007	What happened to Sodom and Gomorrah and the cities near them is an example for us of the punishment of eternal fire . The people of these cities suffered the same fate that God’s people and the angels did , because they committed sexual sins and engaged in homosexual activities .
65001008	Yet , in a similar way , the people who slipped in among you are dreamers . They contaminate their bodies with sin , reject the Lord’s authority , and insult his glory .
65001009	When the archangel Michael argued with the devil , they were arguing over the body of Moses . But Michael didn’t dare to hand down a judgment against the devil . Instead , Michael said , “ May the Lord reprimand you ! ”
65001010	Whatever these people don’t understand , they insult . Like animals , which are creatures of instinct , they use whatever they know to destroy themselves .
65001011	How horrible it will be for them ! They have followed the path of Cain . They have rushed into Balaam’s error to make a profit . They have rebelled like Korah and destroyed themselves .
65001012	These people are a disgrace at the special meals you share with other believers . They eat with you and don’t feel ashamed . They are shepherds who care only for themselves . They are dry clouds blown around by the winds . They are withered , uprooted trees without any fruit . As a result , they have died twice .
65001013	Their shame is like the foam on the wild waves of the sea . They are wandering stars for whom gloomy darkness is kept forever .
65001014	Furthermore , Enoch , from the seventh generation after Adam , prophesied about them . He said , “ The Lord has come with countless thousands of his holy angels .
65001015	He has come to judge all these people . He has come to convict all these ungodly sinners for all the ungodly things they have done and all the harsh things they have said about him . ”
65001016	These people complain , find fault , follow their own desires , say arrogant things , and flatter people in order to take advantage of them .
65001017	Dear friends , remember what the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ told you to expect :
65001018	“ In the last times people who ridicule God will appear . They will follow their own ungodly desires . ”
65001019	These are the people who cause divisions . They are concerned about physical things , not spiritual things .
65001020	Dear friends , use your most holy faith to grow . Pray with the Holy Spirit’s help .
65001021	Remain in God’s love as you look for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ to give you eternal life .
65001022	Show mercy to those who have doubts .
65001023	Save others by snatching them from the fire of hell . Show mercy to others , even though you are afraid that you might be stained by their sinful lives .
65001024	God can guard you so that you don’t fall and so that you can be full of joy as you stand in his glorious presence without fault .
